REPORT_NNP on_IN Plague_NNP in_IN India_NNP from_IN September_NNP 1896_CD to_TO August_NNP 1897_CD ,_, compiled_VBN by_IN Mr._NNP R._NNP Nathan_NNP ,_, I._NNP C._NNP S._NNP ,_, was_VBD published_VBN under_IN the_DT orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP in_IN 1898_CD ;_: and_CC a_DT report_NN on_IN Plague_NNP in_IN this_DT Presidency_NN for_IN the_DT same_JJ period_NN ,_, compiled_VBN by_IN Mr._NNP Couchman_NNP ,_, I._NNP C._NNP S._NNP ,_, was_VBD published_VBN under_IN the_DT orders_NNS of_IN this_DT Government_NNP in_IN September_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Sub-_NNP sequently_RB ,_, neither_CC the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP nor_CC this_DT Government_NNP have_VBP issued_VBN any_DT comprehen-_JJ sive_JJ report_NN on_IN Plague_NNP ;_: but_CC reports_NNS have_VBP been_VBN issued_VBN by_IN other_JJ Governments_NNS in_IN whose_WP$ terri-_JJ tories_VBZ the_DT pestilence_NN has_VBZ appeared_VBN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) Report_NNP 011_CD Plague_NNP in_IN the_DT Hoshiarpur_NNP and_CC Jullundar_NNP Districts_NNP (_( Panjab_NNP )_) ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Report_NN on_IN Plague_NNP in_IN the_DT Central_NNP Provinces_NNPS ._.
The_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP have_VBP decided_VBN that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ desirable_JJ ,_, if_IN not_RB indeed_RB necessary_JJ ,_, that_IN some_DT account_NN of_IN the_DT history_NN and_CC progress_NN of_IN Plague_NNP in_IN this_DT Presidency_NNP during_IN the_DT past_JJ two_CD years_NNS ,_, together_RB with_IN the_DT efforts_NNS made_VBD to_TO repel_VB and_CC to_TO combat_VB it_PRP ,_, should_MD be_VB placed_VBN on_IN record_NN ._.
The_DT main_JJ objects_NNS aimed_VBN at_IN in_IN this_DT Report_NNP are-a_JJ comprehensive_JJ record_NN of_IN the_DT rise_NN and_CC progress_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN in_IN this_DT Presidency_NN from_IN May_NNP 1897_CD to_TO June_NNP 1899_CD ,_, with_IN its_PRP$ ,_, effects_NNS ,_, both_DT good_JJ and_CC bad_JJ :_: the_DT delimitation_NN of_IN our_PRP$ present_JJ knowledge_NN of_IN its_PRP$ origin_NN ,_, growth_NN ,_, dissemination_NN and_CC treatment_NN :_: the_DT results_NNS attained_VBN by_IN the_DT preventive_NN and_CC combative_JJ measures_NNS actually_RB adopted_VBN :_: and_CC a_DT work_NN of_IN reference_NN ._.
The_DT sources_NNS from_IN which_WDT this_DT Report_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN compiled_VBN are_VBP many_JJ and_CC various_JJ ._.

Plague_NNP appears_VBZ in_IN a_DT place_NN ,_, sweeps_VBZ off_IN anything_NN from_IN one-tenth_JJ to_TO one-third_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN in_IN a_DT few_JJ months_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB disappears_NNS ,_, leaving_VBG no_DT time_NN for_IN the_DT Plague_NNP staff_NN to_TO do_VB more_JJR than_IN attend_NN to_TO the_DT wants_VBZ of_IN the_DT stricken_NN and_CC provide_VB for_IN the_DT protection_NN of_IN the_DT healthy_JJ ._.

The_DT word_NN plague_NN is_VBZ derived_VBN ,_, through_IN the_DT Latin_NNP playa_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT Greek_NNP p_NN ?_. ?_. ?_. ?_.
:_: it_PRP signifies_VBZ '_'' a_DT stroke_NN ._.
Plague_NN is_VBZ the_DT most_RBS deadly_JJ of_IN all_DT known_VBN diseases_NNS ._.
Obscure_NN in_IN its_PRP$ origin_NN ,_, persistent_NN in_IN its_PRP$ duration_NN ,_, terrible_JJ in_IN its_PRP$ effects_NNS ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ baffled_VBN alike_IN the_DT investiga-_JJ tions_NNS of_IN science_NN and_CC the_DT observations_NNS of_IN the_DT most_RBS perspicacious_JJ ._.
The_DT attitude_NN it_PRP compels_VBZ in_IN those_DT who_WP are_VBP ,_, and_CC in_IN those_DT likely_JJ to_TO become_VB ,_, its_PRP$ victims_NNS is_VBZ one_CD of_IN abject_JJ panic_NN ._.
It_PRP assumes_VBZ varying_VBG forms_NNS ,_, it_PRP strikes_VBZ with_IN varying_VBG force_NN ,_, it_PRP rises_VBZ and_CC falls_VBZ with_IN varying_VBG rapidity_NN ._.
Such_JJ is_VBZ the_DT disease_NN which_WDT ,_, appearing_VBG century_NN after_IN century_NN ,_, now_RB in_IN the_DT most_RBS deadly_JJ epidemic_JJ ,_, and_CC now_RB in_IN a_DT mild_JJ sporadic_JJ ,_, form_NN ,_, was_VBD the_DT scourge_NN of_IN Europe_NNP up_IN to_TO the_DT very_RB beginning_NN of_IN the_DT 19th_JJ century_NN ._.
As_IN well_RB for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN com-_JJ pleteness_NN ,_, as_IN for_IN that_DT of_IN interest_NN and_CC comparison_NN ,_, a_DT brief_JJ sketch_NN of_IN what_WP it_PRP has_VBZ done_VBN in_IN the_DT past_NN ,_, both_DT in_IN the_DT West_NNP and_CC in_IN the_DT East_NNP ,_, will_MD not_RB be_VB out_IN of_IN place_NN here_RB ._.

D_NNP 1300-_JJ PLAGUE_NNP IN_NNP EUROPE_NNP ._.
(_( A._NN D._NNP 542-_JJ A._NNP D_NNP ._.
1841_CD ._. )_)
The_DT first_JJ historical_JJ notice_NN we_PRP have_VBP of_IN Plague_NNP is_VBZ contained_VBN m_IN the_DT fragment_NN of_IN the_DT Physician_NNP Rufus_NNP of_IN Ephesus_NNP ,_, preserved_VBN by_IN Oribasius_NNP (_( circ.._JJ B._NNP C._NNP 200_CD )_) ;_: but_CC although_IN mentioned_VBN later_RB by_IN Livy_NNP and_CC by_IN Orosius_NNP as_IN destroying_VBG one_CD million_CD people_NNS in_IN Africa_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB until_IN the_DT 6th_JJ century_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT reign_NN of_IN Justinian_NNP ,_, that_IN we_PRP find_VBP Bubonic_JJ Plague_NNP in_IN Europe_NNP ._.
Beginning_VBG at_IN Palusium_NNP (_( Egypt_NNP )_) in_IN 542_CD A._NN D._NNP ,_, it_PRP spread_VBD over_IN Egypt_NNP ;_: in_IN 543_CD it_PRP reached_VBD Constantinople_NNP ,_, where_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO have_VB destroyed_VBN 10.000_CD people_NNS in_IN one_CD day_NN ;_: in_IN 546_CD we_PRP find_VBP it_PRP in_IN Gaul_NNP (_( France_NNP )_) ;_: in_IN 565_CD in_IN Italy_NNP ,_, ``_`` where_WRB it_PRP depopulated_VBD the_DT country_NN to_TO such_PDT an_DT extent_NN as_IN to_TO leave_VB it_PRP an_DT easy_JJ prey_NN to_TO the_DT Lombards_NNP ._. ''_''
Con-_JJ stantinople_NN was_VBD ,_, thus_RB ,_, we_PRP see_VBP ,_, the_DT first_JJ haunt_NN of_IN Plague_NNP in_IN Europe_NNP ;_: and_CC it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN the_DT starting_VBG point_NN for_IN most_JJS ,_, if_IN not_RB all_DT ,_, succeeding_VBG European_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.
But_CC although_IN Plague_NNP appeared_VBD thus_RB early_RB in_IN Europe_NNP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD not_RB until_IN very_RB much_JJ later_RBR that_IN it_PRP appeared_VBD in_IN England_NNP ._.
The_DT history_NN of_IN Plague_NNP from_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT Justinian_JJ pandemic_NN is_VBZ very_RB vague_JJ until_IN we_PRP reach_VBP the_DT 14th_JJ century_NN ,_, when_WRB that_DT great_JJ cycle_NN of_IN epidemics_NNS known_VBN as_IN the_DT ``_`` Black_NNP Death_NNP ,_, ''_'' swept_VBD over_IN Europe_NNP ,_, inflicting_VBG enormous_JJ mortality_NN ._.
*_IN ``_`` Whether_NNP in_IN all_PDT the_DT postilences_NNS kuown_VBN by_IN this_DT name_NN the_DT disease_NN was_VBD really_RB the_DT same_JJ may_MD admit_VB of_IN doubt_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ clear_JJ that_IN in_IN some_DT at_IN least_JJS it_PRP was_VBD the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN ''_'' -Encyc_NN ._.
Brit._NNP ,_, Art_NNP ._.
``_`` Plague_NN ._. ''_''
``_`` It_PRP must_MD ,_, however_RB ,_, be_VB remembered_VBN that_IN although_IN numerous_JJ pestilenoes_NNS in_IN Europe_NNP are_VBP recorded_VBN by_IN medival_NN chroniclers_NNS ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no_DT sufficient_JJ evidenoe_NN ,_, before_IN the_DT 14th_JJ century_NN ,_, that_IN they_PRP were_VBD bubonic_JJ plague_NN ._.

14th_JJ Century_NNP ._.
``_`` The_DT Black_NNP Death_NNP ''_'' INTRODUCTION_NNP ._.

``_`` With_IN reference_NN to_TO the_DT second_JJ outbreak_NN which_WDT occurred_VBD during_IN the_DT period_NN 1683_CD to_TO 1689_CD ,_, the_DT Gazetteer_NNP makes_VBZ the_DT following_JJ remarks_NNS :_: '_'' For_IN several_JJ years_NNS before_IN 1689_CD the_DT plague_NN ,_, T'un_NNP and_CC Wab_NNP ,_, was_VBD again_RB in_IN Ahmedabad_NNP ,_, and_CC lasted_VBD for_IN seven_CD or_CC eight_CD years_NNS ._.

Gilder_NNP and_CC White_NNP ,_, visited_VBD the_DT country_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN ,_, and_CC wrote_VBD accounts_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN :_: and_CC the_DT pneumonic_JJ form_NN of_IN plague_NN was_VBD now_RB dis-_JJ covered_VBN for_IN the_DT first_JJ time_NN by_IN Dr._NNP White_NNP ,_, who_WP gives_VBZ the_DT following_VBG interesting_JJ description_NN of_IN its_PRP$ symptoms_NNS :_: -_: The_DT first_JJ notice_NN of_IN pneumonic_JJ plague_NN ._.
``_`` In_IN this_DT man_NN the_DT heat_NN of_IN the_DT body_NN was_VBD not_RB much_JJ increased_VBN nor_CC the_DT pulse_NN ``_`` greatly_RB accelerated_VBN ;_: his_PRP$ bowels_NNS were_VBD not_RB disordered_VBN ,_, nor_CC did_VBD his_PRP$ tongue_NN ``_`` indicate_JJ much_RB febrile_JJ irritation_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD able_JJ to_TO walk_VB about_IN and_CC converse_VB ,_, ``_`` answering_VBG questions_NNS distinctly_RB ._.

He_PRP had_VBD c_VBN Xiv_NNP INTRODUCTION._NNP ``_``
only_RB been_VBN attacked_VBN that_IN morning_NN ._.

Mild_NNP Bubonic_NNP Plague_NNP ._.

The_DT Pali_NNP Epidemic_NNP 1836-1838_CD ._.
The_DT second_JJ epidemic_NN was_VBD the_DT Pali_NNP outbreak_NN of_IN 1836-38_JJ ;_: although_IN a_DT disease_NN suspiciously_RB akin_VBZ to_TO plague_VB was_VBD discovered_VBN by_IN Col._NNP Skinner_NNP at_IN Hansi_NNP (_( Punjab_NNP )_) in_IN 1828-29_JJ ._.

II_NNP (_( a_DT )_) SECOND_JJ PERIOD_NNP ._. ]_NN
.3_RB now_RB hoped_VBZ that_IN the_DT pestilence_NN would_MD gradually_RB disappear_VB altogether_RB from_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP Recrudescences_NNPS were_VBD perhaps_RB feared_VBN ,_, but_CC not_RB expected_VBN ,_, at_IN any_DT rate_NN in_IN a_DT severe_JJ form_NN ,_, and_CC every_DT effort_NN was_VBD put_VBN forth_RB to_TO prevent_VB them_PRP ._.

GENERAL_NNP REVIEW_NNP ,_, Part_NNP II.-Measures_NNP and_CC their_PRP$ Results_NNS ._.
Since_IN plague_NN began_VBD in_IN this_DT Presidency_NNP in_IN September_NNP 1896_CD ,_, no_DT effort_NN has_VBZ been_VBN spared_VBN to_TO eradicate_VB it_PRP from_IN Bombay_NNP City_NNP and_CC the_DT other_JJ places_NNS where_WRB it_PRP first_RB appeared_VBD :_: to_TO check_VB its_PRP$ dis-_JJ semination_NN and_CC spread_NN to_TO other_JJ places_NNS :_: to_TO prevent_VB recrudescence_NN or_CC re-infection_NN in_IN places_NNS where_WRB outbreaks_NNS had_VBD occurred_VBN and_CC the_DT disease_NN had_VBD apparently_RB died_VBN out_RP ._.
Hardly_RB any_DT such_JJ effort_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, whatever_VB its_PRP$ direction_NN ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN completely_RB successful_JJ ._.

Of_IN these_DT ,_, death_NN certificates_NNS and_CC search_NN parties_NNS (_( except_IN in_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC Poona_NNP City_NNP )_) have_VBP been_VBN largely_RB abandoned_VBN ;_: their_PRP$ utility_NN being_VBG incommensurate_JJ with_IN their_PRP$ drawbacks_NNS and_CC general_JJ ondesirability_NN ,_, except_IN in_IN very_RB large_JJ places_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT preface_NN ,_, allusion_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN to_TO the_DT good_JJ results_NNS of_IN which_WDT the_DT plague_NN has_VBZ been_VBN ,_, either_DT directly_RB or_CC indirectly_RB ,_, the_DT cause_NN ._.
The_DT stringency_NN and_CC severity_NN of_IN most_JJS of_IN the_DT plague_NN measures_NNS at_IN one_CD time_NN or_CC another_DT introduced_VBN ,_, will_MD tend_VB to_TO render_VB the_DT people_NNS less_RBR sensitive_JJ to_TO minor_VB measures_NNS which_WDT Government_NNP may_MD find_VB it_PRP necessary_JJ from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN to_TO enforce_VB on_IN other_JJ grounds_NNS ._.
The_DT devoted_JJ labour_NN of_IN so_RB many_JJ ,_, voluntarily_RB given_VBN to_TO combat_VB the_DT pestilence_NN ,_, has_VBZ undoubtedly_RB done_VBN much_RB to_TO prove_VB to_TO the_DT masses_NNS that_WDT their_PRP$ sufferings_NNS and_CC hardships_NNS are_VBP both_DT realized_VBN and_CC sympathized_VBN with_IN :_: and_CC the_DT close_JJ relations_NNS between_IN the_DT different_JJ races_NNS entailed_VBN by_IN disinfection_NN ,_, search_NN parties_NNS ,_, etc._NN ,_, etc._NN ,_, have_VBP ,_, as_IN undoubtedly_RB ,_, thrown_VBD down_RB many_JJ a_DT barrier_NN of_IN caste_NN and_CC prejudice-destroyed_JJ many_JJ a_DT misunderstanding_NN of_IN long_JJ existence_NN ._.
Apart_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, from_IN the_DT ethical_JJ good_NN which_WDT has_VBZ indirectly_RB accrued_VBN from_IN this_DT visitation_NN ,_, material_JJ improvements_NNS can_MD be_VB pointed_VBN to_TO ,_, which_WDT make_VBP for_IN both_DT the_DT health_NN and_CC the_DT comfort_NN of_IN the_DT large_JJ mass_NN of_IN people_NNS ._.
Sanitation_NN has_VBZ been_VBN vigorously_RB carried_VBN on_IN ,_, as_IN perhaps_RB never_RB before_IN ;_: and_CC houses_NNS unfit_VBP for_IN habitation_NN have_VBP been_VBN razed_VBN to_TO the_DT ground_NN ._.
Nothing_VBG endurable_JJ can_MD be_VB raised_VBN in_IN a_DT day_NN :_: and_CC seed_NN time_NN and_CC harvest_NN are_VBP separated_VBN by_IN a_DT time_NN of_IN development_NN and_CC growth_NN ._.
The_DT consideration_NN for_IN ,_, and_CC sympathy_NN with_IN ,_, the_DT people_NNS hown_VBN by_IN officials_NNS and_CC non-officials_NNS alike_RB ,_, the_DT generous_JJ grant_NN of_IN Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP ,_, the_DT MEASURES_NNP AND_NNP RESULTS_NNP ._. ]_NN
15_CD provision_NN of_IN free_JJ camps_NNS and_CC food_NN in_IN times_NNS of_IN evacuation_NN and_CC the_DT many_JJ other_JJ mattere_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT people_NNS 's_POS welfare_NN and_CC comfort_NN have_VBP been_VBN considered_VBN ,_, are_VBP the_DT seeds_NNS of_IN which_WDT the_DT harvest_NN is_VBZ not_RB yet_RB ._.
In_IN conclusion_NN ,_, a_DT general_JJ review_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP History_NNP of_IN this_DT Presidency_NNP during_IN the_DT last_JJ three_CD years_NNS tends_VBZ to_TO show_VB that_IN although_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP has_VBZ suffered_VBN heavily_RB ,_, and_CC that_IN ,_, although_IN the_DT pestilence_NN has_VBZ spread_VBN ,_, neither_CC the_DT general_JJ incidence_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, nor_CC the_DT actual_JJ plague_NN mortality-except_NN in_IN certain_JJ very_RB small_JJ places_NNS in_IN the_DT rains_NNS ,_, when_WRB no_DT measures_NNS could_MD be_VB effec-_JJ tually_RB enforced_VBN -_: will_MD bear_VB comparison_NN with_IN the_DT terrible_JJ results-the_JJ appalling_VBG mortality-_NN accredited_VBD to_TO the_DT pestilence_NN in_IN the_DT past_NN ._.
And_CC it_PRP may_MD fairly_RB be_VB urged_VBN that_DT to_TO the_DT various_JJ mea-_JJ sures_NNS so_RB promptly_RB and_CC thoroughly_RB enforced_VBN ,_, and_CC to_TO the_DT loyal_NN efforts_NNS made_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ introduction_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT careful_JJ watch_NN kept_VBD over_IN their_PRP$ strict_JJ observance_NN ,_, by_IN a_DT large_JJ and_CC devoted_VBD body_NN of_IN plague_JJ workers_NNS scattered_VBD over_IN the_DT entire_JJ Presidency-men_NNS and_CC women-European_JJ and_CC Native-_JJ Official_NNP and_CC Non-Official-this_NNP moderated_VBD virulence-this_JJ lessened_JJ mortality-in_NN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, this_DT success_NN in_IN the_DT fight_NN with_IN plague_NN is_VBZ due_JJ ._.
CHAPTER_NN I_PRP ._.
Part_NN III.-Evacuation_NNP ._.
Evacuation_NN as_IN a_DT plague_NN measure_NN has_VBZ not_RB only_RB recommended_VBD itself_PRP to_TO almost_RB all_DT persons_NNS ,_, whether_IN Medical_NNP ,_, Civil_NNP or_CC Military_NNP ,_, who_WP have_VBP had_VBN any_DT experience_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, but_CC has_VBZ been_VBN (_( and_CC is_VBZ )_) successively_RB adopted_VBN by_IN Governments_NNS ,_, as_IN plague_NN has_VBZ appeared_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ territory_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Government_NNP Report_NNP of_IN the_DT plague_NN in_IN the_DT Hoshiarpur_NNP and_CC Jullundur_NNP Districts_NNP ,_, this_DT is_VBZ the_DT measure_NN approved_VBN of_IN and_CC relied_VBN upon_IN by_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP Government*-_NNP ``_`` The_DT advantages_NNS of_IN evacuation_NN and_CC thorough_JJ disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ village_NN site_NN have_VBP been_VBN so_RB accepted_JJ ,_, as_IN fully_RB proved_VBN ,_, that_DT little_JJ argument_NN has_VBZ been_VBN used_VBN regarding_VBG them_PRP in_IN the_DT report_NN ._.
A_DT comparison_NN of_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS in_IN Banga_NNP ,_, Bhangal_NNP Kariha_NNP ,_, Garhi_NNP and_CC Garh-_NNP shankar_NN ,_, where_WRB immediate_JJ evacuation_NN was_VBD not_RB insisted_VBN on_IN ,_, with_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT later_JJ villages_NNS ,_, where_WRB no_DT delay_NN was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO occur_VB ,_, will_MD show_VB clearly_RB the_DT necessity_NN of_IN having_VBG all_PDT the_DT villagers_NNS camped_VBD out_RP in_IN the_DT open_JJ air_NN at_IN the_DT earliest_JJS possible_JJ moment_NN ._.
The_DT argument_NN is_VBZ this_DT ._.
Plague_NN shows_VBZ no_DT tendency_NN to_TO spread_VB from_IN house_NN to_TO house_NN unless_IN it_PRP is_VBZ carried_VBN by_IN human_JJ beings_NNS or_CC animals_NNS ._.
Rats_NNS take_VBP the_DT disease_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ admitted_VBN that_IN after_IN being_VBG infected_VBN they_PRP have_VBP no_DT tendency_NN to_TO leave_VB their_PRP$ homes_NNS unless_IN they_PRP are_VBP disturbed_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN ten_JJ days_NNS all_PDT that_DT live_VBP in_IN the_DT infected_JJ houses_NNS should_MD have_VB died_VBN ._.
If_IN ,_, however_RB ,_, they_PRP are_VBP disturbed_VBN by_IN the_DT roofs_NN being_VBG at_IN once_RB taken_VBN off_RP infected_JJ houses_NNS ,_, floors_NNS being_VBG dug_VBN up_RP and_CC everything_NN being_VBG flooded_VBN with_IN Phenyle_NNP ,_, they_PRP must_MD leave_VB the_DT infected_JJ houses_NNS and_CC carry_VBP the_DT infection_NN to_TO other_JJ houses_NNS ._.
In_IN front_NN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, of_IN the_DT line_NN of_IN disinfection_NN through_IN a_DT village_NN there_EX must_MD be_VB an_DT advancing_VBG wave_NN of_IN infection_NN carried_VBN by_IN rats_NNS ;_: and_CC when_WRB the_DT disinfection_NN reaches_VBZ the_DT last_JJ house_NN in_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, the_DT remaining_VBG Tats_NNP must_MD either_RB double_VB back_RB into_IN the_DT houses_NNS already_RB disinfected_VBN ,_, thus_RB re-infecting_VBG them_PRP ,_, or_CC they_PRP must_MD leave_VB the_DT Village_NNP and_CC carry_VBP the_DT infection_NN to_TO some_DT other_JJ village_NN ,_, and_CC either_DT result_NN is_VBZ clearly_RB one_CD to_TO be_VB avoided_VBN ._.
The_DT matter_NN may_MD be_VB somewhat_RB ridiculous_JJ ,_, but_CC given_VBN the_DT premises_NNS ,_, the_DT conclusion_NN and_CC therefore_RB the_DT rule_NN would_MD appear_VB to_TO be_VB sound_VBN ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS have_VBP been_VBN 3,390_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS 2,103_CD or_CC about_IN 61_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN attacks_NNS ._.
I_PRP have_VBP had_VBN these_DT cases_NNS analysed_VBD for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN seeing_VBG what_WDT effect_NN evacuation_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN site_NN had_VBD on_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP find_VBP from_IN the_DT statements_NNS made_VBN out_RP ,_, that_IN of_IN the_DT total_JJ 3,390_CD cases-_JJ 1,335_CD occurred_VBD before_IN evacuation_NN ._.
1,014_CD within_IN four_CD days_NNS after_IN evacuation_NN ._.
421_CD within_IN the_DT second_JJ period_NN of_IN four_CD days_NNS ._.
169_CD within_IN the_DT third_JJ period_NN ._.

This_DT gives_VBZ the_DT total_NN cases_NNS up_IN to_TO 20_CD days_NNS after_IN evacuation_NN :_: enquiries_NNS were_VBD not_RB pursued_VBN beyond_IN this_DT period_NN ._.
The_DT cases_NNS which_WDT occurred_VBD within_IN the_DT first_JJ four_CD days_NNS after_IN evacuation_NN are_VBP cases_NNS which_WDT must_MD have_VB taken_VBN the_DT infection_NN in_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, and_CC which_WDT were_VBD only_RB discovered_VBN as_IN soon_RB us_PRP the_DT people_NNS came_VBD out_RP into_IN camp_NN ._.
Adding_VBG these_DT 1,014_CD cases_NNS to_TO those_DT known_VBN to_TO have_VB existed_VBN before_IN evacuation_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ found_VBN that_IN 2,349_CD cases_NNS out_IN of_IN a_DT total_NN of_IN 3,390_CD ,_, or_CC practically_RB two-thirds_NNS ,_, are_VBP directly_RB due_JJ to_TO infection_VB inside_IN the_DT village_NN ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB also_RB fairly_RB assumed_VBD that_IN many_JJ of_IN the_DT cases_NNS included_VBD in_IN the_DT second_JJ period_NN of_IN four_CD days_NNS were_VBD infected_VBN before_IN evacuation_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ period_NN of_IN incubation_NN is_VBZ five_CD or_CC six_CD days_NNS ._.
The_DT result_NN of_IN evacuation_NN ,_, as_IN shown_VBN by_IN the_DT successive_JJ drops_NNS from_IN 1,014_CD to_TO 421_CD ,_, 169_CD ,_, 103_CD and_CC 88_CD ,_, is_VBZ most_JJS clearly_RB marked_VBN ._.
The_DT fall_NN is_VBZ not_RB to_TO be_VB ascribed_VBN in_IN any_DT way_NN to_TO the_DT disease_NN having_VBG run_VBN its_PRP$ course_NN ,_, since_IN it_PRP was_VBD proved_VBN over_IN and_CC over_RB again_RB that_IN in_IN the_DT evacuated_JJ houses_NNS in_IN the_DT villages_NNS the_DT disease_NN still_RB retained_VBD its_PRP$ full_JJ virulence_NN ._. Evacuation_NN may_MD be_VB :_: -I.-Complete_JJ ;_: II.-Partial_JJ ._.
I.-Complete_NNP ,_, evacuation_NN is_VBZ the_DT emptying_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ town_NN or_CC village_NN infected_VBN ,_, without_IN discrimination_NN of_IN infected_JJ or_CC non-infected_JJ quarters_NNS ._.

(_( 1_CD )_) Its_PRP$ feasibility-_JJ Theoretically_NNP speaking_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no_DT limit_NN to_TO its_PRP$ feasibility_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ merely_RB the_DT transference_NN of_IN a_DT population_NN from_IN one_CD locality_NN or_CC site_NN to_TO another_DT ._.

._.

III_NNP ._.

EVACUATION_NNP ._. ]_NN
27_CD In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN large_JJ towns_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, matters_NNS are_VBP different_JJ ,_, and_CC a_DT larger_JJR and_CC larger_JJR number_NN of_IN well-to-do_JJ inhabitants_NNS find_VBP their_PRP$ business_NN seriously_RB interfered_VBN with_IN by_IN this_DT enforced_JJ abandonment_NN of_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS ._.

(_( 4_CD )_) and_CC (_( 7_CD )_) .-Cost_NN of_IN Evacuation.-_NNP The_DT cost_NN of_IN evacuation_NN varies_NNS with_IN the_DT class_NN of_IN people_NNS to_TO be_VB turned_VBN out_RP ._.
As_IN a_DT rule_NN ,_, its_PRP$ cost_NN is_VBZ now_RB nominal_JJ ,_, the_DT people_NNS being_VBG simply_RB told_VBN to_TO make_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ arrangements_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, except_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT very_RB poor_JJ ,_, to_TO build_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ huts_NNS ,_, or_CC erect_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ sheds_NNS ,_, outside_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
The_DT cost_NN ,_, again_RB ,_, must_MD be_VB in_IN some_DT sort_NN proportionate_NN to_TO the_DT size_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN a_DT large_JJ town_NN like_IN Sholapur_NNP ,_, doubtless_VBD the_DT expense_NN is_VBZ considerable_JJ ._.

*_VB The_DT following_JJ note_NN by_IN Mr._NNP Morison_NNP ,_, t_VBD formerly_RB Collector_NNP there_RB ,_, shows_VBZ the_DT actual_JJ cost_NN at_IN Sholapur_NNP ,_, where_WRB arrangements_NNS were_VBD made_VBN to_TO house_NN everybody_NN ._.

Rs_NNP ._.

Evacuation_NN and_CC Health_NNP ._.

This_DT is_VBZ shown_VBN by_IN the_DT extracts_NNS from_IN reports_NNS for_IN the_DT districts_NNS quoted_VBN below_IN ._.
By_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Planpur_NNP ,_, forwarded_VBN by_IN Mr._NNP P._NNP S._NNP V._NNP Fitzgerald_NNP ,_, Political_NNP Superintendent_NN :_: -_: ``_`` As_RB far_RB as_IN my_PRP$ experience_NN goes_VBZ ,_, I_PRP think_VBP that_IN life_NN in_IN Camps_NNP or_CC Huts_NNP in_IN open_JJ fields_NNS is_VBZ much_RB more_RBR healthy_JJ than_IN that_DT in_IN Towns_NNP or_CC Villages_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN that_IN ,_, during_IN the_DT last_JJ epidemic_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT town_NN of_IN Planpur_NNP as_RB well_RB as_IN other_JJ Villages_NNP under_IN it_PRP that_WDT were_VBD infected_VBN were_VBD evacuated_VBN and_CC the_DT people_NNS were_VBD living_VBG in_IN huts_NNS in_IN open_JJ fields_NNS outside_IN ,_, they_PRP kept_VBD their_PRP$ health_NN much_RB better_JJR than_IN they_PRP did_VBD while_IN living_NN in_IN the_DT town_NN or_CC villages_NNS either_CC before_IN or_CC after_IN evacuation_NN ,_, notwithstanding_VBG the_DT various_JJ hardships_NNS and_CC sufferings_NNS they_PRP had_VBD then_RB to_TO undergo_VB while_IN living_VBG outside_JJ ._.
A_DT great_JJ many_JJ of_IN them_PRP were_VBD ill-fed_JJ ,_, ill-clad_JJ ,_, badly_RB sheltered_VBN ,_, and_CC ,_, moreover_RB ,_, had_VBD to_TO bear_VB up_RP against_IN the_DT inclemency_NN of_IN weather_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN showers_NNS of_IN rain_NN ,_, stormy-winds_NNS ,_, extreme_JJ cold_NN ,_, etc._NN ,_, and_CC yet_RB they_PRP kept_VBD their_PRP$ health_NN far_RB better_JJR than_IN they_PRP usually_RB did_VBD in_IN ordinary_JJ times_NNS while_IN living_NN within_IN the_DT town_NN or_CC villages_NNS ._. ''_''

CHAPTER_NN I_PRP ._.
Part_NN IV.-Inoculation_NNP ._.
The_DT experience_NN of_IN plague_NN and_CC measures_NNS for_IN its_PRP$ management_NN acquired_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP during_IN the_DT past_JJ 3_CD years_NNS has_VBZ demonstrated_VBN that_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ means_NNS used_VBN for_IN ``_`` stamping_VBG out_RP ``_`` the_DT disease_NN have_VBP not_RB met_VBN with_IN the_DT success_NN hoped_VBD for_IN ._.
The_DT fact_NN is_VBZ forced_VBN upon_IN one_CD that_WDT ,_, in_IN a_DT large_JJ town_NN ,_, once_RB the_DT disease_NN has_VBZ taken_VBN root_NN ,_, it_PRP will_MD re-appear_VB year_NN after_IN year_NN ,_, and_CC that-so_JJ far_RB as_IN present_JJ experience_NN guides_NNS us-its_JJ virulence_NN will_MD show_VB no_DT sign_NN of_IN diminution_NN ,_, as_IN is_VBZ the_DT case_NN with_IN some_DT other_JJ epidemic_JJ diseases_NNS ._.
If_IN the_DT disease_NN then_RB can_MD not_RB with_IN certainty_NN be_VB ``_`` stamped_VBN out_RP ,_, ''_'' the_DT only_RB other_JJ resource_NN left_VBD is_VBZ to_TO try_VB to_TO render_VB the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT infected_JJ town_NN immune_NN to_TO plague_VB ,_, so_IN that_DT ,_, though_IN living_NN with_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN all_DT round_VBP them_PRP ,_, they_PRP may_MD remain_VB free_JJ from_IN attack_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ only_RB necessary_JJ to_TO refer_VB to_TO the_DT effects_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN for_IN small-pox_NN ,_, to_TO make_VB it_PRP clear_JJ that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB impossible_JJ to_TO immunise_VB a_DT population_NN ,_, so_IN that_DT ,_, though_IN conditions_NNS giving_VBG rise_NN to_TO a_DT disease_NN may_MD exist_VB in_IN nature_NN all_DT around_RB ,_, yet_CC cases_NNS of_IN that_DT disease_NN are_VBP comparatively_RB rare_JJ ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT well-known_JJ fact_NN that_IN diseases_VBZ ,_, such_JJ as_IN small-pox_JJ ,_, typhoid_JJ fever_NN ,_, cholera_NN ,_, etc._FW ,_, appear_VBP as_IN a_DT rule_NN only_RB once_RB in_IN the_DT same_JJ individual_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT person_NN who_WP has_VBZ recovered_VBN from_IN an_DT attack_NN of_IN one_CD of_IN these_DT has_VBZ the_DT comfortable_JJ conviction_NN that_IN in_IN all_DT probability_NN he_PRP will_MD not_RB suffer_VB again_RB ._.
He_PRP or_CC she_PRP has_VBZ become_VBN ``_`` immune_JJ ''_'' to_TO that_DT disease_NN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN ascertained_VBN that_IN these_DT ``_`` zymotic_JJ ''_'' diseases_NNS as_IN they_PRP are_VBP called_VBN ,_, are_VBP each_DT one_CD caused_VBN by_IN a_DT special_JJ germ_NN of_IN its_PRP$ own_JJ ._.
These_DT germs_NNS can_MD be_VB separated_VBN from_IN the_DT bodies_NNS of_IN persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN such_JJ disease_NN ,_, and_CC grown_VBN on_IN suitable_JJ media_NNS in_IN laboratories_NNS ._.
From_IN these_DT germs_NNS each_DT disease_NN can_MD be_VB produced_VBN ,_, just_RB as_IN cereal_JJ crops_NNS can_MD be_VB produced_VBN by_IN sowing_VBG the_DT seed_NN of_IN the_DT required_JJ grain_NN in_IN suitable_JJ soil_NN ._.
Each_DT grain_NN produces_VBZ its_PRP$ own_JJ particular_JJ crop_NN and_CC no_DT other_JJ ,_, so_IN each_DT different_JJ germ_NN of_IN disease_NN produces_VBZ its_PRP$ own_JJ disease_NN and_CC no_DT other_JJ ._.
One_CD important_JJ difference_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, appears_VBZ ,_, viz._NN ,_, in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN cereals_NNS one_CD can_MD go_VB on_IN ,_, year_NN after_IN year_NN ,_, sowing_VBG the_DT same_JJ crop_NN in_IN the_DT same_JJ field_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT yield_NN will_MD be_VB produced_VBN and_CC a_DT harvest_NN reaped_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT human_JJ body_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT contrary_JJ ,_, the_DT seeds_NNS of_IN disease_NN having_VBG once_RB been_VBN sown_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT disease_NN crop_NN matured_VBD ,_, a_DT second_JJ crop_NN will_MD not_RB grow_VB ._.
Even_RB if_IN the_DT seeds_NNS are_VBP sown_VBN ,_, they_PRP do_VBP not_RB germinate_VB ,_, the_DT avail-_JJ able_JJ material_NN in_IN the_DT soil_NN has_VBZ been_VBN used_VBN up_RP ,_, or_CC the_DT soil_NN has_VBZ been_VBN so_RB altered_JJ that_IN no_DT second_JJ disease-crop_NN can_MD be_VB produced_VBN ;_: in_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, the_DT individual_NN has_VBZ become_VBN immune_JJ ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN that_IN immunity_NN is_VBZ caused_VBN by_IN the_DT reaction_NN of_IN the_DT body_NN to_TO the_DT poison_NN excreted_VBN by_IN the_DT disease-germs_NNS as_IN they_PRP grow_VBP in_IN the_DT body_NN ._.
If_IN ,_, then_RB ,_, we_PRP cause_VBP the_DT germs_NNS to_TO manufacture_VB their_PRP$ poison_NN in_IN bottles_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, after_IN killing_VBG them_PRP by_IN heat_NN ,_, inject_VBP a_DT measured_JJ quantity_NN of_IN this_DT fluid_NN ,_, the_DT same_JJ effect_NN will_MD be_VB produced_VBN on_IN the_DT body_NN soil_NN as_IN though_IN the_DT germs_NNS had_VBD actually_RB lived_VBN in_IN that_DT body_NN and_CC produced_VBD their_PRP$ poison_NN there_RB ._.
It_PRP was_VBD considerations_NNS such_JJ as_IN these_DT that_WDT guided_VBD Haffkino_NNP in_IN working_VBG out_RP ``_`` vaccines_NNS ``_`` for_IN cholera_NN and_CC plague_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT success_NN or_CC otherwise_NN of_IN his_PRP$ plague_NN prophylactic_NN may_MD be_VB judged_VBN from_IN the_DT statistics_NNS now_RB to_TO be_VB given_VBN ._.
As_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN 3_CD months_NNS '_POS labour_NN at_IN the_DT life-history_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN bacillus_NN ,_, Haffkine_NNP was_VBD able_JJ to_TO inform_VB the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, in_IN a_DT letter_NN dated_VBD 16th_CD January_NNP 1897_CD ,_, that_IN he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN able_JJ to_TO prepare_VB an_DT inoculation_NN fluid_NN ,_, which_WDT promised_VBD ,_, on_IN the_DT analogy_NN of_IN the_DT results_NNS obtained_VBD pre-_JJ viously_RB by_IN Pasteur_NNP in_IN connection_NN with_IN anthrax_NN and_CC rabies_NNS ,_, and_CC by_IN himself_PRP in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN cholera_NN ,_, to_TO produce_VB in_IN the_DT human_JJ organism_NN a_DT considerable_JJ resistance_NN to_TO plague_VB ._.
The_DT now_RB well-known_JJ effect_NN on_IN human_JJ beings_NNS he_PRP described_VBD from_IN its_PRP$ action_NN on_IN himself_PRP ,_, as_IN he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN inoculated_VBN with_IN a_DT dose_NN which_WDT turned_VBD out_RP to_TO be_VB 4_CD times_NNS stronger_JJR than_IN that_DT now_RB fixed_VBN as_IN the_DT standard_NN ._.

The_DT preparation_NN of_IN the_DT prophylactic_NN is_VBZ detailed_VBN in_IN the_DT British_JJ Medical_NNP Journal_NNP for_IN June_NNP 12th_CD ,_, 1897_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Gazette_NNP for_IN June_NNP 1897_CD ,_, and_CC though_IN ?_. 36_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.

Kirkee.-Plague_NNP broke_VBD out_RP here_RB in_IN the_DT Artillery_NNP Cantonment_NNP ,_, situated_VBD 4_CD miles_NNS from_IN Poona_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT followers_NNS of_IN the_DT four_CD batteries_NNS stationed_VBD there_RB suffered_VBN severely_RB ._.
These_DT men_NNS were_VBD living_VBG with_IN their_PRP$ families_NNS in_IN lines_NNS on_IN a_DT sloping_NN plain_NN ,_, under_IN military_JJ discipline_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN circumstances_NNS far_RB superior_JJ ,_, in_IN a_DT sanitary_JJ sense_NN ,_, to_TO those_DT of_IN the_DT average_JJ villager_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT disease_NN appeared_VBD the_DT lines_NNS were_VBD isolated_VBN ,_, so_IN that_IN none_NN could_MD enter_VB or_CC leave_VB without_IN the_DT knowledge_NN of_IN the_DT military_JJ authorities_NNS ._.
A_DT special_JJ hospital_NN was_VBD erected_VBN close_RB by_IN ,_, where_WRB all_DT sick_JJ persons_NNS were_VBD sent_VBN as_IN they_PRP were_VBD discovered_VBN by_IN the_DT search_NN parties_NNS of_IN European_JJ Artillerymen_NNP ,_, who_WP visited_VBD each_DT house_NN thrice_JJ daily_RB ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ therefore_RB probable_JJ that_IN all_DT cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN were_VBD promptly_RB discovered_VBN and_CC removed_VBN to_TO hospital_VB ,_, and_CC in_IN each_DT case_NN the_DT usual_JJ disinfection_NN was_VBD thoroughly_RB and_CC promptly_RB carried_VBD out_RP ._.
Yet_RB ,_, in_IN spite_NN of_IN all_PDT this_DT ,_, it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN ,_, in_IN those_DT not_RB protected_VBN by_IN inoculation_NN ,_, 1_CD out_IN of_IN every_DT 6_CD of_IN the_DT popula-_JJ tion_NN was_VBD attacked_VBN ,_, and_CC 2_CD out_IN of_IN every_DT 3_CD attacked_VBD died_VBN ._.
The_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD therefore_RB a_DT severe_JJ one_CD ._.
The_DT population_NN of_IN the_DT lines_NNS numbered_VBD 1,530_CD ;_: and_CC out_IN of_IN these_DT ,_, 671_CD volunteered_VBD for_IN inocu-_JJ lation_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ the_DT plague_JJ hospital_NN admission_NN and_CC discharge_NN book_NN was_VBD examined_VBN ,_, and_CC compared_VBN with_IN the_DT register_NN of_IN those_DT inoculated_VBN ,_, with_IN the_DT following_JJ results_NNS ._.

Belgaum.-Plague_JJ cases_NNS began_VBD to_TO appear_VB in_IN Belgaum-a_NNP town_NN of_IN 40,700_CD inhabitants_NNS -in_JJ October_NNP 1897_CD ,_, five_CD deaths_NNS being_VBG reported_VBN in_IN that_DT month_NN ._.

The_DT 26th_CD Regiment_NNP of_IN Madras_NNP Infantry_NNP were_VBD ,_, during_IN this_DT period_NN ,_, living_VBG in_IN lines_NNS close_RB to_TO the_DT Cantonment_NNP and_CC City_NNP ,_, and_CC suffered_VBD similarly_RB ._.

Next_JJ day_NN another_DT sepoy_NN was_VBD attacked_VBN and_CC also_RB died_VBD ._.

The_DT history_NN of_IN the_DT three_CD uninoculated_JJ persons_NNS is_VBZ interesting_JJ ._.
The_DT first_JJ case_NN was_VBD that_IN of_IN a_DT sepoy_NN who_WP was_VBD believed_VBN to_TO have_VB already_RB suffered_VBN from_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT first_JJ epidemic_JJ ,_, and_CC who_WP was_VBD not_RB inoculated_VBN on_IN the_DT presumption_NN that_IN he_PRP would_MD prove_VB immune_NN ._.

Umerkhadi_NNP Jail_NNP ,_, Bombay.-Plague_NNP appeared_VBD in_IN this_DT jail_NN in_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN December_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Three_CD prisoners_NNS took_VBD the_DT disease_NN and_CC subsequently_RB died_VBD ._.
Then_RB on_IN 1st_CD January_NNP 1898_CD ,_, inoculation_NN was_VBD offered_VBN to_TO the_DT prisoners_NNS ,_, who_WP all_DT ,_, 401_CD in_IN number_NN ,_, declared_VBD themselves_PRP willing_JJ to_TO undergo_VB the_DT operation_NN ._.

1.27_CD 10_CD 6_CD 8_CD ._.
Undhera.-Plague_JJ broke_VBD out_RP in_IN this_DT agricultural_JJ village_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ situated_VBN 6_CD miles_NNS from_IN Baroda_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN December_NNP 1897_CD ._.
According_VBG to_TO a_DT census_NN taken_VBN by_IN the_DT Baroda_NNP authorities_NNS on_IN 5th_CD January_NNP 1898_CD ,_, there_EX were_VBD 1,031_CD souls_NNS in_IN the_DT village_NN ._.
Between_IN that_DT date_NN and_CC 12th_CD February_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT inoculations_NNS were_VBD performed_VBN ,_, 76_CD persons_NNS died_VBD of_IN plague_NN ,_, 10_CD had_VBD left_VBN the_DT village_NN ,_, and_CC 5_CD were_VBD born_VBN ,_, thus_RB leaving_VBG 950_CD persons_NNS alive_VBP on_IN the_DT latter_JJ date_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ equivalent_JJ t_NN ?_.
a_DT death-rate_NN of_IN 766_CD per_IN mille_FW per_IN annum_NN ,_, and_CC will_MD serve_VB to_TO show_VB how_WRB virulent_JJ the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD ._.
On_IN 12th_CD February_NNP the_DT village_NN was_VBD visited_VBN by_IN Mr._NNP Haffkine_NNP ,_, Major_NNP Bannerman_NNP ,_, Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Service_NNP ,_, the_DT chief_JJ Plague_NNP authorities_NNS of_IN Baroda_NNP State_NNP ,_, and_CC some_DT half-dozen_JJ local_JJ medical_JJ men_NNS ,_, and_CC by_IN them_PRP inoculation_NN of_IN 513_CD of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP the_DT same_JJ day_NN ._.
By_IN reference_NN to_TO the_DT census_NN papers_VBZ the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS were_VBD called_VBN out_RP house_NN by_IN house_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT half_NN of_IN each_DT section_NN of_IN each_DT household_NN inoculated_VBN ._.
In_IN this_DT way_NN an_DT endeavour_NN was_VBD made_VBN to_TO inoculate_VB half_PDT the_DT men_NNS ,_, half_PDT the_DT women_NNS ,_, and_CC half_PDT the_DT children_NNS in_IN each_DT family_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO arrange_VB that_IN a_DT fair_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT sickly-looking_NN should_MD be_VB placed_VBN in_IN each_DT division_NN ._.
An_DT investigation_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT results_NNS of_IN the_DT inoculations_NNS in_IN Undhera_NNP was_VBD made_VBN on_IN 4th_CD April_NNP 1898_CD by_IN Surgeon-Major-General_JJ R._NNP Harvey_NNP ,_, Director-General_NNP ,_, Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Service_NNP ;_: Mr._NNP Haffkine_NNP ,_, Major_NNP Bannerman_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, and_CC Captain_NNP Dyson_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT aid_NN of_IN the_DT local_JJ authorities_NNS of_IN Baroda_NNP ._.

Aga_NNP Khan_NNP ,_, inoculation_NN was_VBD successfully_RB introduced_VBN amongst_IN the_DT Khojas_NNP in_IN 1897_CD ._.
By_IN the_DT 20th_CD April_NNP 1898_CD ,_, 5,184_CD of_IN this_DT community_NN had_VBD been_VBN operated_VBN on_IN ._.
As_IN the_DT operations_NNS extended_VBD over_IN 16_CD weeks_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO take_VB the_DT average_JJ number_NN for_IN comparison_NN with_IN the_DT uninoculated_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT community_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT is_VBZ found_VBN to_TO be_VB 3,814_CD persons_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN 1898_CD a_DT careful_JJ census_NN of_IN the_DT Khojas_NNP in_IN Bombay_NNP was_VBD taken_VBN ,_, which_WDT showed_VBD that_IN 9,350_CD Khojas_NNP were_VBD in_IN the_DT city_NN at_IN that_DT time_NN ._.
But_CC as_IN many_JJ families_NNS had_VBD left_VBN the_DT city_NN through_IN fear_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, a_DT calculation_NN was_VBD made_VBN from_IN the_DT average_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS registered_VBN in_IN the_DT burial-book_NN of_IN the_DT Jamat_NNP Khana_NNP for_IN the_DT five_CD years_NNS previous_JJ to_TO the_DT appearance_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD decided_VBN that_IN 13,300_CD should_MD be_VB taken_VBN as_IN representing_VBG the_DT total_JJ Khoja_NNP population_NN ._.
This_DT exaggerated_JJ number_NN ,_, 2/5_CD more_JJR than_IN that_DT found_VBD at_IN the_DT census_NN ,_, is_VBZ taken_VBN so_RB as_IN to_TO avoid_VB the_DT risk_NN of_IN increasing_VBG unduly_RB the_DT death-rate_NN among_IN the_DT uninoculated_JJ ,_, in_IN the_DT calcula-_JJ tions_NNS that_IN follow_VBP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ found_VBN then_RB that_IN there_EX were_VBD during_IN this_DT period_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP 3,814_CD (_( average_NN )_) inoculated_VBD and_CC 9,516_CD (_( purposely_RB exaggerated_VBN )_) uninoculated_JJ Khojas_NNP ._.
Between_IN 27th_CD December_NNP 1897_CD and_CC 20th_CD April_NNP 1898_CD ,_, there_EX were_VBD 184_CD deaths_NNS in_IN the_DT Khoja_NNP community_NN ._.

Hubli.-Plague_NN appeared_VBD in_IN this_DT mercantile_JJ town_NN of_IN 52,000_CD inhabitants_NNS in_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN 1897_CD ._.
It_PRP then_RB disappeared_VBD for_IN a_DT time_NN ,_, only_RB to_TO break_VB out_RP once_RB more_JJR on_IN the_DT approach_NN of_IN the_DT monsoon_NN ._.
``_`` The_DT average_JJ rainfall_NN between_IN April_NNP and_CC October_NNP amounts_NNS to_TO more_JJR than_IN 28_CD inches_NNS ._.
Under_IN these_DT circumstances_NNS ,_, although_IN a_DT large_JJ and_CC weather-proof_JJ health_NN camp_NN had_VBD been_VBN pre-_JJ pared_VBN for_IN emergencies_NNS ,_, complete_JJ evacuation_NN of_IN the_DT infected_JJ town-site_NN was_VBD impossible_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT attempt_NN to_TO effect_NN it_PRP would_MD have_VB led_VBN to_TO the_DT severest_JJS hardships_NNS and_CC to_TO the_DT immediate_JJ spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN into_IN surrounding_VBG villages_NNS and_CC districts_NNS ._. ''_''
It_PRP was_VBD for_IN this_DT reason_NN ,_, as_IN Mr._NNP Cappel_NNP the_DT Collector-whose_NNP words_NNS have_VBP just_RB been_VBN quoted-remarks_JJ ,_, that_IN inoculation_NN was_VBD tried_VBN so_RB extensively_RB ,_, being_VBG the_DT only_RB feasible_JJ measure_NN under_IN the_DT circumstances_NNS ._.

Dharwar.-A_JJ town_NN of_IN some_DT 32,000_CD inhabitants_NNS ,_, situated_VBN in_IN the_DT Southern_NNP Mahratta_NNP Country_NNP ,_, 13_CD miles_NNS from_IN Hubli_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT head-quarters_NNS station_NN of_IN the_DT Southern_NNP Mahratta_NNP Rail-_NNP way_NN ._.
Plague_NNP broke_VBD out_RP here_RB during_IN August_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC inoculation_NN work_NN was_VBD begun_VBN almost_RB at_IN once_RB by_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, and_CC afterwards_NNS continued_VBN and_CC practised_VBN on_IN a_DT large_JJ scale_NN by_IN Dr._NNP Miss_NNP Corthorn_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD sent_VBN there_RB on_IN special_JJ duty_NN ,_, and_CC from_IN whose_WP$ report_NN the_DT following_JJ figures_NNS are_VBP taken_VBN ._.

47_CD If_IN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, the_DT inoculated_VBN had_VBD remained_VBN as_IN susceptible_JJ to_TO plague_VB as_IN their_PRP$ fellow-towns-_JJ men_NNS ,_, they_PRP should_MD have_VB shown_VBN 270_CD cases_NNS with_IN 223_CD deaths_NNS ,_, instead_RB of_IN 129_CD and_CC 54_CD respectively_RB ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT careful_JJ way_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT records_NNS of_IN the_DT inoculation_NN work_NN were_VBD kept_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ possible_JJ to_TO pronounce_VB an_DT opinion_NN on_IN the_DT effect_NN of_IN inoculation_NN on_IN those_DT actually_RB in_IN the_DT incubation_NN stage_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
In_IN Dharwar_NNP 74_CD individuals_NNS developed_VBD plague_NN within_IN 10_CD days_NNS of_IN operation_NN ._.
As_IN 10_CD days_NNS is_VBZ generally_RB admitted_VBN to_TO be_VB the_DT limit_NN of_IN the_DT incubation_NN period_NN ,_, we_PRP may_MD assume_VB that_IN many_JJ of_IN these_DT persons_NNS had_VBD already_RB the_DT plague-germs_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ bodies_NNS at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN inoculation_NN ._.
The_DT following_JJ statement_NN shows_VBZ that_IN the_DT death-rate_NN at_IN no_DT time_NN exceeded_VBD that_IN among_IN the_DT uninoculated_JJ population_NN (_( 80.8_CD %_NN )_) ,_, and_CC was_VBD generally_RB very_RB much_RB below_IN this_DT ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ evident_JJ ,_, then_RB ,_, that_DT inoculation_NN of_IN persons_NNS incubating_VBG plague_NN does_VBZ not_RB do_VB any_DT harm_NN ,_, but_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT contrary_JJ ,_, increases_VBZ their_PRP$ chance_NN of_IN recovery_NN ._.

The_DT average_JJ population_NN for_IN the_DT previous_JJ six_CD months_NNS is_VBZ estimated_VBN by_IN those_DT on_IN the_DT spot_NN at_IN 27,000_CD ,_, and_CC this_DT number_NN is_VBZ therefore_RB adopted_VBN for_IN statistical_JJ purposes_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT figures_NNS given_VBN below_IN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP taken_VBN from_IN a_DT report_NN submitted_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Burjorji_NNP Sorabsha_NNP ,_, the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN employed_VBN by_IN the_DT Parsi_NNP Panchayat_NNP to_TO perform_VB inoculation_NN ,_, among_IN the_DT members_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ community_NN ._.

From_IN the_DT above_JJ observations_NNS ,_, then_RB ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB taken_VBN as_IN proved_JJ :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) That_DT inoculation_NN is_VBZ harmless_JJ ._.
(_( b_NN )_) That_IN when_WRB given_VBN in_IN the_DT incubation_NN stage_NN (_( i.e._JJ ,_, before_IN the_DT signs_NNS of_IN plague_NN are_VBP apparent_JJ )_) it_PRP has_VBZ ,_, in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS ,_, the_DT power_NN of_IN aborting_VBG the_DT disease_NN ._.

?_. 51_CD CHAPTER_NN I_PRP ._.
Part_NN V.-The_NNP Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP Fund_NNP ._.
One_CD of_IN the_DT greatest_JJS difficulties_NNS experienced_VBN by_IN Government_NNP in_IN dealing_VBG with_IN plague_NN was_VBD the_DT abhorrence_NN and_CC distrust_NN with_IN which_WDT the_DT people_NNS regarded_VBD plague_JJ hospitals_NNS ._.
Every_DT means_NN was_VBD tried_VBN to_TO overcome_VB this_DT prejudice_NN and_CC this_DT unpopularity_NN ;_: private_JJ hospitals_NNS were_VBD permitted_VBN ,_, where_WRB native_JJ practitioners_NNS administered_VBD native_JJ medicines_NNS ,_, and_CC patients_NNS were_VBD absolved_VBN from_IN all_DT compulsion_NN in_IN the_DT matter_NN of_IN taking_VBG medicines_NNS ._.
Their_PRP$ friends_NNS and_CC relatives_NNS were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO visit_VB them_PRP ,_, and_CC no_DT effort_NN was_VBD spared_VBN to_TO clearly_RB prove_VB the_DT humane_NN intentions_NNS of_IN Government_NNP in_IN the_DT enforcement_NN of_IN this_DT measure_NN ._.
But_CC of_IN all_PDT the_DT means_NNS devised_VBN to_TO render_VB hospitals_NNS less_JJR unpopular_JJ and_CC more_RBR attractive_JJ ,_, none_NN has_VBZ been_VBN so_RB effective_JJ as_IN that_DT introduced_VBD in_IN October_NNP 1898_CD ._.
The_DT far-reaching_JJ effect_NN of_IN the_DT system_NN then_RB introduced_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT generous_JJ grant_NN then_RB bestowed_VBD ,_, are_VBP of_IN sufficient_JJ importance_NN to_TO justify_VB a_DT detailed_JJ history_NN of_IN its_PRP$ institution_NN ._.
The_DT Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP Fund_NNP for_IN Plague_NNP was_VBD instituted_VBN on_IN the_DT 17th_CD of_IN November_NNP 1898_CD ,_, by_IN Government_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
\6406/6294-P\_NN of_IN the_DT 17th_CD November_NNP 1898_CD :_: and_CC detailed_JJ instructions_NNS as_IN to_TO its_PRP$ disbursement_NN throughout_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP are_VBP given_VBN in_IN Government_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
\6230/6328-P\_NN of_IN the_DT 14th_CD November_NNP 1898_CD ,_, both_DT of_IN which_WDT documents_NNS are_VBP quoted_VBN in_IN full_JJ below_NN :_: -_: General_NNP Department_NNP (_( Plague_NNP )_) ._.
No_DT ._.
\6230/6328-P\_NN ._.
Bombay_NNP Castle_NNP ,_, 14th_CD November_NNP 1898_CD ._.
RESOLUTION_NNP OF_NNP GOVERNMENT_NNP ._.
With_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO encourage_VB the_DT prompt_JJ reporting_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN and_CC to_TO facilitate_VB and_CC popularise_VB as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ the_DT measures_NNS undertaken_VBN with_IN the_DT object_NN of_IN reducing_VBG mortality_NN during_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, Government_NNP are_VBP desirous_JJ of-_JJ (_( 1_CD )_) making_VBG the_DT hospitals_NNS attractive_JJ ,_, (_( 2_CD )_) removing_VBG the_DT minor_JJ discomforts_NNS and_CC losses_NNS attendant_VBP upon_IN measures_NNS of_IN disin-_JJ fection_NN ,_, etc._NN ,_, and_CC (_( 3_CD )_) removing_VBG the_DT objections_NNS to_TO temporary_JJ removal_NN from_IN an_DT infected_JJ house_NN or_CC locality_NN ._.
If_IN there_EX is_VBZ any_DT dislike_NN or_CC distrust_NN of_IN hospitals_NNS ,_, cases_NNS will_MD be_VB concealed_VBN and_CC opposition_NN to_TO removal_VB will_MD revive_VB ._.
Large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN hospitals_NNS have_VBP been_VBN opened_VBN ,_, both_DT by_IN local_JJ authorities_NNS and_CC by_IN caste_NN committees_NNS ,_, and_CC most_JJS of_IN them_PRP have_VBP been_VBN well_RB maintained_VBN ;_: but_CC at_IN present_JJ some_DT lack_VBP those_DT attractions_NNS which_WDT would_MD cause_VB patients_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ friends_NNS to_TO regard_VB them_PRP with_IN gratitude_NN ._.
As_IN the_DT severity_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ increases_NNS ,_, the_DT strain_NN on_IN the_DT benevolence_NN of_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT poorer_NN communities_NNS intensifies_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ unnecessary_JJ here_RB to_TO enumerate_VB the_DT ways_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT sufferings_NNS of_IN the_DT poor_JJ may_MD be_VB mitigated_VBN ,_, but_CC some_DT may_MD be_VB mentioned_VBN ,_, as_IN ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, the_DT provision_NN of_IN extra_JJ rations_NNS before_IN discharge_NN ,_, the_DT gift_NN of_IN clothing_NN or_CC small_JJ sums_NNS of_IN money_NN on_IN discharge_NN ,_, the_DT payment_NN of_IN funeral_JJ expenses_NNS ,_, the_DT support_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN ,_, where_WRB necessary_JJ ,_, during_IN illness_NN or_CC interruption_NN of_IN ordinary_JJ avocations_NNS ,_, assistance_NN to_TO survivors_NNS or_CC convalescents_NNS to_TO return_VB to_TO their_PRP$ homes_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_JJ ._.
The_DT popularity_NN of_IN hospitals_NNS will_MD be_VB enhanced_VBN by_IN fairly_RB generous_JJ treatment_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN and_CC their_PRP$ relations_NNS ._.
Occasionally_RB it_PRP may_MD be_VB useful_JJ to_TO engage_VB or_CC subsidise_VB popular_JJ hakims_NNS or_CC native_JJ practitioners_NNS to_TO attend_VB the_DT hospitals_NNS ._.
No_DT person_NN who_WP objects_VBZ should_MD be_VB compelled_VBN to_TO take_VB medicines_NNS ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB found_VBN sufficient_JJ to_TO publish_VB the_DT results_NNS in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP accepted_VBN and_CC persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP refused_VBN treatment_NN ._.
Concealment_NN of_IN cases_NNS is_VBZ also_RB practised_VBN in_IN order_NN to_TO avoid_VB the_DT inconveniences_NNS and_CC petty_JJ expenses_NNS of_IN disinfection_NN ,_, destruction_NN of_IN clothing_NN ,_, etc_FW ._.
Here_RB also_RB much_JJ can_MD be_VB done_VBN to_TO remove_VB the_DT objections_NNS of_IN the_DT poor_JJ and_CC to_TO gain_VB at_IN least_JJS their_PRP$ acquiescence_NN ._.
Government_NNP fear_NN that_IN too_RB little_JJ attention_NN has_VBZ been_VBN given_VBN to_TO the_DT payment_NN of_IN prompt_JJ compensation_NN and_CC to_TO the_DT grant_NN of_IN a_DT ?_. 52_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
I._NN ,_, ?_. T_NNP ._.
V._NNP trifling_VBG sum_NN to_TO cover_VB ,_, in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT working_NN classes_NNS ,_, the_DT petty_NN expenses_NNS incidental_VBP to_TO a_DT temporary_JJ vacation_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN ._.
Compensation_NN for_IN articles_NNS destroyed_VBN or_CC damaged_VBN must_MD be_VB paid_VBN by_IN the_DT officer_NN on_IN the_DT spot_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD be_VB calculated_VBN not_RB only_RB with_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT value_NN of_IN the_DT article_NN ,_, but_CC also_RB with_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT cost_NN of_IN replacing_VBG it_PRP ._.
The_DT objections_NNS to_TO the_DT temporary_JJ removal_NN to_TO a_DT camp_NN are_VBP usually_RB of_IN a_DT similar_JJ nature_NN ._.
The_DT removal_NN involves_VBZ interruption_NN to_TO work_VB or_CC the_DT loss_NN of_IN wages_NNS ,_, or_CC exposure_NN of_IN children_NNS to_TO cold_VB ,_, or_CC expenses_NNS of_IN transit_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_JJ ._.
This_DT is_VBZ particularly_RB the_DT case_NN with_IN weavers_NNS ._.
The_DT officer_NN must_MD make_VB careful_JJ inquiry_NN in_IN each_DT case_NN and_CC use_VB his_PRP$ discretion_NN how_WRB far_RB to_TO afford_VB relief_NN ._.
The_DT class_NN of_IN expenditure_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN indicated_VBN in_IN the_DT foregoing_NN paragraphs_NN may_MD be_VB described_VBN as_IN Discretional_JJ Relief_NNP ._.
The_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, subject_JJ to_TO the_DT sanction_NN of_IN Government_NNP ,_, will_MD place_VB distinct_JJ sums_NNS from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN particular_JJ officers_NNS ,_, Civil_NNP or_CC Military_NNP ._.
The_DT officer_NN concerned_VBN will_MD report_VB weekly_RB the_DT amount_NN spent_NN and_CC the_DT place_NN where_WRB he_PRP has_VBZ spent_VBN it_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT countersignature_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP will_MD be_VB accepted_VBN by_IN the_DT Accountant-General_NNP as_IN a_DT sufficient_JJ voucher_NN for_IN the_DT expenditure_NN ._.
Subject_JJ to_TO the_DT sanction_NN of_IN Government_NNP in_IN each_DT case_NN ,_, the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP may_MD also_RB subsidise_VB any_DT hospital_NN which_WDT he_PRP is_VBZ satisfied_JJ is_VBZ in_IN need_NN of_IN such_JJ assistance_NN ._.
In_IN Bombay_NNP City_NNP the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP is_VBZ authorised_VBN to_TO place_VB a_DT sum_NN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, and_CC elsewhere_RB at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, where_WRB such_JJ assistance_NN appears_VBZ to_TO the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP to_TO be_VB necessary_JJ ._.
The_DT money_NN must_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN quite_RB distinct_JJ from_IN advances_NNS or_CC grants_NNS made_VBN on_IN account_NN of_IN ordinary_JJ plague_NN charges_NNS and_CC no_DT funds_NNS held_VBD on_IN the_DT one_CD account_NN should_MD under_IN any_DT circumstances_NNS be_VB used_VBN for_IN expenditure_NN on_IN the_DT other_JJ ._.
No_DT officer_NN to_TO whom_WP a_DT grant_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN for_IN plague_JJ expenditure_NN generally_RB is_VBZ on_IN any_DT account_NN permitted_VBD to_TO disburse_VB from_IN it_PRP sums_VBD properly_RB debitable_JJ to_TO Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP ,_, and_CC no_DT outlay_NN on_IN Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB incurred_VBN from_IN Government_NNP funds_NNS under_IN any_DT circumstances_NNS without_IN a_DT prior_JJ grant_NN having_VBG been_VBN sanctioned_VBN by_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP ._.
The_DT names_NNS of_IN the_DT officers_NNS entrusted_VBD with_IN advances_NNS for_IN Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP and_CC the_DT amount_NN of_IN each_DT advance_NN must_MD be_VB approved_VBN by_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP ._.
The_DT sums_NNS advanced_VBD will_MD be_VB taken_VBN into_IN consideration_NN in_IN determining_VBG the_DT proportion_NN of_IN plague_NN expenditure_NN to_TO be_VB borne_VBN by_IN Government_NNP and_CC the_DT amount_NN of_IN aid_NN to_TO be_VB given_VBN to_TO Local_NNP bodies_NNS when_WRB the_DT accounts_NNS are_VBP finally_RB adjusted_VBN ._.
For_IN the_DT due_JJ control_NN of_IN this_DT expenditure_NN the_DT Circular_NNP and_CC Forms_NNP appended_VBD to_TO this_DT Resolution_NNP ,_, which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN prepared_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN modified_VBN to_TO suit_VB requirements_NNS elsewhere_RB ,_, are_VBP approved_VBN ._.
The_DT Forms_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN as_RB simple_JJ as_IN possible_JJ with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO minimise_VB the_DT labour_NN involved_VBN to_TO the_DT officers_NNS concerned_VBN while_IN maintaining_VBG a_DT record_NN of_IN all_PDT that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO know_VB ._.
The_DT account_NN of_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN Plague_NNP Operations_NNP in_IN Bombay_NNP with_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT District_NNP Officers_NNP '_POS accounts_NNS with_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, will_MD be_VB kept_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Accountant_NNP 's_POS Office_NNP in_IN ordinary_JJ account_NN form_NN ._.
Elsewhere_RB those_DT accounts_NNS will_MD be_VB kept_VBN by_IN the_DT Huzr_NNP Deputy_NNP Collector_NNP ._.
A_DT receipt_NN must_MD be_VB given_VBN by_IN every_DT officer_NN for_IN each_DT sum_NN advanced_VBD to_TO him_PRP ._.
The_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP will_MD inform_VB the_DT Accountant-General_NNP of_IN every_DT advance_NN made_VBN by_IN him_PRP and_CC the_DT names_NNS of_IN those_DT authorised_VBN to_TO receive_VB advances_NNS and_CC the_DT amount_NN of_IN the_DT advances_NNS allotted_VBN in_IN each_DT case_NN ._.
The_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP will_MD forward_VB weekly_RB to_TO the_DT Account-_NNP ant-General_JJ one_CD copy_NN of_IN Form_NNP C_NNP with_IN his_PRP$ countersignature_NN ,_, which_WDT will_MD be_VB the_DT voucher_NN for_IN the_DT expenditure_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB intended_VBN that_IN the_DT necessarily_RB very_RB limited_JJ allotment_NN available_JJ for_IN Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP should_MD replace_VB or_CC dry_VB up_RP private_JJ charity_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT contrary_JJ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ hoped_VBN that_IN these_DT instructions_NNS will_MD stimulate_VB many_JJ to_TO come_VB forward_RB to_TO supplement_VB the_DT sums_NNS placed_VBN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN officers_NNS ._.
It_PRP will_MD prove_VB convenient_NN that_IN any_DT officer_NN applying_VBG for_IN an_DT advance_NN for_IN Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP should_MD state_NN the_DT amount_NN and_CC the_DT principal_JJ objects_NNS for_IN which_WDT he_PRP requires_VBZ it_PRP ,_, and_CC how_WRB long_RB he_PRP thinks_VBZ it_PRP will_MD last_JJ ._.
Experience_NN has_VBZ shown_VBN that_IN even_RB small_JJ sums_NNS judiciously_RB expended_VBN are_VBP greatly_RB appreciated_VBN ._.
The_DT Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC elsewhere_RB the_DT Collector_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, will_MD promptly_RB caution_VB any_DT officer_NN whose_WP$ expenditure_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB unduly_RB heavy_JJ ,_, and_CC will_MD take_VB early_JJ steps_NNS to_TO satisfy_VB himself_PRP whether_IN the_DT distress_NN or_CC the_DT circumstances_NNS are_VBP so_RB exceptional_JJ as_IN to_TO justify_VB the_DT expenditure_NN ,_, and_CC whether_IN the_DT discretion_NN is_VBZ being_VBG wisely_RB exercised_VBN ._.

53_CD CIRCULAR_NNP ._.
``_`` Small_JJ advances_NNS will_MD be_VB placed_VBN by_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Plague_NNP Operations_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, /Collector_NN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN certain_JJ officers_NNS for_IN discretional_JJ relief_NN in_IN cases_NNS of_IN distress_NN ,_, etc._FW ,_, connected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ._.
This_DT money_NN must_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN quite_RB distinct_JJ from_IN advances_NNS or_CC grants_NNS made_VBN on_IN account_NN of_IN ordinary_JJ plague_NN charges_NNS ,_, and_CC no_DT funds_NNS held_VBD on_IN the_DT one_CD account_NN should_MD under_IN any_DT circumstances_NNS be_VB used_VBN for_IN expenditure_NN on_IN the_DT other_JJ ._.
There_EX must_MD be_VB no_DT outlay_NN whatever_RB without_IN a_DT prior_JJ grant_NN having_VBG been_VBN sanctioned_VBN by_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP ._.
Officers_NNS will_MD themselves_PRP learn_VB by_IN experience_NN in_IN what_WP direction_NN this_DT relief_NN should_MD be_VB afforded_VBN ,_, and_CC they_PRP should_MD freely_RB report_VB for_IN orders_NNS or_CC for_IN information_NN any_DT instances_NNS requiring_VBG relief_NN not_RB enumerated_VBN below_IN ,_, but_CC as_IN a_DT general_JJ guide_NN the_DT following_VBG are_VBP indicated_VBN ,_, provided_VBN always_RB that_IN the_DT relief_NN is_VBZ intended_VBN for_IN the_DT poor_JJ and_CC the_DT poor_JJ only_RB :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) Hospital_NN Relief_NN ._.
(_( 1_CD )_) The_DT provision_NN of_IN extra_JJ rations_NNS before_IN discharge_NN ._.
NOTE.-This_NNP would_MD ordinarily_RB be_VB arranged_VBN under_IN the_DT special_JJ direction_NN of_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN Plague_NNP Operations_NNP ,_, Bombay./Collector_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) The_DT gift_NN of_IN clothing_NN or_CC small_JJ sums_NNS of_IN money_NN on_IN discharge_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) The_DT payment_NN of_IN funeral_JJ expenses_NNS ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) The_DT support_NN of_IN a_DT family_NN ,_, where_WRB necessary_JJ ,_, during_IN illness_NN or_CC interruption_NN of_IN ordinary_JJ avocations_NNS ,_, while_IN in_IN hospital_NN or_CC the_DT hospital_NN camp_NN ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) Assistance_NN to_TO survivors_NNS or_CC convalescents_NNS to_TO return_VB to_TO their_PRP$ own_JJ homes_NNS ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Compensation_NN ._.

(_( 2_CD )_) The_DT grant_NN of_IN a_DT trifling_VBG sum_NN to_TO cover_VB ,_, in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT poorer_NN classes_NNS ,_, the_DT petty_NN expenses_NNS incidental_VBP to_TO the_DT vacation_NN of_IN a_DT house_NN ._.
NOTE.-_JJ Compensation_NN for_IN articles_NNS destroyed_VBN or_CC damaged_VBN must_MD be_VB paid_VBN on_IN the_DT spot_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD be_VB calculated_VBN not_RB only_RB with_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT value_NN of_IN the_DT article_NN but_CC also_RB with_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT cost_NN of_IN replacing_VBG it_PRP ._.
(_( c_NN )_) Camps_NNP ._.
(_( 1_CD )_) Compensation_NN for_IN interruption_NN of_IN work_NN or_CC loss_NN of_IN wages_NNS ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Expenses_NNS of_IN transit_NN ._.

(_( 4_CD )_) Provision_NN of_IN cots_NNS as_IN a_DT protection_NN against_IN dampness_NN ._.
Expenditure_NN under_IN this_DT head_NN (_( 4_CD )_) must_MD ,_, however_RB ,_, be_VB previously_RB sanctioned_VBN by_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN Plague_NNP Operations/Collector_NNP as_IN ``_`` Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP ``_`` is_VBZ intended_VBN ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, actually_RB to_TO reach_VB the_DT pockets_NNS of_IN the_DT poor_JJ ._.
For_IN each_DT advance_NN received_VBD the_DT officer_NN will_MD furnish_VB a_DT receipt_NN ._.
No_DT vouchers_NNS will_MD be_VB required_VBN from_IN the_DT officers_NNS to_TO whom_WP advances_NNS from_IN this_DT Discretional_NNP Relief_NNP Fund_NNP are_VBP made_VBN ,_, except_IN in_IN case_NN of_IN purchase_NN of_IN supplies_NNS ,_, blankets_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, from_IN tradesmen_NNS ,_, when_WRB the_DT receipts_NNS must_MD be_VB attached_VBN to_TO the_DT weekly_JJ return_NN ._.
They_PRP will_MD ,_, however_RB ,_, be_VB personally_RB responsible_JJ that_IN the_DT money_NN is_VBZ properly_RB expended_VBN and_CC that_IN the_DT accounts_NNS are_VBP correctly_RB and_CC punctually_RB submitted_VBN ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB impossible_JJ for_IN the_DT officer_NN entrusted_VBD with_IN an_DT advance_NN to_TO be_VB promptly_RB on_IN the_DT spot_NN in_IN every_DT case_NN where_WRB relief_NN is_VBZ desirable_JJ ,_, and_CC these_DT officers_NNS are_VBP therefore_RB authorized_VBN to_TO entrust_VB small_JJ sums_NNS to_TO those_DT of_IN their_PRP$ volunteers_NNS and_CC those_DT of_IN their_PRP$ assistants_NNS in_IN whose_WP$ integrity_NN and_CC discretion_NN they_PRP feel_VBP that_IN they_PRP are_VBP able_JJ to_TO repose_VB complete_JJ confidence_NN ._.

'_POS 2_CD ._.

'_POS 3_CD ._.

I_PRP am_VBP to_TO request_VB that_IN in_IN order_NN to_TO bring_VB the_DT expenditure_NN incurred_VBN on_IN the_DT accounts_NNS according_VBG to_TO the_DT time_NN when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ actually_RB incurred_VBN ,_, the_DT sums_NNS issued_VBN may_MD not_RB take_VB the_DT form_NN of_IN large_JJ lump_NN grants_NNS ,_, but_CC may_MD be_VB restricted_VBN to_TO the_DT amounts_NNS likely_JJ to_TO be_VB required_VBN for_IN expenditure_NN during_IN short_JJ periods_NNS ._.

V._NNP (_( 1_CD )_) Compensation.-This_NN might_MD be_VB of_IN various_JJ sorbs_NNS ,_, i._NN e._NN ,_, for_IN clothing_NN destroyed_NN ,_, for_IN bedding_VBG burnt_NN or_CC for_IN damage_NN sustained_VBN to_TO property_NN by_IN disinfection_NN ._.

Part_NN VI.-The_NNP Mortality_NNP of_IN Plague_NNP ._.
Whether_NNP looked_VBD at_IN from_IN the_DT standpoint_NN of_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN people_NNS it_PRP destroys_VBZ when_WRB it_PRP appears_VBZ ,_, or_CC from_IN the_DT standpoint_NN of_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN those_DT attacked_VBN by_IN it_PRP who_WP ultimately_RB suc-_JJ cumb_NN ,_, plague_NN is_VBZ acknowledged_VBN to_TO be_VB the_DT most_RBS deadly_JJ of_IN all_DT known_VBN diseases_NNS ._.

||_JJ Dr._NNP Viegas_NNP '_POS estimate_NN quoted_VBN in_IN Major_JJ Lyons_NNP '_POS Report_NNP ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT mortality_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP Hospitals_NNP ,_, the_DT following_VBG remarks_NNS by_IN Lieut_NNP ._.
-Col._NNP J._NNP S._NNP Wilkins_NNP are_VBP quoted_VBN from_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP 's_POS Plague_NNP Report_NNP ,_, 1898-99_JJ :_: -_: ``_`` It_PRP will_MD be_VB inferred_VBN from_IN a_DT comparison_NN of_IN the_DT above_JJ figures_NNS that_IN each_DT recurring_VBG epide-_JJ mic_NN of_IN plague_NN is_VBZ more_RBR virulent_JJ than_IN the_DT last_JJ ._.
This_DT is_VBZ an_DT opinion_NN very_RB largely_RB held_VBN by_IN medi-_JJ cal_JJ men_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ doubtful_JJ ,_, however_RB ,_, if_IN the_DT true_JJ increase_NN in_IN percentage_NN mortality_NN ?_. 60_CD [_NN C_NNP ?_. ?_. P_NNP ._.
I._NN ,_, ?_. T_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
is_VBZ so_RB great_JJ as_IN these_DT figures_NNS would_MD lead_VB us_PRP to_TO infer_VB ._.
For_IN instance_NN ,_, General_NNP Gatacre_NNP 's_POS Report_NNP does_VBZ not_RB cover_VB the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN of_IN 1896-97_JJ ,_, but_CC only_JJ deals_NNS with_IN four_CD months_NNS ,_, during_IN which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD declining_VBG ;_: so_CC that_IN the_DT 58.9_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
mortality_NN shown_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ figures_NNS would_MD probably_RB have_VB been_VBN much_RB higher_JJR if_IN a_DT longer_JJR period_NN had_VBD been_VBN reported_VBN on._IN ``_``
The_DT figures_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, do_VBP show_VB a_DT larger_JJR number_NN of_IN cases_NNS admitted_VBN to_TO hospital_VB during_IN 1898-99_JJ than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.
This_DT will_MD be_VB readily_RB seen_VBN if_IN we_PRP compare_VBP the_DT aver-_JJ age_NN monthly_JJ admissions_NNS to_TO hospital_NN ._.
During_IN General_NNP Gatacre_NNP 's_POS time_NN the_DT average_JJ monthly_JJ admission_NN rate_NN was_VBD 661.5_CD ;_: during_IN the_DT existence_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, 811.4_CD ,_, and_CC dur-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN ,_, 850.8_CD ._.
``_`` It_PRP may_MD also_RB be_VB gathered_VBN from_IN a_DT comparison_NN of_IN the_DT percentage_NN rates_NNS of_IN mortality_NN that_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Service_NNP is_VBZ as_RB helpless_JJ as_IN ever_RB as_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN plague_NN is_VBZ concerned_VBN ._. ''_''
It_PRP must_MD be_VB noted_VBN that_IN the_DT foregoing_JJ statement_NN gives_VBZ the_DT case-mortality_NN for_IN hospitals_NNS only_RB ._.
In_IN these_DT it_PRP may_MD be_VB reasonably_RB inferred_JJ that_IN many_JJ lives_NNS were_VBD saved_VBN which_WDT would_MD otherwise_RB have_VB been_VBN lost_VBN ._.
It_PRP may_MD also_RB be_VB reasonably_RB inferred_VBN that_IN the_DT case-mortality_NN in_IN untreated_JJ cases_NNS is_VBZ higher_JJR :_: although_IN the_DT case-mortality_NN shown_VBN by_IN the_DT officially_RB recorded_VBN cases_NNS and_CC deaths_NNS in_IN Districts_NNS can_MD not_RB be_VB accepted_VBN as_IN an_DT accurate_JJ index_NN of_IN the_DT deadliness_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
Facts_NNS and_CC figures_NNS ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN they_PRP are_VBP known_VBN ,_, or_CC as_RB far_RB as_IN they_PRP are_VBP available_JJ ,_, the_DT accuracy_NN of_IN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN attempted_VBN ,_, but_CC can_MD not_RB be_VB asserted_VBN ,_, are_VBP given_VBN :_: the_DT rest_NN must_MD be_VB left_VBN to_TO individual_JJ opinion_NN ._.

65_CD The_DT average_JJ duration_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN towns_NNS between_IN 20,000_CD and_CC 60,000_CD appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB therefore_RB between_IN 15_CD and_CC 18_CD weeks-or_JJ about_IN 4_CD months_NNS ._.

``_`` When_WRB plague_NN ceases_NNS for_IN several_JJ months_NNS in_IN a_DT town_NN ,_, or_CC village_NN ,_, or_CC house_NN ,_, is_VBZ the_DT germ_JJ dead_JJ or_CC is_VBZ it_PRP merely_RB dormant_JJ ?_.
This_DT is_VBZ a_DT point_NN on_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ important_JJ to_TO collect_VB evidence_NN ._.
And_CC the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP will_MD be_VB glad_VBN to_TO have_VB any_DT that_IN there_EX may_MD be_VB already_RB ,_, or_CC that_DT may_MD in_IN future_JJ come_NN to_TO notice_NN ._.
And_CC he_PRP requests_VBZ that_IN a_DT look-out_NN may_MD be_VB kept_VBN for_IN facts_NNS bearing_VBG on_IN the_DT point_NN ._.
To_TO what_WP extent_NN is_VBZ it_PRP found_VBD that_IN in_IN the_DT present_JJ ,_, or_CC past_NN ,_, spreads_NNS of_IN plague_NN the_DT disease_NN keeps_VBZ re-appearing_NN in_IN the_DT same_JJ villages_NNS and_CC in_IN the_DT same_JJ houses_NNS ,_, as_IN though_IN the_DT result_NN not_RB of_IN new_JJ imported_VBN infection_NN ,_, but_CC of_IN the_DT re-awakening_NN of_IN a_DT germ_NN that_WDT has_VBZ never_RB quitted_VBN the_DT room_NN ._.
(_( Sd_NNP ._. )_)
A._NN CUMINE_NNP ,_, Acting_NNP Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP ._. ''_''

?_. 67_CD CHAPTER_NN II_NNP ._.
THE_DT MEDICAL_NNP ASPECTS_NNP OF_NNP PLAGUE_NNP ._.
REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP BOMBAY_NNP BUBONIC_NNP PLAGUE_NNP RESEARCH_NNP COMMITTEE_NNP ._.
(_( NOTE.-Footnotes_NNS made_VBN by_IN Major_JJ Lyons_NNS are_VBP not_RB initialled_VBN :_: in_IN every_DT other_JJ case_NN the_DT initials_NNS of_IN the_DT annotator_NN are_VBP given_VBN ._. )_)
The_DT Plague_NNP Research_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, details_NNS of_IN the_DT constitution_NN and_CC work_NN of_IN which_WDT are_VBP given_VBN below_IN ,_, was_VBD a_DT body_NN of_IN experts_NNS appointed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP to_TO investigate_VB and_CC report_VB upon_IN the_DT nature_NN and_CC treatment_NN of_IN Plague_NNP ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ ordinary_JJ duties_NNS ,_, however_RB (_( Major_NNP Manser_NNP was_VBD Professor_NNP of_IN Medicine_NNP ,_, and_CC Capt_NNP ._.
Childe_NNP Professor_NNP of_IN Pathology_NNP at_IN the_DT Grant_NNP Medical_NNP College_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP )_) ,_, they_PRP were_VBD unable_JJ to_TO give_VB the_DT time_NN and_CC research_NN to_TO the_DT subject_NN which_WDT could_MD have_VB been_VBN wished_VBN :_: but_CC in_IN this_DT statement_NN Mr._NNP Haffkine_NNP and_CC Mr._NNP Hankin_NNP are_VBP not_RB included_VBN ._.
Nevertheless_RB ,_, in_IN spite_NN of_IN difficulties_NNS in_IN the_DT matters_NNS of_IN time_NN and_CC opportunity_NN ,_, they_PRP ,_, after_IN the_DT lapse_NN of_IN a_DT year_NN ,_, published_VBD a_DT Report_NNP of_IN remarkable_JJ excellence_NN on_IN the_DT clinical_JJ aspects_NNS and_CC the_DT macroscopic_NN and_CC microscopic_NN pathology_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN :_: as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN various_JJ investigations_NNS and_CC experiments_NNS in_IN the_DT bacteriology_NN of_IN the_DT subject_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT present_JJ time_NN ,_, indeed_RB ,_, except_IN in_IN the_DT bacteriology_NN of_IN the_DT subject_NN ,_, their_PRP$ Report_NNP still_RB stands_VBZ as_IN the_DT first_JJ authority_NN on_IN the_DT medical_JJ aspects_NNS of_IN Plague_NNP ,_, and_CC for_IN that_DT reason_NN it_PRP is_VBZ quoted_VBN ,_, practically_RB in_IN extenso_NN ,_, here_RB ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT length_NN of_IN the_DT Report_NNP ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO omit_VB portions_NNS ,_, but_CC in_IN every_DT case_NN where_WRB this_DT has_VBZ been_VBN done_VBN ,_, the_DT fact_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT description_NN of_IN the_DT portion_NN omitted_VBN ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN stated_VBN ._.
The_DT history_NN of_IN the_DT Committee_NNP itself_PRP was_VBD an_DT eventful_JJ one_CD ._.
Appointed_VBN in_IN October_NNP 1896_CD ,_, its_PRP$ President_NNP ,_, Major_NNP Manser_NNP ,_, succumbed_VBD to_TO plague_VB within_IN the_DT first_JJ three_CD months_NNS of_IN its_PRP$ exist-_JJ ence_NN ,_, while_IN Dr._NNP Surveyor_NNP 's_POS health_NN gave_VBD way_NN ._.
A_DT full_JJ description_NN of_IN Major_NNP Manser_NNP 's_POS case_NN is_VBZ given_VBN in_IN the_DT Report_NNP itself_PRP by_IN Captain_NNP (_( now_RB Major_NNP )_) L._NNP F._NNP Childe_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, who_WP attended_VBD him_PRP ._.
After_IN Major_NNP Manser_NNP 's_POS decease_NN ,_, Major_NNP Lyons_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, was_VBD appointed_VBN President_NNP ._.
Points_NNS of_IN special_JJ interest_NN are_VBP the_DT failure_NN to_TO find_VB the_DT point_NN of_IN entry_NN of_IN the_DT poison_NN into_IN the_DT body_NN marked_VBN by_IN any_DT specific_JJ lesion_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN is_VBZ the_DT case_NN in_IN anthrax_NN ;_: the_DT character_NN of_IN the_DT gland_NN enlargement_NN and_CC the_DT effusion_NN into_IN the_DT tissues_NNS surrounding_VBG the_DT glands_NNS ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ so_RB conspicuous_JJ and_CC forms_NNS such_JJ a_DT mass_NN that_IN the_DT glands_NNS proper_NN are_VBP almost_RB entirely_RB obscured_VBN by_IN it_PRP ;_: the_DT brain_NN appearances_NNS of_IN congestion_NN ,_, etc._NN ,_, which_WDT may_MD perhaps_RB explain_VB the_DT cerebral_JJ symptoms_NNS ;_: and_CC ,_, lastly_RB ,_, the_DT state_NN of_IN the_DT heart_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ of_IN great_JJ interest_NN ._.
I.REPORT_VBN BY_NNP SURGEON-MAJOR_JJ LYONS_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, PRESIDENT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP PLAGUE_NNP RESEARCH_NNP COMMITTEE_NNP ._.
THE_DT Plague_NNP Research_NNP Committee_NNP was_VBD originally_RB formed_VBN ,_, in_IN October_NNP 1896_CD ,_, to_TO inquire_VB into_IN the_DT nature_NN and_CC history_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, stated_VBN to_TO be_VB bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT a_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS had_VBD occurred_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP City_NNP ._.
The_DT Committee_NNP was_VBD composed_VBN of_IN the_DT following_JJ members_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP decided_VBD to_TO distribute_VB the_DT work_NN as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: SURG.-MAJOR_JJ MANSER_NNP ,_, President_NNP :_: -The_JJ clinical_JJ aspect_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ;_: its_PRP$ treatment_NN by_IN drugs_NNS ;_: the_DT source_NN of_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP outbreak_NN ;_: the_DT history_NN of_IN its_PRP$ introduction_NN and_CC spread_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT evidence_NN relating_VBG to_TO its_PRP$ incubation_NN period_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Manser_NNP died_VBD in_IN January_NNP 1897_CD from_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC Surgeon-Major_NNP R._NNP W._NNP S._NNP Lyons_NNP took_VBD ,_, his_PRP$ place_NN as_IN President_NNP ._.
SURG.-CAPT_NNP ._.
CHILDE_NN :_: -The_JJ macroscopic_NN and_CC microscopic_NN pathology_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
?_. 68_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
II_NNP ._.
MR._NNP HANKIN_NNP :_: -Its_JJ orgin_NN in_IN the_DT outside_JJ world_NN ;_: search_NN for_IN the_DT microbe_NN in_IN food_NN ,_, clothing_NN ,_, bedding_NN ,_, drains_NNS and_CC sea-water_NN ;_: and_CC whether_IN the_DT microbes_NNS survived_VBD longer_RBR in_IN rotten_JJ than_IN sound_JJ grain_NN ._.
DR._NNP SURVEYOR_NNP :_: -The_JJ nature_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN in_IN rats_NNS and_CC fowls_NN ;_: bacteriological_JJ proof_NN that_IN rats_NNS are_VBP suffering_VBG from_IN the_DT disease_NN ;_: the_DT effects_NNS of_IN antisepties_NNS on_IN the_DT microbe_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT relative_JJ value_NN of_IN different_JJ antiseptics_NNS practically_RB ._.
MR._NNP HAFFKINE_NNP :_: -The_NN study_NN of_IN the_DT microbe_NN and_CC its_PRP$ relation_NN to_TO the_DT patient_NN and_CC to_TO the_DT animal_JJ body_NN ;_: the_DT question_NN of_IN its_PRP$ commuonicability_NN by_IN infection_NN or_CC contagion_NN between_IN man_NN and_CC man_NN ,_, and_CC between_IN man_NN and_CC animals_NNS ,_, inoculations_NNS ,_, etc_FW ._.
;_: diagnostic_JJ methods_NNS ;_: the_DT period_NN during_IN which_WDT the_DT patient_NN continues_VBZ infectious_JJ ;_: immunity_NN ;_: and_CC antitoxine_VB and_CC other_JJ treatment_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Surveyor_NNP was_VBD unable_JJ ,_, owing_VBG to_TO illness_VB ,_, to_TO pursue_VB his_PRP$ line_NN of_IN investigation_NN or_CC to_TO write_VB a_DT report_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Haffkine_NNP 's_POS report_NN was_VBD not_RB ready_JJ for_IN publication_NN with_IN the_DT Committee_NNP 's_POS report_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD presented_VBN to_TO Government_NNP in_IN November_NNP 1897_CD ._.
The_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT Committee_NNP examined_VBN and_CC reported_VBN on_IN a_DT very_RB large_JJ number_NN of_IN speci-_JJ mens_NNS from_IN suspected_VBN plague_NN cases_NNS sent_VBD from_IN every_DT part_NN of_IN India_NNP ;_: experimented_VBN with_IN numerous_JJ antiseptics_NNS sent_VBD for_IN report_NN ;_: and_CC answered_VBD an_DT immense_JJ number_NN of_IN inquiries_NNS addressed_VBN to_TO them_PRP ;_: involving_VBG tedious_JJ laboratory_NN work_NN and_CC a_DT considerable_JJ amount_NN of_IN correspondence_NN ._.
The_DT difficulties_NNS of_IN laboratory_JJ research_NN were_VBD very_RB great_JJ ,_, owing_VBG to_TO want_VB of_IN apparatus_NN and_CC of_IN trained_JJ and_CC intelligent_JJ assistants_NNS to_TO carry_VB out_RP the_DT ordinary_JJ routine_JJ work_NN ._.
The_DT portions_NNS of_IN the_DT programme_NN which_WDT devolved_VBD on_IN Drs_NNP ._.
Lyons_NNS and_CC Childe_NNP had_VBD to_TO be_VB carried_VBN out_RP at_IN such_JJ times_NNS as_IN they_PRP could_MD spare_VB from_IN their_PRP$ other_JJ duties_NNS ,_, which_WDT ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT presence_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, were_VBD unusually_RB heavy_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT present_JJ outbreak_NN of_IN plague_NN the_DT infection_NN was_VBD no_DT doubt_NN imported_VBN from_IN some_DT locality_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT disease_NN existed_VBD ,_, but_CC the_DT most_RBS searching_JJ inquiry_NN ,_, instituted_VBN at_IN the_DT time_NN it_PRP was_VBD first_RB noticed_VBN ,_, failed_VBD to_TO discover_VB evidence_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS (_( or_CC indeed_RB of_IN any_DT severe_JJ form_NN of_IN sickness_NN except_IN twelve_JJ cases_NNS of_IN cholera_NN )_) on_IN board_NN vessels_NNS which_WDT entered_VBD Bombay_NNP Harbour_NNP after_IN 1st_CD June_NNP 1896_CD ._.
Inquiry_NNP was_VBD also_RB instituted_VBN among_IN ship-owners_NNS regarding_VBG any_DT noticeable_JJ mortality_NN among_IN rats_NNS on_IN ships_NNS trading_VBG with_IN China_NNP and_CC ports_NNS where_WRB plague_NN was_VBD known_VBN to_TO have_VB existed_VBN ,_, but_CC in_IN this_DT case_NN also_RB with_IN negative_JJ results_NNS ._.
As_IN the_DT outbreak_NN commenced_VBD near_IN the_DT Docks_NNP ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ most_RBS probable_JJ that_IN the_DT infection_NN was_VBD introduced_VBN by_IN sea_NN and_CC carried_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ clothes_NNS or_CC goods_NNS by_IN traders*_NN who_WP were_VBD themselves_PRP insusceptible_JJ ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ also_RB posssible_JJ that_IN it_PRP may_MD have_VB been_VBN introduced_VBN in_IN this_DT way_NN by_IN traders_NNS from_IN Northern_NNP India_NNP ,_, as_IN plague_NN is_VBZ believed_VBN to_TO be_VB endemic_JJ on_IN the_DT southern_JJ slopes_NNS of_IN the_DT Himalayas_NNP ._.
The_DT disease_NN probably_RB commenced_VBD to_TO spread_VB in_IN Bombay_NNP about_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN August_NNP 1896_CD ,_, as_IN the_DT mortality_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN began_VBD to_TO increase_VB in_IN the_DT second_JJ week_NN of_IN that_DT month_NN ._.
This_DT increase_NN in_IN mortality_NN was_VBD attributed_VBN at_IN the_DT time_NN to_TO remittent_VB fever_NN and_CC lung_NN affections_NNS ,_, but_CC as_IN rats_NNS were_VBD dying_VBG in_IN great_JJ numbers_NNS in_IN Mandvi_NNP Ward_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT death-rate_NN among_IN the_DT population_NN was_VBD unusually_RB high_JJ ,_, and_CC where_WRB the_DT prevalence_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD first_RB discovered_VBN ,_, there_EX can_MD be_VB little_JJ doubt_NN that_IN the_DT excessive_JJ mortality_NN was_VBD due_JJ to_TO plague_VB ._.
The_DT epidemic_JJ spread_NN slowly_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT total_JJ mortality_NN continued_VBD to_TO increase_VB until_IN by_IN the_DT second_JJ week_NN in_IN February_NNP the_DT whole_JJ city_NN had_VBD become_VBN infected_JJ ._.
After_IN that_DT time_NN the_DT mortality_NN began_VBD to_TO decrease_VB ,_, and_CC by_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN May_NNP it_PRP had_VBD fallen_VBN to_TO the_DT normal_JJ ,_, and_CC deaths_NNS from_IN plague_NN ceased_VBN to_TO occur_VB ._.
*_JJ Dr._NNP Jan_NNP Mahomed_NNP 's_POS first_JJ cases_NNS occurred_VBD towards_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN September_NNP among_IN Mooltaris_NNP who_WP trade_VBP with_IN China_NNP ,_, and_CC who_WP lived_VBD near_IN the_DT dock_NN ._.
Vids_NNS Paper_NNP on_IN Plague_NNP in_IN Gahrwal_NNP and_CC Kumaon_NNP ,_, by_IN Col._NNP Hutcheson_NNP ._.
