87_CD region_NN this_DT swelling_NN was_VBD enormous_JJ ,_, and_CC pressed_VBN upon_NN and_CC embarrassed_VBD the_DT larynx_NN and_CC trachea_NN (_( hence_VB the_DT dyspna_NN in_IN these_DT cases_NNS )_) ._.
With_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT remaining_VBG lymphatic_JJ glands_NNS of_IN the_DT body_NN in_IN a_DT bubonic_JJ case_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ but_CC little_JJ to_TO be_VB said_VBD ._.
Thus_RB in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN a_DT left_JJ axillary_JJ bubo_IN the_DT following_JJ condition_NN was_VBD found_VBN ._.
The_DT left_JJ supra-trochlear_JJ gland_NN was_VBD intensely_RB engorged_VBN and_CC the_DT size_NN of_IN a_DT large_JJ bean_NN ,_, rather_RB firm_NN and_CC full_JJ of_IN dark_JJ blood_NN ;_: the_DT right_JJ supra-trochlear_NN ,_, right_JJ axillary_NN ,_, cervical_NN of_IN both_DT sides_NNS and_CC bronchial_JJ looked_VBD normal_JJ or_CC just_RB slightly_RB engorged_VBN ._.
The_DT mesenteric_NN ,_, iliac_NN ,_, lumbar_NN and_CC popliteal_NN were_VBD in_IN the_DT same_JJ condition_NN ;_: whilst_CC the_DT inguinal_JJ were_VBD some_DT as_RB large_JJ as_IN beans_NNS ,_, pinkish_JJ ,_, and_CC slightly_RB engorged_VBN ,_, others_NNS of_IN about_IN the_DT normal_JJ size_NN and_CC appearance_NN ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB mentioned_VBN here_RB that_IN the_DT lymphatic_JJ vessels_NNS presented_VBN no_DT abnormality_NN as_IN a_DT rule_NN ,_, except_IN that_DT in_IN some_DT cases_NNS those_DT near_IN the_DT bubo_NN seemed_VBD to_TO be_VB slightly_RB swollen_VBN ;_: the_DT thoracic_NN duct_NN ,_, too_RB ,_, was_VBD either_CC normal_JJ or_CC possibly_RB slightly_RB swollen_VBN ._.
Condition_NN of_IN the_DT other_JJ Organs.-Hmorrhages_NNS were_VBD frequently_RB found_VBN beneath_IN the_DT con-_JJ junctiv_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT connective_JJ tissue_NN under_IN the_DT scalp_NN ,_, and_CC under_IN the_DT periosteum_NN on_IN the_DT surface_NN of_IN the_DT cranial_JJ bones_NNS ,_, also_RB extravasations_VBZ sometimes_NNS of_IN large_JJ size_NN were_VBD occasionally_RB found_VBN amongst_IN the_DT muscles_NNS ,_, especially_RB in_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT abdominal_JJ wall_NN ._.
The_DT occurrence_NN of_IN petechi_NN in_IN the_DT skin_NN has_VBZ been_VBN already_RB mentioned_VBN ._.
Nervous_JJ System.-The_NNP dura_NN mater_NN and_CC pia_NN mater_NN were_VBD much_RB engorged_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT appear-_JJ ance_NN of_IN lymph_NN was_VBD seen_VBN along_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT larger_JJR vessels_NNS in_IN the_DT latter_JJ membrane_NN ;_: the_DT puneta_NN cruenta_NN in_IN the_DT brain_NN were_VBD well_RB marked_VBN ,_, but_CC the_DT brain_NN substance_NN itself_PRP looked_VBD normal_JJ ,_, as_IN did_VBD the_DT fluid_NN in_IN the_DT ventricles_NNS ._.
The_DT spinal_JJ cord_NN presented_VBD a_DT similar_JJ engorged_JJ appearance_NN ,_, but_CC showed_VBD no_DT other_JJ abnormality_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT nerve-trunks_NNS appeared_VBD to_TO be_VB normal_JJ ._.
Alimentary_JJ System.-The_NNP tonsils_NNS were_VBD either_RB normal_JJ or_CC enlarged_VBN to_TO the_DT size_NN of_IN almonds_NNS ,_, of_IN a_DT dusky_JJ purple_NN colour_NN ,_, soft_JJ and_CC engorged_VBD ;_: and_CC similarly_RB the_DT pharyngeal_NN tonsils_NNS were_VBD either_RB normal_JJ or_CC engorged_VBN ._.
The_DT parotid_NN and_CC sub-maxillary_JJ salivary_JJ glands_NNS were_VBD either_RB normal_JJ or_CC engorged_VBN to_TO some_DT extent_NN ,_, the_DT mucous_JJ membrane_NN of_IN the_DT pharynx_NN and_CC sophagus_NN was_VBD usually_RB dusky_JJ from_IN engorgement_NN ._.
The_DT stomach_NN showed_VBD constantly_RB a_DT distinctly_RB engorged_VBN appear-_JJ ance_NN with_IN hmorrhages_NNS into_IN the_DT mucous_JJ membrane_NN ,_, which_WDT were_VBD usually_RB petechial_JJ ,_, but_CC some-_JJ times_NNS of_IN a_DT larger_JJR size_NN ._.
Similar_JJ engorgement_NN and_CC petechi_NN were_VBD frequent_JJ in_IN the_DT large_JJ intestine_NN and_CC rectum_NN ,_, but_CC were_VBD less_JJR generally_RB found_VBN in_IN the_DT small_JJ intestine_NN ._.
(_( This_DT applies_VBZ especially_RB to_TO petechi_VB ._. )_)
In_IN some_DT cases_NNS Peyer_NNP 's_POS patches_NNS and_CC the_DT solitary_JJ follicles_NNS looked_VBD distinct_JJ ,_, promi-_JJ nent_NN and_CC slightly_RB swollen_VBN ;_: but_CC usually_RB they_PRP were_VBD either_CC somewhat_RB distinct_JJ or_CC of_IN the_DT normal_JJ appearance_NN ._.
The_DT Liver_NNP was_VBD always_RB distinctly_RB enlarged_VBN and_CC full_JJ of_IN blood_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT substance_NN itself_PRP was_VBD usually_RB rather_RB pale_JJ and_CC soft_JJ from_IN parenchymatous_JJ degeneration_NN ,_, there_EX was_VBD bile_NN in_IN the_DT gall-_JJ bladder_NN either_DT of_IN the_DT usual_JJ appearance_NN or_CC thin_JJ and_CC watery_NN ._.
Hmorrhages_NNS into_IN the_DT mucous_JJ membrane_NN of_IN the_DT gall-bladder_NN were_VBD rarely_RB seen_VBN ._.
In_IN one_CD instance_NN small_JJ necrotic_JJ patches_NNS were_VBD scattered_VBN through_IN the_DT liver_NN ._.
This_DT case_NN will_MD be_VB described_VBN hereafter_NN ._.
The_DT Pancreas_NNP was_VBD either_DT normal_JJ or_CC engorged_VBN ._.
The_DT Spleen_NNP was_VBD always_RB enlarged_VBN ,_, sometimes_RB to_TO two_CD or_CC three_CD times_NNS the_DT ordinary_JJ size_NN ,_, the_DT capsule_NN was_VBD normal_JJ ,_, the_DT spleen-pulp_NN of_IN a_DT brick-red_JJ or_CC purple_JJ colour_NN and_CC always_RB markedly_RB engorged_VBN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD either_RB fairly_RB firm_NN or_CC rather_RB soft_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT Malpighian_JJ bodies_NNS plainly_RB seen_VBN as_IN if_IN each_DT were_VBD engorged_VBN ,_, so_RB as_IN to_TO give_VB the_DT section_NN sometimes_RB almost_RB a_DT granular_JJ appearance_NN ._.
Urinary_JJ System.-The_JJ kidneys_NNS were_VBD always_RB enlarged_VBN and_CC much_RB engorged_VBN ,_, the_DT capsule_NN stripped_VBD easily_RB and_CC petechial_JJ hmorrhages_NNS were_VBD constantly_RB found_VBN beneath_IN it_PRP ;_: the_DT kidney_NN substance_NN itself_PRP was_VBD pale_JJ and_CC soft_JJ from_IN parenchymatous_JJ degeneration_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD distinct_JJ 88_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
II_NNP ._.
engorgement_NN of_IN the_DT pelvis_NN of_IN the_DT kidney_NN with_IN petechial_JJ hmorrhages_NNS and_CC sometimes_VBZ a_DT large_JJ clot_NN distending_VBG the_DT pelvis_NN and_CC calices_NNS ._.
The_DT whole_JJ ureter_NN was_VBD frequently_RB engorged_VBN ,_, and_CC distinct_JJ hmorrhages_NNS could_MD be_VB seen_VBN under_IN its_PRP$ inner_JJ coat_NN ._.
The_DT bladder_NN was_VBD usually_RB distended_VBN with_IN urine_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD either_DT of_IN the_DT normal_JJ or_CC a_DT slightly_RB blood-stained_JJ colour_NN ;_: small_JJ hmorrhages_NNS were_VBD frequently_RB seen_VBN in_IN the_DT mucous_JJ membrane_NN of_IN the_DT bladder_NN ._.
The_DT Genital_NNP System_NNP showed_VBD nothing_NN abnormal_JJ beyond_IN some_DT engorgement_NN ._.
The_DT suprarenal_JJ capsule_NN and_CC thyroid_VB body_NN were_VBD engorged_VBN ,_, but_CC otherwise_RB normal_JJ ._.
The_DT Peritoneum_NNP showed_VBD considerable_JJ engorgement_NN ,_, and_CC hmorrhages_VBZ into_IN the_DT retro-_JJ peritoneal_JJ tissue_NN were_VBD frequently_RB found_VBN ;_: thus_RB ,_, they_PRP were_VBD seen_VBN on_IN the_DT under_IN surface_NN of_IN the_DT diaphragm_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT upper_JJ surface_NN of_IN the_DT liver_NN ,_, especially_RB close_RB to_TO the_DT ligaments_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN one_CD instance_NN there_EX was_VBD a_DT hmorrhage_NN completely_RB enclosing_VBG the_DT gall-bladder_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN there_EX was_VBD a_DT casing_NN of_IN coagulated_VBN blood_NN between_IN the_DT peritoneum_NN and_CC gall-bladder_NN ._.
Similar_JJ hmorrhages_NNS behind_IN the_DT peritoneum_NN were_VBD found_VBN on_IN the_DT surface_NN of_IN the_DT spleen_NN ,_, kidneys_NNS ,_, and_CC intestines_NNS ,_, and_CC sometimes_RB large_JJ coagula_NN in_IN the_DT retro-peritoneal_JJ tissue_NN of_IN the_DT lumber_JJ region_NN ._.
Circulatory_JJ System.-The_NNP pericardial_JJ cavity_NN usually_RB contained_VBD a_DT few_JJ ounces_NNS of_IN blood-_NN stained_VBD or_CC clear_JJ fluid_NN ,_, and_CC petechial_JJ hmorrhages_NNS were_VBD constantly_RB seen_VBN beneath_IN the_DT visceral_JJ and_CC parietal_JJ pericardium_NN ._.
The_DT heart-muscle_NN was_VBD either_CC normal_JJ or_CC in_IN some_DT cases_NNS rather_RB soft_JJ and_CC friable_JJ ;_: considerable_JJ dilatation_NN of_IN the_DT right_JJ side_NN ,_, with_IN post-_JJ mortem_NN clots_NNS in_IN the_DT cavities_NNS ,_, was_VBD often_RB present_JJ ._.
There_EX was_VBD not_RB much_JJ engorgement_NN of_IN the_DT walls_NNS of_IN arteries_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT vena_NN cava_NN and_CC other_JJ large_JJ veins_NNS showed_VBD this_DT condition_NN very_RB markedly_RB ._.
On_IN opening_VBG the_DT veins_NNS distinct_JJ petechial_JJ and_CC larger_JJR hmorrhages_NNS were_VBD seen_VBN under_IN the_DT inner_JJ coat_NN ,_, giving_VBG it_PRP a_DT mottled_JJ appearance_NN ._.
Where_WRB a_DT large_JJ vein_NN ,_, e._JJ g._NN ,_, axillary_JJ or_CC femoral_JJ ,_, was_VBD included_VBN in_IN the_DT bubo_NN ,_, this_DT hmorrhage_NN into_IN its_PRP$ walls_NNS was_VBD constantly_RB seen_VBN ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT extravasated_JJ blood_NN in_IN the_DT gland_NN itself_PRP ,_, in_IN the_DT areolar_JJ tissue_NN outside_IN it_PRP and_CC in_IN the_DT walls_NNS of_IN the_DT vein_NN ,_, was_VBD all_DT directly_RB continuous_JJ ._.
I_PRP think_VBP that_IN the_DT blood_NN itself_PRP was_VBD rather_RB more_JJR fluid_NN and_CC showed_VBD less_JJR tendency_NN to_TO clot_NN than_IN is_VBZ usually_RB seen_VBN after_IN death_NN ._.
The_DT Respiratory_NNP System.-There_NNP was_VBD some_DT engorgement_NN of_IN the_DT larynx_NN and_CC trachea_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT mucous_JJ membrane_NN of_IN the_DT bronchial_JJ tubes_NN was_VBD usually_RB swollen_VBN and_CC engorged_VBN ,_, sometimes_RB greatly_RB so_RB ._.
There_EX was_VBD much_JJ general_JJ engorgement_NN of_IN the_DT lungs_NNS with_IN dema_NN ,_, and_CC small_JJ hmorrhages_NNS into_IN the_DT lung_NN tissue_NN were_VBD seen_VBN rather_RB frequently_RB ._.
Frothy_JJ sero-mucous_JJ fluid_NN which_WDT was_VBD sometimes_RB blood-tinged_JJ ,_, was_VBD found_VBN in_IN the_DT bronchi_NN ._.
The_DT pleura_NN showed_VBD marked_JJ engorgement_NN ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ cavity_NN often_RB contained_VBD some_DT blood-stained_JJ or_CC clear_JJ fluid_NN ;_: sub-pleural_JJ hmorrhages_NNS ,_, sometimes_RB of_IN large_JJ extent_NN ,_, were_VBD commonly_RB found_VBN on_IN the_DT upper_JJ surface_NN of_IN the_DT diaphragm_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT chest-wall_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT surface_NN of_IN the_DT lungs_NNS ,_, especially_RB between_IN the_DT lobes_NNS In_IN cases_NNS of_IN cervical_JJ bubo_NN the_DT engorgement_NN and_CC dema_NN extended_VBN to_TO the_DT larynx_NN ,_, and_CC deina_NN of_IN the_DT glottis_NN was_VBD present_JJ ._.
Note.-A_JJ variety_NN of_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ form_NN of_IN plague_NN must_MD be_VB mentioned_VBN here_RB ;_: for_IN ,_, instead_RB of_IN finding_VBG one_CD large_JJ bubo_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN has_VBZ been_VBN described_VBN above_IN ,_, the_DT following_JJ condition_NN was_VBD observed_VBN :_: A_DT chain_NN of_IN enlarged_JJ glands_NNS was_VBD found_VBN in_IN the_DT inguinal_JJ region_NN and_CC it_PRP extended_VBD into_IN the_DT pelvis_NN right_RB along_IN the_DT iliac_JJ artery_NN as_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT lumber_NN glands_NNS ._.
These_DT glands_NNS were_VBD dark-_JJ red_JJ ,_, soft_JJ and_CC friable_JJ and_CC intensely_RB engorged_VBN ,_, and_CC looked_VBD like_IN soft_JJ spleen_JJ tissue_NN ;_: there_EX was_VBD great_JJ engorgement_NN ,_, extravasation_NN ,_, and_CC dema_NN around_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC they_PRP surrounded_VBD the_DT iliac_JJ artery_NN and_CC vein_NN ,_, so_IN that_DT in_IN dissecting_VBG out_RP the_DT gland_NN mass_NN these_DT vessels_NNS came_VBD away_RB enclosed_VBN in_IN it_PRP ._.
The_DT glands_NNS were_VBD as_RB large_JJ as_IN almonds_NNS or_CC smaller_JJR ,_, and_CC were_VBD so_RB incorporated_VBN in_IN the_DT coagulated_JJ blood_NN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD scarcely_RB possible_JJ to_TO dissect_VB them_PRP out_RP ._.
The_DT remaining_VBG glands_NNS and_CC other_JJ organs_NNS in_IN the_DT body_NN were_VBD in_IN the_DT condition_NN described_VBN above_IN ._.
MEDICAL_NNP ASPEOTS_NNP OF_NNP PLAGUE_NNP ._. ]_NN
89_CD B.-THE_JJ SEPTICMIC_NNP FORM_NNP ,_, OR_NNP PLAGUE-SEPTICMIA_NNP ._.
Plague_NNP Septicmia_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ form_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, one_CD set_NN of_IN glands_NNS with_IN extravasated_JJ blood_NN around_IN them_PRP forms_VBZ the_DT bubo_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ practically_RB no_DT alteration_NN in_IN the_DT remaining_VBG glands_NNS of_IN the_DT body_NN ;_: but_CC in_IN the_DT septicmic_JJ form_NN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT such_JJ bubo_NN ,_, yet_RB there_EX is_VBZ a_DT general_JJ involvement_NN of_IN nearly_RB all_DT the_DT lymphatic_JJ glands_NNS ._.
Yet_RB though_IN so_RB many_JJ glands_NNS show_VBP evidence_NN of_IN disease_NN ,_, one_CD gland_NN or_CC several_JJ glands_NNS of_IN one_CD set_NN show_NN characteristic_JJ changes_NNS which_WDT are_VBP pathognomonic_JJ of_IN this_DT type_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
These_DT appearances_NNS are_VBP :_: The_DT gland_NN is_VBZ enlarged_VBN to_TO the_DT size_NN of_IN an_DT almond_NN or_CC less_JJR ,_, is_VBZ rounded_VBN ,_, firm_NN ,_, and_CC pink_VB in_IN colour_NN ;_: on_IN section_NN it_PRP shows_VBZ some_DT ,_, but_CC not_RB much_JJ ,_, engorge-_JJ ment_NN and_CC some_DT dema_NN ;_: its_PRP$ substance_NN is_VBZ rather_RB soft_JJ and_CC can_MD be_VB easily_RB scraped_VBN off_RP with_IN a_DT knife_NN ,_, and_CC sometimes_RB small_JJ softening_VBG areas_NNS were_VBD present_JJ ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT hmorrhage_NN in_IN the_DT areolar_JJ tissue_NN around_IN this_DT gland_NN and_CC at_IN most_RBS only_RB a_DT little_JJ dema_NN and_CC trifling_VBG engorgement_NN of_IN the_DT vessels_NNS ._.
Commonly_RB there_EX were_VBD one_CD or_CC several_JJ such_JJ glands_NNS in_IN one_CD inguinal_JJ region_NN ,_, and_CC usually_RB the_DT lowest_JJS gland_NN of_IN the_DT chain_NN was_VBD most_RBS markedly_RB affected_VBD ;_: whilst_VB those_DT higher_JJR up_RP varied_VBN in_IN size_NN from_IN a_DT bean_NN to_TO an_DT almond_NN ,_, and_CC had_VBD the_DT same_JJ firm_NN pink_NN appearance_NN ,_, though_IN there_EX were_VBD at_IN times_NNS some_DT which_WDT looked_VBD nearly_RB normal_JJ in_IN size_NN and_CC shape_NN ._.
The_DT iliac_JJ glands_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ side_NN were_VBD similarly_RB affected_VBN ,_, as_RB large_JJ as_IN almonds_NNS ,_, and_CC either_DT pink_NN and_CC firm_NN or_CC softer_JJR and_CC of_IN a_DT dark-red_JJ colour_NN ._.
The_DT inguinal_JJ glands_NNS of_IN the_DT opposite_JJ side_NN showed_VBD similar_JJ changes_NNS ,_, but_CC sometimes_RB to_TO a_DT less_RBR extent_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT iliac_NN sometimes_RB showed_VBD slighter_JJ changes_NNS or_CC some_DT of_IN them_PRP looked_VBD normal_JJ ._.
The_DT lumbar_NN usually_RB showed_VBD slight_JJ enlargement_NN and_CC were_VBD either_CC pale_JJ and_CC soft_JJ or_CC somewhat_RB pink_JJ and_CC firm_NN ._.
The_DT cervical_JJ and_CC axillary_JJ varied_VBN in_IN size_NN from_IN hazel-nuts_NNS to_TO peas_NNS ,_, and_CC usually_RB showed_VBD merely_RB engorgement_JJ ,_, being_VBG full_JJ of_IN dark_JJ blood_NN ;_: but_CC sometimes_VBZ some_DT of_IN them_PRP showed_VBD the_DT pink_NN firm_NN appearance_NN described_VBN above_IN ._.
The_DT mesenteric_NN were_VBD enlarged_VBN to_TO the_DT size_NN of_IN peas_NNS and_CC beans_NNS ,_, and_CC were_VBD either_RB slightly_RB or_CC considerably_RB engorged_VBN ._.
The_DT supra-trochlear_JJ and_CC popliteal_JJ were_VBD normal_JJ or_CC engorged_VBN ._.
There_EX was_VBD no_DT hmorrhage_NN or_CC dema_NN around_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT above-mentioned_JJ glands_NNS ,_, and_CC no_DT enlargement_NN of_IN the_DT lymphatic_JJ vessels_NNS was_VBD observed_VBN ._.
The_DT condition_NN of_IN the_DT remaining_VBG organs_NNS was_VBD such_JJ as_IN has_VBZ already_RB been_VBN described_VBN under_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ form_NN ._.
Note.-In_JJ several_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague-septicmia_NN ,_, where_WRB death_NN had_VBD occurred_VBN shortly_RB after_IN attack_NN ,_, the_DT glands_NNS were_VBD found_VBN slightly_RB enlarged_VBN ,_, of_IN a_DT dark-red_JJ colour_NN and_CC contained_VBD much_RB blood_NN and_CC dema_NN fluid_NN ._.
This_DT appeared_VBD to_TO be_VB an_DT earlier_JJR form_NN of_IN the_DT characteristic_JJ pink_NN plague-_JJ glands_NNS described_VBN above_IN ._.
The_DT difference_NN between_IN the_DT bubonic_NN and_CC septicmic_JJ form_NN of_IN plague_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB this_DT :_: -In_VB the_DT bubonic_JJ form_NN the_DT plague-bacillus_NN after_IN entering_VBG the_DT body_NN is_VBZ arrested_VBN at_IN the_DT nearest_JJS group_NN of_IN glands_NNS ,_, grows_NNS here_RB vigorously_RB ,_, and_CC as_IN a_DT result_NN of_IN its_PRP$ growth_NN the_DT bubo_NN is_VBZ formed_VBN ._.
Here_RB the_DT bacillus_NN forms_VBZ the_DT toxins_NNS which_WDT are_VBP discharged_VBN into_IN the_DT system_NN and_CC cause_VB the_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN plague_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT glands_NNS of_IN the_DT bubo_NN form_NN a_DT barrier_NN which_WDT prevents_VBZ the_DT bacilli_NN from_IN passing_VBG on_IN and_CC growing_VBG generally_RB throughout_IN the_DT body_NN ;_: and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ only_RB shortly_RB before_IN death_NN ,_, in_IN fatal_JJ cases_NNS ,_, that_IN this_DT resistance_NN is_VBZ overcome_VBN and_CC the_DT bacilli_NN are_VBP able_JJ to_TO pass_VB on_IN into_IN the_DT system_NN generally_RB ._.
But_CC in_IN the_DT septicmic_JJ form_NN ,_, the_DT bacillus_NN ,_, after_IN entering_VBG the_DT body_NN ,_, meets_NNS with_IN feeble_JJ resistance_NN at_IN the_DT nearest_JJS glands_NNS ;_: it_PRP speedily_RB overcomes_VBZ all_DT oppo-_JJ sition_NN and_CC passes_NNS on_IN to_TO infect_VB other_JJ glands_NNS and_CC organs_NNS where_WRB it_PRP grows_VBZ abundantly_RB ._.
These_DT points_NNS will_MD be_VB illustrated_VBN later_RB in_IN the_DT detailed_JJ account_NN of_IN autopsies_NNS ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB mentioned_VBN here_RB that_IN no_DT bubo_NN of_IN the_DT mesenteric_JJ glands_NNS was_VBD ever_RB found_VBN ;_: these_DT glands_NNS were_VBD always_RB examined_VBN ,_, and_CC though_IN changes_NNS might_MD be_VB found_VBN in_IN them_PRP ,_, they_PRP were_VBD always_RB less_JJR marked_JJ and_CC less_RBR distinct_JJ than_IN plague_JJ glands_NNS found_VBN in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT body_NN ._.
In_IN short_JJ ,_, there_EX was_VBD no_DT autopsy_NN ,_, which_WDT went_VBD to_TO show_VB that_IN the_DT plague-bacillus_NN had_VBD reached_VBN the_DT stomach_NN or_CC intestine_NN ,_, e._JJ g._NN ,_, in_IN food_NN ,_, and_CC thence_NN infected_VBD the_DT mesenteric_JJ glands_NNS ._.
23_CD 90_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
II_NNP ._.
C.-THE_NNP PNEUMONIC_NNP FORM_NNP OR_NNP PLAGUE-PNEUMONIA_NNP ._.
Plague-_NNP Pneumonia_NNP ._.
In_IN this_DT form_NN of_IN plague_NN the_DT only_JJ marked_VBD evidences_NNS of_IN disease_NN are_VBP found_VBN in_IN the_DT lungs_NNS ,_, whereas_IN the_DT lymphatic_JJ glands_NNS and_CC other_JJ organs_NNS are_VBP scarcely_RB affected_VBN at_IN all_DT ._.
The_DT lungs_NNS were_VBD in_IN the_DT following_JJ condition_NN :_: -_: There_EX was_VBD general_JJ engorgement_NN with_IN considerable_JJ dema_NN ,_, a_DT reddened_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT mucous_JJ membrane_NN of_IN the_DT bronchi_NN ,_, but_CC no_DT marked_JJ evidences_NNS of_IN bronchitis_NN ,_, and_CC frothy_JJ watery_NN fluid_NN ,_, sometimes_RB blood-stained_JJ ,_, could_MD be_VB squeezed_VBN from_IN the_DT bronchi_NN ._.
(_( Pus_NNP in_IN the_DT bronchial_JJ tubes_NN was_VBD only_RB found_VBN on_IN one_CD occasion_NN ._. )_)
A_DT number_NN of_IN pneumonic_JJ patches_NNS were_VBD found_VBN scattered_VBN through_IN the_DT lungs_NNS ,_, varying_VBG in_IN size_NN from_IN a_DT pea_NN to_TO an_DT egg_NN ._.
These_DT patches_NNS were_VBD light_JJ pink_NNS or_CC red_JJ grey_NN in_IN colour_NN ,_, solid_JJ ,_, airless_JJ and_CC sank_NN in_IN water_NN ;_: they_PRP were_VBD rounded_VBN in_IN shape_NN and_CC usually_RB separated_VBN by_IN a_DT distinct_JJ ring_NN of_IN engorgement_NN from_IN the_DT crepitant_NN lung_NN around_IN ._.
Some_DT ,_, instead_RB of_IN being_VBG pink_NN ,_, were_VBD of_IN a_DT deep_JJ blood_NN colour_NN throughout_IN and_CC less_JJR solid_JJ ,_, and_CC some_DT of_IN these_DT had_VBD a_DT small_JJ greyish_NN more_RBR solid_JJ centre_NN ._.
Those_DT of_IN the_DT patches_NNS which_WDT were_VBD situated_VBN on_IN the_DT surface_NN of_IN the_DT lung_NN were_VBD prominent_JJ and_CC projected_VBN distinctly_RB from_IN the_DT surface_NN ;_: whilst_CC the_DT pleura_NN over_IN them_PRP was_VBD roughened_VBN and_CC showed_VBD signs_NNS of_IN early_JJ inflammation_NN ._.
These_DT patches_NNS had_VBD in_IN fact_NN the_DT appearance_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ and_CC second_JJ stages_NNS of_IN lobular_JJ pneumonia_NN ,_, but_CC no_DT patches_NNS were_VBD found_VBN which_WDT had_VBD passed_VBN on_IN to_TO the_DT third_JJ stage_NN of_IN softening_VBG and_CC breaking_VBG down_RP ._.
In_IN a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS larger_JJR masses_NNS of_IN pneumonic_JJ lung_NN than_IN these_DT were_VBD found_VBN ,_, and_CC once_RB about_IN half_PDT the_DT lower_JJR lobe_NN was_VBD found_VBN in_IN this_DT condition_NN ._.
Petechial_JJ hmorrhages_NNS were_VBD usually_RB found_VBN on_IN the_DT surface_NN of_IN the_DT lung_NN ,_, the_DT bronchial_JJ glands_NNS were_VBD either_RB enlarged_VBN ,_, swollen_VBN ,_, dematous_JJ ,_, soft_JJ and_CC distinctly_RB engorged_VBN ,_, or_CC else_RB they_PRP were_VBD small_JJ and_CC of_IN the_DT usual_JJ appearance_NN ,_, perhaps_RB a_DT little_JJ engorged_NN ._.
The_DT remaining_VBG lymphatic_JJ glands_NNS throughout_IN the_DT body_NN showed_VBD none_NN of_IN the_DT appearances_NNS of_IN either_CC the_DT bubonic_NN or_CC septicmic_JJ form_NN of_IN plague_NN ;_: most_JJS of_IN them_PRP looked_VBD absolutely_RB normal_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT only_JJ noticeable_JJ change_NN was_VBD that_IN the_DT axillary_JJ ,_, and_CC sometimes_RB the_DT cervical_JJ chains_NNS ,_, were_VBD a_DT little_JJ engorged_NN ._.
The_DT description_NN of_IN the_DT remaining_VBG internal_JJ organs_NNS already_RB given_VBN applies_NNS equally_RB to_TO this_DT form_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, except_IN that_IN the_DT large_JJ horrhages_NNS were_VBD absent_JJ ,_, but_CC petechi_VBP on_IN the_DT surface_NN of_IN the_DT heart_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT pelvis_NN of_IN the_DT kidney_NN ,_, bladder_NN ,_, stomach_NN and_CC intestines_NNS were_VBD commonly_RB present_JJ ._.
Petechi_NNP in_IN the_DT skin_NN were_VBD not_RB observed_VBN in_IN this_DT form_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
Reference_NN must_MD be_VB made_VBN here_RB to_TO a_DT variety_NN of_IN this_DT form_NN of_IN plague_NN which_WDT may_MD be_VB described_VBN as_IN a_DT combination_NN of_IN Plague-Pneumonia_NNP with_IN Plague-Septicmia_NNP ._.
In_IN this_DT condition_NN the_DT lungs_NNS were_VBD found_VBN in_IN the_DT state_NN which_WDT has_VBZ just_RB been_VBN described_VBN ,_, pneumonic_JJ patches_NNS being_VBG scattered_VBN through_IN them_PRP ;_: and_CC in_IN addition_NN the_DT lymphatic_JJ glands_NNS of_IN the_DT body_NN presented_VBD the_DT appearances_NNS seen_VBN in_IN cases_NNS of_IN Plague-Septicmia_NNP ._.
Thus_RB in_IN these_DT cases_NNS the_DT plague-bacilli_NN had_VBD specially_RB infected_VBN both_PDT the_DT lymphatic_JJ glands_NNS and_CC lungs_NNS ,_, whereas_NNS in_IN the_DT varieties_NNS of_IN plague_NN ,_, treated_VBN of_IN above_NN ,_, only_RB one_CD or_CC other_JJ of_IN these_DT tissues_NNS was_VBD the_DT special_JJ focus_NN of_IN disease_NN ._.
II.-MICROSCOPIC_NNP PATHOLOGY_NNP OF_NNP PLAGUE_NNP ._.
A.-THE_NNP BUBONIC_NNP FORM_NNP ._.
The_DT areolar_JJ tissue_NN round_VBD the_DT glands_NNS of_IN the_DT bubo_NN is_VBZ intensely_RB engorged_VBN ,_, free_JJ hmorrhage_NN is_VBZ seen_VBN in_IN the_DT areolar_JJ tissue_NN and_CC fat_NN ,_, and_CC all_PDT the_DT vessels_NNS visible_JJ are_VBP full_JJ of_IN blood_NN ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ walls_NNS deeply_RB engorged_VBD ._.
The_DT glands_NNS are_VBP uniformly_JJ full_JJ of_IN extravasated_JJ blood_NN through-_NN out_IN ,_, with_IN more_JJR intense_JJ hmorrhages_NNS here_RB and_CC there_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT gland_NN tissue_NN is_VBZ so_RB overlaid_JJ with_IN blood_NN as_IN to_TO be_VB scarcely_RB visible_JJ ;_: in_IN some_DT ,_, probably_RB earlier_RBR ,_, glands_VBZ the_DT blood-cells_NNS are_VBP distinct_JJ ;_: in_IN others_NNS ,_, probably_RB older_JJR ,_, they_PRP are_VBP not_RB so_RB distinct_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT gland_NN is_VBZ stained_VBN with_IN blood-colouring_JJ matter_NN ,_, softer_JJR ,_, showing_VBG granular_JJ dbris_NN ,_, and_CC beginning_VBG to_TO break_VB down_RP MEDICAL_NNP ASPECTS_NNP OF_NNP PLAGUE_NNP ._. ]_NN
91_CD in_IN parts_NNS ._.
Still_RB there_EX is_VBZ no_DT distinct_JJ appearance_NN of_IN pus_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB a_DT necrotic_JJ soften-_JJ ing_NN ._.
In_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT smaller_JJR glands_VBZ the_DT exact_JJ early_JJ appearance_NN is_VBZ seen_VBN ;_: the_DT whole_JJ gland_NN is_VBZ infiltrated_VBN with_IN blood_NN ,_, the_DT blood_NN corpuscles_NNS being_VBG distinct_JJ ,_, and_CC at_IN parts_NNS there_EX is_VBZ a_DT large_JJ deeply-stained_JJ hmorrhage_NN occupying_VBG half_NN or_CC more_JJR of_IN the_DT gland_NN ._.
So_RB intense_JJ is_VBZ the_DT hmorrhage_NN that_IN in_IN most_JJS glands_NNS there_EX is_VBZ no_DT distinction_NN between_IN cortex_NN and_CC medulla_NN ,_, nor_CC can_MD the_DT gland_NN tissue_NN or_CC blood_NN and_CC lymph-vessels_NNS be_VB easily_RB made_VBN out_RP ,_, but_CC the_DT walls_NNS of_IN such_JJ vessels_NNS as_IN are_VBP seen_VBN are_VBP deeply_RB engorged_VBN both_DT in_IN the_DT glands_NNS as_RB well_RB as_IN at_IN the_DT hilus_NN ._.
Such_JJ lymph-vessels_NNS ,_, as_IN can_MD be_VB seen_VBN ,_, particularly_RB at_IN the_DT hilus_NN ,_, are_VBP full_JJ of_IN lymph_NN corpuscles_NNS ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ some_DT engorgement_NN of_IN their_PRP$ walls_NNS ,_, and_CC sections_NNS of_IN the_DT lymph-vessels_NNS ,_, seen_VBN outside_IN the_DT gland_NN ,_, shew_VBP the_DT same_JJ appearance_NN ._.
Specimens_NNS were_VBD cut_VBN to_TO shew_VB the_DT glands_NNS of_IN the_DT bubo_NN lying_VBG against_IN and_CC around_IN the_DT axillary_JJ artery_NN and_CC vein_NN ;_: here_RB there_EX is_VBZ intense_JJ engorgement_NN of_IN the_DT walls_NNS of_IN these_DT vessels_NNS with_IN hmorrhage_NN into_IN them_PRP ,_, but_CC much_RB more_JJR of_IN the_DT vein_NN than_IN of_IN the_DT artery_NN ;_: in_IN the_DT vein_NN the_DT extravasated_VBN blood_NN comes_VBZ in_IN most_JJS parts_NNS right_RB through_IN its_PRP$ wall_NN into_IN the_DT inner_JJ coat_NN and_CC as_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT lumen_NNS ;_: so_RB that_IN at_IN these_DT parts_NNS the_DT inner_NN coat_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB properly_RB seen_VBN at_IN all_DT ._.
Hence_NNP one_CD sees_VBZ the_DT plague-gland_NN lying_VBG right_RB against_IN the_DT vein_NN ,_, with_IN extravasated_VBN blood_NN in_IN the_DT gland_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT little_JJ connective_JJ tissue_NN outside_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC then_RB in_IN the_DT vein-wall_NN as_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT lumen_NNS ;_: and_CC thus_RB there_EX is_VBZ a_DT direct_JJ path_NN for_IN the_DT passage_NN of_IN the_DT plague-bacillus_NN from_IN the_DT gland_NN to_TO the_DT lumen_NNS of_IN the_DT vein_NN and_CC so_RB into_IN the_DT general_JJ circulation_NN ._.
A_DT similar_JJ condition_NN of_IN affairs_NNS was_VBD observed_VBN in_IN those_DT cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT ,_, instead_RB of_IN a_DT bubo_NN ,_, there_EX was_VBD a_DT chain_NN of_IN enlarged_JJ plague-glands_NNS ,_, e._FW g._NNS ,_, along_IN the_DT iliac_JJ artery_NN and_CC vein_NN ._.
The_DT remaining_VBG glands_NNS of_IN the_DT body_NN in_IN a_DT bubonic_JJ case_NN showed_VBD either_CC a_DT normal_JJ appearance_NN or_CC a_DT little_JJ engorgement_NN of_IN vessels_NNS ._.
Lung.-A_JJ section_NN of_IN the_DT lung_NN shows_VBZ blood-cells_NNS in_IN all_PDT the_DT vessels_NNS as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN the_DT alveolar_JJ capillaries_NNS ;_: the_DT vessels_NNS under_IN the_DT pleura_NN always_RB contain_RB blood_NN ,_, and_CC large_JJ hmorrhages_NNS are_VBP sometimes_RB present_JJ here_RB ;_: scattered_VBN about_IN ,_, areas_NNS are_VBP seen_VBN where_WRB blood-cells_NNS are_VBP present_JJ in_IN the_DT alveoli_NN themselves_PRP ,_, and_CC similarly_RB blood-cells_NNS may_MD be_VB seen_VBN in_IN the_DT smaller_JJR bronchial_JJ tubes_NNS ._.
The_DT vessels_NNS of_IN the_DT walls_NNS of_IN the_DT bronchi_NN ,_, like_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT lung_NN ,_, are_VBP distended_VBN with_IN blood_NN ;_: the_DT bronchial_JJ mucous_JJ membrane_NN shows_VBZ no_DT special_JJ change_NN ._.
Specimens_NNS of_IN lung_NN stain_NN well_RB ._.
Liver.-All_JJ vessels_NNS are_VBP engorged_VBN and_CC the_DT specimen_NN has_VBZ the_DT appearance_NN of_IN early_JJ nutmeg_JJ degeneration_NN ._.
The_DT central_JJ veins_NNS are_VBP wide_JJ ,_, as_IN are_VBP the_DT capillaries_NNS round_VBP them_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT portal_JJ veins_NNS are_VBP also_RB distended_VBN with_IN blood-cells_NNS ;_: around_IN the_DT distended_JJ central_JJ and_CC portal_JJ veins_NNS there_EX is_VBZ fine_JJ granular_JJ pigmentation_NN of_IN the_DT liver_NN cells_NNS ._.
Engorged_VBN vessels_NNS are_VBP usually_RB seen_VBN well_RB just_RB beneath_VB the_DT capsule_NN of_IN the_DT liver_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX may_MD be_VB hmorrhages_NNS here_RB ._.
The_DT nuclei_NN of_IN the_DT liver-cells_NNS stain_VBP badly_RB and_CC the_DT cells_NNS have_VBP a_DT cloudy_NN indistinct_JJ appearance_NN as_IN of_IN parenchymatous_JJ degeneration_NN ._.
Spleen.-The_JJ vessels_NNS generally_RB ,_, both_DT large_JJ and_CC capillary_JJ ,_, are_VBP distended_VBN with_IN blood-cells_NNS ,_, and_CC this_DT is_VBZ more_JJR marked_JJ in_IN certain_JJ distinct_JJ areas_NNS ;_: here_RB a_DT dilated_JJ vessel_NN is_VBZ seen_VBN full_JJ of_IN blood_NN ,_, and_CC round_VB it_PRP an_DT area_NN of_IN engorged_JJ capillaries_NNS ,_, with_IN hrnorrhage_NN into_IN the_DT spleen_JJ tissue_NN ,_, blood-cells_NNS being_VBG seen_VBN amongst_IN the_DT spleen-cells_NNS ._.
Engorged_VBN vessels_NNS are_VBP also_RB seen_VBN in_IN some_DT glomeruli_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT vessel_NN distended_VBN with_IN blood_NN leading_VBG to_TO the_DT glomeruli_NN ;_: further_RB distended_VBD vessels_NNS with_IN hmorrhages_NNS around_IN them_PRP are_VBP usually_RB well_RB marked_VBN under_IN the_DT capsule_NN of_IN the_DT spleen_NN ._.
Section_NN of_IN spleen_NN stain_NN well_RB and_CC the_DT cells_NNS are_VBP distinct_JJ ._.
Kidney.-The_NNP vessels_NNS ,_, both_DT large_JJ and_CC capillary_JJ ,_, are_VBP distended_VBN with_IN blood-cells_NNS at_IN places_NNS ,_, vessels_NNS have_VBP ruptured_VBN and_CC hmorrhage_NN is_VBZ seen_VBN into_IN the_DT kidney_NN substance_NN ._.
This_DT condition_NN is_VBZ marked_VBN immediately_RB beneath_IN the_DT capsule_NN ._.
Blood-cells_NNS are_VBP seen_VBN in_IN many_JJ of_IN the_DT tubules_NNS ,_, 92_CD [_NN CHAP_NNP ._.
II_NNP ._.
but_CC more_RBR so_RB in_IN the_DT straight_NN than_IN in_IN the_DT convoluted_JJ tubes_NN ,_, and_CC some_DT of_IN the_DT glomeruli_NNS are_VBP likewise_RB engorged_VBN ._.
The_DT epithelium_NN of_IN the_DT tubules_NNS is_VBZ swollen_JJ and_CC in_IN a_DT condition_NN of_IN parenchy-_JJ matous_JJ degeneration_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT nuclei_NN of_IN the_DT cells_NNS stain_VBP badly_RB ;_: but_CC this_DT condition_NN is_VBZ more_RBR plainly_RB seen_VBN in_IN the_DT convoluted_VBN than_IN in_IN the_DT straight_JJ tubes_NNS ._.
Some_DT specimens_NNS show_VBP engorged_JJ vessels_NNS with_IN hmorrhage_NN at_IN the_DT pelvis_NN of_IN the_DT kidney_NN ._.
Ureter.-The_JJ vessels_NNS of_IN the_DT walls_NNS of_IN the_DT ureter_NN are_VBP distended_VBN with_IN blood_NN ,_, and_CC hmorrhage_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN into_IN the_DT walls_NNS ,_, blood-cells_NNS being_VBG seen_VBN in_IN the_DT mucous_JJ membrane_NN even_RB as_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT lumen_NNS ;_: the_DT condition_NN is_VBZ similar_JJ to_TO that_DT found_VBN in_IN the_DT walls_NNS of_IN veins_NNS ._.
Stomach_NNP and_CC Intestines.-The_NNP vessels_NNS are_VBP distended_VBN with_IN blood_NN ,_, this_DT condition_NN being_VBG best_JJS seen_VBN in_IN the_DT sub-mucosa_NN ;_: at_IN places_NNS small_JJ hmorrhages_NNS have_VBP occurred_VBN ._.
The_DT epithelium_NN does_VBZ not_RB stain_VB well_RB ._.
Nothing_VBG abnormal_NN was_VBD seen_VBN in_IN Peyer_NNP 's_POS patches_NNS ._.
Brain_NNP and_CC Spinal_NNP Cord.-The_NNP large_JJ vessels_NNS and_CC capillaries_NNS of_IN the_DT pia_NN mater_NN are_VBP distended_VBN with_IN blood_NN ,_, but_CC no_DT special_JJ changes_NNS have_VBP been_VBN seen_VBN in_IN the_DT substance_NN of_IN the_DT brain_NN or_CC spinal_JJ cord_NN ._.
Muscle.-In_JJ specimens_NNS of_IN voluntary_JJ muscle_NN some_DT fibres_NNS are_VBP seen_VBN well_RB stained_VBN and_CC distinctly_RB striated_VBN ,_, but_CC mixed_JJ with_IN them_PRP are_VBP others_NNS which_WDT are_VBP badly_RB stained_VBN ,_, with_IN striation_NN faint_NN or_CC absent_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT muscle-substance_NN is_VBZ swollen_VBN ,_, broken_VB up_RP into_IN irregular_JJ lumps_NNS and_CC of_IN a_DT shiny_JJ homogeneous_JJ appearance_NN ._.
Specimens_NNS of_IN the_DT heart-muscle_NN showed_VBD this_DT condition_NN also_RB ._.
Note.-This_JJ degeneration_NN of_IN heart-muscle_NN is_VBZ associated_VBN with_IN the_DT dilatation_NN of_IN the_DT heart_NN and_CC nutmeg_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT liver_NN found_VBD post-mortem_NN ;_: and_CC also_RB with_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN plague-_JJ patients_NNS are_VBP liable_JJ to_TO die_VB suddenly_RB of_IN heart-failure_NN ._.
Blood-vessels.-In_NNP the_DT outer_NN coat_NN of_IN large_JJ arteries_NNS the_DT blood-vessels_NNS are_VBP found_VBN full_JJ of_IN blood_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT capillaries_NNS of_IN the_DT middle_JJ coat_NN may_MD also_RB be_VB seen_VBN distended_VBN ;_: but_CC the_DT inner_JJ coat_NN is_VBZ always_RB perfect_JJ ,_, distinct_JJ and_CC intact_JJ ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ elastic_JJ tissue_NN plainly_RB visible_JJ ._.
The_DT walls_NNS of_IN large_JJ veins_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, show_VBP much_RB more_RBR engorgement_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN these_DT ,_, large_JJ collections_NNS of_IN blood_NN may_MD be_VB seen_VBN immediately_RB beneath_IN the_DT inner_JJ coat_NN ,_, extending_VBG as_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT lumen_NNS ,_, and_CC at_IN parts_NNS the_DT inner_NN coat_NN is_VBZ either_DT extremely_RB thin_JJ or_CC can_MD not_RB be_VB traced_VBN over_IN the_DT hmorrhage_NN ._.
This_DT condition_NN is_VBZ best_RBS seen_VBN in_IN vessels_NNS incorporated_VBN in_IN a_DT bubo_NN ,_, but_CC is_VBZ also_RB to_TO be_VB found_VBN in_IN the_DT vena_NN cava_NN ,_, iliac_JJ veins_NNS ,_, &_CC c._VBP The_DT following_JJ organs_NNS were_VBD also_RB examined_VBN ,_, but_CC nothing_NN was_VBD observed_VBN under_IN the_DT micro-_JJ scope_NN ,_, except_IN some_DT engorgement_NN :_: The_DT tonsils_NNS ,_, salivary_JJ glands_NNS ,_, thyroid_NN body_NN ,_, breast_NN ,_, male_NN and_CC female_JJ generative_JJ organs_NNS ,_, cartilage_NN ,_, nerve_NN and_CC thoracic_JJ duct_NN ._.
Sections_NNS of_IN the_DT skin_NN were_VBD also_RB made_VBN ,_, and_CC showed_VBD engorged_VBN capillaries_NNS with_IN small_JJ hmorrhages_NNS ,_, where_WRB petechi_NN were_VBD visible_JJ on_IN the_DT surface_NN ._.
B.-THE_JJ SEPTICMIC_NNP FORM_NNP ._.
Lymphatic_JJ Glands.-The_NNP areolar_JJ tissue_NN around_IN the_DT plague-glands_NNS (_( i._NN e._NN ,_, the_DT characteristic_JJ glands_NNS already_RB described_VBN )_) shows_VBZ none_NN of_IN the_DT intense_JJ engorgement_NN seen_VBN in_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ form_NN ._.
The_DT plague-glands_JJ themselves_PRP are_VBP well_RB stained_VBN and_CC all_DT their_PRP$ anatomical_JJ features_NNS are_VBP distinct_JJ ._.
All_PDT the_DT blood-vessels_NNS in_IN the_DT gland_NN are_VBP distended_VBN with_IN blood-corpuscles_NNS ,_, and_CC at_IN parts_NNS hmor-_JJ rhage_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN into_IN the_DT gland-substance_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ most_RBS frequently_RB seen_VBN beneath_IN the_DT cap-_JJ sule_NN ,_, but_CC may_MD also_RB be_VB at_IN other_JJ parts_NNS ._.
The_DT lymphatic_JJ vessels_NNS and_CC lymph_NN channels_NNS in_IN the_DT gland_NN are_VBP wide_JJ and_CC distended_JJ with_IN lymph-corpuscles_NNS ._.
The_DT distension_NN of_IN the_DT blood_NN and_CC lymph_NN vessels_NNS is_VBZ always_RB most_RBS marked_VBN at_IN the_DT hilus_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX may_MD be_VB hmorrhages_NNS into_IN the_DT areolar_JJ tissue_NN here_RB ._.
In_IN some_DT glands_NNS small_JJ areas_NNS may_MD be_VB seen_VBN ,_, where_WRB softening_VBG and_CC breaking_VBG down_RP is_VBZ MEDICAL_JJ ASPECTS_NNP OF_NNP PLAGUE_NNP ._. ]_NN
93_CD taking_VBG place_NN ,_, granular_JJ dbris_NN and_CC broken-down_JJ cells_NNS being_VBG seen_VBN here_RB ._.
The_DT glands_NNS show_VBP these_DT changes_NNS in_IN varying_VBG degree_NN ;_: in_IN some_DT there_EX is_VBZ merely_RB slight_JJ engorgement_NN with_IN some_DT disten-_JJ sion_NN of_IN lymph-vessels_NNS ,_, in_IN others_NNS there_EX is_VBZ wide_JJ distension_NN of_IN both_DT kinds_NNS of_IN vessels_NNS ,_, with_IN some_DT amount_NN of_IN hmorrhage_NN into_IN the_DT gland_NN tissue_NN ;_: whilst_NNS in_IN others_NNS again_RB there_EX are_VBP many_JJ hmor-_JJ rhagic_NNS areas_NNS which_WDT may_MD occupy_VB half_NN or_CC more_JJR of_IN the_DT gland_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ in_IN these_DT glands_NNS that_IN break-_NN ing_VBG down_RP is_VBZ usually_RB seen_VBN ._.
In_IN a_DT septicmic_JJ case_NN ,_, the_DT glands_NNS which_WDT have_VBP not_RB the_DT characteristic_JJ plague_NN appearance_NN ,_, shew_NN under_IN the_DT microscope_NN either_CC slight_JJ engorgement_NN or_CC normal_JJ features_NNS ._.
With_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT remaining_VBG organs_NNS ,_, the_DT appearances_NNS described_VBN under_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ form_NN apply_NN also_RB to_TO the_DT septicmic_JJ form_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
C.-THE_NNP PNEUMONIC_NNP FORM_NNP ._.
A_DT section_NN of_IN lung-tissue_NN ,_, apart_RB from_IN a_DT pneumonic_JJ area_NN ,_, shows_VBZ great_JJ engorgement_NN of_IN all_DT large_JJ blood-vessels_NNS ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT alveolar_JJ capillaries_NNS as_IN well_RB ,_, and_CC patches_NNS of_IN heumonic_NN into_IN the_DT alveoli_NN around_IN these_DT engorged_VBN vessels_NNS are_VBP seen_VBN scattered_JJ about_IN ._.
In_IN a_DT pneumonic_JJ area_NN three_CD zones_NNS can_MD be_VB made_VBN out_RP ._.
At_IN the_DT circumference_NN there_EX is_VBZ intense_JJ engorgement_NN of_IN all_DT vessels_NNS ,_, including_VBG alveolar_JJ capillaries_NNS ,_, the_DT alveoli_NN are_VBP full_JJ of_IN blood_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT hmorrhage_NN is_VBZ so_RB intense_JJ that_IN many_JJ of_IN the_DT alveolar_JJ septa_NN are_VBP broken_VBN down_RP ,_, entirely_RB absent_JJ ,_, or_CC represented_VBN by_IN mere_JJ shreds_NNS ._.
Within_IN the_DT circumference_NN is_VBZ seen_VBN a_DT zone_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT alveoli_NN are_VBP intact_JJ and_CC are_VBP completely_RB filled_VBN with_IN well-stained_JJ cells_NNS ,_, so_IN that_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT interval_NN between_IN the_DT alveolar_JJ walls_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ contents_NNS ;_: and_CC at_IN the_DT centre_NN is_VBZ one_CD universal_JJ mass_NN of_IN similar_JJ cells_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT cellular_JJ infiltration_NN is_VBZ so_RB extreme_JJ that_IN the_DT walls_NNS of_IN the_DT alveoli_NNS are_VBP scarcely_RB visible_JJ ._.
Such_JJ is_VBZ the_DT general_JJ arrangement_NN of_IN the_DT pneumonic_JJ patch_NN ,_, although_IN there_EX may_MD be_VB alveolar_JJ hmorrhage_NN in_IN parts_NNS of_IN either_CC the_DT middle_NN or_CC central_JJ zone_NN ._.
Under_IN a_DT higher_JJR power_NN the_DT alveoli_NN of_IN the_DT circumference_NN are_VBP seen_VBN to_TO be_VB completely_RB filled_VBN with_IN blood_NN corpuscles_NNS ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ scarcely_RB any_DT appearance_NN of_IN fibrin_NN ,_, or_CC none_NN at_IN alll_NN in_IN the_DT middle_JJ zone_NN the_DT alveolar_JJ contents_NNS consist_VBP for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN of_IN catarrhal_JJ epithelium_NN with_IN some_DT white_JJ and_CC a_DT few_JJ red_JJ blood-corpuscles_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT little_JJ fibrin_NN or_CC none_NN at_IN all_DT ,_, whilst_VBP the_DT dense_JJ central_JJ mass_NN of_IN cells_NNS consist_NN of_IN catarrhal_JJ epithelium_NN and_CC leucocytes_VBZ with_IN some_DT granular_JJ dbris_NN ._.
Thus_RB the_DT pneumonic_JJ area_NN has_VBZ the_DT appearance_NN of_IN very_RB extreme_JJ lobular_NN or_CC catarrhal_NN pneumonia_NN ._.
The_DT walls_NNS of_IN the_DT bronchial_JJ tubes_NN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN of_IN the_DT large_JJ veins_NNS ,_, show_VBP great_JJ engorgement_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX are_VBP hmorrhages_NNS into_IN the_DT vein-walls_NNS ._.
Blood_NN and_CC catarrhal_JJ cells_NNS may_MD be_VB seen_VBN in_IN the_DT finer_NN bronchi_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT bronchial_JJ mucous_JJ membrane_NN is_VBZ scarcely_RB altered_VBN ,_, there_EX being_VBG at_IN most_JJS a_DT little_JJ cellular_JJ proliferation_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP the_DT appearances_NNS of_IN acute_JJ pleurisy_NN over_IN those_DT pneu-_JJ monic_JJ areas_NNS which_WDT project_VBP upon_IN the_DT surface_NN of_IN the_DT lung_NN ,_, with_IN hmorrhages_NNS beneath_VBP the_DT pleura_NN ._.
The_DT bronchial_JJ glands_NNS show_VBP engorgement_NN of_IN blood-vessels_NNS ,_, some_DT hmorrhage_NN into_IN the_DT gland-tissue_NN and_CC distended_VBD lymphatic_JJ vessels_NNS ;_: but_CC in_IN some_DT cases_NNS these_DT conditions_NNS are_VBP only_RB slightly_RB marked_VBN and_CC the_DT glands_NNS looked_VBD nearly_RB normal_JJ ._.
The_DT remaining_VBG lymphatic_JJ glands_NNS in_IN the_DT body_NN looked_VBD either_CC normal_JJ ,_, or_CC presented_VBD the_DT characters_NNS described_VBD above_IN to_TO a_DT slight_JJ extent_NN ._.
With_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT other_JJ organs_NNS ,_, the_DT description_NN given_VBN under_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ form_NN of_IN plague_NN applies_NNS here_RB also_RB ,_, except_IN that_DT generally_RB engorgement_JJ and_CC hmorrhage_NN are_VBP less_RBR marked_JJ ._.
D.-THE_JJ PLAGUE-BACILLUS_NNP IN_NNP SITU_NNP ._.
Sections_NNS of_IN the_DT various_JJ organs_NNS and_CC lymphatic_JJ glands_NNS were_VBD prepared_VBN to_TO show_VB the_DT plague-_JJ bacillus_NN in_IN situ_NN ;_: they_PRP showed_VBD best_JJS when_WRB stained_VBN with_IN Lffler_NNP 's_POS methylene_NN blue_NN or_CC carbol-_JJ fuchsin_NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP could_MD not_RB be_VB demonstrated_VBN with_IN Gram_NNP 's_POS method_NN ._.
24_CD 94_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
II_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT glands_NNS of_IN the_DT bubo_NN the_DT bacilli_NN could_MD be_VB seen_VBN in_IN enormous_JJ numbers_NNS ,_, both_DT amongst_VBP the_DT cells_NNS of_IN the_DT gland-tissue_NN and_CC also_RB in_IN the_DT lymphatic_JJ vessels_NNS ;_: they_PRP were_VBD also_RB seen_VBN amongst_IN the_DT blood-_JJ corpuscles_NNS extravasated_VBN into_IN the_DT gland_NN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN the_DT hmorrhage_NN outside_IN the_DT gland_NN ._.
In_IN case_NN of_IN plague-septicmia_NN they_PRP were_VBD similarly_RB present_JJ in_IN the_DT enlarged_JJ characteristic_JJ glands_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT kidney_NN the_DT bacilli_NN could_MD also_RB be_VB seen_VBN ,_, especially_RB among_IN the_DT blood-cells_NNS of_IN the_DT tubules_NNS into_IN which_WDT hmorrhage_NN had_VBD occurred_VBN :_: in_IN the_DT spleen_NN they_PRP were_VBD also_RB present_JJ ,_, some-_JJ times_NNS in_IN large_JJ numbers_NNS amongst_VBP the_DT cells_NNS of_IN the_DT spleen-tissue_NN and_CC in_IN the_DT hmorrhagic_JJ areas_NNS ;_: similarly_RB they_PRP were_VBD found_VBN in_IN the_DT liver_NN ,_, especially_RB in_IN those_DT cases_NNS where_WRB engorgement_NN and_CC extravasation_NN were_VBD marked_VBN ._.
In_IN case_NN of_IN plague-pneumonia_NN ,_, the_DT bacilli_NN were_VBD seen_VBN in_IN abundance_NN in_IN the_DT pneumonic_JJ areas_NNS ;_: they_PRP could_MD be_VB found_VBN in_IN profusion_NN amongst_IN the_DT catarrhal_JJ epithelial_JJ cells_NNS and_CC leucocytes_NNS which_WDT filled_VBD the_DT alveoli_NN and_CC terminal_JJ bronchioles_NNS ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN among_IN the_DT blood-corpuscles_NNS of_IN the_DT alveoli_NN into_IN which_WDT hmorrhage_NN had_VBD occurred_VBN ._.
Similarly_RB in_IN the_DT lungs_NNS of_IN non-pneumonic_JJ cases_NNS they_PRP could_MD be_VB seen_VBN ,_, but_CC in_IN far_RB less_JJR numbers_NNS ,_, and_CC mostly_RB where_WRB small_JJ hmorrhage_NN had_VBD occurred_VBN into_IN the_DT alveoli_NN ._.
Note.-These_JJ specimens_NNS were_VBD only_RB prepared_JJ from_IN cases_NNS where_WRB the_DT post-mortem_NN was_VBD made_VBN immediately_RB after_IN death_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN which_WDT the_DT presence_NN of_IN the_DT plague-bacillus_JJ had_VBD been_VBN proved_VBN to_TO be_VB present_JJ by_IN the_DT method_NN of_IN cultures_NNS ,_, so_RB as_IN to_TO avoid_VB the_DT fallacy_NN of_IN diagnosing_VBG plague-_JJ bacilli_NN from_IN their_PRP$ microscopic_NN appearance_NN alone_RB ._.
III.-CASES_JJ TO_NNP ILLUSTRATE_NNP THE_NNP VARIOUS_NNP FORMS_NNP OF_NNP PLAGUE_NNP ._.
A.-THE_NNP BUBONIC_NNP FORM_NNP ._.
Bubo_NNP in_IN the_DT Left_NNP Axilla.-R._NNP N._NNP ,_, male_NN ,_, Hindu_NNP ,_, aged_VBD 40_CD years_NNS ,_, admitted_VBD 1st_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ,_, says_VBZ he_PRP got_VBD suddenly_RB ill_RB four_CD days_NNS ago_RB with_IN fever_NN and_CC severe_JJ rigors_NNS ;_: temperature_NN on_IN admission_NN 104.8_CD F._NNP ,_, pulse_RB 110_CD ,_, has_VBZ pain_VBN in_IN left_JJ axilla_NN ._.
March_NNP 2nd.-Temperature_JJ 103.2_CD ,_, pulse_RB 110_CD ,_, still_RB pain_VB in_IN left_JJ axilla_NN ,_, and_CC swollen_JJ glands_NNS are_VBP felt_VBN ._.
During_IN the_DT day_NN a_DT large_JJ doughy_NN ,_, diffuse_NN swelling_VBG arose_NN in_IN the_DT axilla_NN ,_, and_CC there_RB was_VBD much_RB more_JJR pain_NN ._.
March_NNP 3rd.-_JJ Temperature_NNP 100_CD ,_, the_DT swelling_VBG filled_VBN out_RP the_DT whole_JJ axilla_NN and_CC was_VBD very_RB painful_JJ ._.
Patient_NN died_VBD at_IN 9-30_CD A.M._NNP Post-mortem_NNP examination_NN one_CD hour_NN after_IN death.-dema_NN and_CC petechi_NN of_IN left_JJ arm_NN ;_: old_JJ abrasions_NNS on_IN hands_NNS and_CC feet_NNS ;_: large_JJ swelling_VBG in_IN left_JJ axilla_NN ,_, with_IN small_JJ petechi_NNS on_IN the_DT skin_NN over_IN it_PRP ._.
The_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT left_JJ axilla_NN was_VBD occupied_VBN by_IN a_DT mass_NN of_IN coagulated_VBN blood_NN and_CC serum_NN ,_, and_CC within_IN the_DT mass_NN the_DT axillary_JJ glands_NNS were_VBD found_VBN ;_: they_PRP varied_VBD in_IN size_NN from_IN almonds_NNS to_TO peas_NNS ,_, and_CC were_VBD all_DT intensely_RB engorged_VBN ,_, deep_JJ or_CC lighter_JJ red_JJ and_CC a_DT little_JJ soft_JJ ;_: the_DT axillary_JJ vessels_NNS were_VBD included_VBN in_IN the_DT bubo_NN thus_RB formed_VBN of_IN coagula_NN and_CC swollen_JJ glands_NNS ._.
The_DT hmor-_JJ rhage_NN and_CC dema_NN extended_VBN beyond_IN the_DT borders_NNS of_IN the_DT axilla_NN in_IN all_DT directions_NNS ._.
Left_VBN supra-trochlear_JJ gland_NN intensely_RB engorged_VBN and_CC the_DT size_NN of_IN a_DT large_JJ bean_NN ._.
Right_RB supra-trochlear_NN ,_, right_JJ axillary_NN ,_, and_CC cervical_JJ chains_NNS on_IN both_DT sides_NNS were_VBD a_DT little_JJ engorged_JJ ,_, but_CC of_IN normal_JJ shape_NN ;_: the_DT popliteal_NN were_VBD normal_JJ ;_: the_DT inguinal_NN were_VBD some_DT as_RB large_JJ as_IN beans_NNS ,_, and_CC some_DT smaller_JJR or_CC of_IN normal_JJ size_NN ;_: they_PRP were_VBD all_DT slightly_RB engorged_VBN ,_, on_IN the_DT right_JJ side_NN rather_RB more_JJR than_IN on_IN the_DT left_NN ._.
The_DT iliac_NN and_CC lumbar_NN were_VBD a_DT little_JJ engorged_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT mesenteric_NN slightly_RB so_RB ,_, the_DT bronchial_JJ glands_NNS looked_VBD normal_JJ ._.
There_EX was_VBD no_DT hmorrhage_NN or_CC dema_NN round_VBP any_DT of_IN these_DT glands_NNS ._.
Heart.-Some_JJ sero-sanguineous_JJ fluid_NN in_IN pericardial_JJ cavity_NN and_CC small_JJ sub-pericardial_JJ petechi_NN ;_: dark_JJ blood_NN in_IN cavities_NNS of_IN heart_NN ,_, mostly_RB on_IN right_JJ side_NN ._.
Hmorrhages_NNS into_IN walls_NNS of_IN vena_NN cava_NN seen_VBN well_RB under_IN inner_NN coat_NN ._.
MEDICAL_JJ ASPECTS_NNP OF_NNP PLAGUE_NNP ._. ]_NN
95_CD Lungs.-A_JJ little_JJ blood-stained_JJ fluid_NN in_IN pleural_JJ cavities_NNS ,_, many_JJ sub-pleural_JJ hmorrhages_NNS of_IN petechial_JJ and_CC larger_JJR size_NN ._.
Intense_JJ engorgement_NN ,_, with_IN some_DT hmorrhages_NNS into_IN lung-tissue_NN and_CC some_DT dema_NN of_IN lungs_NNS ._.
Liver.-All_JJ vessels_NNS ,_, large_JJ and_CC small_JJ ,_, both_DT hepatic_JJ and_CC portal_JJ ,_, gorged_VBN with_IN blood_NN ;_: liver-_JJ substance_NN rather_RB soft_JJ ;_: large_JJ sub-peritoneal_JJ hmorrhages_NNS on_IN the_DT surface_NN of_IN the_DT liver_NN ,_, specially_RB along_IN the_DT ligaments_NNS ._.
Tonsils.-Swollen_NNP and_CC engorged_VBD ;_: mucous_JJ membrane_NN of_IN stomach_NN and_CC intestines_NNS engorged_VBN ,_, and_CC small_JJ hmorrhages_NNS in_IN stomach_NN and_CC large_JJ in_IN testine_NN ._.
Hmorrhages_NNS under_IN serous_JJ coat_NN of_IN intestines_NNS ._.
Spleen.-Large_NN ,_, brick-red_JJ and_CC somewhat_RB soft_JJ ,_, and_CC many_JJ small_JJ hmorrhages_NNS under_IN its_PRP$ serous_JJ coat_NN ._.
Kidneys.-Large_NNP ,_, and_CC all_DT vessels_NNS engorged_VBN ,_, the_DT kidney-substance_NN itself_PRP rather_RB pale_NN and_CC soft_JJ ._.
Many_JJ small_JJ hmorrhages_NNS under_IN the_DT kidney-capsule_NN ,_, and_CC coagula_NN distending_VBG the_DT pelvis_NN of_IN each_DT kidney_NN ._.
Hmorrhages_NNS into_IN walls_NNS of_IN ureters_NNS ,_, and_CC bladder_NN distended_VBN with_IN urine_NN ._.
Distribution_NN of_IN the_DT Plague-Bacillus.-In_NNP this_DT case_NN the_DT plague-bacillus_NN was_VBD found_VBN in_IN the_DT various_JJ organs_NNS as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -It_NN was_VBD present_JJ in_IN enormous_JJ numbers_NNS in_IN the_DT glands_NNS of_IN the_DT bubo_NN and_CC in_IN immense_NN but_CC diminished_JJ numbers_NNS in_IN the_DT blood_NN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT dema_NN fluid_NN from_IN the_DT left_JJ axilla_NN ._.
The_DT right_JJ axillary_JJ glands_NNS ,_, the_DT supra-trochlear_JJ and_CC cervical_JJ of_IN both_DT sides_NNS showed_VBD a_DT considerable_JJ number_NN of_IN plague-bacilli_JJ ,_, but_CC far_RB less_JJR than_IN the_DT bubo_NN ._.
The_DT lumbar_NN also_RB showed_VBD them_PRP in_IN considerable_JJ numbers_NNS ,_, but_CC they_PRP were_VBD rather_RB less_RBR in_IN the_DT iliac_NN and_CC inguinal_JJ chains_NNS of_IN both_DT sides_NNS ._.
A_DT few_JJ were_VBD seen_VBN in_IN the_DT mesenteric_JJ glands_NNS ._.
A_DT specimen_NNS of_IN blood_NN taken_VBN from_IN the_DT left_JJ ventricle_NN of_IN the_DT heart_NN and_CC from_IN various_JJ large_JJ veins_NNS in_IN the_DT body_NN showed_VBD many_JJ plague-bacilli_JJ ,_, but_CC far_RB less_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT blood_NN taken_VBN from_IN the_DT bubo_NN ._.
Immense_JJ numbers_NNS were_VBD found_VBN in_IN the_DT spleen_NN and_CC liver_NN ,_, almost_RB as_RB many_JJ as_IN in_IN the_DT glands_NNS of_IN the_DT bubo_NN ;_: and_CC some_DT ,_, but_CC far_RB less_JJR ,_, in_IN the_DT lung_NN and_CC kidney_NN ._.
In_IN point_NN of_IN fact_NN it_PRP appeared_VBD from_IN these_DT specimens_NNS that_IN the_DT bacillus_NN had_VBD grown_VBN most_JJS abundantly_RB in_IN the_DT glands_NNS and_CC blood_NN of_IN the_DT bubo_NN ,_, and_CC next_JJ in_IN the_DT spleen_NN and_CC liver_NN ;_: whereas_NNS in_IN the_DT remaining_VBG lymphatic_JJ glands_NNS and_CC other_JJ organs_NNS it_PRP was_VBD present_JJ in_IN about_IN the_DT same_JJ num-_JJ bers_NNS as_IN in_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN the_DT general_JJ circulation_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT bacilli_NN seen_VBN in_IN these_DT specimens_NNS were_VBD probably_RB those_DT contained_VBN in_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN the_DT respective_JJ organs_NNS ._.
Possibly_RB it_PRP might_MD have_VB grown_VBN to_TO some_DT extent_NN in_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT lymphatic_JJ glands_NNS ,_, as_IN indicated_VBN by_IN the_DT above_JJ specimens_NNS ._.
Note.-In_NNP a_DT case_NN of_IN this_DT nature_NN ,_, where_WRB there_EX is_VBZ extravasated_JJ blood_NN around_IN the_DT glands_NNS of_IN the_DT bubo_NN ,_, which_WDT extends_VBZ through_IN all_PDT the_DT coats_NNS of_IN the_DT large_JJ vein_NN (_( the_DT axillary_NN in_IN this_DT instance_NN )_) ,_, and_CC where_WRB there_EX are_VBP enormous_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN plague-bacilli_NN in_IN this_DT extravasated_JJ blood_NN ,_, there_EX appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB a_DT direct_JJ path_NN for_IN the_DT passage_NN of_IN the_DT plague-bacilli_NN into_IN the_DT lumen_NNS of_IN the_DT vein_NN and_CC so_RB into_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN the_DT general_JJ circulation_NN ._.
B.-CASE_NNP OF_NNP A_NNP BUBO_NNP EXTENDING_NNP ALONG_NNP THE_NNP ILIAC_NNP VESSELS_NNP ._.
M._NNP R._NNP ,_, Hindu_NNP ,_, male_NN ,_, aged_VBN 27_CD years_NNS ,_, admitted_VBD January_NNP 26th_CD ,_, 1897_CD ,_, says_VBZ he_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN ill_JJ two_CD days_NNS ._.
The_DT left_JJ inguinal_JJ glands_NNS are_VBP large_JJ ,_, painful_JJ and_CC tender_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT left_NN leg_NN is_VBZ swollen_VBN ,_, is_VBZ much_RB exhausted_VBN ,_, and_CC died_VBD one_CD hour_NN after_IN admission_NN ._.
Post-mortem_JJ examination_NN made_VBD three_CD hours_NNS after_IN death_NN ._.
Body_NNP well-nourished_JJ ,_, rigor-_JJ mortis_NN present_NN ._.

96_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
II_NNP ._.
The_DT Left_NNP Iliac_NNP Glands_NNP were_VBD all_DT dark_JJ red_JJ ,_, soft_JJ ,_, friable_JJ and_CC intensely_RB engorged_VBN and_CC looked_VBN like_IN soft_JJ spleen-tissue_NN ;_: there_EX was_VBD great_JJ engorgement_NN ,_, extravasation_NN ,_, and_CC dema_NN around_IN them_PRP and_CC they_PRP surrounded_VBD the_DT iliac_JJ artery_NN and_CC vein_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT whole_JJ mass_NN of_IN coagula_NN ,_, glands_NNS and_CC vessels_NNS had_VBD to_TO be_VB removed_VBN together_RB ._.
There_EX was_VBD no_DT rounded_JJ bubo_NN as_IN in_IN the_DT former_JJ case_NN ,_, but_CC a_DT chain_NN of_IN swollen_JJ glands_NNS with_IN hmorrhage_NN around_IN them_PRP extending_VBG along_IN the_DT vessels_NNS ._.
Lumbar_NNP Glands.-The_NNP lower_JJR ones_NNS were_VBD rather_RB large_JJ ,_, soft_JJ and_CC engorged_JJ ,_, but_CC much_RB less_JJR than_IN the_DT iliac_NN ,_, and_CC there_RB was_VBD but_CC little_JJ extravasated_JJ blood_NN around_IN them_PRP ._.
The_DT upper_JJ ones_NNS showed_VBD even_RB fewer_JJR changes_NNS ,_, and_CC some_DT looked_VBD normal_JJ ._.
The_DT Right_NNP Femoral_NNP and_CC Right_NNP Iliac_NNP Glands_NNP were_VBD normal_JJ ._.
The_DT remaining_VBG glands_NNS looked_VBD normal_JJ ,_, except_IN that_IN the_DT right_JJ axillary_NN were_VBD engorged_VBN ,_, two_CD of_IN them_PRP being_VBG as_RB large_JJ as_IN almonds_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT right_JJ supra-trochlear_NN was_VBD likewise_RB engorged_VBN to_TO the_DT size_NN of_IN a_DT large_JJ pea_NN ._.
With_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT remaining_VBG organs_NNS ,_, the_DT heart_NN showed_VBD some_DT dilatation_NN of_IN the_DT right_JJ side_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT lungs_NNS a_DT great_JJ deal_NN of_IN engorgement_NN and_CC dema_NN ;_: there_EX were_VBD petechi_NNS under_IN the_DT pleura_NN and_CC pericardium_NN ._.
The_DT liver_NN and_CC spleen_NN were_VBD both_DT large_JJ ,_, dark_JJ and_CC full_JJ of_IN blood_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT kidneys_NNS large_JJ ,_, soft_JJ and_CC engorged_VBD ._.
There_EX were_VBD some_DT petechi_NNS in_IN the_DT stomach_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT brain_NN and_CC its_PRP$ membranes_NNS were_VBD engorged_VBN ._.
Distribution_NN of_IN the_DT Plague-Bacillus.-The_NNP enlarged_VBD left_VBD inguinal_JJ glands_NNS contained_VBN plague-bacilli_NN in_IN considerable_JJ numbers_NNS which_WDT were_VBD found_VBN to_TO stain_VB well_RB ;_: specimens_NNS of_IN the_DT left_JJ iliac_NN glands_NNS showed_VBD them_PRP in_IN immense_NN numbers_NNS ,_, as_IN did_VBD those_DT from_IN the_DT lower_JJR lumbar_NN glands_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT higher_JJR lumbar_NN showed_VBD less_JJR ._.
The_DT right_JJ inguinal_NN and_CC iliac_NN ,_, the_DT axillary_JJ and_CC cervical_JJ of_IN both_DT sides_NNS and_CC the_DT bronchial_JJ glands_NNS showed_VBD only_RB a_DT few_JJ plague-bacilli_JJ ,_, but_CC of_IN this_DT series_NN the_DT right_JJ axillary_NN specimens_NNS showed_VBD rather_RB more_JJR than_IN the_DT others_NNS ._.
The_DT lung_NN ,_, liver_NN ,_, spleen_JJ and_CC kidneys_NNS similarly_RB contained_VBD a_DT few_JJ ,_, as_IN did_VBD the_DT specimen_NNS of_IN blood_NN taken_VBN from_IN the_DT heart_NN ;_: in_IN fact_NN ,_, apart_RB from_IN the_DT bubo_NN the_DT remaining_VBG lymphatic_JJ glands_NNS and_CC organs_NNS merely_RB showed_VBD about_IN as_IN many_JJ plague-bacilli_JJ as_IN the_DT blood_NN ._.
C.-THE_JJ SEPTICMIC_NNP FORM_NNP ._.
P._NNP S._NNP ,_, Hindu_NNP ,_, male_NN ,_, 30_CD years_NNS old_JJ ,_, was_VBD admitted_VBN on_IN the_DT 19th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ._.
His_PRP$ friends_NNS said_VBD he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN ill_VBN with_IN fever_NN for_IN about_IN four_CD days_NNS and_CC had_VBD been_VBN delirious_JJ for_IN one_CD day_NN ._.
He_PRP died_VBD immediately_RB after_IN admission_NN ._.
The_DT post-mortem_JJ examination_NN was_VBD made_VBN one_CD hour_NN after_IN death_NN ._.
No_DT petechi_NN on_IN surface_NN of_IN body_NN ._.
Lymphatic_JJ Glands_NNS :_: Right_RB Inguinal.-The_NNP lowest_NN was_VBD the_DT largest_JJS ,_, of_IN the_DT size_NN of_IN a_DT small_JJ almond_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT others_NNS ,_, some_DT were_VBD nearly_RB as_RB large_JJ and_CC some_DT smaller_JJR ;_: they_PRP were_VBD rather_RB firm_JJ and_CC pink_JJ and_CC of_IN the_DT characteristic_JJ plague_NN appearance_NN ._.
Left_VBN Inguinal.-The_JJ lowest_NN was_VBD like_IN a_DT small_JJ almond_NN ,_, those_DT above_IN quite_RB small_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT highest_JJS as_RB large_JJ as_IN beans_NNS ;_: all_DT were_VBD slightly_RB firm_JJ and_CC pink_VB ,_, but_CC in_IN an_DT earlier_JJR stage_NN than_IN on_IN the_DT right_NN ._.
Right_RB Iliac.-The_NNP three_CD lowest_JJS were_VBD like_JJ large_JJ almonds_NNS ,_, pink_NN and_CC firm_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT upper_JJ were_VBD smaller_JJR ._.
Left_VBN Iliac.-The_JJ lowest_NN was_VBD like_IN a_DT small_JJ almond_NN ,_, but_CC red_JJ and_CC full_JJ of_IN blood_NN and_CC rather_RB soft_JJ ,_, the_DT upper_JJ ones_NNS were_VBD like_IN small_JJ beans_NNS and_CC less_JJR engorged_VBN ._.
The_DT Lumbar_NNP were_VBD like_IN small_JJ peas_NNS and_CC beans_NNS ,_, all_DT rather_RB red_JJ and_CC firm_NN ._.
The_DT Mesenteric_NNP were_VBD enlarged_VBN to_TO the_DT size_NN of_IN small_JJ almonds_NNS ,_, beans_NNS and_CC peas_NNS ,_, and_CC were_VBD all_DT dark_JJ red_JJ ,_, engorged_VBN and_CC soft_JJ ._.
The_DT Right_NNP and_CC Left_NNP Axillary_NNP were_VBD light_JJ red_JJ in_IN colour_NN ,_, and_CC rather_RB firm_NN ,_, some_DT being_VBG as_RB large_JJ as_IN hazelnuts_NNS and_CC some_DT smaller_JJR ._.
The_DT Cervical_NNP chains_NNS showed_VBD a_DT similar_JJ appearance_NN ,_, whilst_VBD the_DT Supra-trochlear_JJ and_CC Popliteal_NNP glands_NNS were_VBD small_JJ and_CC pale_JJ ._.
MEDICAL_JJ ASPECTS_NNP OF_NNP PLAGUE_NNP ._. ]_NN
97_CD There_EX was_VBD no_DT inflammation_NN of_IN lymphatic_JJ vessels_NNS and_CC no_DT hmorrhage_NN or_CC dema_NN round_IN the_DT glands_NNS in_IN this_DT case_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN there_EX was_VBD no_DT appearance_NN like_IN the_DT bubo_NN described_VBD in_IN former_JJ cases_NNS ._.
The_DT condition_NN of_IN the_DT remaining_VBG organs_NNS was_VBD such_JJ as_IN has_VBZ been_VBN already_RB described_VBN ,_, and_CC it_PRP only_RB remains_VBZ to_TO notice_VB that_IN there_EX were_VBD many_JJ small_JJ hmorrhages_NNS in_IN the_DT lungs_NNS ._.
Distribution_NN of_IN the_DT Plague-Bacillus.-Specimens_NNP taken_VBN from_IN the_DT inguinal_JJ ,_, iliac_JJ and_CC axillary_JJ glands_NNS of_IN both_DT sides_NNS showed_VBD enormous_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN distinct_JJ plague-bacilli_NN which_WDT took_VBD the_DT stain_NN well_RB ;_: specimens_NNS of_IN the_DT lumbar_NN and_CC mesenteric_JJ glands_NNS showed_VBD the_DT same_JJ appearance_NN ._.
The_DT cervical_JJ glands_NNS showed_VBD them_PRP also_RB ,_, but_CC in_IN less_JJR numbers_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT bronchial_JJ ,_, supra-trochlear_JJ and_CC popliteal_JJ glands_NNS still_RB less_RBR ._.
A_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN specimens_NNS to_TO show_VB the_DT bacilli_NN were_VBD made_VBN from_IN the_DT glands_NNS of_IN each_DT region_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, as_IN a_DT general_JJ rule_NN ,_, those_DT glands_NNS which_WDT were_VBD largest_JJS and_CC most_RBS distinctly_RB altered_VBN showed_VBD the_DT greatest_JJS number_NN of_IN plague-bacilli_NN ._.
Specimens_NNS of_IN the_DT spleen_NN contained_VBD many_JJ of_IN the_DT bacilli_NN ,_, but_CC less_RBR in_IN number_NN than_IN the_DT plague-glands_NNS ._.
The_DT liver_NN and_CC kidneys_NN showed_VBD plenty_JJ ,_, but_CC fewer_JJR than_IN the_DT spleen_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT lungs_NNS still_RB fewer_JJR ._.
The_DT blood_NN contained_VBD a_DT fair_JJ number_NN ,_, about_RB as_RB many_JJ as_IN in_IN the_DT lung_NN ._.
Note.-In_NN this_DT case_NN the_DT mesenteric_NN glands_VBZ showed_VBN distinct_JJ changes_NNS and_CC contained_VBD many_JJ plague-bacilli_JJ ,_, but_CC in_IN some_DT other_JJ cases_NNS of_IN this_DT type_NN these_DT glands_NNS were_VBD only_RB slightly_RB altered_VBN and_CC presented_VBN a_DT few_JJ plague-bacilli_NN :_: and_CC ,_, as_IN a_DT general_JJ rule_NN ,_, the_DT peripheral_JJ glands_NNS were_VBD most_RBS obviously_RB altered_JJ and_CC contained_VBD the_DT bacilli_NN in_IN the_DT greatest_JJS numbers_NNS ,_, whereas_IN the_DT visceral_JJ were_VBD more_JJR normal-looking_JJ and_CC showed_VBD the_DT bacilli_NN only_RB in_IN small_JJ numbers_NNS ._.
D.-THE_NNP PNEUMONIC_NNP FORM_NNP ._.
R._NNP F._NNP ,_, Hindu_NNP ,_, male_NN ,_, 23_CD years_NNS old_JJ ,_, admitted_VBN on_IN January_NNP 31st_CD ,_, 1897_CD ,_, complaining_VBG of_IN fever_NN and_CC cough_NN of_IN four_CD days_NNS duration_NN ._.
He_PRP looked_VBD very_RB ill_JJ ,_, temperature_NN 102_CD ,_, and_CC he_PRP had_VBD dyspna_NN and_CC cough_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD physical_JJ signs_NNS of_IN pneumonic_JJ patches_NNS in_IN the_DT lungs_NNS ._.
He_PRP complained_VBD of_IN no_DT pain_NN whatever_RB ,_, nor_CC was_VBD any_DT enlargement_NN of_IN lymphatic_JJ glands_NNS made_VBN out_RP ._.
He_PRP remained_VBD very_RB ill_JJ and_CC died_VBD on_IN February_NNP 2nd_CD ._.
Post-mortem_JJ examination_NN seven_CD hours_NNS after_IN death_NN ._.
No_DT petechi_NN on_IN surface_NN of_IN body_NN ,_, body_NN well-nourished_JJ and_CC plenty_NN of_IN sub-_JJ cutaneous_JJ fat_NN ._.
Heart.-Muscle_NNP rather_RB soft_JJ and_CC flabby_NN and_CC dilatation_NN of_IN the_DT right_JJ side_NN with_IN slightly_RB coagulated_VBN blood_NN in_IN the_DT cavities_NNS ._.
Lungs.-Much_JJ general_JJ engorgement_NN and_CC dema_NN of_IN lung-substance_NN ,_, some_DT congestion_NN of_IN bronchial_JJ mucous_JJ membrane_NN ,_, with_IN frothy_JJ sero-mucous_JJ fluid_NN in_IN trachea_NN and_CC bronchi_NN ._.
Distinct_NNP rounded_VBD nodules_NNS in_IN the_DT early_JJ second_JJ stage_NN of_IN pneumonia_NN were_VBD distributed_VBN in_IN the_DT lungs_NNS as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -There_EX were_VBD five_CD such_JJ nodules_NNS in_IN the_DT right_JJ upper_JJ lobe_NN ,_, varying_VBG in_IN size_NN from_IN a_DT hazelnut_NN to_TO an_DT egg_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT few_JJ in_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN this_DT lung_NN ,_, with_IN one_CD mass_NN quite_NN at_IN the_DT base_NN ;_: also_RB the_DT left_NN lung_NN contained_VBD a_DT few_JJ similar_JJ pneumonic_NN patches_NNS ._.

Distribution_NN of_IN the_DT Plague-Bacillus.-The_NNP pneumonic_NN lung_NN in_IN the_DT second_JJ stage_NN shows_NNS immense_VBP numbers_NNS of_IN bacilli_NN which_WDT took_VBD the_DT stain_NN well_RB ,_, and_CC some_DT of_IN them_PRP are_VBP collected_VBN into_IN large_JJ masses_NNS or_CC groups_NNS ;_: the_DT pneumonic_JJ lung_NN in_IN the_DT first_JJ stage_NN shows_VBZ the_DT same_JJ appearance_NN ,_, but_CC not_RB so_RB many_JJ of_IN the_DT masses_NNS ._.

E.-PLAGUE-PNEUMONIA_JJ WITH_NNP PLAGUE-SEPTICMIA_NNP ._.
K._NNP B._NNP ,_, Hindu_NNP ,_, 31_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN ,_, was_VBD admitted_VBN on_IN February_NNP 23rd_CD ,_, 1897_CD ,_, for_IN fever_NN and_CC cough_NN ,_, said_VBD to_TO be_VB of_IN five_CD days_NNS '_POS duration_NN ._.

Sections_NNS of_IN the_DT liver_NN were_VBD also_RB examined_VBN ,_, and_CC presented_VBD the_DT following_JJ appear-_JJ ance_NN :_: -The_NN liver_NN was_VBD in_IN the_DT early_JJ nutmeg_JJ condition_NN ,_, the_DT central_JJ veins_NNS dilated_VBD ,_, with_IN some_DT blood_NN corpuscles_NNS extravasated_VBN around_IN them_PRP ,_, the_DT portal_NN vessels_NNS also_RB congested_VBD and_CC fat_JJ globules_NNS in_IN the_DT adjoining_JJ liver-cells_NNS ._.
