In_IN April_NNP 1897_CD disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT baggage_NN of_IN Railway_NNP passengers_NNS was_VBD instituted_VBN at_IN Hotgi_NNP and_CC Bhusawal_NNP ._.
Later_RB on_IN ,_, when_WRB plague_NN had_VBD spread_VBN to_TO several_JJ towns_NNS in_IN the_DT mofussil_NN ,_, and_CC continued_VBD to_TO spread_VB ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN inexpedient_NN to_TO arrange_VB for_IN a_DT wide-spread_JJ medical_JJ inspection_NN so_RB thorough_RB as_IN to_TO influence_VB its_PRP$ course_NN materially_RB ,_, a_DT number_NN of_IN Observation_NNP Camps_NNP were_VBD established_VBN in_IN selected_VBN parts_NNS of_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN disinfecting_VBG and_CC detaining_VBG for_IN observation_NN all_DT third_JJ class_NN passengers_NNS from_IN infected_VBN areas_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT meanwhile_NN ,_, Bombay_NNP became_VBD practically_RB free_JJ ,_, and_CC ,_, to_TO prevent_VB its_PRP$ re-infection_NN ,_, all_DT passengers_NNS coming_VBG into_IN Bombay_NNP City_NNP ,_, whether_IN by_IN sea_NN or_CC rail_NN or_CC road_NN ,_, were_VBD examined_VBN ,_, and_CC such_JJ as_IN came_VBD from_IN infected_VBN areas_NNS and_CC were_VBD likely_RB to_TO carry_VB infection_NN ,_, including_VBG third_JJ class_NN pas-_NN sengers_NNS by_IN rail_NN ,_, were_VBD detained_VBN for_IN observation_NN in_IN Camps_NNP ._.
This_DT arrangement_NN lasted_VBD until_IN the_DT recrudescence_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN December_NNP 1897_CD ._.

Local_JJ ,_, through_IN ,_, barrier_NN ,_, frontier_JJR and_CC mofussil_JJ inspections_NNS with_IN disinfection_NN Observation_NNP Camps_NNP ,_, and_CC other_JJ regulations_NNS to_TO prevent_VB infected_JJ or_CC probably_RB infected_JJ people_NNS from_IN travelling_VBG ,_, remained_VBN in_IN force_NN till_NN after_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN 1898_CD ,_, modified_VBN by_IN local_JJ indications_NNS from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN ;_: as_IN ,_, however_RB ,_, there_EX seemed_VBD little_JJ prospect_NN of_IN a_DT speedy_JJ termination_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, and_CC as_IN it_PRP was_VBD considered_VBN that_IN many_JJ of_IN the_DT regulations_NNS in_IN force_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN detention_NN and_CC others_NNS ,_, which_WDT practically_RB close_VBP the_DT channels_NNS of_IN daily_JJ business_NN ,_, etc._NN ,_, were_VBD inexpedient_JJ as_IN permanent_JJ features_NNS of_IN plague_JJ administration_NN ,_, a_DT modified_JJ system_NN ,_, known_VBN as_IN the_DT Surveillance_NNP System_NNP ,_, was_VBD introduced_VBN in_IN October_NNP 1898_CD ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ laid_VBN down_RB and_CC described_VBN in_IN Government_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
5772-5864-p._CD of_IN 17th_CD October_NNP 1898_CD ._.
The_DT chief_JJ features_NNS of_IN this_DT new_JJ system_NN were-_JJ (_( a_DT )_) systematic_JJ and_CC careful_JJ medical_JJ examination_NN of_IN each_DT traveller_NN ;_: (_( b_NN )_) careful_JJ disinfection_NN of_IN suspicious_JJ articles_NNS ;_: (_( c._NN )_) correct_VBP ascertainment_JJ and_CC record_NN of_IN the_DT locution_NN of_IN travellers_NNS after_IN they_PRP have_VBP been_VBN permitted_VBN to_TO enter_VB a_DT town_NN ;_: (_( d_NN )_) special_JJ regulations_NNS for_IN travellers_NNS who_WP could_MD not_RB be_VB depended_VBN upon_IN to_TO give_VB a_DT trust-_JJ worthy_JJ account_NN of_IN their_PRP$ residence_NN and_CC movements_NNS ,_, or_CC were_VBD suspicious_JJ ,_, whether_IN by_IN reason_NN of_IN their_PRP$ appearance_NN or_CC symptoms_NNS ,_, or_CC the_DT dirty_JJ condition_NN of_IN their_PRP$ clothes_NNS or_CC effects_NNS ._.

VI_NNP On_IN the_DT 4th_CD November_NNP 1898_CD ,_, Captain_NNP W._NNP E._NNP Jennings_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, was_VBD appointed_VBN Supervising_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Railway_NNP Medical_NNP Inspection_NNP ,_, to_TO susperintend_VB the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ system_NN in_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP proper_NN ._.

6130-6228-p._JJ ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 8th_CD November_NNP 1898_CD ,_, were_VBD briefly_VBN as_IN follows_VBZ ,_, viz_NN :_: -_: (_( i_NN )_) To_TO report_VB from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN at_IN what_WP places_VBZ medical_JJ examination_NN should_MD ,_, in_IN his_PRP$ opinion_NN ,_, be_VB conducted_VBN and_CC at_IN what_WP places_NNS discontinued_VBN ;_: (_( ii_NN )_) to_TO be_VB responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT efficiency_NN of_IN the_DT examination_NN at_IN each_DT place_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT arrangements_NNS for_IN the_DT comfort_NN of_IN the_DT public_NN ,_, and_CC generally_RB for_IN carrying_VBG ont_PDT the_DT provisions_NNS of_IN Government_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.

It_PRP was_VBD of_IN course_NN intended_VBN that_IN the_DT decision_NN regarding_VBG the_DT stations_NNS at_IN which_WDT from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN examination_NN should_MD be_VB held_VBN would_MD depend_VB on_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT time_NN when_WRB the_DT new_JJ arrangements_NNS came_VBD into_IN force_NN ,_, the_DT state_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP necessitated_VBD the_DT establishment_NN of_IN inspection_NN and_CC disinfection_NN posts_NNS as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: B_NN ._.

VI_NNP ._.
Though_IN railway_NN inspections_NNS have_VBP been_VBN in_IN force_NN for_IN more_JJR than_IN two_CD years_NNS ,_, yet_RB the_DT plague_NN has_VBZ spread_VBN ._.
But_CC ,_, the_DT area_NN and_CC duration_NN of_IN its_PRP$ prevalence_NN considered_VBN ,_, its_PRP$ dissemi-_JJ nation_NN has_VBZ been_VBN very_RB gradual_JJ :_: and_CC there_EX can_MD be_VB little_JJ doubt_NN that_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN largely_RB checked_VBN by_IN this_DT measure_NN ._.
The_DT following_JJ causes_NNS have_VBP combined_VBN to_TO discount_VB its_PRP$ utility_NN :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) The_DT impossibility_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT measures_NNS would_MD have_VB been_VBN most_JJS useful_JJ ,_, of_IN obtain-_JJ ing_JJ sufficient_JJ staff_NN on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT large_JJ demand_NN made_VBD on_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Depart-_NNP ment_NN for_IN Plague_NNP ,_, Famine_NNP ,_, Cholera_NNP ,_, and_CC Frontier_NNP Campaigns_NNP ,_, all_DT at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT consequent_JJ delegation_NN of_IN inspection_NN work_NN to_TO temporary_JJ medical_JJ subordinates_NNS ;_: who_WP ,_, though_IN doubtless_JJ equally_RB zealous_JJ ,_, were_VBD yet_RB less_JJR qualified_JJ ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Evasion_NN by_IN travellers_NNS ,_, i.e._FW ,_, alighting_VBG before_IN arrival_NN at_IN ,_, and_CC walking_VBG past_JJ inspection-station_NN ;_: booking_VBG to_TO intermediate_VB non-infected_JJ stations_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN (_( c_NN )_) The_DT conveyance_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN road_NN ._.
(_( d_NN )_) The_DT impossibility_NN of_IN detecting_VBG cases_NNS in_IN the_DT incubation_NN stage_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN there_EX is_VBZ much_JJ to_TO demnstrate_VB the_DT value_NN of_IN the_DT system_NN as_IN a_DT preventive_JJ measure_NN ._.
Statistics_NNS go_VBP to_TO illustrate_VB that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT powerful_JJ deterrent_NN against_IN those_DT travelling_JJ ,_, who_WP are_VBP actually_RB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC also_RB against_IN those_DT travelling_JJ ,_, who_WP are_VBP probably_RB infected_VBN :_: for_IN out_IN of_IN many_JJ hundreds_NNS of_IN thousands_NNS of_IN passengers_NNS examined_VBN ,_, only_RB an_DT infinitesimal_JJ number_NN were_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB actually_RB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, out_IN of_IN many_JJ thousands_NNS detained_VBD for_IN observation_NN ,_, a_DT comparatively_RB small_JJ number_NN developed_VBN plague_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ almost_RB certain_JJ that_IN all_DT actual_JJ plague_NN cases_NNS ,_, and_CC all_PDT those_DT who_WP have_VBP commenced_VBN to_TO sicken_VB for_IN plague_NN ,_, are_VBP detected_VBN ,_, and_CC only_RB those_DT incubating_VBG for_IN plague_NN escape_NN ._.
The_DT inspection_NN establishments_NNS were_VBD made_VBN up_IN of_IN officers_NNS of_IN the_DT following_JJ classes_NNS ,_, viz._NN ,_, Commissioned_NNP Medical_NNP Officers_NNP ,_, English_NNP Doctors_NNP and_CC Lady_NNP Nurses_NNP ,_, Government_NNP Assistant_NNP Surgeons_NNP and_CC Hospital_NNP Assistants_NNP ,_, Indian_NNP Medical_NNP graduates_NNS and_CC native_JJ practitioners_NNS ,_, medi-_JJ cal_JJ students_NNS ,_, Indian_JJ trained_VBN nurses_NNS and_CC female_JJ inspectors_NNS specially_RB instructed_VBN to_TO assist_VB in_IN inspection_NN work_NN ,_, and_CC clerical_JJ ,_, police_NN and_CC menial_JJ staff_NN ._.
The_DT following_JJ statement_NN gives_VBZ in_IN a_DT tabular_JJ form_NN the_DT period_NN during_IN which_WDT the_DT Revised_VBN Regulations_NNS were_VBD in_IN force_NN ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN passengers_NNS detained_VBN ,_, the_DT number_NN o_JJ plague_NN cases_NNS detected_VBN (_( and_CC of_IN deaths_NNS among_IN them_PRP )_) ,_, the_DT numbers_NNS of_IN those_DT disinfected_VBN and_CC subjected_VBN to_TO the_DT clinical_JJ thermometer_NN test_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT total_JJ expenditure_NN at_IN each_DT station_NN up_RB to_TO the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 2nd_CD June_NNP 1899_CD ._.

THANA_$ 185_CD to_TO 194_CD 8_CD 151_CD AHMEDABAD_NNP DISTRICT_NNP ._.
Area_$ 3,819_CD sq_NN ._.
miles_NNS ._.
Population_NN in_IN 1891_CD 921,712_CD ._.
Density_NN of_IN population_NN 241_CD per_IN sq_NN mile_NN ._.
Rainfall_JJ 3213_CD inches_NNS ._.
Boundaries_NNS ._.
The_DT Ahmedabad_NNP District_NNP is_VBZ the_DT most_RBS northerly_JJ District_NNP in_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ bounded_VBN roughly_RB as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -on_VB the_DT north_NN by_IN Deghm_NNP and_CC Kadi_NNP (_( Baroda_NNP )_) ;_: on_IN the_DT east_NN by_IN the_DT Gulf_NNP of_IN Cambay_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT south_NN by_IN Bhvnagar_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT west_NN by_IN Kathiwr_NNP ._.
Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
During_IN January_NNP and_CC February_NNP a_DT north-east_JJ wind_NN blows_NNS which_WDT imparts_VBP a_DT sensation_NN of_IN severe_JJ cold_NN :_: from_IN March_NNP a_DT west_NN wind_NN ,_, which_WDT becomes_VBZ hot_JJ in_IN the_DT day-_JJ time_NN ,_, continues_VBZ until_IN the_DT rains_NNS set_VBN in_IN towards_NNS the_DT end_NN of_IN June_NNP ._.
The_DT rains_NNS last_JJ through_IN July_NNP ,_, August_NNP and_CC September_NNP ._.
October_NNP is_VBZ close_JJ and_CC feverish_JJ ;_: and_CC the_DT cold_JJ weather_NN sets_NNS in_IN about_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN November_NNP ._.
Towards_IN the_DT west_NN the_DT soil_NN is_VBZ black_JJ ,_, towards_IN the_DT east_NN ,_, light_NN ._.
The_DT District_NNP is_VBZ well_RB watered_VBN ,_, and_CC owing_VBG to_TO the_DT ill-defined_JJ channels_NNS of_IN many_JJ of_IN the_DT rivers_NNS and_CC the_DT low_JJ level_NN of_IN the_DT land_NN on_IN the_DT lower_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT Sabarmati_NNP ,_, large_JJ portions_NNS of_IN it_PRP are_VBP periodically_RB flooded_VBN ._.
Previous_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.
Plague_NNP appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB visited_VBN Ahmedabad_NNP District_NNP on_IN several_JJ occasions_NNS ;_: and_CC with_IN great_JJ severity_NN ._.
The_DT first_JJ outbreak_NN of_IN which_WDT there_EX is_VBZ any_DT authentic_JJ record_NN occurred_VBD in_IN 1618_CD ._.
This_DT epidemic_JJ began_VBD in_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP in_IN 1611_CD ,_, and_CC no_DT place_NN in_IN Hindustan_NNP was_VBD free_JJ from_IN its_PRP$ ravages_NNS ,_, which_WDT lasted_VBD ,_, with_IN intervals_NNS ,_, for_IN eight_CD years_NNS ._.
Between_JJ 1683_CD and_CC 1689_CD plague_NN was_VBD again_RB in_IN Ahmedabad_NNP and_CC remained_VBD for_IN seven_CD or_CC eight_CD years_NNS ._.
In_IN 1770_CD ,_, a_DT year_NN of_IN great_JJ famine_NN ,_, thousands_NNS of_IN people_NNS died_VBN of_IN fever_NN in_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD days_NNS ,_, so_IN that_IN none_NN could_MD be_VB found_VBN to_TO bury_VB them_PRP ._.
But_CC it_PRP was_VBD in_IN 1812-13_JJ that_IN Ahmedabad_NNP suffered_VBD most_JJS severely_RB ._.
1812_CD was_VBD also_RB a_DT year_NN of_IN famine_NN ,_, and_CC plague_NN appeared_VBD first_RB in_IN Cutch_NNP ._.
Shortly_RB after_IN its_PRP$ appearance_NN in_IN Cutch_NNP ``_`` a_DT contagion_NN raged_VBN at_IN Ahmedabad_NNP with_IN a_DT fury_NN that_WDT can_MD scarcely_RB be_VB believed_VBN ''_'' ;_: and_CC half_PDT the_DT population_NN ,_, about_IN 50,000_CD persons_NNS ,_, are_VBP said_VBD to_TO have_VB perished_VBN ._.
This_DT epidemic_VBZ also_RB lasted_VBN some_DT eight_CD years_NNS ._.
*_NN With_IN such_PDT a_DT record_NN the_DT practical_JJ immunity_NN of_IN Ahmedabad_NNP is_VBZ one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS remarkable_JJ features_NNS of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN which_WDT has_VBZ now_RB continued_VBN since_IN September_NNP 1896_CD ._.
A_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN imported_JJ cases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN this_DT District_NNP from_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN October_NNP 1896_CD to_TO the_DT middle_NN of_IN June_NNP 1897_CD ,_, with_IN a_DT small_JJ number_NN of_IN indigenous_JJ cases_NNS ._.

Boundaries_NNS ._.
The_DT Broach_NNP District_NNP is_VBZ bounded_VBN on_IN the_DT north_NN by_IN the_DT Mahi_NNP river_NN arid_VBZ the_DT Gaekwar_NNP 's_POS terri-_JJ tory_NN ;_: on_IN the_DT east_NN by_IN the_DT States_NNPS of_IN Baroda_NNP and_CC Rjpipla_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT south_NN by_IN the_DT Surat_NNP District_NNP ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN by_IN the_DT Gulf_NNP of_IN Cambay_NNP ._.
Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
The_DT lands_NNS of_IN the_DT District_NNP form_NN an_DT alluvial_JJ plain_NN fifty-four_JJ miles_NNS in_IN length_NN from_IN north_JJ to_TO south_VB ,_, and_CC sloping_VBG gently_RB westward_RB to_TO the_DT shore_NN of_IN the_DT Gulf_NNP of_IN Cambay_NNP ._.
The_DT climate_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP is_VBZ as_RB healthy_JJ as_IN that_DT of_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN Gujarat_NNP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ much_RB more_RBR pleasant_JJ than_IN the_DT climate_NN of_IN parts_NNS of_IN the_DT Province_NNP situated_VBD farther_RBR from_IN the_DT sea_NN ._.
In_IN December_NNP ,_, January_NNP and_CC February_NNP ,_, the_DT mornings_NNS are_VBP some-_JJ times_NNS bitterly_RB chill_NN ,_, the_DT thermometer_NN showing_VBG a_DT mean_JJ average_JJ minimum_NN of_IN 50_CD ._.
Occasion-_NNP ally_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT cold_NN is_VBZ much_RB more_RBR severe_JJ ._.
The_DT latter_JJ days_NNS of_IN March_NNP and_CC the_DT month_NN of_IN April_NNP are_VBP the_DT hottest_JJS season_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
Under_IN canvas_NN in_IN the_DT Wagra_NNP Sub-Division_NNP ,_, the_DT thermometer_NN has_VBZ been_VBN known_VBN to_TO stand_VB as_RB high_JJ as_IN 120_CD ,_, and_CC at_IN this_DT season_NN ,_, in_IN every_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, even_RB in_IN well-built_JJ houses_NNS ,_, the_DT temperature_NN occasionally_RB rises_VBZ to_TO 110_CD ._.
The_DT geological_JJ division_NN of_IN the_DT soils_NNS of_IN the_DT District_NNP is_VBZ into_IN light_JJ soils_NNS and_CC black_JJ soils_NNS ._.
The_DT light_JJ soil_NN varies_NNS in_IN character_NN from_IN the_DT tract_NN of_IN consolidated_JJ sand-drift_NN in_IN the_DT south_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, to_TO the_DT heavier_JJR lands_NNS in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN the_DT Narbada_NNP ,_, almost_RB merging_VBG into_IN the_DT richest_JJS alluvial_JJ loam_NN ._.
Though_IN its_PRP$ rivers_NNS are_VBP the_DT chief_JJ natural_JJ feature_NN of_IN the_DT Broach_NNP plain_NN ,_, the_DT height_NN of_IN their_PRP$ banks_NNS ,_, up_RB to_TO which_WDT the_DT whole_JJ country_NN slopes_NNS ,_, prevents_VBZ the_DT rivers_NNS from_IN effectually_RB carrying_VBG off_RP the_DT surplus_NN waters_NNS of_IN local_JJ floods_NNS ._.

*_JJ Protective_NNP measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Broach_NNP District_NNP ._.
December_NNP 189G_CD ._.

the_DT Broach_NNP District_NNP for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN enjoyed_VBD a_DT remarkable_JJ immunity_NN from_IN plague_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD secured_VBN by_IN no_DT advantages_NNS of_IN natural_JJ situation_NN or_CC isolation_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ easily_RB approached_VBN both_DT by_IN land_NN and_CC sea_NN ._.
Broach_NNP itself_PRP is_VBZ a_DT busy_JJ town_NN of_IN over_IN 40,000_CD inhabitants_NNS ,_, maintaining_VBG constant_JJ communication_NN with_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC other_JJ plague-stricken_JJ places_NNS ._.

Up_RB to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN March_NNP 1897_CD ,_, 18_CD such_JJ cases_NNS (_( 12_CD in_IN Broach_NNP Town_NNP )_) were_VBD discovered_VBN ,_, but_CC were_VBD not_RB followed_VBN by_IN any_DT others_NNS for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN ._.
One_CD more_JJR case_NN was_VBD noticed_VBN in_IN November_NNP 1897_CD ,_, 3_CD in_IN January_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC one_CD towards_VBZ the_DT end_NN of_IN March_NNP 1898_CD ._.
To_TO prevent_VB the_DT importation_NN of_IN infection_NN into_IN his_PRP$ District_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP R._NNP E._NNP Candy_NNP ,_, I._NNP C._NNP S._NNP ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP ,_, had_VBD devised_VBN a_DT most_RBS careful_JJ system_NN of_IN inspection_NN and_CC observation_NN of_IN all_DT arrivals_NNS ._.
This_DT system_NN ,_, simple_NN in_IN itself_PRP ,_, was_VBD extended_VBN to_TO all_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, from_IN the_DT Broach_NNP Rail-_NNP way_NN Station_NNP and_CC seaport_NN to_TO the_DT most_RBS obscure_JJ village_NN on_IN the_DT frontier_NN ;_: while_IN the_DT agency_NN employ-_JJ ed_NN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN was_VBD for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN no_DT more_JJR than_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ administrative_JJ establish-_JJ ment_NN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN a_DT Collector_NNP ._.

Ankleshvar_NNP Town_NNP ._.
Population-10,692_NNP ._.
First_RB Epidemic_NNP ._.
(_( April_NNP 1898-April_JJ 1899_CD )_) ._.
By_IN this_DT means_VBZ the_DT District_NNP was_VBD most_JJS efficiently_RB protected_VBN until_IN April_NNP 1898_CD ,_, when_WRB indigenous_JJ plague_NN appeared_VBD in_IN Ankleshvar_NNP Town_NNP ._.
The_DT disease_NN originated_VBD among_IN the_DT Ghnchis_NNP ,_, a_DT very_RB dirty_JJ class_NN ,_, but_CC how_WRB they_PRP caught_VBD the_DT infection_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB discovered_VBN ._.
Three_CD successive_JJ deaths_NNS in_IN one_CD house_NN within_IN three_CD days_NNS attracted_VBD notice_RB ,_, as_IN mortality_NN statistics_NNS were_VBD being_VBG registered_VBN with_IN scrupulous_JJ accuracy_NN throughout_IN the_DT District_NNP ._.
The_DT whole_JJ street_NN in_IN which_WDT these_DT deaths_NNS occurred_VBD was_VBD at_IN once_RB inspected_VBN ,_, and_CC this_DT resulted_VBN in_IN the_DT discovery_NN of_IN 2_CD more_JJR cases_NNS ,_, which_WDT were_VBD at_IN once_RB removed_VBN to_TO a_DT Hospital_NNP ._.
The_DT inmates_NNS of_IN neighbouring_VBG houses_NNS were_VBD sent_VBN to_TO a_DT Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP ,_, the_DT street_NN disinfected_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT names_NNS of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS noted_VBD down_RB ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD medically_RB examined_VBN twice_RB a_DT day_NN ._.
As_IN a_DT result_NN ,_, the_DT progress_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD arrested_VBN ,_, and_CC from_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN April_NNP to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN July_NNP 1898_CD only_RB 4_CD more_JJR sporadic_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD registered_VBN ._.
But_CC the_DT people_NNS were_VBD by_IN no_DT means_NNS willing_JJ to_TO acquiesce_VB in_IN these_DT measures_NNS ,_, and_CC raised_VBD loud_JJ protests_NNS ._.
Mr._NNP Candy_NNP ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD equal_JJ to_TO the_DT occasion_NN ._.
He_PRP visited_VBD Ankleshvar_NNP ,_, and_CC calling_VBG a_DT meeting_NN of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioners_NNP ,_, he_PRP placed_VBD Khn_NNP Bahadur_NNP Sorbshh_NNP Hormasji_NNP ,_, District_NNP Deputy_NNP Collector_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT chair_NN ,_, while_IN he_PRP himself_PRP addressed_VBD the_DT meeting_NN to_TO such_JJ good_JJ purpose_NN ,_, that_IN a_DT determination_NN to_TO carry_VB out_RP plague_JJ measures_NNS spontaneously_RB was_VBD immediately_RB expressed_VBN ._.
He_PRP thence_RB visited_VBD the_DT Hindu_NNP Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP ,_, and_CC ,_, finding_VBG the_DT inmates_NNS sullen_VBN and_CC dissatisfied_VBN ,_, he_PRP offered_VBD to_TO have_VB a_DT Brahmin_NNP brought_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN reading_VBG the_DT Shstrs_NNP to_TO them_PRP ,_, and_CC to_TO have_VB a_DT 'Tulsi_NNP '_POS plant_NN erected_VBD for_IN their_PRP$ worship_NN ._.
The_DT offer_NN was_VBD gratefully_RB accepted_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT people_NNS were_VBD happy_JJ and_CC contented_VBD ._.
The_DT Mahomedans_NNPS ,_, too_RB ,_, were_VBD provided_VBN with_IN a_DT Mullah_NNP ,_, who_WP read_VBD the_DT Koran_NNP to_TO them_PRP ._.
Nor_CC were_VBD the_DT children_NNS forgotten_VBP :_: for_IN Mr._NNP Candy_NNP presented_VBD them_PRP with_IN various_JJ articles_NNS of_IN amusement_NN ._.
At_IN length_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, in_IN July_NNP 1898_CD ,_, plague_NN again_RB showed_VBD itself_PRP at_IN Ankleshvar_NNP ,_, and_CC soon_RB assumed_VBD epidemic_JJ form_NN ._.
The_DT first_JJ victim_NN was_VBD a_DT Bania_NNP boy_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD attacked_VBN on_IN the_DT 13th_CD of_IN July_NNP ;_: but_CC the_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN again_RB eluded_VBD discovery_NN ._.
To_TO quote_VB the_DT Collector_NNP 's_POS words-_JJ ``_`` It_PRP is_VBZ quite_RB impossible_JJ to_TO say_VB how_WRB the_DT plague_NN microbe_NN was_VBD introduced_VBN again_RB ;_: but_CC as_IN precautions_NNS were_VBD more_RBR or_CC less_RBR relaxed_JJ owing_VBG to_TO the_DT rainy_NN season_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ most_RBS probable_JJ that_IN some_DT one_CD must_MD have_VB gone_VBN to_TO an_DT infected_JJ area_NN and_CC returned_VBD bringing_VBG the_DT germs_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, or_CC perhaps_RB it_PRP is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT vitality_NN of_IN germs_NNS which_WDT have_VBP lain_VBN dormant_JJ since_IN April_NNP within_IN Ankleshvar_NNP itself_PRP ._. ''_''
Prompt_JJ steps_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN to_TO check_VB the_DT epidemic_NN ._.
As_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT existence_NN of_IN plague_NN was_VBD confirmed_VBN ,_, 3_CD Hospitals_NNS were_VBD opened_VBN ,_, for_IN Hindus_NNP ,_, Mahomedans_NNP ,_, and_CC Prsis_NNP respectively_RB ,_, and_CC an_DT Observation_NNP Camp_NNP for_IN contacts_NNS in_IN a_DT Dharamshla_NNP maintained_VBN by_IN local_JJ funds_NNS Search_NNP BROACH_NNP DISTRICT_NNP ._. ]_NN
155_CD parties_NNS were_VBD instituted_VBN and_CC disinfection_NN of_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS carried_VBD out_RP ._.
Nor_CC was_VBD the_DT sanita-_JJ tion_NN of_IN the_DT Town_NNP forgotten_NN ;_: gangs_NNS of_IN sweepers_NNS were_VBD appointed_VBN ,_, under_IN an_DT Abkri_NNP Inspector_NNP ,_, to_TO clean_VB up_RP ,_, remove_VB dirt_NN ,_, etc_FW ._.
The_DT ``_`` season_NN was_VBD very_RB unfavourable_JJ to_TO evacuation_NN ;_: nevertheless_RB ,_, efforts_NNS were_VBD made_VBN in_IN this_DT direction_NN ._.
Three_CD Health_NNP Camps_NNP were_VBD opened-one_RB in_IN a_DT School-building_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ two_CD in_IN ginning_VBG factories_NNS ,_, which_WDT were_VBD kindly_RB placed_VBN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP by_IN Messrs._NNP Jamsetji_NNP N._NNP Ginwla_NNP and_CC Prgds_NNP Ddbhi_NNP ._.
The_DT people_NNS were_VBD at_IN first_JJ unwilling_JJ to_TO leave_VB their_PRP$ houses_NNS in_IN the_DT monsoon_NN ,_, but_CC were_VBD gradually_RB prevailed_VBN upon_NN ,_, by_IN tact_NN and_CC persuasion_NN ,_, to_TO occupy_VB the_DT Health_NNP Camps_NNP ,_, and_CC later_RB to_TO build_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ huts_NNS ._.
By_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN July_NNP those_DT localities_NNS where_WRB the_DT infection_NN was_VBD worst_VBN had_VBD been_VBN vacated_VBN ._.
But_CC the_DT plague_NN showing_VBG no_DT signs_NNS of_IN abatement_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD resolved_VBN to_TO push_VB on_IN complete_JJ evacuation_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN the_DT 24th_CD August_NNP the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN lay_VBD empty_JJ ,_, the_DT people_NNS having_VBG removed_VBN either_DT to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Camps_NNP or_CC into_IN huts_NNS erected_VBN by_IN themselves_PRP round_VBP the_DT town_NN ._.
Three_CD weeks_NNS later_RB the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD brought_VBN under_IN control_NN ._.
Shortly_RB after_IN evacuation_NN ,_, the_DT area_NN occupied_VBN by_IN the_DT evicts_NNS was_VBD divided_VBN into_IN 5_CD circles_NNS ,_, each_DT in_IN charge_NN of_IN a_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD provided_VBN with_IN a_DT small_JJ establishment_NN ._.
A_DT muster_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN each_DT circle_NN was_VBD called_VBN every_DT morning_NN :_: and_CC the_DT removal_NN of_IN corpses_NNS ,_, without_IN a_DT proper_JJ certificate_NN of_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN death_NN ,_, being_VBG prohibited_VBN ,_, the_DT stealthy_JJ disposal_NN of_IN the_DT dead_JJ became_VBD impossible_JJ ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN noticed_VBN above_IN that_DT plague_NN was_VBD brought_VBN under_IN control_NN in_IN September_NNP 1898_CD ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ described_VBN as_IN a_DT very_RB healthy_JJ village_NN situated_VBN on_IN the_DT sea-shore_NN ._.

But_CC it_PRP would_MD have_VB been_VBN strange_JJ indeed_RB had_VBD the_DT capital_NN of_IN an_DT affected_JJ District_NNP escaped_VBD scot-free_JJ ._.

Boundaries_NNS ._.
Separated_VBN from_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT Gulf_NNP of_IN Cambay_NNP by_IN a_DT narrow_JJ strip_NN of_IN territory_NN ,_, the_DT District_NNP of_IN Kaira_NNP ,_, with_IN a_DT breadth_JJ varying_NN from_IN about_IN twenty-five_JJ to_TO forty_VB miles_NNS ,_, stretches_NNS towards_IN the_DT north-east_NN for_IN more_JJR than_IN sixty_JJ miles_NNS along_IN the_DT right_JJ bank_NN of_IN the_DT river_NN Mahi_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ bounded_VBN on_IN the_DT north_NN by_IN Main_NNP Kntha_NNP and_CC Ahmedabad_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT east_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT Panch_NNP Mahls_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT south_JJ and_CC south-_JJ east_NN ,_, by_IN Broach_NNP and_CC the_DT Gaekwar_NNP 's_POS territory_NN ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN ,_, by_IN Cambay_NNP and_CC Ahmedabad_NNP ._.
Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
From_IN November_NNP to_TO March_NNP the_DT air_NN is_VBZ pleasant_JJ and_CC bracing_NN ._.
But_CC even_RB this_DT lengthy_JJ season_NN of_IN cool_NN weather_NN fails_VBZ to_TO make_VB up_RP for_IN the_DT severe_JJ heat_NN of_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, dry_JJ and_CC parching_VBG in_IN March_NNP ,_, April_NNP ,_, and_CC May_NNP ,_, moist_NN and_CC oppressive_JJ from_IN June_NNP to_TO October_NNP ._.
Except_IN a_DT small_JJ corner_NN of_IN hilly_RB ground_NN near_IN its_PRP$ northern_JJ boundary_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT south-east_NN and_CC south_NN ,_, where_WRB along_IN the_DT Mahi_NNP the_DT surface_NN is_VBZ roughened_VBN and_CC furrowed_VBN into_IN deep_JJ ravines_NNS ,_, the_DT District_NNP of_IN Kaira_NNP is_VBZ one_CD unbroken_JJ plain_NN ,_, sloping_VBG gently_RB towards_IN the_DT south-west_NN ._.
The_DT soils_NNS of_IN the_DT District_NNP are_VBP of_IN four_CD chief_NN kinds_NNS ,_, light_NN ,_, medium_NN ,_, black_JJ ,_, and_CC alluvial_JJ ._.
The_DT light_NN is_VBZ the_DT prevailing_JJ soil_NN ,_, varying_VBG in_IN quality_NN from_IN the_DT loose_JJ grained_JJ yellow_JJ sand_NN of_IN the_DT fields_NNS near_IN the_DT Sbarmati_NNP and_CC the_DT Mahi_NNP to_TO a_DT rich_JJ light-brown_NN mould_NN ,_, common_JJ in_IN the_DT central_JJ sub-_JJ divisions_NNS ,_, and_CC found_VBD to_TO perfection_NN in_IN the_DT south-west_JJ corner_NN of_IN Matar_NNP ._.
The_DT District_NNP has_VBZ two_CD chief_NN rivers_NNS :_: the_DT Mahi_NNP ,_, for_IN nearly_RB 100_CD miles_NNS its_PRP$ boundary_NN to_TO the_DT east_NN and_CC south_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT north-west_JJ the_DT Sbarmati_NNP touching_VBG the_DT District_NNP only_RB for_IN a_DT few_JJ miles_NNS ,_, but_CC of_IN great_JJ importance_NN ._.
Into_IN it_PRP ,_, along_IN the_DT channels_NNS of_IN the_DT Shedhi_NNP and_CC Vtrak_NNP ,_, the_DT whole_JJ local_JJ drainage_NN flows_NNS ._.
Previous_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.

Kaira_NNP District_NNP ._.
Population-871,589_NNP ._.

The_DT Anand_NNP Observation_NNP Camp_NNP was_VBD opened_VBN on_IN the_DT 24th_CD November_NNP 1897_CD ._.

At_IN first_JJ only_RB 'suspicious_JJ persons_NNS '_POS were_VBD detained_VBN ,_, but_CC as_IN the_DT result_NN was_VBD the_DT escape_NN of_IN one_CD or_CC two_CD cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN to_TO Ahmedabad_NNP and_CC Wadhwan_NNP ,_, the_DT rule_NN was_VBD changed_VBN :_: all_DT persons_NNS arriving_VBG from_IN an_DT infected_JJ place_NN being_VBG treated_VBN as_IN suspicious_JJ and_CC accordingly_RB detained_VBN ._.
Unfortunately_RB this_DT increased_VBN severity_NN in_IN the_DT rule_NN synchronised_VBD with_IN a_DT rush_NN of_IN panic-_JJ stricken_JJ people_NNS from_IN Bombay_NNP (_( December_NNP ]_NNP 897_CD )_) :_: and_CC the_DT accommodation_NN of_IN the_DT Camp_NNP was_VBD for_IN the_DT time_NN being_VBG quite_RB unequal_JJ to_TO the_DT demand_NN made_VBD upon_IN it_PRP ._.

The_DT site_NN selected_VBN for_IN the_DT Camp_NNP was_VBD an_DT admirable_JJ one_CD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD adjacent_JJ to_TO the_DT Railway_NNP Station_NNP ._.

The_DT site_NN was_VBD admirably_RB suited_VBN for_IN drainage_NN ,_, being_VBG on_IN high_JJ ground_NN cut_VBD off_RP into_IN sections_NNS by_IN inter-_JJ vening_VBG nlas_NNS ._.

The_DT Camp_NNP covered_VBD about_IN 60_CD acres_NNS of_IN ground_NN ._.
It_PRP consisted_VBD of_IN three_CD main_JJ divisions_NNS entirely_RB isolated_VBN from_IN each_DT other-_CD the_DT Detention_NNP Camp_NNP ,_, the_DT Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Hospital_NNP ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP had_VBD two_CD divisions_NNS carefully_RB isolated_VBN from_IN each_DT other_JJ ,_, one_CD for_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN fever_NN and_CC other_JJ diseases_NNS ,_, the_DT other_JJ for_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT accommodation_NN of_IN these_DT divisions_NNS was_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: Detention_NN Camp_NNP ,_, 5,000_CD :_: Segregation_NN Camp_NNP ,_, 400_CD :_: Hospital_NN ,_, 30_CD (_( plague_NN )_) -100_NN (_( other_JJ diseases_NNS )_) ._.
In_IN all_DT sections_NNS of_IN the_DT Camp_NNP separate_JJ huts_NNS were_VBD assigned_VBN to_TO Hindus_NNP ,_, Mahomedans_NNP ,_, Prsis_NNP ,_, and_CC low_JJ castes_NNS ._.

There_EX were_VBD three_CD good_JJ wells_NNS in_IN or_CC close_VB to_TO the_DT Camp_NNP premises_NNS ;_: but_CC as_IN there_EX were_VBD sporadic_JJ cases_NNS of_IN cholera_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD thought_VBN advisable_RB to_TO close_VB these_DT wells_NNS to_TO the_DT inmates_NNS ._.

The_DT wells_NNS were_VBD regularly_RB disinfected_VBN with_IN permanganate_NN of_IN potash_NN ._.
The_DT Camp_NNP was_VBD studded_VBN with_IN Banias_NNP '_POS shops_NNS ,_, where_WRB supplies_NNS of_IN all_DT kinds_NNS could_MD be_VB purchased_VBN at_IN prices_NNS duly_RB notified_VBN on_IN boards_NNS placed_VBN outside_IN the_DT shops_NNS ._.

No_DT more_JJR complaints_NNS were_VBD made_VBN about_IN the_DT quality_NN of_IN the_DT provisions_NNS sold_VBN ._.

?_.

Perhaps_RB the_DT most_RBS important_JJ arrangements_NNS in_IN connection_NN with_IN such_JJ Camps_NNP arc_VBP those_DT intended_VBN to_TO prevent_VB their_PRP$ evasion_NN ._.
The_DT commonest_JJS device_NN is_VBZ ,_, for_IN travellers_NNS to_TO alight_VB at_IN ,_, an_DT earlier_JJR station_NN and_CC continue_VB the_DT journey_NN on_IN foot_NN or_CC re-book_NN further_RB on_IN ._.
Against_IN this_DT ,_, effect-_JJ tive_JJ precautions_NNS were_VBD adopted_VBN ._.
Booking_VBG to_TO Navli_NNP was_VBD stopped_VBN ;_: a_DT subsidiary_NN Camp_NNP was_VBD opened_VBN at_IN Vsad_NNP ._.
South_NNP of_IN Vsad_NNP was_VBD the_DT Mahi_NNP River_NNP ,_, and_CC if_IN any_DT one_CD alight_NN to_TO the_DT south_NN of_IN Vsad_NNP ,_, his_PRP$ progress_NN northwards_NNS by_IN foot_NN or_CC rail_NN was_VBD barred_VBN by_IN the_DT Mahi_NNP Cordon_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD thus_RB impossible_JJ for_IN travellers_NNS to_TO give_VB the_DT slip_NN to_TO both_DT Vsad_NNP and_CC the_DT Anand_NNP Camps_NNP ._.
Another_DT common_JJ practice_NN was_VBD for_IN travellers_NNS from_IN infected_JJ localities_NNS to_TO alight_VB at_IN uninfected_JJ stations_NNS and_CC re-book_JJ thence_NN ._.
This_DT was_VBD prevented_VBN by_IN insisting_VBG on_IN a_DT ten_JJ days_NNS '_POS residence_NN pass_NN from_IN all_DT travellers_NNS from_IN uninfected_JJ localities_NNS ._.
A_DT special_JJ party_NN of_IN laborers_NNS known_VBN as_IN the_DT disinfecting_VBG party_NN was_VBD employed_VBN under_IN a_DT macadam_NN in_IN cleaning_VBG the_DT inside_NN of_IN the_DT huts_NNS of_IN all_DT refuse_NN ,_, etc_FW ._.
Once_RB a_DT week_NN the_DT straw_NN was_VBD removed_VBN and_CC sunned_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT floor_NN was_VBD sprayed_VBN with_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN per_IN chloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD the_DT duty_NN of_IN the_DT disinfecting_VBG party_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT Camp_NNP ,_, to_TO dismantle_VB the_DT hut_NN ,_, to_TO burn_VB the_DT walls_NNS and_CC roof_NN ,_, and_CC souse_VB the_DT floor_NN and_CC wooden_JJ frame-_JJ work_NN with_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN perchloride_NN ._.
The_DT hut_NN was_VBD not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO be_VB re-occupied_JJ for_IN a_DT week_NN ._.
The_DT efforts_NNS made_VBN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN by_IN private_JJ charity_NN ,_, to_TO provide_VB a_DT higher_JJR standard_NN of_IN comfort_NN for_IN the_DT inmates_NNS than_IN would_MD have_VB been_VBN justifiable_JJ at_IN public_JJ expense_NN ,_, deserve_VB grate-_JJ full_JJ mention_NN ._.
The_DT stream_NN of_IN charity_NN first_RB began_VBD to_TO flow_VB from_IN the_DT better_JJR class_NN of_IN inmates_NNS them-_JJ selves_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT early_JJ days_NNS of_IN the_DT Camp_NNP they_PRP raised_VBD subscriptions_NNS among_IN themselves_PRP to_TO the_DT amount_NN of_IN Rest_NNP ._.
1,000_CD ,_, which_WDT were_VBD devoted_VBN to_TO the_DT purchase_NN of_IN bedding_NN ,_, blankets_NNS ,_, cooking_VBG pots_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT poorer_NN people_NNS ._.
With_IN the_DT rise_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN detentions_NNS the_DT KAIRA_NNP DISTRICT_NNP ._. ]_NN
163_CD flow_NN of_IN charity_NN began_VBD to_TO quicken_VB ._.
Generous_JJ persons_NNS from_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC Ahmedabad_NNP for-_NN warded_VBD consignments_NNS of_IN bedding_NN ,_, blankets_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN and_CC the_DT needy_NN ;_: and_CC a_DT munificent_JJ donation_NN of_IN over_IN Rs_NNP ._.

By_IN permission_NN of_IN the_DT Postmaster-General_NNP ,_, a_DT Branch_NNP Post_NNP and_CC Telegraph_NNP Office_NNP was_VBD opened_VBN inside_IN the_DT Camp_NNP ._.

The_DT strength_NN of_IN the_DT Police_NNP force_NN doing_VBG duty_NN in_IN the_DT Camp_NNP varied_VBD from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN ._.

The_DT Police_NNP force_NN was_VBD employed_VBN as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -A_VB small_JJ party_NN was_VBD detailed_VBN to_TO escort_VB the_DT passengers_NNS from_IN the_DT trains_NNS and_CC keep_VB order_NN in_IN the_DT disinfection_NN yard_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT rest_NN were_VBD employed_VBN in_IN forming_VBG a_DT cordon_NN of_IN sentries_NNS round_VBP the_DT Camp_NNP ._.

The_DT following_JJ general_JJ remarks_NNS by_IN Mr._NNP Delouse_NNP are_VBP interesting_VBG :_: -_: ``_`` I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB it_PRP can_MD be_VB disputed_VBN that_IN the_DT Camp_NNP has_VBZ amply_RB justified_VBN its_PRP$ existence_NN ._.

Mhi_NNP Cordon_NNP ._.
The_DT Mhi_NNP River_NNP ,_, running_VBG from_IN east_NN to_TO west_VB ,_, effectively_RB divides_VBZ the_DT Kaira_NNP District_NNP from_IN Reva_NNP Kantha_NNP ,_, Panch_NNP Mahals_NNP ,_, Baroda_NNP Territory_NNP and_CC Broach_NNP ._.
When_WRB plague_NN established_VBD itself_PRP in_IN Baroda_NNP Territory_NNP ,_, advantage_NN was_VBD taken_VBN of_IN the_DT natural_JJ defence_NN afforded_VBN by_IN the_DT river_NN to_TO prevent_VB infection_NN from_IN crossing_VBG it_PRP and_CC invading_VBG Kaira_NNP ,_, as_IN in_IN that_DT case_NN the_DT difficulty_NN of_IN stopping_VBG its_PRP$ spread_NN to_TO Ahmedabad_NNP ,_, and_CC thence_NN to_TO Northern_NNP India_NNP ,_, would_MD be_VB greatly_RB increased_VBN ._.

The_DT arrangements_NNS made_VBN were_VBD briefly_JJ as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) Nakas_NNP were_VBD posted_VBN at_IN every_DT ford_NN and_CC crossing_NN ,_, and_CC all_PDT the_DT ferries_NNS were_VBD stopped_VBN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Supervisors_NNPS were_VBD put_VBN in_IN charge_NN of_IN every_DT three_CD or_CC four_CD Nakas_NNP ,_, with_IN orders_NNS to_TO visit_VB them_PRP constantly_RB by_IN day_NN and_CC night_NN ._.

VII_NNP The_DT Cordon_NNP was_VBD opened_VBN on_IN the_DT 1st_CD January_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ working_NN entrusted_VBN to_TO Rao_NNP Bahadur_NNP Bhimbhai_NNP Kirparam_NNP ,_, Talukdari_NNP Settlement_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, who_WP brought_VBD with_IN him_PRP from_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ establishment_NN a_DT band_NN of_IN very_RB active_JJ Bandar-karkuns_NNP ._.

The_DT western_JJ group_NN ,_, the_DT larger_JJR of_IN the_DT two_CD ,_, comprises_VBZ the_DT sub-divisions_NNS of_IN Godhra_NNP in_IN the_DT north_NN ,_, and_CC Kloe_NNP ,_, including_VBG the_DT petty_JJ division_NN of_IN Hlol_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT south_NN ._.

Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
In_IN healthiness_PDT the_DT climate_NN varies_VBZ greatly_RB ._.
Godhra_NNP ,_, surrounded_VBN by_IN large_JJ areas_NNS of_IN forest_NN and_CC waste_NN ,_, though_IN for_IN residents_NNS fairly_RB healthy_JJ ,_, is_VBZ rather_RB a_DT trying_VBG climate_NN for_IN strangers_NNS ._.
The_DT hot_JJ and_CC rainy_JJ seasons_NNS weaken_VBP Europeans_NNPS ,_, and_CC the_DT cutting_VBG malarious_JJ winds_NNS and_CC hot_JJ sun_NN of_IN the_DT cold_JJ months_NNS are_VBP ,_, to_TO natives_NNS from_IN other_JJ Districts_NNS ,_, apt_NN to_TO bring_VB on_IN fevers_NNS of_IN a_DT dangerous_JJ type_NN ._.

The_DT District_NNP is_VBZ well_RB supplied_VBN with_IN water_NN from_IN ponds_NNS and_CC streams_NNS ._.

*_JJ Protective_NNP measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Panch_JJ Mahals_NNP District_NNP ._.

The_DT precautionary_JJ measures_NNS enforced_VBN were_VBD the_DT prevention_NN ,_, detention_NN and_CC observation_NN of_IN all_DT arrivals_NNS from_IN infected_JJ parts_NNS ;_: and_CC the_DT patrolling_NN of_IN the_DT Baroda_NNP frontier_NN (_( extending_VBG for_IN some_DT 70_CD miles_NNS )_) by_IN Police_NNP ,_, under_IN the_DT supervision_NN of_IN the_DT Mmlatdr_NNP of_IN Klol_NNP ._.
Doubtless_NNP these_DT measures_NNS ,_, energetically_RB carried_VBN out_RP as_IN they_PRP were_VBD ,_, were_VBD not_RB without_IN their_PRP$ effect_NN ._.

cause_NN of_IN the_DT long_JJ security_NN of_IN the_DT Panch_NNP Mhals_NNP ._.

First_RB Epidemic_NNP (_( October_NNP 1898-April_JJ 1899_CD )_) .-The_NN details_NNS of_IN the_DT first_JJ two_CD cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT Panch_NN Mahals_NNS are_VBP as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) A_DT Hindu_NNP Wnia_NNP died_VBD on_IN the_DT 11th_CD of_IN September_NNP 1898_CD with_IN suspicious_JJ symptoms_NNS ._.

Population-4,464_NNP ._.

The_DT Panch_NNP Mahls_NNP District_NNP ._.

2,845_CD )_) was_VBD stricken_VBN early_RB in_IN December_NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT people_NNS rapidly_RB vacated_VBD it_PRP ,_, and_CC but_CC few_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD returned_VBN ._.

Boundaries_NNS ._.
Situated_VBN on_IN the_DT shore_NN of_IN the_DT Arabian_NNP Sea_NNP ,_, where_WRB its_PRP$ waters_NNS begin_VBP to_TO narrow_VB into_IN the_DT Gulf_NNP of_IN Cambay_NNP ,_, the_DT District_NNP of_IN Surat_NNP stretches_NNS for_IN about_RB 80_CD miles_NNS from_IN the_DT Damanganga_NNP river_NN northwards_NNS to_TO the_DT Kim_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ bounded_VBN roughly_RB as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -On_VB the_DT north_NN by_IN the_DT District_NNP of_IN Broach_NNP and_CC the_DT Baroda_NNP State_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT east_NN by_IN the_DT Gaekwar_NNP 's_POS territory_NN and_CC the_DT Dharampor_NNP State_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT south_NN by_IN the_DT Thna_NNP District_NNP and_CC Daman_NNP ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN by_IN the_DT Arabian_NNP Sea_NNP ._.
Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
The_DT District_NNP forms_NNS an_DT alluvial_JJ plain_NN stretching_VBG from_IN north_JJ to_TO south_VB for_IN about_RB eighty_JJ miles_NNS ,_, with_IN a_DT gradual_JJ fall_NN sloping_VBG from_IN the_DT high_JJ lands_NNS in_IN the_DT east_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP westwards_NNS to_TO the_DT shores_NNS of_IN the_DT Arabian_NNP Sea_NNP ._.
As_IN regards_NNS climate_NN ,_, the_DT District_NNP of_IN Surat_NNP consists_VBZ of_IN two_CD parts-one_NN ,_, of_IN equable_JJ tem-_JJ perature_NN ,_, under_IN the_DT influence_NN of_IN the_DT sea-breeze_NN ;_: the_DT other_JJ ,_, beyond_IN this_DT influence_NN ,_, subject_JJ to_TO changes_NNS in_IN heat_NN and_CC cold_JJ almost_RB as_RB great_JJ as_IN in_IN the_DT more_JJR northerly_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP ._.
Except_IN in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN rivers_NNS ,_, which_WDT ,_, acting_VBG as_IN channels_NNS ,_, carry_VBP the_DT sea-breeze_NN further_JJ inland_NN ,_, its_PRP$ influence_NN does_VBZ not_RB ,_, as_IN a_DT general_JJ rule_NN ,_, extend_VBP for_IN more_JJR than_IN from_IN eight_CD to_TO ten_VB miles_NNS from_IN the_DT coast_NN ._.
Another_DT peculiarity_NN which_WDT helps_VBZ to_TO make_VB the_DT coast_NN Districts_VBZ more_RBR healthy_JJ than_IN the_DT inland_NN parts_NNS ,_, is_VBZ their_PRP$ much_JJ lighter_JJR rainfall_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT inland_NN parts_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, Prd_NNP in_IN the_DT south_NN and_CC Mndvi_NNP in_IN the_DT north-east_NN are_VBP the_DT most_RBS unhealthy_JJ ._.
The_DT soils_NNS of_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, all_DT more_RBR or_CC less_RBR alluvial_JJ in_IN character_NN ,_, belong_NN to_TO three_CD chief_JJ classes-the_JJ black_JJ ;_: the_DT light_JJ soil_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT besar_NN ,_, a_DT soil_NN uniting_VBG the_DT characteristics_NNS of_IN the_DT black_JJ and_CC light_JJ varieties_NNS ._.
The_DT country_NN is_VBZ abundantly_RB supplied_VBN with_IN ponds_NNS ,_, wells_NNS ,_, and_CC springs_NNS of_IN water_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Dang_NNP forests_NNS ,_, by_IN far_RB the_DT most_RBS unhealthy_JJ locality_NN ,_, remittent_JJ fever_NN of_IN a_DT very_RB severe_JJ and_CC fatal_JJ type_NN prevails_VBZ up_RP to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN March_NNP or_CC April_NNP ._.
Previous_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.
The_DT first_JJ outbreak_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Surat_NNP was_VBD in_IN 1684_CD ,_, and_CC for_IN six_CD years_NNS it_PRP raged_VBD without_IN interruption_NN ._.
But_CC though_IN during_IN this_DT time_NN the_DT city_NN was_VBD never_RB entirely_RB free_JJ from_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, at_IN different_JJ seasons_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN the_DT attacks_NNS varied_VBN in_IN intensity_NN ._.
Lulling_VBG during_IN the_DT rainy_JJ months_NNS (_( June_NNP to_TO September_NNP )_) ,_, the_DT epidemic_JJ broke_VBD out_RP with_IN fresh_JJ fierceness_NN in_IN October_NNP ,_, and_CC again_RB abating_VBG during_IN the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT cold_JJ and_CC hot_JJ seasons_NNS raged_VBN with_IN renewed_JJ fury_NN towards_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN May_NNP ._.
The_DT death-rate_NN at_IN times_NNS ``_`` on_IN a_DT very_RB modest_JJ calculation_NN ''_'' amounted_VBD to_TO 300_CD a_DT day_NN ._.

The_DT first_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN occurred_VBD in_IN a_DT Mahomedan_NNP boy_NN ,_, about_IN 15_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD intercepted_VBN at_IN the_DT railway_NN station_NN by_IN the_DT Medical_NNP In-_NNP spector_NN and_CC brought_VBD to_TO the_DT Contagious_NNP Diseases_NNP Ward_NNP of_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Hospital_NNP on_IN the_DT 8th_CD December_NNP 1896_CD ._.

The_DT boy_NN had_VBD contracted_VBN the_DT disease_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
This_DT was_VBD the_DT first_JJ reported_VBD imported_JJ case_NN ._.
The_DT last_JJ case_NN was_VBD indigenous_JJ ,_, and_CC occurred_VBD on_IN the_DT 11th_CD May_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Between_IN the_DT 8th_CD December_NNP 1896_CD and_CC 11th_CD May_NNP 1897_CD (_( a_DT period_NN of_IN about_IN five_CD months_NNS )_) ,_, in_IN all_DT 114_CD cases_NNS were_VBD reported_VBN ,_, exclusive_JJ of_IN 13_CD under_IN observation_NN ,_, and_CC subsequently_RB discharged_VBN cured_VBN ._.

On_IN the_DT 1st_CD November_NNP 1897_CD ,_, Mr._NNP A._NNP Wingate_NNP ,_, I.C.S._NNP ,_, Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, visited_VBD Surat_NNP and_CC approved_VBD of_IN what_WP had_VBD been_VBN done_VBN ,_, and_CC suggested_VBD the_DT following_JJ additional_JJ measures_NNS which_WDT the_DT Collector_NNP promptly_RB put_VBD into_IN execution_NN :_: (_( 1_CD )_) The_DT Ward_NNP System_NNP ;_: (_( 2_CD )_) Segregation_NN Camps_NNP for_IN Contacts_NNP ;_: (_( 3_CD )_) Extension_NN of_IN Hospital_NNP accommodation_NN ._.

The_DT modus_NN operandi_NN was_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -The_JJ City_NNP was_VBD divided_VBN into_IN 9_CD wards_NNS ._.

In_IN December_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP made_VBD a_DT permanent_JJ improvement_NN in_IN the_DT sanitation_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP by_IN having_VBG 7,000_CD pit_JJ privies_NNS filled_VBN in_IN ._.

179_CD (_( 2_CD )_) In_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN December_NNP a_DT rumour_NN was_VBD spread_VBN in_IN the_DT City_NNP to_TO the_DT effect_NN that_IN the_DT Collector_NNP had_VBD sent_VBN for_IN European_JJ Troops_NNP from_IN Deesa_NNP to_TO oppress_VB the_DT inhabitants_NNS ._.
This_DT rumour_NN ,_, absurd_JJ and_CC groundless_JJ though_IN it_PRP was_VBD ,_, nevertheless_RB ,_, produced_VBD a_DT panic_NN in_IN the_DT City_NNP ;_: and_CC it_PRP was_VBD necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT Collector_NNP to_TO order_NN the_DT printing_NN and_CC distribution_NN of_IN a_DT public_JJ proclamation_NN throughout_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, stating_VBG that_IN no_DT European_NNP Troops_NNP had_VBD been_VBN ,_, or_CC would_MD be_VB ,_, sent_NN for_IN ,_, and_CC that_IN no_DT locality_NN would_MD be_VB evacuated_VBN without_IN very_RB good_JJ reason_NN ._.

In_IN January_NNP 1898_CD ,_, two_CD new_JJ causes_NNS for_IN anxiety_NN arose_NN ._.

This_DT ,_, in_IN itself_PRP a_DT serious_JJ matter_NN ,_, had_VBD yet_RB more_RBR serious_JJ results_NNS ._.

S._NNP C._NNP ,_, two_CD British_JJ Officers_NNS ,_, who_WP appeared_VBD on_IN the_DT scene_NN on_IN 27th_CD December_NNP 1897_CD ._.

From_IN the_DT 28th_CD December_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT twelve_NN gates_NNS of_IN the_DT City_NNP were_VBD barred_VBN and_CC guarded_VBN by_IN the_DT Police_NNP ,_, egress_NN and_CC ingress_NN between_IN 8_CD P.M._NNP and_CC 6_CD A.M._NNP being_VBG possible_JJ only_RB on_IN production_NN of_IN a_DT special_JJ Pass_NNP ._.
The_DT second_JJ cause_NN of_IN anxiety_NN was_VBD a_DT sudden_JJ influx_NN of_IN refugees_NNS from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, where_WRB plague_NN was_VBD raging_VBG ._.
As_IN Surat_NNP had_VBD previously_RB derived_VBN infection_NN from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, the_DT following_JJ measures_NNS were_VBD enforced_VBN to_TO prevent_VB its_PRP$ happening_VBG again_RB :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) Observation_NN Camps_NNP were_VBD established_VBN at_IN Surat_NNP and_CC Bulsr_NNP on_IN the_DT 10th_CD January_NNP 1898_CD ;_: others_NNS were_VBD gradually_RB constructed_VBN and_CC opened_VBN till_NN ,_, on_IN 22nd_CD February_NNP ,_, Vapi_NNP ,_, Udwda_NNP ,_, Prdi_NNP ,_, Amlsad_NNP ,_, and_CC Kim_NNP were_VBD all_DT similarly_RB protected_VBN ._.

(_( 6_CD )_) An_DT inoculation_NN centre_NN was_VBD established_VBN in_IN the_DT heart_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, and_CC lymph_RB procured_VBN from_IN Bombay_NNP ;_: and_CC Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP Manill_NNP Desi_NNP ,_, a_DT popular_JJ and_CC experienced_VBD Hindu_NNP official_NN ,_, of_IN good_JJ caste_NN ,_, was_VBD detailed_VBN to_TO superintend_VB this_DT work_NN ._.

The_DT plague_NN gradually_RB decreased_VBD up_RB to_TO the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 11th_CD February_NNP 1898_CD ,_, when_WRB the_DT total_JJ mortality_NN was_VBD only_RB 114_CD ,_, or_CC some_DT 30_CD above_IN the_DT probable_JJ average_NN ._.
Then_RB came_VBD a_DT misfortune_NN ._.

VII_NNP ._.
``_`` The_DT end_NN seemed_VBD within_IN sight_NN when_WRB unexpectedly_RB a_DT cyclonic_JJ downfall_NN of_IN rain-most_JJ unusual_JJ at_IN the_DT season-occurred_JJ throughout_IN the_DT District_NNP on_IN the_DT 9th_CD February_NNP 1898_CD ._.
The_DT immediate_JJ and_CC necessary_JJ result_NN was_VBD the_DT return_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT persons_NNS camped_VBD outside_IN the_DT City_NNP and_CC the_DT villages_NNS ,_, to_TO their_PRP$ houses_NNS ._.
The_DT ill-effects_NNS of_IN this_DT move_NN ,_, ''_'' he_PRP continues_VBZ ,_, ``_`` were_VBD shown_VBN in_IN the_DT increased_JJ mortality_NN of_IN the_DT next_JJ and_CC following_JJ weeks_NNS ._. ''_''
Nor_CC did_VBD the_DT mortality_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP sink_NN to_TO the_DT level_NN it_PRP had_VBD reached_VBN just_RB before_IN the_DT cyclone_NN till_VBD the_DT 18th_CD March_NNP 1898-a_JJ period_NN of_IN five_CD weeks_NNS ._.

Third_JJ Epidemic_NNP (_( January_NNP 1899-June_JJ 1899_CD )_) .-Yet_VBP a_DT third_JJ epidemic_JJ broke_VBD out_RP in_IN the_DT current_JJ year_NN ._.

Population-4,287_NNP ._.
The_DT course_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Dumas_NNP in_IN the_DT Sachin_NNP State_NNP may_MD be_VB appropriately_RB noticed_VBN here_RB ._.
As_IN a_DT precautionary_JJ measure_NN ,_, early_RB in_IN the_DT progress_NN of_IN the_DT Surat_NNP epidemic_NN ,_, a_DT check_NN was_VBD placed_VBN on_IN the_DT road_NN leading_VBG to_TO Dumas_NNP and_CC Bhimpur_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT use_NN of_IN all_DT other_JJ roads_NNS and_CC bye-paths_JJ forbidden_NN ._.

This_DT was_VBD treated_VBN as_IN an_DT object-lesson_NN for_IN the_DT neighbouring_JJ village_NN of_IN Bhimpur_NNP ,_, the_DT villagers_NNS of_IN which_WDT did_VBD not_RB afterwards_VB proceed_NN into_IN Surat_NNP ,_, but_CC stopped_VBD at_IN the_DT border_NN and_CC there_RB transferred_VBN their_PRP$ fish_JJ to_TO Surat_NNP fish-sellers_NNS ._.

The_DT first_JJ case_NN was_VBD detected_VBN on_IN the_DT 1st_CD January_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT last_JJ on_IN the_DT 21st_CD April_NNP :_: the_DT total_JJ number_NN between_IN these_DT dates_NNS being_VBG 160_CD ._.

On_IN the_DT very_RB day_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT first_JJ case_NN was_VBD discovered_VBN ,_, the_DT affected_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN was_VBD evacuated_VBN ,_, a_DT Hospital_NN was_VBD established_VBN ,_, infected_VBN houses_NNS cleaned_VBD ,_, ventilated_VBN and_CC disinfected_VBN with_IN their_PRP$ contents_NNS which_WDT were_VBD exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT sun_NN ._.

The_DT Koli_NNP and_CC Macchhi_NNP houses_NNS were_VBD distributed_VBN among_IN the_DT village_NN officers_NNS and_CC certain_JJ leading_VBG men_NNS who_WP volunteered_VBD for_IN the_DT work_NN ._.

From_IN the_DT 27th_CD January_NNP ,_, 1898_CD ,_, the_DT evacuation_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ village_NN was_VBD commenced_VBN ._.
On_IN the_DT 8th_CD and_CC 9th_CD February_NNP however_RB ,_, there_EX were_VBD heavy_JJ showers_NNS of_IN rain_NN and_CC the_DT people_NNS got_VBD back_RB into_IN the_DT village_NN ._.
After_IN a_DT week_NN they_PRP were_VBD re-evicted_VBN as_RB soon_RB as_IN a_DT case_NN occurred_VBD in_IN a_DT 'falia_NN ,_, '_'' and_CC shortly_RB the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT fishermen_NNS and_CC Kolis_NNP were_VBD turned_VBN out_RP ._.
Mr._NNP P._NNP J._NNP Mead_NNP ,_, I.C.S._NNP ,_, the_DT Administrator_NNP of_IN the_DT Sachin_NNP State_NNP ,_, makes_VBZ the_DT following_JJ interesting_JJ remarks_NNS on_IN the_DT method_NN of_IN evacuation_NN and_CC segregation_NN of_IN contacts_NNS :_: -_: ``_`` The_DT population_NN were_VBD turned_VBN out_RP in_IN long_JJ lines_NNS arranged_VBN in_IN blocks_NNS ._.
Every_DT block_NN was_VBD supervised_VBN by_IN one_CD man_NN ._.
For_IN this_DT purpose_NN I_PRP employed_VBD the_DT Talti_NNP and_CC the_DT various_JJ school_NN mas-_JJ ters_NNS ,_, and_CC later_RB on_IN the_DT Patel_NNP for_IN the_DT Kunbis_NNP and_CC Prsis_NNP ._.
The_DT Patel_NNP had_VBD plenty_NN of_IN general_JJ work_NN ,_, and_CC did_VBD it_PRP splendidly_RB ._.
My_PRP$ supervisors_NNS were_VBD instructed_VBN to_TO see_VB every_DT single_JJ person_NN and_CC feel_VB the_DT heat_NN of_IN their_PRP$ bodies_NNS with_IN the_DT hand_NN ._.
They_PRP reported_VBD to_TO me_PRP or_CC to_TO the_DT Doctor_NNP ._.
Not_RB a_DT single_JJ case_NN escaped_VBD detection_NN ,_, and_CC very_RB few_JJ were_VBD not_RB early_RB reported_VBN on_IN ._.

``_`` Before_IN the_DT village_NN was_VBD evacuated_VBN ,_, segregation_NN sheds_NNS had_VBD been_VBN erected_VBN near_IN the_DT Hospi-_NNP tal_NN ._.
These_DT were_VBD never_RB popular_JJ ._.

VII_NNP ._.
left_VBN to_TO the_DT people_NNS as_IN in_IN other_JJ small_JJ villages_NNS ,_, but_CC as_IN the_DT plague_NN mounted_VBD ,_, I_PRP arranged_VBD sheds_NNS near_IN the_DT different_JJ blocks_NNS of_IN mndvas_NN (_( called_VBN Ward_NNP A_NNP ,_, B_NNP ,_, C_NNP ,_, &_CC c._NN )_) ,_, and_CC there_RB had_VBD contacts_NNS segregated_VBN in_IN the_DT sight_NN of_IN all_DT ,_, but_CC in_IN rigid_JJ seclusion_NN enforced_VBN by_IN a_DT Police_NNP Guard_NNP ._.

The_DT characteristics_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN in_IN this_DT District_NNP have_VBP been_VBN persistent_JJ duration_NN and_CC small_JJ virulence_NN :_: the_DT largest_JJS numbers_NNS for_IN any_DT one_CD week_NN being_VBG 80_CD cases-69_JJ deaths_NNS (_( week_NN ending_VBG 25th_CD August_NNP 1899_CD )_) ,_, and_CC the_DT total_JJ figures_NNS for_IN the_DT whole_JJ year_NN up_RB to_TO 15th_CD September_NNP 1899_CD ,_, returned_VBN from_IN 33_CD places_NNS ,_, 1,179_CD cases-8C6_JJ deaths_NNS ._.

Boundaries_NNS ._.
The_DT Thna_NNP District_NNP is_VBZ bounded_VBN roughly_RB as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -On_VB the_DT north_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT Portuguese_NNP territory_NN of_IN Damaun_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Klu_NNP and_CC Damanganga_NNP rivers_NNS ;_: on_IN the_DT east_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT Nsik_NNP and_CC Ahmednagar_NNP Districts_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT south-east_NN and_CC south_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT Kolba_NNP and_CC Poona_NNP Districts_NNP ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT Arabian_NNP Sea_NNP ._.
Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
The_DT climate_NN ,_, like_IN the_DT climate_NN of_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT Konkan_NNP ,_, is_VBZ exceedingly_RB moist_JJ for_IN fully_RB half_PDT the_DT year_NN ,_, the_DT rainfall_NN being_VBG very_RB great_JJ and_CC often_RB beginning_VBG in_IN May_NNP ._.
The_DT low_JJ level_NN of_IN the_DT plains_NNS of_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, its_PRP$ heavy_JJ rainfall_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT large_JJ area_NN of_IN salt_NN marsh_NN ,_, forests_NNS ,_, and_CC rice-fields_NNS ,_, make_VBP the_DT climate_NN hot_JJ ,_, damp_JJ ,_, and_CC feverish_JJ ._.
The_DT most_RBS feverish_JJ months_NNS are_VBP October_NNP ,_, November_NNP ,_, and_CC December_NNP ,_, when_WRB ,_, after_IN the_DT south-_JJ west_NN monsoon_NN is_VBZ over_IN and_CC under_IN a_DT powerful_JJ sun_NN ,_, decaying_VBG vegetable_JJ matter_NN produces_VBZ a_DT malarial_NN atmosphere_NN ._.
Hot_NNP springs_NNS are_VBP found_VBN in_IN four_CD sub-divisions_NNS ,_, -Mhim_NNP ,_, Vada_NNP ,_, Bhiwndi_NNP ._.
and_CC Bassein_NNP ._.
The_DT water_NN of_IN the_DT spring_NN which_WDT rises_VBZ in_IN the_DT bed_NN of_IN the_DT Surya_NNP river_NN ,_, and_CC which_WDT is_VBZ moderately_RB hot_JJ and_CC saltish_JJ ,_, smells_NNS like_IN rotten_JJ mud_NN ._.
The_DT main_JJ division_NN of_IN soils_NNS is_VBZ into_IN sweet_JJ and_CC salt_NN ._.
Sweet_NNP land_NN is_VBZ either_DT black_JJ or_CC red_JJ ;_: the_DT black_JJ called_VBD shet_NN ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ the_DT plain_JJ rice-fields_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT red_JJ called_VBD ml_NN rarkas_NN ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ the_DT fiat_JJ tops_NNS and_CC slopes_NNS of_IN the_DT trap_NN hills_NNS ,_, on_IN which_WDT nchni_NN ,_, vari_NN ,_, and_CC other_JJ coarse_JJ hill-grains_NNS are_VBP grown_VBN ._.
The_DT low_JJ fields_NNS are_VBP the_DT most_RBS productive_JJ ,_, as_IN the_DT rain-water_NN leaves_VBZ a_DT rich_JJ deposit_NN ._.
Previous_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.
In_IN 1702_CD the_DT plague_NN broke_VBD out_RP in_IN the_DT Island_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC carried_VBD off_IN some_DT hundreds_NNS of_IN the_DT natives_NNS and_CC reduced_VBD the_DT number_NN of_IN Europeans_NNPS to_TO the_DT small_JJ num-_JJ ber_NN of_IN 76_CD ;_: but_CC there_EX is_VBZ no_DT authentic_JJ record_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT Thna_NNP District_NNP proper_VBZ previous_JJ to_TO 1896_CD ._.
*_JJ Thna_NNP District_NNP ._.
Population-_JJ 918,967_CD ._.
The_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP forms_NNS ,_, as_IN it_PRP were_VBD ,_, the_DT starting_NN point_NN for_IN the_DT Thna_NNP District_NNP ,_, which_WDT ,_, while_IN in_IN ordinary_JJ times_NNS affording_VBG innumerable_JJ advan-_JJ tages_NNS to_TO the_DT population_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, in_IN time_NN of_IN plague_NN becomes_VBZ a_DT steady_JJ and_CC constant_JJ focus_NN for_IN the_DT dissemination_NN of_IN infection_NN ._.

The_DT town_NN of_IN Bhiwndi_NNP ,_, which_WDT ,_, after_IN passing_VBG through_IN a_DT very_RB virulent_JJ outbreak_NN in_IN 1897_CD ,_, managed_VBD ,_, except_IN for_IN occasional_JJ sporadic_JJ cases_NNS ,_, to_TO maintain_VB a_DT tolerably_JJ clean_JJ bill_NN of_IN health_NN from_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN May_NNP 1897_CD ,_, was_VBD attacked_VBN for_IN the_DT second_JJ time_NN in_IN the_DT weekending_VBG 15th_CD April_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC went_VBD through_IN an_DT exceptionally_RB severe_JJ epidemic_NN ._.

Boundaries_NNS ._.
The_DT boundaries_NNS of_IN the_DT Ahmednagar_NNP District_NNP are_VBP roughly_RB as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -north-west_JJS and_CC north_JJ ,_, Nsik_NNP ;_: north-east_JJ ,_, east_JJ ,_, and_CC south-east_NN ,_, Nizam_NNP 's_POS territory_NN ;_: south_CC ,_, Sholpur_NNP ;_: south-west_JJS ,_, Poona_NNP :_: west_NN ,_, Thna_NNP ._.
Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
The_DT climate_NN is_VBZ on_IN the_DT whole_JJ good_NN ._.
From_IN November_NNP to_TO February_NNP the_DT air_NN is_VBZ dry_JJ and_CC invigorating_NN ._.
From_IN February_NNP to_TO May_NNP a_DT hot_JJ dry_JJ wind_NN blows_NNS ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ followed_VBN by_IN sultry_NN weather_NN ,_, lasting_VBG till_IN the_DT bursting_NN of_IN the_DT monsoon_NN towards_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN June_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT climate_NN again_RB becomes_VBZ temperate_NN and_CC pleasant_NN ._.
Partly_RB owing_VBG to_TO the_DT absence_NN of_IN trees_NNS ,_, partly_RB to_TO the_DT ruined_JJ condition_NN of_IN so_RB many_JJ village_NN walls_NNS ,_, partly_RB also_RB to_TO the_DT geological_JJ conformation_NN of_IN the_DT hills_NNS ,_, the_DT general_JJ aspect_NN of_IN the_DT open_JJ country_NN of_IN Ahmednagar_NNP is_VBZ desolate_JJ ._.
The_DT soil_NN is_VBZ of_IN three_CD sorts_NNS -black_RB ,_, red_JJ ,_, and_CC grey_NN ._.
The_DT whole_JJ District_NNP forms_NNS part_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ ``_`` trap_NN ''_'' region_NN of_IN the_DT Deccan_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ drained_VBN by_IN two_CD chief_JJ rivers-the_JJ Godvari_NNP and_CC the_DT Bhima_NNP ,_, draining_VBG the_DT north_NN and_CC south_JJ respectively-and_NN is_VBZ well_RB watered_VBN by_IN these_DT and_CC numerous_JJ tributaries_NNS ._.

*_JJ Protective_NNP measures_NNS in_IN the_DT Ahmednagar_NNP District_NNP ._.
September_NNP 1896_CD ._.
First_RB Epidemic_NNP (_( September_NNP 1897-March_CD ,_, 1898_CD )_) .-Precautions_NNS against_IN the_DT plague_NN began_VBD in_IN Ahmednagar_NNP as_RB early_RB as_IN September_NNP 1896_CD ,_, and_CC before_IN Mr._NNP F._NNP L._NNP Charles_NNP ,_, I._NNP C._NNP S._NNP ,_, gave_VBD over_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP in_IN March_NNP 1897_CD ,_, suitable_JJ local_JJ regulations_NNS had_VBD been_VBN framed_VBN ,_, a_DT Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP had_VBD been_VBN arranged_VBN ,_, and_CC an_DT excellent_JJ Observation_NN Camp_NNP had_VBD been_VBN established_VBN at_IN the_DT Railway_NNP Station_NNP ._.
Forty-eight_NNP imported_JJ cases_NNS (_( 32_CD fatal_NN )_) occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT Ahmednagar_NNP District_NNP from_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN December_NNP 1896_CD to_TO the_DT beginning_NN of_IN April_NNP 1897_CD ,_, from_IN which_WDT time_NN up_RP to_TO August_NNP 1897_CD ,_, plague_NN had_VBD not_RB re-appeared_JJ ;_: nor_CC ,_, at_IN first_JJ ,_, did_VBD the_DT adjacent_JJ Districts_NNP constitute_NN a_DT menace_NN to_TO its_PRP$ safety_NN ._.
With_IN the_DT outbreak_NN at_IN Sirur_NNP (_( July_NNP 1897_CD )_) this_DT immunity_NN ceased_VBD to_TO exist_VB ,_, and_CC imported_VBN cases_NNS began_VBD to_TO occur_VB with_IN increasing_VBG frequency_NN at_IN Hingani_NNP ,_, Rahuri_NNP ,_, Sangam-_NNP uer_NN ,_, Chichondi_NNP ,_, and_CC Nagar_NNP Town-the_NNP first_RB imported_VBD case_NN occurring_VBG at_IN Hingani_NNP on_IN the_DT 3rd_CD August_NNP 1897_CD ,_, and_CC from_IN this_DT date_NN to_TO the_DT 17th_CD of_IN September_NNP 1897_CD ,_, 24_CD imported_VBN cases_NNS (_( 18_CD fatal_NN )_) occurred_VBD in_IN all_DT ._.
Ahmednagar_NNP Town_NNP ._.
Population-36,031_NNP ._.
So_RB far_RB there_EX had_VBD been_VBN no_DT case_NN of_IN indigenous_JJ plague_NN in_IN either_DT Town_NNP or_CC District_NNP ,_, and_CC every_DT effort_NN was_VBD put_VBN forth_RB to_TO prevent_VB its_PRP$ obtaining_VBG a_DT footing_NN ._.
With_IN this_DT object_JJ representations_NNS were_VBD made_VBN to_TO the_DT Sirur_NNP authorities_NNS ;_: regis-_JJ tration_NN and_CC medical_JJ examination_NN of_IN all_DT arrivals_NNS (_( whether_IN by_IN road_NN or_CC rail_NN )_) from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, Kirkee_NNP ,_, Sirur_NNP ,_, and_CC Igatpuri_NNP was_VBD instituted_VBN ;_: the_DT cleansing_NN and_CC better_JJR sanitation_NN of_IN Nagar_NNP Town_NNP was_VBD taken_VBN in_IN hand_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT preparation_NN of_IN the_DT Siddhi_NNP Bgh_NNP Hospital_NNP was_VBD pushed_VBN forward_RB ._.

At_IN length_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 24th_CD September_NNP 1897_CD ,_, indigenous_JJ plague_NN appeared_VBD ._.
The_DT first_JJ case_NN reported_VBN occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT compound_NN of_IN a_DT Roman_NNP Catholic_NNP priest_JJS in_IN Cantonments_NNS ._.
But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ at_IN least_JJS doubtful_JJ if_IN this_DT was_VBD in_IN reality_NN the_DT first_JJ indigenous_JJ case_NN ,_, for_IN previous_JJ to_TO this_DT a_DT death_NN had_VBD been_VBN concealed_VBN and_CC the_DT corpse_NN had_VBD been_VBN secretly_RB conveyed_VBN for_IN disposal_NN to_TO Shaha-_NNP pur-a_JJ hamlet_NN five_CD miles_NNS north-east_RB of_IN Nagar_NNP ._.

On_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN another_DT case_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN of_IN October_NNP ,_, the_DT evacuation_NN of_IN the_DT Sadar_NNP Bazr_NNP in_IN Cantonments_NNP was_VBD determined_VBN on_IN ,_, and_CC carried_VBD out_RP with_IN great_JJ promptness_NN -only_RB 24_CD hours_NNS '_POS notice_NN being_VBG given_VBN ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT evacuation_NN of_IN the_DT Sadar_NNP Bazr_NNP and_CC the_DT rise_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Poona_NNP ,_, fur-_JJ ther_NN steps_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN for_IN the_DT protection_NN of_IN Nagar_NNP Town_NNP ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT 1st_CD of_IN October_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT Railway_NNP Station_NNP Camp_NNP was_VBD re-opened_JJ ._.
At_IN this_DT Camp_NNP ,_, subject_JJ to_TO certain_JJ exceptions_NNS ,_, and_CC subject_JJ to_TO release_VB on_IN surveillance_NN ,_, all_DT persons_NNS were_VBD detained_VBN who_WP arrived_VBN by_IN rail_NN or_CC by_IN the_DT roads_NNS approaching_VBG Ahmednagar_NNP from_IN the_DT west_NN ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, Major_NNP H._NNP W._NNP Steven-_NNP son_NN ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, held_VBD classes_NNS for_IN the_DT instruction_NN of_IN Revenue_NNP and_CC Municipal_NNP Officers_NNP in_IN plague_NN mensures_NNS generally_RB ,_, and_CC practical_JJ demonstrations_NNS were_VBD given_VBN of_IN the_DT methods_NNS of_IN disinfection_NN ._.

On_IN the_DT 8th_CD of_IN October_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT Sarjpur_NNP Dharamsla_NNP was_VBD prepared_VBN as_IN a_DT Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP ;_: from_IN the_DT 9th_CD ,_, all_PDT the_DT gates_NNS of_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, except_IN five_CD ,_, were_VBD closed_VBN ,_, and_CC people_NNS were_VBD not_RB allowed_VBN in_IN unless_IN known_VBN ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT 10th_CD ,_, Plague_NNP Authorities_NNPS were_VBD appointed_VBN ._.
The_DT 5th_CD of_IN November_NNP 1897_CD marks_VBZ a_DT new_JJ period_NN in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Ahmed-_NNP nagar_NN ._.
The_DT evacuated_JJ population_NN of_IN Cantonments_NNS had_VBD been_VBN permitted_VBN to_TO return_VB to_TO their_PRP$ houses_NNS to_TO whitewash_VB them_PRP ._.
This_DT step_NN was_VBD followed_VBN by_IN a_DT rise_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS and_CC by_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN indigenous_JJ plague_NN both_DT in_IN Nagar_NNP Town_NNP and_CC in_IN Bhingar_NNP ._.
The_DT following_JJ week_NN (_( 5th-12th_JJ November_NNP )_) 5_CD cases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN Nagar_NNP and_CC 5_CD in_IN Bhingar_NNP ,_, and_CC all_DT doubt_NN as_IN to_TO their_PRP$ infection_NN was_VBD at_IN an_DT end_NN ._.

As_RB far_RB as_IN evidence_NN is_VBZ procurable_JJ ,_, it_PRP seems_VBZ that_IN the_DT infection_NN is_VBZ traceable_JJ to_TO the_DT exit_NN of_IN people_NNS from_IN the_DT Sadar_NNP Bazr_NNP ._.

On_IN the_DT 20th_JJ December_NNP ,_, Lieutenant_NNP R._NNP W._NNP Boger_NNP ,_, R.A._NNP ,_, and_CC one_CD Officer_NNP and_CC 20_CD men_NNS of_IN the_DT East_NNP Yorkshire_NNP Regiment_NNP were_VBD sent_VBN to_TO the_DT Collector_NNP for_IN plague_NN duty_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT work_NN of_IN unroofing_JJ ,_, disinfecting_NN ,_, and_CC general_JJ sanitation_NN proceeded_VBD apace_NN ;_: and_CC from_IN this_DT time_NN the_DT num-_JJ ber_NN of_IN cases_NNS steadily_RB declined_VBD ._.

AHMEDNAGAR_NNP DISTRICT_NNP ._. ]_NN
201_CD Every_NNP bouse_NN which_WDT appeared_VBD to_TO require_VB it_PRP was_VBD thus_RB opened_VBN up_RP ,_, ventilated_VBN and_CC cleaned_VBN ;_: and_CC in_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN January_NNP 1898_CD ,_, Wards_NNP I_PRP ,_, III_NNP ,_, IX_NNP ,_, and_CC XI_NNP were_VBD evacuated_VBN ._.

This_DT completed_VBD the_DT evacuation_NN of_IN the_DT entire_JJ Town_NNP ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT infection_NN ,_, neither_CC rats_NNS nor_CC grain_NN would_MD seem_VB to_TO bave_VB been_VBN responsible_JJ for_IN it_PRP ,_, for_IN very_RB few_JJ ,_, if_IN any_DT ,_, dead_JJ rats_NNS were_VBD found_VBN ;_: and_CC as_IN regards_NNS grain_NN ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP reports_NNS :_: ``_`` No_DT case_NN is_VBZ reported_VBN where_WRB infection_NN is_VBZ traceable_JJ to_TO grain_VB ._. But_CC in_IN parts_NNS of_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, cases_NNS of_IN cats_NNS ,_, rats_NNS ,_, and_CC mice_NN \vere_RB reported_VBN ._.

._.

207_CD KHANDESH_NNP DISTRICT_NNP ._.
Area_NN ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: 10,454_CD sq_NN ._.

mile_NN ._.
Rainfall_NN ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: About_IN 22_CD inches_NNS ._.
Boundaries_NNS ._.
Khndesh_NNP ,_, stretching_VBG nearly_RB 160_CD miles_NNS along_IN the_DT Tpti_NNP ,_, and_CC forming_VBG an_DT upland_NN basin_NN ,_, varying_VBG in_IN breadth_NN from_IN 70_CD to_TO 90_CD miles_NNS ,_, is_VBZ the_DT most_RBS nor-_JJ therly_JJ section_NN of_IN the_DT Deccan_NNP table-land_NN ._.
Along_IN the_DT whole_JJ northern_JJ frontier_NN ,_, the_DT District_NNP is_VBZ bounded_VBN by_IN the_DT Stpuda_NNP range_NN ,_, from_IN 80_CD to_TO 40_CD miles_NNS wide_JJ ;_: on_IN the_DT east_NN and_CC north-east_NN ,_, by_IN Berr_NNP and_CC Holkar_NNP 's_POS territory_NN ;_: on_IN the_DT south_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT Nizm_NNP 's_POS dominions_NNS :_: and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT Graekwar_NNP 's_POS territory_NN (_( Baroda_NNP )_) and_CC by_IN Rewa_NNP Kantha_NNP ._.
Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
The_DT Khndesh_NNP seasons_NNS are-the_JJ rainy_NN season_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN June_NNP to_TO the_DT middle_NN of_IN October_NNP ;_: the_DT cold_NN season_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN October_NNP to_TO the_DT middle_NN of_IN February_NNP ;_: and_CC the_DT hot_JJ season_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN February_NNP to_TO the_DT middle_NN of_IN June_NNP ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO variety_NN of_IN height_NN ,_, position_NN ,_, and_CC character_NN ,_, the_DT climate_NN varies_NNS greatly_RB in_IN different_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT District_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT western_JJ hills_NNS and_CC forests_NNS ,_, the_DT rainfall_NN from_IN the_DT south-west_JJ monsoon_NN is_VBZ heavy_JJ ,_, but_CC in_IN the_DT centre_NN and_CC south_VB the_DT fall_NN is_VBZ scanty_JJ and_CC uncertain_JJ ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT general_JJ health_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, the_DT hot_JJ weather_NN is_VBZ the_DT most_RBS healthy_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT cold_JJ weather_NN the_DT most_RBS unhealthy_JJ ,_, season_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT cold_JJ weather_NN ,_, the_DT drying_NN of_IN the_DT ground_NN breeds_VBZ much_JJ malaria_NNS ,_, and_CC later_RB on_IN ,_, the_DT great_JJ daily_JJ extremes_NNS of_IN heat_NN and_CC cold_NN are_VBP very_RB trying_VBG ._.
In_IN Khn-_NNP desh_NN there_EX are_VBP four_CD hot_JJ springs_NNS :_: three_CD in_IN Chopda_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT fourth_JJ in_IN Shirpur_NNP ._.
All_PDT the_DT varieties_NNS of_IN soil_NN that_IN come_JJ under_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT three_CD orders_NNS ,_, black_JJ ,_, red_JJ ,_, and_CC stony_NN ,_, are_VBP found_VBN in_IN this_DT District_NNP ._.
Many_JJ of_IN the_DT chief_JJ streams_NNS flow_VBP during_IN almost_RB the_DT whole_JJ year_NN ,_, but_CC most_JJS of_IN them_PRP are_VBP unfit_JJ for_IN drinking_NN ,_, as_IN their_PRP$ water_NN is_VBZ often_RB polluted_VBN by_IN the_DT soaking_NN of_IN hemp_NN and_CC other_JJ fibrous_JJ plants_NNS ._.
Previous_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT authentic_JJ record_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Khndesh_NNP previous_JJ to_TO 1896_CD ._.
*_VB The_DT first_JJ case_NN ._.
Imported_VBN into_IN Dhulia_NNP ._.
12th_CD October_NNP 1896_CD ._.
The_DT first_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN this_DT District_NNP occurred_VBD at_IN Dhulia_NNP ,_, the_DT head-quarter_JJ station_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT 12th_CD October_NNP 1896_CD ._.
The_DT sufferer_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD a_DT resident_NN of_IN Mndvi_NNP in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, left_VBD Bombay_NNP on_IN the_DT 11th_CD October_NNP ._.
He_PRP was_VBD then_RB suffering_VBG from_IN high_JJ fever_NN and_CC was_VBD afraid_VBN he_PRP had_VBD plague_NN ._.
He_PRP went_VBD by_IN rail_NN to_TO Ohlisgaon_NNP ,_, and_CC thence_NN by_IN tonga_NN ,_, 34_CD miles_NNS ,_, to_TO Dhulia_NNP ,_, which_WDT he_PRP reached_VBD in_IN an_DT unconscious_JJ state_NN on_IN the_DT 12th_CD ._.
He_PRP was_VBD under_IN observation_NN from_IN the_DT time_NN he_PRP arrived_VBD ._.
The_DT case_NN was_VBD found_VBN by_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, Lieut.-Colonel_NNP K._NNP A._NN Dalai_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP to_TO be_VB one_CD of_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT patient_NN died_VBD on_IN the_DT 15th_CD ._.
Protective_JJ measures_NNS at_IN Bhusval_NNP ._.
November_NNP 1897_CD ._.
No_DT indigenous_JJ cases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT District_NNP till_NN November_NNP 1897_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT imported_VBN cases_NNS were_VBD mostly_RB found_VBN at_IN the_DT Bhusval_NNP Railway_NNP Station_NNP ._.
Under_IN Government_NNP orders_NNS the_DT inspection_NN at_IN Bhusval_NNP of_IN Railway_NNP passengers_NNS coming_VBG from_IN Bombay_NNP began_VBD on_IN the_DT 1st_CD November_NNP 1896_CD ._.
The_DT inspecting_JJ staff_NN consisted_VBN ,_, at_IN first_JJ ,_, of_IN one_CD Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP ,_, but_CC this_DT was_VBD subsequently_RB increased_VBN to_TO two_CD Assistant_NNP Surgeons_NNS and_CC three_CD or_CC four_CD Hospital_NN Assistants_NNS ._.
The_DT first_JJ case_NN detected_VBN among_IN passengers_NNS was_VBD on_IN the_DT 3rd_CD December_NNP 1896_CD ,_, and_CC *_NNP Bombay_NNP Gazetteer_NNP ,_, Vol_NNP ._.
XII_NN ._.
208_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
VIII_NNP ._.
from_IN then_RB till_VB 18th_CD June_NNP 1897_CD ,_, 37_CD cases_NNS were_VBD detected_VBN ,_, of_IN which_WDT only_RB 17_CD proved_VBD fatal_JJ ._.
From_IN the_DT 18th_CD June_NNP till_NN 3rd_CD September_NNP 1897_CD only_RB one_CD more_JJR case_NN (_( fatal_JJ )_) was_VBD detected_VBN ._.
Hospital_NN Assistant_NNP Nmdeo_NNP Hari_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD first_RB in_IN charge_NN at_IN Bhusval_NNP ,_, died_VBD of_IN plague_NN contracted_VBN in_IN the_DT discharge_NN of_IN his_PRP$ duty_NN ._.
