Plague_NN in_IN Jalgaon_NNP ._.
Population_NN 14,672_CD ._.
While_IN the_DT inspection_NN of_IN all_DT passengers_NNS from_IN Bombay_NNP was_VBD being_VBG carried_VBN on_IN at_IN Bhus-_NNP val_NN ,_, local_JJ arrangements_NNS were_VBD made_VBN for_IN the_DT inspection_NN of_IN passengers_NNS leaving_VBG the_DT train_NN at_IN Chlisgaon_NNP ,_, Pchora_NNP and_CC Jalgaon_NNP ;_: and_CC to_TO guard_VB against_IN infection_NN from_IN Surat_NNP ,_, similar_JJ local_JJ arrangements_NNS were_VBD made_VBN at_IN Nandurbr_NNP and_CC Navpur_NNP ,_, for_IN inspection_NN of_IN travellers_NNS by_IN road_NN when_WRB Surat_NNP became_VBD infected_JJ ._.
Up_RB to_TO the_DT 1st_CD November_NNP 1897_CD throughout_IN the_DT whole_JJ District_NNP 40_CD imported_VBN cases_NNS ,_, with_IN 18_CD deaths_NNS ,_, had_VBD occurred_VBN ,_, and_CC it_PRP seemed_VBD probable_JJ that_IN the_DT exertions_NNS of_IN the_DT local_JJ authorities_NNS would_MD be_VB successful_JJ in_IN entirely_RB preventing_VBG an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN indigenous_JJ plague_NN ._.
However_RB ,_, a_DT suspicious_JJ case_NN occurred_VBD in_IN Jalgaon_NNP in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 26th_CD November_NNP 1897_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT Collector_NNP thus_RB describes_VBZ what_WP followed_VBD :_: -_: ``_`` You_PRP will_MD have_VB got_VBD a_DT telegram_NN from_IN me_PRP saying_VBG that_IN there_EX is_VBZ indigenous_JJ plague_NN here_RB and_CC that_DT apparently_RB about_IN 15_CD cases_NNS have_VBP occurred_VBN ._.
The_DT way_NN in_IN which_WDT deaths_NNS have_VBP been_VBN occurring_VBG in_IN a_DT special_JJ area_NN ,_, and_CC 2_CD or_CC 3_CD in_IN the_DT same_JJ house_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN considerable_JJ excess_NN of_IN the_DT average_NN ,_, shows_VBZ that_IN there_EX is_VBZ something_NN wrong_JJ ._.
And_CC the_DT existence_NN of_IN buboes_NNS in_IN two_CD of_IN the_DT patients_NNS seems_VBZ to_TO show_VB that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ plague_JJ the_DT people_NNS are_VBP dying_VBG of_IN ._.
The_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN is_VBZ that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB plague_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT mortality_NN is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO ordinary_JJ fever_NN acting_VBG on_IN constitutions_NNS undermined_VBN by_IN famine_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT increase_NN lately_RB in_IN the_DT deaths_NNS and_CC the_DT distribution_NN of_IN the_DT deaths_NNS seems_VBZ to_TO show_VB that_IN this_DT is_VBZ wrong_JJ ._.
The_DT reason_NN I_PRP gave_VBD 15_CD as_IN the_DT probable_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS (_( from_IN plague_NN )_) is_VBZ that_IN it_PRP represents_VBZ roughly_RB the_DT excess_NN over_IN the_DT average_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD therefore_RB be_VB taken_VBN as_IN the_DT pro-_JJ duct_NN of_IN the_DT special_JJ cause_NN ,_, plague_NN ._.
Pogson_NNP and_CC Hatch_NNP and_CC a_DT European_JJ Abkri_NNP Inspector_NNP are_VBP here_RB ,_, and_CC working_VBG hard_RB at_IN getting_VBG ready_JJ segregation_NN sheds_NNS and_CC trying_VBG to_TO prevent_VB infection_NN going_VBG to_TO Bhusval_NNP ._.
Priestly_RB ,_, the_DT Police_NNP Inspector_NNP ,_, is_VBZ expected_VBN to-morrow_NN ._.
We_PRP will_MD have_VB as_IN thorough_IN a_DT house-to-house_JJ search_NN as_IN is_VBZ possible_JJ ,_, and_CC we_PRP hope_VBP to_TO get_VB a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN people_NNS to_TO move_VB out_RB into_IN the_DT fields_NNS ,_, ''_'' The_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, with_IN Surgeon-Major-General_JJ Cleghorn_NNP and_CC Surgeon-_NNP Colonel_NNP Hay_NNP ,_, visited_VBD Jalgaon_NNP at_IN this_DT time_NN (_( 2nd_CD December_NNP 1897_CD )_) ,_, and_CC made_VBD the_DT following_JJ notes_NNS on_IN that_DT town_NN and_CC Bhusval_NN :_: -_: ``_`` Jalgaon.-Population_NN ,_, 16,000_CD ._.
The_DT first_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN was_VBD discovered_VBN on_IN the_DT 23rd_CD November_NNP ,_, three_CD other_JJ cases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT same_JJ house_NN ,_, and_CC there_RB have_VBP been_VBN three_CD others_NNS up_RB to_TO date_NN ._.
All_PDT these_DT were_VBD confined_VBN to_TO one_CD quarter_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
A_DT Mrwdi_NNP from_IN Sholpur_NNP is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO have_VB introduced_VBN the_DT disease_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT evidence_NN on_IN this_DT point_NN is_VBZ not_RB clear_JJ ._.
The_DT mortality_NN for_IN some_DT time_NN past_NN has_VBZ been_VBN above_IN the_DT normal_JJ ,_, and_CC within_IN the_DT last_JJ two_CD or_CC three_CD weeks_NNS it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN about_IN double_NN of_IN that_DT in_IN the_DT same_JJ period_NN last_JJ year_NN ,_, The_DT bodies_NNS of_IN those_DT dying_VBG have_VBP been_VBN examined_VBN by_IN a_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP ,_, but_CC nothing_NN found_VBD to_TO justify_VB the_DT idea_NN that_IN the_DT deaths_NNS were_VBD due_JJ to_TO plague_VB ._.
No_DT cases_NNS have_VBP been_VBN observed_VBN during_IN the_DT last_JJ two_CD days_NNS ,_, and_CC no_DT other_JJ place_NN in_IN the_DT district_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB infected_VBN ._.
The_DT houses_NNS in_IN which_WDT cases_NNS occurred_VBD have_VBP been_VBN evacuated_VBN and_CC the_DT inmates_NNS removed_VBD to_TO huts_NNS which_WDT were_VBD hastily_RB erected_VBN ._.
We_PRP met_VBD Mr._NNP Cumine_NNP ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP ,_, here_RB on_IN the_DT 5th_JJ instant_NN ;_: he_PRP had_VBD already_RB selected_VBN a_DT site_NN for_IN a_DT camp_NN ,_, and_CC as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT necessary_JJ number_NN of_IN huts_NNS have_VBP been_VBN erected_VBN ,_, the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS in_IN the_DT infected_JJ quarter_NN will_MD be_VB removed_VBN to_TO them_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT residents_NNS of_IN other_JJ quarters_NNS will_MD be_VB persuaded_VBN to_TO leave_VB the_DT town_NN ,_, Numbers_NNP of_IN agriculturists_NNS are_VBP now_RB departing_VBG and_CC camping_VBG in_IN their_PRP$ fields_NNS ._.
A_DT mill-owner_NN who_WP employs_VBZ 1,300_CD hands_NNS is_VBZ making_VBG arrangements_NNS for_IN hutting_VBG the_DT whole_NN of_IN his_PRP$ employs_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT proprietors_NNS of_IN several_JJ ginning_NN and_CC pressing_VBG mills_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT about_IN 700_CD work_NN people_NNS are_VBP employed_VBN ,_, will_MD ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ expected_VBN ,_, follow_VB the_DT same_JJ good_JJ example_NN ._.
KHANDESH_NNP DISTRICT_NNP ._. ]_NN
209_CD Mr._NNP Cumine_NNP had_VBD before_IN our_PRP$ arrival_NN on_IN the_DT 5th_JJ instant_JJ organized_VBN four_CD search_NN parties_NNS ,_, and_CC we_PRP wired_VBD to_TO Bombay_NNP for_IN a_DT gang_NN of_IN 20_CD coolies_NNS with_IN all_DT appliances_NNS and_CC disinfectants_NNS ._.
They_PRP will_MD arrive_VB to-morrow_JJ morning_NN ._.
Eighty_NNP inore_NN coolies_NNS will_MD be_VB entertained_VBN for_IN disinfection_NN and_CC to_TO learn_VB the_DT work_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Priestley_NNP ,_, of_IN the_DT Police_NNP Department_NNP ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN placed_VBN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS ,_, and_CC he_PRP was_VBD sent_VBN to_TO Nsik_NNP on_IN the_DT evening_NN of_IN the_DT 5th_CD to_TO make_VB himself_PRP acquainted_VBN with_IN the_DT system_NN of_IN disinfection_NN and_CC the_DT practical_JJ work_NN :_: carried_VBN out_RP in_IN connec-_JJ tion_NN with_IN an_DT infected_JJ locality_NN ._.
One_CD of_IN the_DT recently_RB arrived_VBN private_JJ practitioners_NNS from_IN England_NNP will_MD be_VB posted_VBN to_TO Jalgaon_NNP ._.
The_DT appearance_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN at_IN Jalgaon_NNP renders_NNS necessary_JJ the_DT introduction_NN at_IN Bhusval_NNP of_IN measures_NNS calculated_VBN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN towards_IN the_DT north_NN ._.
The_DT measures_NNS which_WDT will_MD be_VB adopted_VBN in_IN Jalgaon_NNP may_MD be_VB effective_JJ as_IN regards_NNS the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, but_CC ,_, should_MD other_JJ places_NNS in_IN the_DT district_NN become_NN infected_JJ ,_, as_IN travellers_NNS from_IN infected_JJ districts_NNS avoid_VBN by_IN road_NN Manmd_NNP Station_NNP ,_, then_RB travel_NN by_IN rail_NN to_TO Bhusval_NNP and_CC the_DT north_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ evident_JJ that_IN there_EX will_MD be_VB a_DT great_JJ liability_NN to_TO the_DT extension_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN to_TO these_DT parts_NNS ._.
To_TO enable_VB us_PRP to_TO take_VB the_DT necessary_JJ steps_NNS we_PRP visited_VBD Bhusval_NNP and_CC arranged_VBN with_IN the_DT local_JJ Railway_NNP authorities_NNS for_IN the_DT erection_NN of_IN an_DT obser-_JJ vation_NN camp_NN at_IN Bhusval_NNP ._.
There_EX is_VBZ an_DT excellent_JJ site_NN for_IN such_JJ a_DT camp_NN on_IN railway_NN ground_NN near_IN the_DT station_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT District_NNP Traffic_NNP Superintendent_NNP informed_VBD us_PRP that_IN he_PRP could_MD construct_VB huts_NNS made_VBN of_IN sleepers_NNS ,_, sufficient_JJ to_TO accommodate_VB 500_CD people_NNS within_IN 24_CD hours_NNS ._.
He_PRP wired_VBD to_TO the_DT Agent_NNP ,_, G._NNP I._NNP P._NNP Railway_NNP ,_, for_IN the_DT necessary_JJ sanction_NN to_TO this_DT pro-_JJ posal_NN ._.
When_WRB everything_NN is_VBZ ready_JJ ,_, booking_NN of_IN passengers_NNS between_IN Manmd_NNP and_CC Bhusval_NNP ,_, except_IN at_IN Bhadli_NNP ,_, a_DT small_JJ Station_NN between_IN Jalgaon_NNP and_CC Bhusval_NNP ,_, will_MD be_VB open_JJ to_TO every_DT one_CD ,_, and_CC all_DT suspected_VBN travellers_NNS will_MD be_VB detained_VBN in_IN the_DT camp_NN at_IN Bhusval_NNP for_IN a_DT period_NN not_RB exceeding_VBG ten_JJ days_NNS ._.
The_DT officer_NN in_IN charge_NN to_TO have_VB full_JJ powers_NNS of_IN exemption_NN and_CC detention_NN ._.
The_DT clothes_NNS and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS of_IN those_DT detained_VBN will_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN ._.
The_DT Municipal_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, under_IN the_DT supervision_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Cumine_NNP ,_, will_MD also_RB arrange_VB for_IN the_DT establishment_NN of_IN a_DT segregation_NN camp_NN for_IN the_DT residents_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN plague_NN appearing_VBG in_IN it_PRP ._.
The_DT Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP and_CC segregation_NN huts_NNS are_VBP already_RB in_IN construction_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT site_NN for_IN a_DT health_NN camp_NN has_VBZ been_VBN selected_VBN in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN ._.
The_DT place_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB at_IN present_JJ free_JJ from_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
An_DT Assistant_NNP Collector_NNP will_MD be_VB placed_VBN in_IN charge_NN at_IN Bhusval_NNP ,_, and_CC we_PRP have_VBP applied_VBN for_IN the_DT services_NNS of_IN a_DT Staff_NNP Corps_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO work_VB under_IN him_PRP ._. ''_''
With_IN plague_NN indigenous_JJ at_IN Jalgaon_NNP and_CC a_DT certain_JJ number_NN of_IN people_NNS leaving_VBG it_PRP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD to_TO be_VB expected_VBN that_IN several_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN imported_VBN from_IN Jalgaon_NNP would_MD be_VB heard_VBN of_IN in_IN villages_NNS ._.
Accordingly_RB ,_, on_IN the_DT 28th_CD of_IN December_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP reports_NNS :_: -_: ``_`` A_DT man_NN who_WP had_VBD gone_VBN about_RB 8_CD days_NNS ago_RB from_IN Jalgaon_NNP to_TO Datla_NNP in_IN the_DT Jalgaon_NNP Tluka_NNP died_VBD there_EX on_IN the_DT 26th_CD ._.
His_PRP$ death_NN was_VBD sudden_JJ ,_, and_CC so_RB I_PRP assume_VBP it_PRP to_TO have_VB been_VBN plague_JJ ._.
He_PRP had_VBD not_RB been_VBN admitted_VBN into_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, but_CC was_VBD living_VBG in_IN a_DT hut_NN of_IN jowri_NN straw_NN in_IN the_DT fields_NNS ._.
The_DT Mmlatdr_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN to_TO the_DT place_NN and_CC burnt_VB the_DT man_NN 's_POS clothes_NNS ,_, and_CC segregated_VBD the_DT people_NNS with_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC demolished_VBD the_DT hut_NN ._. ''_''

''_''
So_RB also_RB a_DT week_NN later_RB (_( 7th_CD January_NNP 1898_CD )_) :_: -_: ``_`` It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN learnt_VBN that_IN about_RB 8_CD days_NNS ago_RB a_DT man_NN ,_, Bhavdu_NNP Rmchandra_NNP Wni_NNP ,_, aged_VBD about_IN 16_CD ,_, went_VBD from_IN Jalgaon_NNP to_TO the_DT village_NN of_IN Chincholi_NNP and_CC died_VBD there_RB in_IN about_RB 4_CD days_NNS ._.
The_DT cause_NN of_IN death_NN is_VBZ unknown_JJ ,_, but_CC I_PRP have_VBP assumed_VBN it_PRP to_TO be_VB plague_NN ._.

Fortunately_RB none_NN of_IN the_DT cases_NNS mentioned_VBD did_VBD as_IN a_DT fact_NN infect_VB the_DT village_NN into_IN which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD imported_VBN ._.
On_IN the_DT 15th_CD of_IN January_NNP 1898_CD the_DT Collector_NNP thus_RB reviews_VBZ the_DT situation_NN in_IN Jalgaon_NNP :_: -_: ``_`` As_IN I_PRP have_VBP not_RB yet_RB sent_VBN any_DT detailed_JJ account_NN of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN ,_, I_PRP beg_VBP to_TO do_VB so_RB now_RB ._.

VIII_NNP ._.
The_DT first_JJ suspicious_JJ case-a_JJ man_NN with_IN buboes-was_JJ discovered_VBN on_IN or_CC about_IN the_DT 23rd_CD November_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Looking_VBG back_RB now_RB with_IN one_CD 's_POS present_JJ knowledge_NN ,_, one_CD sees_VBZ that_IN one_CD ought_MD to_TO have_VB been_VBN certain_JJ from_IN the_DT fact_NN of_IN there_EX having_VBG been_VBN other_JJ deaths_NNS in_IN the_DT house_NN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD plague_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT time_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, I_PRP was_VBD not_RB certain_JJ ._.
The_DT man_NN was_VBD segregated_VBN ._.
And_CC the_DT Assistant_NNP Collector_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Hatch_NNP ,_, came_VBD and_CC stayed_VBD at_IN Jalgaon_NNP and_CC watched_VBD the_DT illnesses_NNS and_CC deaths_NNS ._.
On_IN marking_VBG down_RP in_IN a_DT map_NN the_DT houses_NNS where_WRB deaths_NNS had_VBD lately_RB been_VBN occurring_VBG ,_, it_PRP was_VBD obvious_JJ to_TO him_PRP that_IN there_EX was_VBD something_NN wrong_JJ in_IN a_DT particular_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
And_CC the_DT discovery_NN on_IN the_DT 2nd_CD December_NNP of_IN a_DT bubo_NN on_IN the_DT body_NN of_IN a_DT dead_JJ woman_NN showed_VBD him_PRP that_IN it_PRP was_VBD plague_NN that_IN the_DT people_NNS had_VBD been_VBN dying_VBG of_IN ._.
So_RB I_PRP went_VBD to_TO Jalgaon_NNP ._.
The_DT Europeans_NNPS available_JJ when_WRB plague_NN became_VBD an_DT established_VBN fact_NN were_VBD Mr._NNP Hatch_NNP ,_, Mr_NNP Pogson_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Priestley_NNP (_( of_IN the_DT Police_NNP Department_NNP )_) ,_, and_CC Messrs._NNP Sibbald_NNP and_CC McCarty_NNP ,_, Abkri_NNP Inspectors_NNP ._.
Subsequently_RB ,_, Mr._NNP Firth_NNP of_IN the_DT Staff_NNP Corps_NNP came_VBD and_CC rendered_VBD valuable_JJ assistance_NN till_NN he_PRP had_VBD to_TO go_VB to_TO Bhusval_NNP to_TO take_VB charge_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ camp_NN there_RB ._.
And_CC still_RB later_RB Dr._NNP Stewart_NNP came_VBD from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ ,_, I_PRP am_VBP glad_JJ to_TO say_VB ,_, with_IN us_PRP still_RB ._.
A_DT Mussalmn_NNP member_NN of_IN the_DT Municipality-Mr._NNP Itbrkhn-has_NNP behaved_VBD excellently_RB ,_, and_CC voluntarily_RB devoted_VBD the_DT whole_NN of_IN his_PRP$ time_NN to_TO plague_VB work_NN throughout_IN ._.
Another_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Lahanu_NNP (_( who_WP is_VBZ also_RB Police_NNP Patil_NNP )_) ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN doing_VBG all_DT in_IN his_PRP$ power_NN to_TO help_VB ;_: and_CC has_VBZ exercised_VBN his_PRP$ great_JJ influence_NN most_JJS beneficially_RB ._.
Mr._NNP Hatch_NNP and_CC I_PRP both_DT agree_VBP that_IN the_DT man_NN to_TO have_VB as_IN Mmlatdr_NNP in_IN an_DT emergency_NN of_IN this_DT sort_NN was_VBD Mr._NNP Karandikar_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ name_NN I_PRP have_VBP already_RB mentioned_VBN favourably_RB to_TO Govern-_NNP ment_NN ._.

At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN a_DT number_NN of_IN krkuns_NNS ,_, vaccinators_NNS ,_, Abkri_NNP sub-inspectors_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_JJ ,_, were_VBD brought_VBN in_IN from_IN the_DT tlukas_NN :_: the_DT town_NN was_VBD divided_VBN into_IN wards_NNS :_: and_CC search_VB parties_NNS assigned_VBN to_TO them_PRP :_: the_DT wards_NNS again_RB were_VBD distributed_VBN among_IN European_JJ superintendents_NNS :_: and_CC plague_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD searched_VBN for_IN ._.
A_DT plague_NN camp_NN and_CC a_DT segregation_NN camp_NN were_VBD of_IN course_NN erected_VBN ._.
Police_NNS were_VBD stationed_VBN on_IN the_DT roads_NNS leading_VBG east_NN ,_, south_NN and_CC north_NN to_TO stop_VB any_DT one_CD who_WP had_VBD not_RB a_DT pass_NN ,_, and_CC 2nd_CD and_CC 3rd_CD class_NN booking_NN from_IN Jalgaon_NNP and_CC the_DT station_NN on_IN either_DT side_NN was_VBD stopped_VBN in_IN an_DT eastward_JJ direction_NN ._.
Going_VBG west-_JJ wards_NNS was_VBD not_RB forbidden_JJ ,_, as_IN it_PRP was_VBD thought_VBN that_IN a_DT certain_JJ number_NN of_IN people_NNS would_MD be_VB sure_JJ to_TO go_VB away_RB and_CC that_IN it_PRP was_VBD better_RBR to_TO give_VB the_DT stream_NN an_DT inclination_NN back_RB towards_IN the_DT infected_JJ Bombay_NNP Districts_NNP than_IN forward_RB towards_NNS uninfected_VBD Bhusval_NNP and_CC the_DT Central_NNP Provinces_NNPS and_CC Berrs_NNP ._.
The_DT object_NN to_TO be_VB aimed_VBN at_IN was_VBD to_TO get_VB the_DT townspeople_NN out_RP into_IN the_DT fields_NNS as_RB quickly_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, but_CC not_RB to_TO frighten_VB them_PRP so_RB much_JJ that_IN they_PRP would_MD go_VB beyond_IN the_DT fields_NNS and_CC into_IN other_JJ villages_NNS and_CC ,_, infect_VB them_PRP ._.
The_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT infected_JJ part_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB taken_VBN out_RP in_IN a_DT body_NN :_: if_IN they_PRP went_VBD voluntarily_RB so_RB much_JJ the_DT better_JJR ,_, but_CC go_VB somehow_RB or_CC other_JJ they_PRP must_MD ._.

It_PRP was_VBD thought_VBN that_IN perhaps_RB there_EX might_MD be_VB some_DT difficulty_NN in_IN getting_VBG them_PRP to_TO comprehend_VB why_WRB they_PRP were_VBD to_TO go_VB out_RP ._.
And_CC as_IN it_PRP was_VBD desirable_JJ that_IN whatever_WDT was_VBD to_TO be_VB done_VBN should_MD be_VB clone_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS good-humouredly_RB ,_, I_PRP asked_VBD the_DT two_CD most_RBS respected_JJ and_CC influential_JJ Mussalmn_NNP gentlemen_NNS in_IN Khndesh-Khan_NNP Sheb_NNP Sayad_NNP Jamal_NNP of_IN Bhadgaon_NNP and_CC Khn_NNP Sheb_NNP Dda_NNP Miya_NNP of_IN Pchora-and_NNP a_DT retired_JJ Risaldar-Major_NNP of_IN Chlisgaon_NNP to_TO do_VB me_PRP the_DT favour_NN to_TO come_VB in_IN and_CC help_VB in_IN explaining_VBG matters_NNS to_TO the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP am_VBP glad_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN ,_, thanks_NNS no_DT doubt_NN in_IN great_JJ measure_NN to_TO their_PRP$ good_JJ influence_NN ,_, the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT infected_JJ part_NN went_VBD out_IN cheerfully_RB and_CC without_IN a_DT murmur_NN ._.
The_DT people_NNS in_IN the_DT old_JJ town-chiefly_JJ cultivators-had_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT meantime_NN ,_, following_VBG the_DT excellent_JJ example_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Lahnu_NNP Ptil_NNP (_( whom_WP I_PRP have_VBP mentioned_VBN above_IN )_) ,_, all_DT gone_VBN out_RP into_IN huts_NNS in_IN the_DT fields_NNS ;_: a_DT number_NN of_IN people_NNS in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN went_VBD too_RB ,_, so_IN that_DT in_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN the_DT whole_JJ town_NN ,_, except_IN two_CD semi-detached_JJ parts_NNS and_CC some_DT merchants_NNS '_POS shops_NNS ,_, was_VBD completely_RB emptied_VBN ._.

But_CC if_IN it_PRP was_VBD plague_NN they_PRP died_VBD of_IN ,_, then_RB the_DT infection_NN may_MD possibly_RB have_VB come_VBN from_IN some_DT Teli_NNP who_WP has_VBZ got_VBN permission_NN to_TO go_VB into_IN the_DT town_NN for_IN some_DT hours_NNS in_IN the_DT day_NN to_TO work_VB his_PRP$ oil-mill_NN ._.
[_NN This_DT is_VBZ now_RB being_VBG stopped_VBN ,_, and_CC oil-mills_NNS removed_VBD outside_IN the_DT town_NN ._. ]_NN
C-.A_NNP twelfth_NN case_NN was_VBD that_IN of_IN a_DT very_RB poor_JJ man_NN ,_, practically_RB a_DT beggar_NN :_: a_DT man_NN who_WP used_VBD to_TO scrape_VB up_RP from_IN the_DT ground_NN (_( for_IN food_NN )_) the_DT grains_NNS that_WDT fell_VBD at_IN the_DT Wnis_NNP '_POS shops_NNS as_IN the_DT corn_NN was_VBD being_VBG measured_VBN ._.
A_DT man_NN who_WP lives_VBZ in_IN this_DT way_NN may_MD contract_NN the_DT infection_NN at_IN any_DT place_NN any_DT time_NN ._.
D.-The_JJ thirteenth_NN and_CC fourteenth_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD a_DT cloth-packer_NN in_IN the_DT weaving_NN mill_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT Kunbi_NNP in_IN a_DT threshing_NN floor_NN close_RB to_TO the_DT town_NN ._.
How_WRB they_PRP got_VBD the_DT infection_NN I_PRP have_VBP not_RB been_VBN able_JJ to_TO trace_VB ._.
The_DT fifteenth_JJ case_NN was_VBD that_IN of_IN a_DT clerk_NN in_IN the_DT Post_NNP Office_NNP ._.
But_CC though_IN we_PRP have_VBP counted_VBN it_PRP as_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC segregated_VBD him_PRP and_CC the_DT establishment_NN ,_, and_CC moved_VBD the_DT office_NN to_TO another_DT building_NN ,_, I_PRP can_MD not_RB help_VB thinking_VBG that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ only_RB malaria_JJ :_: as_IN last_JJ month_NN the_DT man_NN was_VBD in_IN the_DT extremely_RB feverish_JJ climate_NN of_IN the_DT Nawpur_NNP Peta_NNP ._.
The_DT plague_NN would_MD appear_VB to_TO have_VB now_RB left_VBN the_DT Mrwdis_NNP and_CC to_TO be_VB leaving_VBG the_DT Wnis_NNP and_CC Pardesis-the_NNP three_CD classes_NNS who_WP suffered_VBD so_RB severely_RB from_IN it_PRP at_IN first_JJ ._.
The_DT people_NNS attacked_VBN in_IN the_DT week_NN under_IN report_NN included_VBD Mussalmns_NNP ,_, Brhmins_NNP ,_, a_DT Kunbi_NNP ,_, a_DT Martha_NNP ,_, a_DT Weaver_NNP ,_, a_DT Mahrin_NNP ,_, a_DT Jain_NNP Shimpi_NNP ,_, a_DT Teli_NNP ,_, a_DT Sweeper_NNP :_: so_RB that_IN it_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB to_TO have_VB gone_VBN into_IN any_DT said_VBD one_CD particular_JJ class_NN ._.

Boundaries_NNS ._.
Rhomboidal_NNP in_IN shape_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT length_NN of_IN 108_CD miles_NNS from_IN north-east_JJ to_TO south-west_JJ ,_, and_CC an_DT extreme_JJ breadth_NN from_IN north_JJ to_TO south_VB of_IN 87_CD miles_NNS ,_, the_DT Nsik_NNP District_NNP is_VBZ bounded_VBN on_IN the_DT north_NN by_IN Khndesh_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT east_NN by_IN the_DT Nizam_NNP 's_POS dominions_NNS ;_: on_IN the_DT south_NN by_IN the_DT Ahmednagar_NNP District_NNP ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN by_IN Thana_NNP ,_, the_DT State_NNP of_IN Dharampur_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Songad_NNP division_NN of_IN the_DT Gaekwar_NNP 's_POS territory_NN ._.
Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
The_DT climate_NN varies_VBZ considerably_RB in_IN different_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, the_DT extremes_NNS of_IN heat_NN and_CC cold_NN being_VBG greater_JJR towards_IN the_DT east_NN ._.
For_IN a_DT short_JJ period_NN in_IN each_DT year_NN extreme_NN cold_NN and_CC extreme_NN heat_NN are_VBP experienced_VBN ,_, the_DT extreme_JJ cold_NN usually_RB in_IN January_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT extreme_JJ heat_NN in_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN April_NNP ._.
Occasionally_RB in_IN May_NNP ,_, the_DT thermometer_NN rises_VBZ to_TO 102_CD ,_, and_CC during_IN exceptionally_RB cold_JJ weather_NN in_IN December_NNP and_CC the_DT early_JJ part_NN of_IN January_NNP ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN known_VBN to_TO fall_VB as_RB low_JJ as_IN 27_CD ._.
Nsik_NNP is_VBZ one_CD of_IN the_DT healthiest_JJS districts_NNS in_IN Western_JJ India_NNP ._.
The_DT rainfall_NN is_VBZ heavy_JJ in_IN the_DT hill-tracts_NNS in_IN the_DT west_NN ,_, moderate_JJ in_IN the_DT centre_NN ,_, and_CC uncertain_JJ and_CC scanty_NN in_IN the_DT east_NN ._.
With_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT soil_NN ,_, little_JJ need_NN be_VB said_VBD in_IN a_DT geological_JJ point_NN of_IN view_NN ._.
The_DT valleys_NNS are_VBP filled_VBN with_IN disintegrated_JJ basalt_NN of_IN various_JJ shades_NNS ,_, from_IN grey_NN to_TO black_JJ ,_, washed_VBD down_RB by_IN rain_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ of_IN an_DT argillaceous_JJ nature_NN ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ colour_NN depends_VBZ greatly_RB upon_IN the_DT organic_JJ matter_NN it_PRP has_VBZ imbibed_VBN ,_, or_CC the_DT length_NN of_IN time_NN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT air_NN ._.
The_DT red_JJ soil_NN is_VBZ less_RBR common_JJ and_CC more_RBR tenacious_JJ than_IN in_IN most_JJS districts_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT authentic_JJ record_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Nsik_NNP District_NNP previous_JJ to_TO 1896_CD ._.
Plague_NN in_IN the_DT Nsik_NNP District_NNP ._.
December_NNP 1896_CD to_TO March_NNP 1898_CD ._.
First_RB Epidemic_NNP (_( July_NNP 1897-March_JJ 1893_CD )_) .-Imported_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN were_VBD discovered_VBN in_IN this_DT District_NNP as_RB early_RB as_IN December_NNP 1896_CD ,_, and_CC from_IN that_DT date_NN to_TO the_DT middle_NN of_IN May_NNP 1897_CD forty-seven_NN such_JJ cases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN different_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT district_NN ._.
No_DT further_JJ case_NN was_VBD observed_VBN up_RP to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN July_NNP ._.
At_IN this_DT time_NN it_PRP was_VBD rumoured_VBN that_IN plague_NN existed_VBD at_IN Igatpuri_NNP ,_, an_DT important_JJ town_NN situated_VBN on_IN the_DT G._NNP I._NNP P._NNP Railway_NNP ,_, 28_CD miles_NNS from_IN Nsik_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT direction_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
The_DT Collector_NNP at_IN once_RB visited_VBN the_DT town_NN with_IN Major_NNP A._NN V._NNP Anderson_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, and_CC from_IN the_DT inquiries_NNS they_PRP instituted_VBD ,_, it_PRP was_VBD ascertained_VBN that_IN plague_NN really_RB existed_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN cases_NNS had_VBD been_VBN occurring_VBG for_IN about_IN a_DT fortnight_JJ previous_JJ to_TO their_PRP$ visit_NN ._.
Indigenous_JJ plague_NN may_MD ,_, therefore_VB ,_, be_VB said_VBD to_TO have_VB commenced_VBN in_IN the_DT district_NN towards_IN the_DT latter_JJ part_NN of_IN July_NNP 1897_CD ._.
The_DT infection_NN is_VBZ attributed_VBN to_TO two_CD cases_NNS imported_VBN from_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD remarkable_JJ that_IN ,_, in_IN spite_NN of_IN the_DT comparatively_RB large_JJ number_NN of_IN imported_VBN cases_NNS which_WDT occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, indigenous_JJ plague_NN did_VBD not_RB show_VB itself_PRP for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN ,_, -_: especially_RB in_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Nsik_NNP ,_, where_WRB as_RB many_JJ as_IN 86_CD imported_JJ cases-26_NN from_IN Igatpuri_NNP alone-were_RB discovered_VBD before_IN the_DT first_JJ indigenous_JJ case_NN occurred_VBD on_IN 12th_CD October_NNP 1897_CD ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP Maynard_NNP ,_, comments_NNS on_IN these_DT facts_NNS as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: *_NN Bombay_NNP Gazetteer_NNP ,_, Vol_NNP ._.

VIII_NNP ._.
Dr._NNP Maynard_NNP refers_NNS to_TO the_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS subse-_JJ quent_NN to_TO the_DT 18th_CD August_NNP 1897_CD ._.
``_`` The_DT above_JJ facts_NNS ,_, at_IN least_JJS as_RB far_RB as_IN Nsik_NNP is_VBZ concerned_VBN ,_, show_VBP a_DT peculiarity_NN as_IN regards_NNS this_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, viz._NN ,_, that_IN no_DT less_JJR than_IN 26_CD cases_NNS 01_CD a_DT virulent_NN type_NN or_CC the_DT disease_NN (_( these_DT cases_NNS showed_VBD a_DT mortality_NN of_IN 92.73_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
)_) ,_, nearly_RB all_DT in_IN the_DT same_JJ quarter_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN (_( Kjipura_NNP and_CC its_PRP$ vicinity_NN )_) ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT conditions_NNS seemed_VBD to_TO be_VB peculiarly_RB favourable_JJ for_IN its_PRP$ becoming_VBG indigenous_JJ ,_, occurred_VBD before_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT local_JJ residents_NNS contracted_VBD the_DT disease_NN ._. ''_''
With_IN Igatpuri_NNP infected_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, it_PRP was_VBD no_RB longer_RBR possible_JJ to_TO ward_VB off_RP an_DT outbreak_NN ,_, and_CC several_JJ places_NNS in_IN the_DT Tluka_NNP ,_, including_VBG Deolli_NNP ,_, Nndgaon_NNP ._.
and_CC Ghoti_NNP ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN Ambe_NNP in_IN the_DT Dindori_NNP Tluka_NNP and_CC Khede_NNP in_IN the_DT Niphd_NNP Tluka_NNP ,_, were_VBD soon_RB infected_VBN ,_, with_IN the_DT result_NN that_WDT during_IN the_DT months_NNS of_IN August_NNP and_CC September_NNP 1897_CD ,_, 393_CD attacks_NNS and_CC 309_CD deaths_NNS were_VBD reported_VBN ._.
The_DT next_JJ place_NN of_IN importance_NN attacked_VBN was_VBD Manmd_NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT infection_NN is_VBZ stated_VBN to_TO be_VB due_JJ to_TO an_DT arrival_NN from_IN Sirr_NNP in_IN the_DT Poona_NNP District_NNP ,_, which_WDT at_IN the_DT time_NN was_VBD infected_VBN ._.
The_DT epidemic_NN ,_, which_WDT had_VBD so_RB long_RB menaced_JJ Nsik_NNP Town_NNP itself_PRP ,_, at_IN last_JJ broke_VBD out_RP ,_, and_CC the_DT first_JJ case_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD discovered_VBN on_IN 12th_CD October_NNP 1897_CD ,_, is_VBZ thus_RB referred_VBN to_TO by_IN Dr._NNP Maynard_NNP :_: -_: ``_`` The_DT first_JJ case_NN in_IN which_WDT exposure_NN to_TO infection_NN by_IN the_DT patient_NN had_VBD not_RB occurred_VBN outside_IN Nsik_NNP Town_NNP was_VBD that_IN of_IN a_DT Mussalmn_NNP ,_, who_WP ,_, on_IN the_DT 12th_CD October_NNP 1897_CD ,_, was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN in_IN a_DT house_NN in_IN the_DT same_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN in_IN which_WDT most_JJS of_IN the_DT imported_JJ cases_NNS had_VBD been_VBN found_VBN ;_: and_CC which_WDT afterwards_NNS furnished_VBD the_DT greatest_JJS number_NN of_IN local_JJ cases_NNS ,_, and_CC was_VBD the_DT first_JJ to_TO be_VB vacated_VBN ._.
This_DT house_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN also_RB occupied_JJ just_RB previously_RB by_IN seven_CD people_NNS who_WP had_VBD come_VBN direct_JJ from_IN Igatpuri_NNP ._.
These_DT people_NNS had_VBD stayed_VBN in_IN the_DT house_NN for_IN a_DT few_JJ days_NNS ,_, when_WRB one_CD of_IN their_PRP$ number_NN was_VBD taken_VBN ill_NN ;_: and_CC they_PRP returned_VBD at_IN once_RB to_TO Igatpuri_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT one_CD taken_VBN ill_NN died_VBD ._. ''_''
The_DT manner_NN of_IN dissemination_NN was_VBD obscure_JJ ;_: but_CC in_IN Dr._NNP Maynard_NNP 's_POS opinion_NN rats_NNS were_VBD apparently_RB closely_RB connected_VBN with_IN it-_JJ ``_`` As_IN bearing_NN on_IN the_DT question_NN it_PRP may_MD be_VB stated_VBN that_IN on_IN the_DT two_CD days_NNS immediately_RB preceding_VBG the_DT discovery_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ local_JJ case_NN ,_, about_IN a_DT dozen_NN dead_JJ rats_NNS were_VBD found_VBN in_IN the_DT immediate_JJ vici-_JJ nity_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN in_IN which_WDT it_PRP occurred_VBD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ unfortunate_JJ that_IN no_DT material_NN was_VBD available_JJ by_IN which_WDT a_DT bacteriological_JJ examination_NN of_IN these_DT dead_JJ rats_NNS could_MD be_VB made_VBN ._.
The_DT local_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD at_IN first_JJ confined_VBN to_TO that_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT first_JJ one_CD occurred_VBN ,_, a_DT quarter_NN consisting_VBG chiefly_NN of_IN small_JJ dark_JJ grass-roofed_JJ huts_NNS inhabited_VBN by_IN poor_JJ Mahomedans_NNPS ._.
In_IN a_DT great_JJ many_JJ cases_NNS the_DT source_NN of_IN infection_NN could_MD be_VB directly_RB traced_VBN to_TO another_DT cause_NN ._. ''_''
During_IN this_DT month_NN Sinnar_NNP also_RB had_VBD to_TO be_VB added_VBN to_TO the_DT list_NN of_IN infected_JJ places_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT returns_NNS number_NN 197_CD cases_NNS and_CC 164_CD deaths_NNS ._.
The_DT early_JJ measures_NNS adopted_VBN throughout_IN the_DT District_NNP are_VBP thus_RB described_VBN by_IN the_DT Collector_NN :_: -_: ``_`` In_IN March_NNP 1897_CD ,_, Hospital_NNP Assistants_NNPS were_VBD deputed_VBN to_TO Igatpuri_NNP ,_, Mnmad_NNP ,_, and_CC Nsik_NNP Road_NNP Stations_NNP to_TO examine_VB passengers_NNS ,_, and_CC additional_JJ police_NN were_VBD sent_VBN there_RB to_TO assist_VB them_PRP ._.
Isolation_NN sheds_NNS were_VBD erected_VBN at_IN several_JJ places_NNS ,_, and_CC orders_NNS were_VBD issued_VBN to_TO the_DT Mmlatdrs_NNP to_TO make_VB strict_JJ enquiries_NNS in_IN every_DT village_NN into_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN death_NN ,_, especially_RB where_WRB there_EX was_VBD an_DT allegation_NN of_IN fever_NN ._.
Comparison_NNP of_IN death_NN statistics_NNS was_VBD directed_VBN to_TO be_VB made_VBN in_IN large_JJ towns_NNS ,_, and_CC village_NN plague_NN authorities_NNS were_VBD appointed_VBN througout_IN the_DT district_NN ._.
The_DT Station_NNP Master_NNP at_IN the_DT Nsik_NNP Road_NNP Station_NNP was_VBD directed_VBN to_TO make_VB such_JJ arrangements_NNS on_IN the_DT station_NN as_IN would_MD make_VB passengers_NNS alighting_VBG on_IN it_PRP pass_VBZ out_RP by_IN such_JJ exits_NNS as_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP prescribed_VBD for_IN facilitating_VBG medical_JJ inspection_NN ._.
Nos_NNP ._.
6_CD and_CC 7_CD of_IN the_DT plague_NN rules_NNS were_VBD applied_VBN to_TO the_DT towns_NNS of_IN Nsik_NNP ,_, Igatpuri_NNP ,_, Mlegaon_NNP ,_, Manmd_NNP ,_, Nndgaon_NNP ,_, Yeola_NNP ,_, and_CC Trimbak_NNP ._. ''_''
These_DT measures_NNS were_VBD gradually_RB supplemented_VBN by_IN others_NNS ,_, and_CC from_IN about_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN October_NNP 1897_CD the_DT measures_NNS actively_RB employed_VBN to_TO combat_VB the_DT disease_NN were-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) An_DT isolated_JJ plague_NN hospital_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Health_NNP and_CC segregation_NN camps_NNS for_IN contacts_NNS ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) Observation_NN camps_NNS for_IN suspects_NNS ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) Disinfection_NN of_IN houses_NNS (_( either_RB infected_VBN or_CC in_IN close_JJ proximity_NN to_TO such_JJ )_) ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) Evacuation_NN 217_CD NASIK_NNP DISTRICT_NNP ._. ]_NN
(_( 6_CD )_) Defence_NN of_IN the_DT roads_NNS leading_VBG into_IN the_DT town_NN by_IN ten_JJ clays_NNS '_POS detention_NN for_IN arrivals_NNS from_IN infected_JJ places_NNS ,_, and_CC surveillance_NN of_IN new_JJ arrivals_NNS ._.
(_( 7_CD )_) The_DT ward_NN system_NN ._.
(_( 8_CD )_) Corpse_NNP inspection_NN ._.
In_IN addition_NN to_TO these_DT ,_, Railway_NNP Camps_NNP were_VBD established_VBN at_IN Mnmad_NNP ,_, Igatpuri_NNP ,_, and_CC Nsik_NNP Road_NNP ._.
The_DT Observation_NNP Camp_NNP at_IN Yeola_NNP must_MD be_VB noticed_VBN ;_: the_DT Collector_NNP says-_NN ``_`` An_DT observation_NN camp_NN on_IN a_DT small_JJ scale_NN was_VBD maintained_VBN at_IN Yeola_NNP by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP from_IN the_DT 12th_CD December_NNP 1897_CD to_TO 80th_CD April_NNP 1898_CD ._.
There_EX were_VBD from_IN first_JJ to_TO last_JJ 315_CD admissions_NNS from_IN infected_JJ places_NNS ._.
Ten_CD days_NNS '_POS detention_NN was_VBD enforced_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT detained_VBN were_VBD ,_, with_IN their_PRP$ belongings_NNS ,_, disinfected_VBN on_IN arrival_NN ._.
Not_RB a_DT single_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT camp_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP attributes_VBZ this_DT to_TO the_DT thoroughness_NN of_IN the_DT disinfection_NN ._.

''_''

Nsik_JJ Town_NNP Population-24,429_NNP ._.
In_IN Nsik_NNP Town_NNP these_DT measures_NNS were_VBD introduced_VBN within_IN a_DT week_NN or_CC two_CD of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ case_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN evacuation_NN and_CC the_DT ward_NN system_NN ._.

7th_CD January_NNP 1898_CD 49_CD 45_CD 14th_CD January_NNP 1898_CD 32_CD 32_CD 21st_CD January_NNP 1898_CD 18_CD 12_CD 28th_CD January_NNP 1898_CD 7_CD 9_CD Total_NN for_IN January_NNP 1898_CD 106_CD 98_CD February_NNP 1898_CD (_( 4_CD weeks_NNS )_) 18_CD 15_CD March_NNP 1898_CD (_( 4_CD weeks_NNS )_) 20_CD 12_CD April_NNP 1898_CD (_( 5_CD weeks_NNS )_) 1_CD 1_CD Total_JJ 145_CD 126_CD 4_CD months_NNS subsequent_JJ to_TO evacuation_NN ._.
By_IN the_DT 22nd_CD December_NNP 1897_CD the_DT west_NN and_CC south_JJ portions_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN lay_VBD empty_JJ ._.
In_IN that_DT week_NN the_DT disease_NN appeared_VBD amongst_IN the_DT Brahmins_NNS :_: whereupon_IN the_DT Dingerali_NNP block_NN near_IN the_DT river_NN was_VBD vacated_VBN during_IN the_DT following_JJ week_NN ._.
Coolies_NNS were_VBD sent_VBN from_IN Bombay_NNP to_TO assist_VB in_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN disinfection_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Stewart_NNP says_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` We_PRP have_VBP nine_CD disinfecting_VBG parties_NNS at_IN work_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP putting_VBG on_IN two_CD more_JJR ,_, as_IN ,_, there_EX seems_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN the_DT whole_JJ town_NN must_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN ._. ''_''
On_IN the_DT 29th_CD December_NNP Mr._NNP Stewart_NNP reports_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` There_EX has_VBZ been_VBN an_DT increase_NN of_IN three_CD cases_NNS over_IN last_JJ week_NN ,_, though_RB two_CD days_NNS during_IN the_DT week_NN were_VBD bad_JJ ,_, showing_VBG twelve_NN and_CC nine_CD cases_NNS ._.
These_DT nearly_RB all_DT occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT thickly_JJ popu-_NN lated_VBD centre_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, and_CC some_DT half_JJ dozen_NN cases_NNS were_VBD members_NNS of_IN three_CD or_CC four_CD households_NNS related_VBN to_TO one_CD another_DT ._.
I_PRP have_VBP now_RB ordered_VBN six_CD more_JJR blocks_NNS covering_VBG this_DT portion_NN to_TO be_VB vacated_VBN ,_, and_CC am_VBP making_VBG every_DT effort_NN to_TO get_VB the_DT people_NNS to_TO live_VB in_IN the_DT health_NN camp_NN instead_RB of_IN going_VBG to_TO villages_VB round_NN about_IN ._.
A_DT circular_NN has_VBZ been_VBN sent_VBN to_TO all_DT village_NN officers_NNS that_IN they_PRP will_MD be_VB strictly_RB held_VBN responsible_JJ if_IN they_PRP allow_VBP plague_NN to_TO enter_VB their_PRP$ villages_NNS ._. ''_''
The_DT Bombay_NNP coolies_NNS were_VBD sent_VBN back_RB on_IN the_DT 6th_CD January_NNP 1898_CD ,_, their_PRP$ work_NN being_VBG un-_JJ satisfactory_NN :_: and_CC local_JJ labour_NN replaced_VBD them_PRP ._.
``_`` Almost_RB the_DT whole_JJ city_NN is_VBZ empty_JJ ,_, ''_'' writes_VBZ Mr._NNP Stewart_NNP on_IN the_DT 10th_CD January_NNP 1898_CD ,_, ``_`` even_RB those_DT blocks_NNS which_WDT have_VBP not_RB been_VBN formally_RB emptied_JJ having_VBG very_RB few_JJ inhabitants_NNS ._. ''_''
During_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG the_DT 13th_CD January_NNP 1898_CD a_DT decrease_NN took_VBD place_NN ,_, but_CC Mr._NNP Stewart_NNP was_VBD sceptical_JJ :_: -_: ``_`` There_EX has_VBZ been_VBN an_DT appreciable_JJ decrease_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN ,_, ''_'' he_PRP writes_VBZ ``_`` (_( 31_CD against_IN 49_CD )_) ,_, though_IN I_PRP should_MD not_RB like_VB to_TO say_VB that_IN we_PRP have_VBP got_VBN control_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ..._: ._. and_CC I_PRP am_VBP not_RB satisfied_JJ that_IN we_PRP are_VBP getting_VBG all_PDT the_DT cases_NNS that_WDT occur_VBP amongst_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN the_DT fields_NNS ._. ''_''
And_CC indeed_RB no_DT less_JJR than_IN 9_CD dead_JJ bodies_NNS were_VBD found_VBN ._.
The_DT following_JJ week_NN ,_, although_IN the_DT decrease_NN continued_VBD ,_, it_PRP was_VBD the_DT same_JJ complaint_NN :_: -_: ``_`` The_DT city_NN is_VBZ practically_RB free_JJ of_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC disinfection_NN of_IN entire_JJ blocks_NNS is_VBZ being_VBG steadily_RB pushed_VBN on_IN ._.

Of_IN the_DT 7_CD cases_NNS reported_VBD ,_, 5_CD were_VBD found_VBN dead_JJ ,_, and_CC more_JJR outside_JJ inspection_NN than_IN we_PRP can_MD manage_VB seems_VBZ needed_VBN ._. ''_''
This_DT end_NN was_VBD ultimately_RB compassed_VBN by_IN detailing_VBG a_DT Superintendent_NN and_CC a_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP to_TO visit_VB outlying_VBG camps_NNS daily_RB :_: a_DT measure_NN which_WDT was_VBD instituted_VBN the_DT following_JJ week_NN ._.
As_IN the_DT evacuation_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN was_VBD practically_RB complete_JJ by_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN January_NNP 1898_CD ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ perhaps_RB not_RB unreasonable_JJ to_TO infer_VB that_IN the_DT sudden_JJ subsidence_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD largely_RB due_JJ to_TO that_DT measure_NN ,_, especially_RB if_IN it_PRP be_VB taken_VBN in_IN conjunction_NN with_IN other_JJ towns_NNS ,_, which_WDT ,_, under_IN similar_JJ circumstances_NNS ,_, present_VBP the_DT same_JJ phenomena_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, inclusive_NN of_IN the_DT figures_NNS quoted_VBN in_IN the_DT tables_NNS above_IN ,_, there_EX were_VBD 61_CD cases_NNS and_CC 467_CD deaths_NNS in_IN the_DT months_NNS of_IN November_NNP and_CC December_NNP ,_, and_CC 568_CD cases_NNS with_IN 48_CD deaths_NNS in_IN January_NNP and_CC February_NNP 1898_CD ._.
There_EX was_VBD an_DT appreciable_JJ reduction_NN in_IN March_NNP -_: NASIK_NNP DISTRICT_NNP ._. ]_NN
219_CD 210_CD cases_NNS ,_, 167_CD deaths-and_NN then_RB a_DT sudden_JJ decline_NN ._.
By_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN April_NNP the_DT District_NNP was_VBD practically_RB free_JJ from_IN plague_NN and_CC a_DT blank_JJ report_NN was_VBD submitted_VBN for_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 13th_CD May_NNP 1898_CD ,_, the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS during_IN these_DT 2_CD months_NNS being_VBG 35_CD ,_, and_CC deaths_NNS 28_CD ._.
As_IN a_DT proof_NN of_IN the_DT belief_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN the_DT efficacy_NN of_IN evacuation_NN ,_, may_MD be_VB noted_VBN that_IN a_DT great_JJ many_JJ left_VBD their_PRP$ houses_NNS to_TO camp_VB in_IN the_DT jungle_NN without_IN in_IN any_DT way_NN being_VBG compelled_VBN to_TO do_VB so_RB ._.
In_IN the_DT same_JJ connection_NN also_RB ,_, Dr._NNP Maynard_NNP states_NNS :_: -_: ``_`` Taking_VBG the_DT experience_NN of_IN Nsik_NNP Town_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT villages_NNS of_IN the_DT District_NNP in_IN which_WDT the_DT epidemic_NN appeared_VBD ,_, the_DT preventive_JJ measure_NN as_IN regards_NNS the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, which_WDT seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB of_IN by_IN far_RB the_DT greatest_JJS value_NN ,_, is_VBZ the_DT vacation_NN of_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT houses_NNS ,_, with_IN control_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN properly-arranged_JJ camps_NNS on_IN selected_VBN sites_NNS ,_, with_IN thorough_JJ disinfection_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT houses_NNS in_IN which_WDT cases_NNS have_VBP occurred_VBN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN those_DT in_IN their_PRP$ immediate_JJ vicinity_NN ,_, combined_VBN with_IN all_DT possible_JJ improvements_NNS in_IN general_JJ sanitation_NN ._. ''_''
It_PRP is_VBZ worthy_JJ of_IN mention_NN that_IN the_DT G._NNP I._NNP P._NNP Railway_NNP Company_NNP set_VBD aside_RB 150_CD empty_JJ wagons_NNS for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN their_PRP$ native_JJ employs_NNS at_IN Igatpuri_NNP ._.
The_DT result_NN is_VBZ declared_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN in_IN the_DT highest_JJS degree_JJ beneficial_NN ._.
From_IN five_CD to_TO seven_CD hundred_CD people_NNS were_VBD comfortably_RB accom-_JJ modated_VBN in_IN the_DT wagons_NNS at_IN the_DT time_NN when_WRB the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD at_IN its_PRP$ height_NN ,_, and_CC not_RB a_DT single_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN occurred_VBD among_IN them_PRP ._.
Re-occupation_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN by_IN blocks_NNS was_VBD permitted_VBN from_IN the_DT 16th_CD of_IN Februray_NN 1898_CD ,_, and_CC by_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN April_NNP the_DT whole_JJ town_NN was_VBD thrown_VBN open_JJ ._.

But_CC the_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS were_VBD apparently_RB not_RB eager_JJ to_TO re-enter_VB it_PRP ,_, as_IN they_PRP remained_VBD in_IN camp_NN till_IN the_DT approach_NN of_IN the_DT rains_NNS ._.
Malegaon_NNP ._.
One_CD of_IN the_DT worst_JJS affected_JJ places_NNS in_IN the_DT Nsik_NNP District_NNP was_VBD Malegaon-a_NNP town_NN not_RB only_RB important_JJ in_IN itself_PRP ,_, but_CC practically_RB the_DT gate_NN of_IN the_DT yet_RB un-_JJ stricken_JJ District_NNP of_IN Khandesh_NNP ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ a_DT considerable_JJ popula-_JJ tion_NN ,_, numbering_VBG about_IN 15,502_CD ,_, who_WP maintain_VBP constant_JJ intercourse_NN with_IN the_DT surrounding_VBG country_NN ,_, more_RBR especially_RB with_IN Nsik_NNP on_IN the_DT one_CD side_NN and_CC Dhulia_NNP and_CC Chalisgaon_NNP on_IN the_DT other_JJ ._.
Freedom_NN from_IN imported_VBN plague_NN could_MD ,_, under_IN the_DT circumstances_NNS ,_, hardly_RB be_VB hoped_VBN for_IN :_: which_WDT ,_, indeed_RB ,_, began_VBD to_TO occur_VB as_RB early_RB as_IN January_NNP or_CC February_NNP 1897_CD ._.
But_CC the_DT authorities_NNS were_VBD on_IN the_DT alert_NN and_CC took_VBD prompt_NN measures_NNS to_TO segregate_VB such_JJ cases_NNS ._.
After_IN the_DT rains_NNS of_IN 1897_CD ,_, Mr._NNP A._NNP H._NNP A._NNP Simcox_NNP ,_, I._NNP C._NNP S._NNP ,_, Assistant_NNP Collector_NNP ,_, organized_VBN systematic_JJ preventive_JJ measures_NNS and_CC had_VBD the_DT Girna_NNP bridge_NN and_CC the_DT fords_NNS of_IN the_DT Girna_NNP river_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP closely_RB watched_VBD ._.
He_PRP called_VBD in_IN the_DT aid_NN of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioners_NNP ,_, and_CC succeeded_VBD in_IN establishing_VBG house-to-house_JJ inspection_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT town_NN had_VBD no_DT natural_JJ barriers_NNS ,_, and_CC with_IN a_DT limited_JJ establishment_NN it_PRP was_VBD impossible_JJ to_TO detect_VB each_DT and_CC every_DT person_NN entering_VBG it_PRP ._.
An_DT old_JJ woman_NN from_IN Bombay_NNP evaded_VBD the_DT guard_NN ,_, entered_VBD the_DT town_NN and_CC developed_VBD plague_NN ._.
The_DT case_NN was_VBD ,_, indeed_RB ,_, detected_VBD on_IN November_NNP 12th_CD ,_, but_CC the_DT infection_NN had_VBD already_RB been_VBN communicated_VBN ._.
Next_JJ day_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Simcox_NNP arrived_VBD and_CC found_VBD that_IN measures_NNS had_VBD already_RB been_VBN taken_VBN in_IN hand_NN ._.
A_DT rest-house_NN was_VBD turned_VBN into_IN a_DT hospital_NN ,_, a_DT godown_NN into_IN a_DT segregation_NN camp_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT block_NN of_IN houses_NNS was_VBD evacuated_VBN ._.
Disinfection_NN with_IN fire_NN and_CC chemicals_NNS was_VBD started_VBN ,_, while_IN a_DT good_JJ many_JJ people_NNS left_VBD the_DT town_NN ._.
The_DT week_NN 's_POS record_NN numbered_VBD 9_CD cases_NNS and_CC 6_CD deaths_NNS :_: in_IN the_DT following_JJ week_NN there_EX were_VBD 7_CD cases_NNS and_CC 5_CD deaths_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 3rd_CD December_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS was_VBD further_RBR reduced_VBN to_TO 4_CD ,_, of_IN which_WDT 3_CD proved_VBD fatal_JJ ._.
Every_DT hope_NN was_VBD entertained_VBN that_IN the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD nipped_VBN in_IN the_DT bud_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT meanwhile_NN ,_, an_DT English_JJ Doctor_NNP had_VBD arrived_VBN ,_, and_CC a_DT Commission_NNP ,_, consisting_VBG of_IN Mr._NNP Wingate_NNP ,_, Surgeon-General_JJ 220_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
VIII_NNP ._.
Cleghorn_NNP ,_, and_CC Colonel_NNP Hay_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, visited_VBD the_DT town_NN ,_, and_CC expressed_VBD satisfaction_NN with_IN the_DT arrangements_NNS ._.
Among_IN the_DT people_NNS who_WP were_VBD turned_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT infected_JJ block_NN were_VBD certain_JJ Kunbis_NNP who_WP went_VBD into_IN their_PRP$ fields_NNS ._.
These_DT people_NNS stealthily_RB visited_VBD the_DT infected_JJ quarters_NNS and_CC kept_VBD the_DT plague_NN alive_JJ amongst_IN the_DT evacuated_JJ population_NN ._.
The_DT result_NN was_VBD a_DT re-introduction_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN into_IN the_DT town_NN by_IN their_PRP$ means_NNS ._.
It_PRP was_VBD now_RB necessary_JJ to_TO carry_VB out_RP measures_NNS on_IN a_DT much_RB larger_JJR scale_NN ._.
Accordingly_RB ,_, groups_NNS of_IN huts_NNS for_IN a_DT Hospital_NNP and_CC a_DT Health_NNP Camp_NNP were_VBD built_VBN on_IN an_DT excellent_JJ plan_NN outside_IN the_DT town_NN and_CC large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN people_NNS vacated_VBN their_PRP$ houses_NNS ._.
In_IN December_NNP a_DT Staff_NNP Corps_NNP Officer_NNP arrived_VBD ,_, while_IN the_DT Staff_NNP was_VBD augmented_VBN by_IN an_DT Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, 2_CD or_CC 3_CD Hospital_JJ Assistants_NNS ,_, an_DT Abkari_NNP Inspector_NNP and_CC a_DT Municipal_JJ Sani-_NNP tary_JJ Inspector_NNP ._.
Miss_NNP Clark_NNP and_CC Miss_NNP Fulcher_NNP of_IN the_DT Zenana_NNP Mission_NNP voluntarily_RB rendered_VBD the_DT greatest_JJS assistance_NN at_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT disease_NN scarcely_RB seemed_VBD to_TO yield_VB ,_, as_IN the_DT following_JJ figures_NNS will_MD show_VB :_: -_: Week_IN ending_VBG Cases_NNS ._.

70_CD 62_CD Total_JJ 231_CD 174_CD The_DT Hospital_NNP and_CC Camp_NNP had_VBD already_RB outgrown_VBN their_PRP$ former_JJ size_NN ,_, but_CC were_VBD not_RB yet_RB large_JJ enough_RB to_TO accommodate_VB the_DT number_NN requiring_VBG admission_NN ._.
The_DT Camp_NNP was_VBD therefore_RB rapidly_RB enlarged_VBD and_CC the_DT whole_JJ remaining_VBG population_NN transferred_VBD thither_RB ._.

The_DT weavers_NNS had_VBD special_JJ sheds_NNS constructed_VBN for_IN them_PRP in_IN which_WDT they_PRP erected_VBD their_PRP$ looms_NNS ._.

1_CD Total_JJ 146_CD 126_CD MALEGAON_NNP Population_NNP 15,502_CD ._.
NASIK_NNP DISTRICT_NNP ._.
221_CD Tube_NNP following_VBG incident_NN is_VBZ related_VBN ._.
On_IN the_DT 9th_CD February_NNP there_EX was_VBD a_DT heavy_JJ storm_NN ._.
``_`` The_DT people_NNS ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Mr._NNP Simcox_NNP ,_, ``_`` came_VBD en_RB masse_NN to_TO my_PRP$ bungalow_NN and_CC threatened_VBD me_PRP ,_, and_CC I_PRP was_VBD down_RB at_IN the_DT Health_NNP Camp_NNP for_IN some_DT five_CD hours_NNS with_IN the_DT other_JJ officers_NNS and_CC gentle-_JJ men_NNS arguing_VBG with_IN the_DT angry_JJ mob_NN ,_, and_CC even_RB so_RB had_VBD to_TO leave_VB them_PRP without_IN coming_VBG to_TO any_DT definite_JJ arrangement_NN ,_, though_RB at_IN least_JJS a_DT riot_NN was_VBD averted_VBN ._. ''_''
The_DT final_JJ arrangement_NN made_VBD was_VBD that_IN the_DT weaving_VBG men_NNS should_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO weave_VB in_IN their_PRP$ town_NN workshops_NNS by_IN day_NN ,_, sleeping_VBG in_IN the_DT Health_NNP Camp_NNP ,_, where_WRB all_DT drying_NN and_CC stretching_NN of_IN thread_NN ,_, and_CC household_NN work_NN ,_, was_VBD still_RB to_TO be_VB done_VBN ._.
This_DT arrangement_NN was_VBD successful_JJ and_CC prevented_VBD a_DT fresh_JJ outbreak_NN ,_, which_WDT would_MD probably_RB have_VB occurred_VBN as_IN at_IN other_JJ places_NNS ,_, had_VBD the_DT people_NNS been_VBN ,_, allowed_VBN to_TO re-occupy_VB the_DT town_NN ._.
The_DT partial_JJ re-occupation_NN had_VBD also_RB another_DT effect_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, that_IN of_IN testing_VBG the_DT efficacy_NN of_IN the_DT disinfection_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT 23rd_CD March_NNP 1898_CD ,_, re-occupation_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN was_VBD permitted_VBN and_CC was_VBD not_RB attended_VBN with_IN a_DT single_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
Second_JJ Epidemic_NNP (_( August_NNP 1898-May_CD 1899_CD )_) .-After_NN being_VBG entirely_RB free_JJ for_IN over_IN two_CD months_NNS and_CC a_DT half_NN ,_, Nsik_NNP District_NNP was_VBD again_RB affected_JJ to_TO wards_VB the_DT beginning_NN of_IN August_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC during_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG the_DT 5th_CD of_IN that_DT month_NN ,_, 22_CD cases_NNS were_VBD reported_VBN from_IN Vinchur_NNP in_IN the_DT Niphd_NNP Tluka_NNP ,_, and_CC d_JJ cases_NNS from_IN Anjanneri_NNP in_IN the_DT Nsik_NNP Tluka_NNP ._.
Neither_DT of_IN these_DT places_NNS was_VBD infected_VBN during_IN the_DT previous_JJ epidemic_NN ;_: nor_CC is_VBZ the_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN at_IN Vinchur_NNP traceable_JJ ;_: the_DT infection_NN of_IN Anjanneri_NNP is_VBZ attributed_VBN to_TO intercourse_VB with_IN the_DT Konkan_NNP ._.
Next_JJ week_NN 23_CD cases_NNS were_VBD reported_VBN ;_: but_CC in_IN the_DT succeeding_NN weeks_NNS the_DT circle_NN of_IN infection_NN grew_VBD wider_JJR and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN attacks_NNS increased_VBN ,_, until_IN ,_, with_IN 9_CD places_NNS stricken_VBN ,_, it_PRP reached_VBD the_DT total_NN of_IN 176_CD in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 16th_CD September_NNP 1898_CD ;_: and_CC with_IN 15_CD infected_JJ places_NNS ,_, 203_CD in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 14th_CD October_NNP 1898_CD ._.
Almost_RB at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN this_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, strict_JJ instructions_NNS had_VBD been_VBN issued_VBN by_IN the_DT Collector_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Moore_NNP ,_, to_TO the_DT effect_NN that_IN as_RB soon_RB as_IN 2_CD cases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN a_DT village_NN ,_, it_PRP should_MD at_IN once_RB be_VB evacuated_VBN ._.
The_DT inhabitants_NNS were_VBD ordered_VBN to_TO reside_VB in_IN huts_NNS in_IN the_DT village_NN fields_NNS ._.
Disinfection_NN was_VBD secured_VBN by_IN unroofing_VBG houses_NNS and_CC leaving_VBG them_PRP open_JJ (_( the_DT doors_NNS and_CC windows_NNS being_VBG barred_VBN with_IN bamboos_NN to_TO prevent_VB ingress_NN )_) ,_, and_CC exposing_VBG their_PRP$ contents_NNS to_TO the_DT sun_NN for_IN 3_CD days_NNS ._.
If_IN any_DT cases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN huts_NNS ,_, they_PRP were_VBD pulled_VBN down_RB and_CC the_DT materials_NNS allowed_VBD to_TO be_VB used_VBN after_IN exposure_NN to_TO the_DT sun_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT site_NN of_IN the_DT hut_NN was_VBD not_RB permitted_VBN to_TO be_VB built_VBN upon_IN again_RB ._.

The_DT season_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, did_VBD not_RB permit_NN of_IN thorough_JJ evacuation_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP could_MD only_RB be_VB resorted_VBN to_TO on_IN a_DT regular_JJ scale_NN about_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN November_NNP ._.
Both_DT townsmen_NNS and_CC villagers_NNS quitted_VBD their_PRP$ homes_NNS and_CC lived_VBD in_IN the_DT fields_NNS ,_, and_CC were_VBD only_RB allowed_VBN ingress_NN on_IN business_NN :_: shop-_JJ keepers_NNS attended_VBN by_IN day_NN ,_, but_CC slept_VBD in_IN the_DT fields_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT towns_NNS were_VBD guarded_VBN by_IN night_NN patrols_NNS ._.
It_PRP was_VBD then_RB that_IN the_DT weekly_JJ returns_NNS improved_VBN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 18th_CD November_NNP ,_, only_RB 30_CD cases_NNS were_VBD reported_VBN ._.
At_IN this_DT time_NN some_DT dead_JJ rats_NNS having_VBG been_VBN found_VBN in_IN the_DT village_NN of_IN Khadak_NNP Mlegaon_NNP ,_, Tluka_NNP Niphd_NNP ,_, the_DT villagers_NNS promptly_RB turned_VBD out_RP into_IN the_DT fields_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ accord_NN and_CC the_DT place_NN remained_VBD free_JJ ._.

Several_JJ villages_NNS were_VBD now_RB declared_VBN free_JJ and_CC were_VBD re-occupied_VBN in_IN January_NNP 1899_CD ,_, but_CC the_DT disquieting_JJ feature_NN was_VBD the_DT danger_NN to_TO Nsik_NNP Town_NNP ,_, through_IN imported_VBN cases_NNS ,_, which_WDT con-_VBP tinued_VBN to_TO occur_VB there_RB from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN ._.
In_IN spite_NN of_IN all_DT precautions_NNS ,_, 4_CD indigenous_JJ cases_NNS ,_, all_DT fatal_JJ ,_, took_VBD place_NN in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 20th_CD January_NNP 1899_CD ._.

Poona_NNP is_VBZ bounded_VBN on_IN the_DT north_NN by_IN Ahmednagar_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT cast_NN ,_, by_IN Ahmednagar_NNP and_CC Sholpur_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT south_NN ,_, by_IN Mlsiras_NNP in_IN Sholpur_NNP ,_, and_CC Phaltan_NNP ,_, Wi_NNP and_CC Bhor_NNP in_IN Stra_NNP ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN by_IN Roha_NNP in_IN Kolba_NNP ,_, Bhor_NNP in_IN Stra_NNP ,_, Pen_NNP in_IN Kolba_NNP ,_, and_CC Karjat_NNP and_CC Murbd_NNP in_IN Thna_NNP ._.
Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
Its_PRP$ height_NN above_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, its_PRP$ freedom_NN from_IN alluvial_JJ deposits_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT prevalence_NN of_IN westerly_JJ breezes_NNS ,_, make_VBP the_DT climate_NN of_IN Poona_NNP dry_JJ and_CC invigorating_NN and_CC better_RB suited_VBN to_TO European_JJ constitutions_NNS than_IN most_JJS Indian_JJ climates_NNS ._.
The_DT air_NN is_VBZ lighter_RBR ,_, the_DT cold_NN more_RBR bracing_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT heat_NN less_RBR oppressive_JJ than_IN in_IN most_JJS parts_NNS of_IN Western_JJ or_CC Southern_JJ India_NNP ._.
There_EX are_VBP three_CD seasons_NNS :_: the_DT cold_JJ season_NN from_IN November_NNP to_TO February_NNP ,_, the_DT hot_JJ season_NN from_IN March_NNP to_TO June_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT wet_NN season_NN from_IN June_NNP to_TO October_NNP ._.
The_DT coldest_JJS month_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN is_VBZ January_NNP ,_, The_DT soil_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP is_VBZ lighter_RBR in_IN the_DT west_NN than_IN in_IN the_DT east_NN ._.
It_PRP belongs_VBZ to_TO three_CD classes_NNS ,_, black_JJ ,_, red_JJ ,_, and_CC coarse_JJ gray_NN ._.
Poona_NNP is_VBZ crossed_VBN by_IN many_JJ rivers_NNS and_CC streams_NNS ,_, the_DT chief_NN of_IN which_WDT is_VBZ the_DT Bhima_NNP ,_, which_WDT for_IN more_JJR than_IN a_DT hundred_JJ miles_NNS forms_VBZ its_PRP$ eastern_JJ boundary_NN ._.
Dur-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT rainy_NN season_NN all_DT of_IN these_DT rivers_NNS flow_VBP with_IN a_DT magnificent_JJ volume_NN of_IN water_NN ,_, and_CC during_IN the_DT hot_JJ season_NN shrink_NN to_TO a_DT narrow_JJ thread_NN in_IN broad_JJ stretches_NNS of_IN gravel_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT authentic_JJ record_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Poona_NNP previous_JJ to_TO 1896_CD ._.
*_NN Between_NNP December_NNP 1896_CD and_CC November_NNP 1899_CD ,_, Poona_NNP City_NNP and_CC District_NNP have_VBP each_DT suffered_VBN from_IN four_CD epidemics_NNS ,_, the_DT epidemics_NNS in_IN each_DT case_NN being_VBG of_IN crescent_NN magnitude_NN ._.

First_RB Epidemic_NNP (_( January_NNP 1897-June_JJ 1897_CD )_) .-Measures_NNS for_IN the_DT protection_NN of_IN Poona_NNP (_( City_NNP were_VBD instituted_VBN as_RB early_JJ as_IN September_NNP 1896_CD :_: the_DT first_JJ of_IN such_JJ measures_NNS being_VBG Railway_NNP Medical_NNP Inspection_NNP ,_, the_DT arrange-_JJ ments_NNS for_IN which_WDT were_VBD first_RB made_VBN by_IN the_DT City_NNP and_CC Suburban_NNP Municipalities_NNP ,_, but_CC which_WDT were_VBD improved_VBN and_CC extended_VBN by_IN Government_NNP ,_, who_WP took_VBD it_PRP over_RP from_IN the_DT 21st_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ._.

224_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
VIII_NNP ._.
absence_NN of_IN any_DT segregation_NN or_CC surveillance_NN system_NN ,_, ,_, it_PRP was_VBD impossible_JJ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT impor-_JJ tation_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN persons_NNS incubating_VBG the_DT disease_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, towards_VBZ the_DT end_NN of_IN January_NNP 1897_CD ,_, was_VBD declared_VBN epidemic_JJ in_IN the_DT City_NNP ._.
In_IN March_NNP 1897_CD a_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP was_VBD appointed_VBN to_TO devise_VB and_CC introduce_VB measures_NNS to_TO deal_VB with_IN the_DT epidemic_NN ,_, the_DT President_NNP of_IN which_WDT ,_, Mr._NNP W._NNP C._NNP Rand_NNP ,_, I.C.S._NNP ,_, was_VBD murdered_VBN in_IN June_NNP 1897_CD ._.
In_IN this_DT ,_, the_DT earlier_JJR period_NN of_IN Plague_NNP history_NN ,_, the_DT panic_NN produced_VBN by_IN pesti-_JJ lence_NN ,_, the_DT stampede_NN from_IN any_DT place_NN where_WRB its_PRP$ incidence_NN was_VBD assuming_VBG serious_JJ proportions_NNS ,_, the_DT distrust_NN alike_NN of_IN hospitals_NNS and_CC treatment_NN ,_, all_DT combined_VBN to_TO hamper_VB and_CC impede_VB the_DT success_NN of_IN the_DT measures_NNS it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO introduce_VB ,_, as_IN well_RB for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN the_DT stricken_JJ people_NNS themselves_PRP as_IN for_IN the_DT protection_NN of_IN those_DT as_IN yet_RB ._.
only_RB menaced_VBD ._.
Mr._NNP Rand_NNP 's_POS description_NN of_IN the_DT situation_NN in_IN those_DT early_JJ days_NNS is_VBZ impressive_JJ :_: -_: ``_`` The_DT state_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP was_VBD one_CD of_IN panic_NN ._.
A_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT leading_VBG men_NNS of_IN the_DT place_NN had_VBD already_RB left_VBN ,_, or_CC were_VBD preparing_VBG to_TO leave_VB ,_, Poona_NNP on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN ._.
Several_JJ of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissoners_NNP and_CC Honorary_NNP Magistrates_NNP were_VBD among_IN the_DT deser-_JJ ters_NNS ._.
The_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT Gujarti_NNP and_CC Marwadi_NNP traders_NNS (_( who_WP have_VBP the_DT grain_NN trade_NN entirely_RB in_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS )_) were_VBD closing_VBG their_PRP$ shops_NNS and_CC returning_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ native_JJ countries_NNS ._.
The_DT mass_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS were_VBD ,_, as_IN a_DT natural_JJ consequence_NN of_IN their_PRP$ ignorance_NN ,_, opposed_VBN segregation_NN either_DT of_IN the_DT sick_JJ or_CC of_IN apparently_RB healthy_JJ persons_NNS who_WP had_VBD been_VBN exposed_VBN to_TO infection_NN ._.
Most_JJS of_IN the_DT influential_JJ men_NNS left_VBN in_IN the_DT town_NN declared_VBD themselves_PRP in_IN favour_NN of_IN the_DT principle_NN of_IN segre-_JJ gation_NN ,_, but_CC their_PRP$ ideas_NNS on_IN the_DT subject_NN were_VBD generally_RB crude_VBN ,_, and_CC few_JJ ,_, if_IN any_DT ,_, of_IN them_PRP were_VBD reconciled_VBN to_TO the_DT application_NN of_IN it_PRP to_TO persons_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ position_NN in_IN life_NN ._.
Another_DT fact_NN to_TO be_VB reckoned_VBN with_IN was_VBD that_IN a_DT section_NN of_IN the_DT Brahmin_NNP community_NN ,_, including_VBG some_DT of_IN the_DT most_RBS influential_JJ men_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, were_VBD disinclined_VBN to_TO support_VB any_DT measures_NNS that_WDT emanated_VBD from_IN an_DT official_JJ source_NN ,_, and_CC were_VBD more_RBR likely_JJ than_IN not_RB to_TO work_VB against_IN any_DT operations_NNS that_WDT might_MD be_VB set_VBN on_IN foot_NN by_IN Government_NNP to_TO deal_VB with_IN the_DT emergency_NN ._.
``_`` Another_DT important_JJ factor_NN ,_, too_RB ,_, in_IN ,_, the_DT situation_NN was_VBD the_DT state_NN of_IN the_DT labour_JJ market_NN Many_JJ labourers_NNS were_VBD leaving_VBG the_DT town_NN on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, and_CC owing_VBG to_TO the_DT panic_NN that_WDT prevailed_VBD ,_, those_DT who_WP remained_VBD could_MD not_RB be_VB relied_VBN ,_, on_IN to_TO work_VB regularly_RB ,_, especially_RB if_IN there_EX was_VBD an_DT element_NN of_IN danger_NN in_IN the_DT work_NN to_TO be_VB done_VBN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD difficult_JJ ,_, therefore_RB ,_, to_TO carry_VB on_IN lime-washing_JJ and_CC other_JJ measures_NNS of_IN disinfection_NN on_IN a_DT large_JJ scale_NN with_IN ,_, private_JJ labour_NN ._.
Under_IN these_DT circumstance_NN ,_, it_PRP would_MD have_VB been_VBN unsafe_JJ to_TO attempt_VB to_TO carry_VB out_RP any_DT extensive_JJ operations_NNS against_IN the_DT plague_NN without_IN a_DT disciplined_JJ and_CC reliable_JJ agency_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD of_IN the_DT utmost_JJ importance_NN to_TO crush_VB the_DT epidemic_JJ with_IN the_DT least_JJS possible_JJ delay_NN ,_, both_DT to_TO stay_VB the_DT great_JJ mortality_NN that_WDT was_VBD taking_VBG place_NN in_IN Poona_NNP and_CC to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN to_TO the_DT other_JJ towns_NNS of_IN the_DT Deccan_NNP ,_, in_IN none_NN of_IN which_WDT had_VBD it_PRP so_RB far_RB attained_JJ epidemic_JJ proportions_NNS ._. ''_''
Nevertheless_RB ,_, the_DT first_JJ epidemic_NN was_VBD of_IN short_JJ duration_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT disease_NN rapidly_RB subsided_VBD during_IN April_NNP and_CC May_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT following_VBG being_VBG the_DT total_NN recorded_VBD figures_NNS :_: -_: First_JJ Epidemic_NNP ._.
Cases_NNS ._.
Deaths_NNS ._.
20th_JJ January_NNP to_TO 27th_CD May_NNP 1887_CD .._VBD 2,854_CD 1,834_CD But_CC this_DT ,_, as_IN Mr._NNP Hand_NNP points_VBZ out_RP ,_, was_VBD probably_RB only_RB about_IN half_PDT the_DT true_JJ plague_NN mortality_NN ._.

225_CD Second_JJ Epidemic_NNP (_( July_NNP 1897-March_JJ 1898_CD )_) .-Throughout_NN June_NNP 1897_CD there_EX was_VBD an_DT Poona_NNP City_NNP ._.

These_DT hopes_NNS were_VBD not_RB realized_VBN :_: for_IN the_DT City_NNP was_VBD not_RB free_JJ from_IN plague_NN for_IN any_DT one_CD week_NN during_IN the_DT following_JJ ten_JJ months_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP soon_RB passed_VBD through_IN a_DT second_JJ epidemic_NN of_IN far_RB longer_JJR duration_NN and_CC greater_JJR severity_NN than_IN the_DT first_JJ ._.
No_DT details_NNS can_MD be_VB given_VBN for_IN this_DT second_JJ epidemic_JJ ,_, as_IN no_DT report_NN has_VBZ been_VBN received_VBN for_IN the_DT period_NN June_NNP 1897_CD to_TO June_NNP 1898_CD for_IN Poona_NNP City_NNP :_: but_CC the_DT following_JJ statement_NN shows_VBZ how_WRB ,_, from_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN September_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT figures_NNS rose_VBD steadily_RB and_CC rapidly_RB ,_, subsiding_VBG again_RB towards_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN December_NNP :_: -_: Week_IN ending_VBG Cases_NNS ._.

Poona_NNP Central_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
Forty-one_JJ cases_NNS remained_VBN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN on_IN the_DT 1st_CD June_NNP 1897_CD ._.
No_DT new_JJ cases_NNS being_VBG admitted_VBN on_IN the_DT 31st_CD June_NNP 1807_CD ,_, there_EX were_VBD only_RB five_CD remaining_VBG ._.
From_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN July_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, admissions_NNS increased_VBD and_CC continued_VBD to_TO increase_VB till_NN they_PRP became_VBD very_RB numerous_JJ ,_, the_DT maximum_NN of_IN 493_CD patients_NNS in_IN hospital_NN being_VBG reached_VBN on_IN the_DT 15th_CD November_NNP 1897_CD :_: and_CC the_DT largest_JJS number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS ,_, 63_CD ,_, was_VBD made_VBN on_IN the_DT 17th_CD November_NNP 1897_CD ._.
From_IN this_DT date_NN the_DT number_NN slowly_RB subsided_VBD ,_, until_IN on_IN 31st_CD March_NNP 1898_CD only_RB 33_CD patients_NNS remained_VBD ._.
Beginning_VBG with_IN the_DT 2nd_CD Bombay_NNP Lancers_NNP (_( July_NNP 1897_CD )_) cases_NNS came_VBD in_IN from_IN Kirkee_NNP (_( August_NNP 1897_CD )_) ,_, Ghorpuri_NNP (_( August-September_NNP 1897_CD )_) ,_, Bhosri_NNP and_CC Poona_NNP City_NNP (_( September_NNP 1897_CD )_) :_: and_CC towards_VB the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ month_NN from_IN Poona_NNP Cantonment_NNP ,_, Sadar_NNP Bazr_NNP ,_, Sholpur_NNP Bazr_NNP ,_, 19th_CD Bombay_NNP Infantry_NNP and_CC 2nd_CD Bombay_NNP Grenadiers_NNP also_RB ._.
The_DT worst_JJS months_NNS were_VBD November_NNP and_CC December_NNP ,_, Corrugated_NNP iron_NN was_VBD used_VBN for_IN roofs_NN during_IN the_DT monsoon_NN only_RB ,_, and_CC throughout_IN the_DT wards_NNS were_VBD quite_RB dry_JJ and_CC rain-proof_JJ ._.
In_IN this_DT con-_JJ nection_NN it_PRP may_MD be_VB mentioned_VBN that_IN Mr._NNP Lyon_NNP personally_RB superintended_VBD the_DT erection_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT wards_NNS ,_, and_CC succeeded_VBD in_IN building_VBG them_PRP when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD difficult_JJ to_TO get_VB the_DT necessary_JJ labour_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD in_IN all_DT 36_CD wards_NNS ,_, with_IN accommodation_NN for_IN some_DT 440_CD people_NNS :_: and_CC 47_CD tents_NNS which_WDT could_MD receive_VB some_DT 188_CD more_JJR ._.
The_DT latter_NN were_VBD practically_RB reserved_VBN for_IN males_NNS :_: females_NNS being_VBG put_VBN into_IN the_DT wards_NNS ._.
There_EX was_VBD never_RB any_DT overcrowding_NN :_: and_CC sufficient_JJ ventilation_NN at_IN night_NN was_VBD secured_VBN by_IN the_DT few_JJ feet_NNS of_IN space_NN between_IN the_DT walls_NNS and_CC roofs_NN ._.
Rows_NNS of_IN huts_NNS were_VBD built_VBN for_IN the_DT staff_NN and_CC establishment_NN ,_, which_WDT at_IN one_CD time_NN numbered_VBD 320_CD ._.
Of_IN these_DT 104_CD were_VBD ward-boys_NNS and_CC ayahs_NNS and_CC 59_CD were_VBD Police_NNP and_CC watchmen_NNS ._.
The_DT latrine_NN ,_, water-supply_NN ,_, and_CC bathing_VBG arrangements_NNS were_VBD good_JJ :_: and_CC the_DT drainage_NN ,_, which_WDT at_IN first_NN was_VBD unsatisfactory_JJ ,_, was_VBD afterwards_NNS improved_VBN ._.
Fire_NNP drill_NN was_VBD practised_VBN :_: and_CC a_DT bell_NN at_IN noon_JJ daily_NN was_VBD a_DT signal_NN for_IN a_DT general_JJ disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT floors_NNS with_IN perchloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN 1_CD in_IN 1,000_CD ._.
A_DT soap-and-water_JJ bath_NN ,_, followed_VBN by_IN one_CD of_IN perchloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN ,_, invariably_RB preceded_VBD the_DT discharge_NN of_IN the_DT cured_NN ._.
Clothes_NNS were_VBD always_RB disinfected_VBN by_IN boiling_VBG ._.
As_IN regards_NNS suspects_NNS ,_, no_DT record_NN of_IN daily_JJ numbers_NNS was_VBD kept_VBN :_: but_CC the_DT total_JJ number_NN was_VBD 1,593_CD ,_, of_IN whom_WP 650_CD were_VBD ultimately_RB admitted_VBN to_TO hospital_VB for_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT hospital_NN was_VBD generously_RB supported_VBN by_IN the_DT Poona_NNP public_NN ,_, not_RB only_RB money_NN ,_, but_CC flannel_NNS ,_, clothes_NNS ,_, etc._NN ,_, being_VBG given_VBN ._.
The_DT latter_NN were_VBD distributed_VBN to_TO the_DT poor_JJ on_IN discharge_NN :_: the_DT former_JJ being_VBG spent_VBN on_IN fruit_NN and_CC luxuries_NNS for_IN the_DT sick_NN ._.
