2.27_CD From_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN December_NNP a_DT system_NN of_IN visiting_VBG was_VBD instituted_VBN ._.
Friends_NNS and_CC relatives_NNS could_MD visit_VB patients_NNS ou_JJ Wednesdays_NNP and_CC Sundays_NNP between_IN 4_CD and_CC 6_CD P.M._NNP ,_, each_DT patient_NN being_VBG allowed_VBN two_CD visitors_NNS at_IN a_DT time_NN ._.
Although_IN not_RB allowed_VBN inside_IN the_DT wards_NNS ,_, these_DT people_NNS could_MD see_VB and_CC converse_VB with_IN their_PRP$ sick_NN over_IN the_DT walls_NNS of_IN the_DT wards_NNS ,_, which_WDT were_VBD only_RB some_DT three_CD or_CC four_CD feet_NNS high_JJ ._.
Contact_NNP and_CC discontent_NN were_VBD thus_RB prevented_VBN ._.
This_DT privilege_NN was_VBD evidently_RB appreciated_VBN ;_: as_IN ,_, beginning_VBG with_IN 240_CD visitors_NNS on_IN 8th_CD December_NNP ,_, the_DT number_NN was_VBD 620_CD on_IN the_DT 15bh_CD ._.
From_IN 8th_CD December_NNP 1897_CD to_TO 31st_CD March_NNP 1898_CD the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN such_JJ visitors_NNS was_VBD 10,246_CD ._.
Poona_NNP District_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT district_NN during_IN this_DT second_JJ period_NN plague_NN was_VBD never_RB very_RB severe_JJ ;_: the_DT highest_JJS figures_NNS registered_VBD being_VBG 269_CD cases-179_JJ deaths_NNS (_( week_NN ending_VBG 3rd_CD September_NNP 1897_CD )_) and_CC 240_CD cases_NNS -180_JJ deaths_NNS (_( week_NN ending_VBG 5th_CD November_NNP 1897_CD )_) ._.
The_DT only_JJ reporte_NN received_VBD for_IN Poona_NNP District_NNP for_IN this_DT period_NN -were_RB for_IN the_DT towns_NNS of_IN Ghodnadi_NNP (_( suburb_NN of_IN Sirur_NNP )_) and_CC Manchur_NNP (_( Tluka_NNP Khed_NNP )_) ,_, and_CC for_IN the_DT village_NN o_NN Mawdi_NNP Karipather_NNP (_( Purandhar_NNP Tluka_NNP )_) ._.
Sirur_NNP Tluka_NNP ._.
Plague_NNP began_VBD in_IN this_DT Tluka_NNP in_IN March_NNP 1897_CD ,_, in_IN which_WDT month_NN 2_CD cases_NNS were_VBD discovered_VBN in_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Ghodnadi_NNP (_( population_NN ,_, 7,65_CD (_( 3_CD )_) ._.
The_DT infection_NN was_VBD due_JJ to_TO Poona_NNP ._.
Six_CD members_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ family_NN had_VBD previously_RB died_VBN ,_, their_PRP$ deaths_NNS being_VBG ascribed_VBN by_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP to_TO the_DT following_JJ causes_NNS :_: -Chronic_JJ phthisis_NN ,_, pneumonia_NN ,_, dysentery_NN and_CC grief_NN ;_: but_CC there_EX is_VBZ little_JJ doubt_NN ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ the_DT then_RB Collector_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Lamb_NNP ,_, ``_`` that_IN these_DT were_VBD all_DT plague_JJ cases_NNS ._. ''_''
No_DT further_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD reported_VBN till_IN the_DT 27th_CD July_NNP 1897_CD ,_, when_WRB Surgeon_NNP Captain_NNP Kilkelly_NNP ,_, being_VBG called_VBN in_IN to_TO examine_VB some_DT sick_JJ persons_NNS ,_, found_VBD them_PRP to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT mortality_NN was_VBD generally_RB above_IN the_DT average_NN during_IN the_DT interval_NN between_IN March_NNP and_CC July_NNP 1897_CD appears_VBZ to_TO point_VB to_TO the_DT presence_NN of_IN undetected_JJ plague_NN through-_NN out_IN ._.
The_DT following_VBG remarks_NNS by_IN Surgeon-Captain_NNP Kilkelly_NNP ,_, on_IN its_PRP$ origin_NN and_CC dissemination_NN ,_, are_VBP interesting_VBG :_: -_: ``_`` It_PRP is_VBZ almost_RB certain_JJ that_IN infection_NN in_IN the_DT first_JJ instance_NN was_VBD from_IN prostitutes_NNS in_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
Rats_NNS may_MD have_VB carried_VBN the_DT disease_NN ._.
Cats_NNS were_VBD frequently_RB found_VBN dead_JJ in_IN plague_NN houses_NNS in_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Sirur_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT few_JJ days_NNS after_IN plague_NN occurred_VBD among_IN my_PRP$ servants_NNS ,_, a_DT cat_NN was_VBD brought_VBN to_TO me_PRP ,_, obviously_RB out_IN of_IN sorts_NNS ,_, and_CC with_IN enlarged_JJ and_CC tender_VB sub-maxillary_JJ glands_NNS ._.
I_PRP kept_VBD the_DT animal_NN under_IN observation_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN about_RB ten_JJ days_NNS it_PRP recovered_VBD completely_RB ._.
``_`` It_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO obtain_VB accurate_JJ dates_NNS ,_, but_CC among_IN my_PRP$ private_JJ servants_NNS on_IN one_CD occa-_JJ sion_NN ,_, at_IN least_JJS ,_, the_DT incubation_NN period_NN was_VBD exactly_RB eight_CD days_NNS ._.
One_CD of_IN two_CD stable_JJ boys_NNS sleep-_JJ ing_VBG together_NN was_VBD attacked_VBN ._.
[_JJ went_VBD into_IN tent_NN that_IN day_NN and_CC took_VBD all_DT servants_NNS with_IN me_PRP and_CC had_VBD them_PRP all_DT strictly_RB under_IN observation_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT eighth_JJ day_NN exactly_RB the_DT second_JJ boy_NN became_VBD ill_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
Ou_IN the_DT other_JJ occasion_NN it_PRP seemed_VBD that_IN incubation_NN period_NN was_VBD much_JJ shorter_JJR ._.
In_IN the_DT open_JJ ,_, infection_NN was_VBD almost_RB nil_JJ ,_, but_CC in_IN cases_NNS of_IN people_NNS living_VBG in_IN crowded_VBN houses_NNS whole_JJ families_NNS were_VBD attacked_VBN ._.
More_RBR than_IN once_RB it_PRP was_VBD noticed_VBN that_IN when_WRB cases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN a_DT new_JJ locality_NN ,_, several_JJ fresh_JJ cases_NNS appeared_VBD in_IN the_DT houses_NNS around_IN after_IN about_IN 15_CD or_CC 20_CD days_NNS ._.
If_IN the_DT incubation_NN period_NN is_VBZ 8_CD days_NNS ,_, this_DT might_MD be_VB explained_VBN by_IN supposing_VBG that_IN rats_NNS or_CC cats_NNS ,_, be-_JJ coming_VBG infected_VBN by_IN the_DT first_JJ case_NN ,_, developed_VBD the_DT disease_NN in_IN a_DT week_NN ,_, and_CC infected_VBD healthy_JJ persons_NNS ,_, who_WP ,_, in_IN their_PRP$ turn_NN ,_, did_VBD not_RB show_VB signs_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN for_IN some_DT days_NNS ._.
Dead_JJ rats_NNS and_CC cats_NNS were_VBD found_VBN in_IN numbere_RB ._.
No_DT case_NN was_VBD traced_VBN to_TO grain_VB ._. ''_''
The_DT following_JJ measures_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN to_TO suppress_VB the_DT outbreak_NN :_: -_: ``_`` Two_CD Hospital_NNP Assistants_NNPS and_CC a_DT disinfecting_VBG party_NN of_IN 6_CD men_NNS and_CC 6_CD sweepers_NNS were_VBD sent_VBN from_IN Poona_NNP to_TO Sirur_NNP ._.
The_DT town_NN was_VBD divided_VBN into_IN four_CD divisions_NNS ,_, and_CC search_NN parties_NNS told_VBD off_RP to_TO each_DT division_NN ._.
These_DT parties_NNS began_VBD their_PRP$ work_NN by_IN taking_VBG a_DT complete_JJ list_NN of_IN all_DT houses_NNS and_CC persons_NNS resident_VBP in_IN their_PRP$ divisions_NNS ._.
Absentees_NNS were_VBD thus_RB easily_RB detected_VBN ._.
The_DT sick_JJ men_NNS who_WP came_VBD from_IN Poona_NNP were_VBD each_DT made_VBN mukdams_NNS of_IN a_DT disinfecting_VBG party_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT work_NN of_IN disinfection_NN was_VBD carried_VBN on_IN under_IN the_DT personal_JJ supervision_NN of_IN Surgeon-Captain_NNP Kilkelly_NNP ,_, 228_CD [_NN CHAP_NNP ._.
VIII_NNP ._.
aided_VBN by_IN Mr._NNP Joshi_NNP ,_, Acting_NNP Mmlatdr_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, Pratap_NNP Gangaram_NNP ._.
Four_CD volunteers_NNS were_VBD found_VBN who_WP carried_VBD on_IN the_DT work_NN in_IN a_DT most_RBS thorough_JJ manner_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB they_PRP had_VBD taken_VBN over_RP the_DT duties_NNS ,_, few_JJ cases_NNS escaped_VBD detection_NN ._.
A_DT party_NN of_IN sweepers_NNS was_VBD formed_VBN ,_, and_CC systematically_RB disinfected_VBN and_CC cleansed_VBN out_RP every_DT court-_JJ yard_NN and_CC privy_NN in_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
Several_JJ cases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN ``_`` D_NNP ''_'' Division_NNP ,_, Kmtipura_NNP ,_, towards_VBZ the_DT end_NN of_IN October_NNP ._.
This_DT part_NN was_VBD accordingly_RB completely_RB evacuated_VBN for_IN 15_CD days_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT houses_NNS thoroughly_RB ventilated_VBN and_CC limewashed_VBN ._.
The_DT inhabitants_NNS were_VBD put_VBN into_IN huts_NNS under_IN observation_NN ._.
Only_RB two_CD fresh_JJ cases_NNS occurred_VBD among_IN them_PRP while_IN in_IN the_DT fields_NNS ._.
The_DT improvement_NN continued_VBD during_IN November_NNP ._.
Plague_NN showed_VBD no_DT tendency_NN to_TO rise_VB again_RB ._.
Houses_NNS in_IN which_WDT cases_NNS had_VBD occurred_VBN before_IN the_DT 20th_JJ October-20-were_NNP put_NN to_TO rights_NNS by_IN their_PRP$ owners_NNS ,_, and_CC allowed_VBD to_TO be_VB inhabited_VBN after_IN they_PRP had_VBD been_VBN passed_VBN by_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT roofs_NNS were_VBD not_RB closed_VBN ._.
``_`` In_IN December_NNP an_DT observation_NN camp_NN was_VBD formed_VBN ,_, in_IN which_WDT persons_NNS entering_VBG Sirur_NNP were_VBD detained_VBN ten_JJ days_NNS under_IN observation_NN ._.
Five_CD imported_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN were_VBD detected_VBN and_CC sent_VBN to_TO hospital_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT 4th_JJ December_NNP ,_, a_DT case_NN occurred_VBD near_IN the_DT police_NN lines_NNS in_IN some_DT old_JJ thatched_JJ huts_NNS ;_: these_DT huts_NNS were_VBD unroofed_JJ and_CC the_DT thatching_NN burnt_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT last_JJ indigenous_JJ case_NN occurred_VBD on_IN the_DT 22nd_CD of_IN December_NNP 1897_CD ;_: the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN oases_NNS treated_VBN in_IN hospital_NN was_VBD 442_CD ,_, of_IN which_WDT 297_CD died_VBD and_CC 147_CD recovered_VBN ._.
Inoculation_NN was_VBD tried_VBN on_IN a_DT very_RB small_JJ scale_NN at_IN Ghodnadi_NNP ;_: the_DT following_NN is_VBZ Mr._NNP Lamb_NNP 's_POS description_NN of_IN the_DT experiment_NN :_: -_: ``_`` Inoculation_NN was_VBD only_RB tried_VBN on_IN a_DT very_RB small_JJ scale_NN ._.
On_IN August_NNP 28th_CD ,_, 14_CD persons_NNS were_VBD inoculated_VBN with_IN a_DT smalt_NN dose_NN of_IN Dr._NNP Haffkine_NNP 's_POS lymph_NN ;_: one_CD of_IN them_PRP afterwards_NNS died_VBD of_IN plague_NN on_IN September_NNP 23rd_CD ._.
On_IN September_NNP 30th_CD Surgeon-Captain_NNP Kilkelly_NNP inoculated_VBD himself_PRP and_CC 34_CD others_NNS with_IN a_DT stronger_JJR dose_NN ._.
But_CC as_IN one_CD man_NN ,_, who_WP no_DT doubt_NN was_VBD previously_RB infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, died_VBD on_IN the_DT following_JJ night_NN and_CC a_DT second_JJ man_NN was_VBD very_RB seriously_RB ill_VB ,_, apart_RB from_IN the_DT temporary_JJ fever_NN which_WDT the_DT inoculation_NN produced_VBN on_IN them_PRP all_DT to_TO a_DT greater_JJR or_CC less_RBR extent_JJ ,_, no_DT one_NN was_VBD subsequently_RB found_VBN willing_JJ to_TO volunteer_VB for_IN inoculation_NN ._.
None_NN of_IN the_DT others_NNS inoculated_VBN at_IN this_DT time_NN were_VBD afterwards_NNS attacked_VBN with_IN plague_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT outbreak_NN at_IN Ghodnadi_NNP did_VBD not_RB cause_VB any_DT great_JJ dissemination_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
Before_IN plague_NN was_VBD declared_VBN epidemic_JJ in_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, but_CC while_IN there_EX was_VBD yet_RB a_DT fear_NN of_IN an_DT out-_JJ break_NN there_EX ,_, a_DT very_RB large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN its_PRP$ inhabitants_NNS fled_VBN :_: precautions_NNS being_VBG taken_VBN after-_JJ wards_NNS to_TO prevent_VB persons_NNS from_IN leaving_VBG the_DT town_NN without_IN passes_NNS ,_, The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS and_CC deaths_NNS recorded_VBN in_IN the_DT village_NN of_IN Sirur_NNP ,_, outside_IN Munici-_NNP pal_JJ limits_NNS and_CC in_IN the_DT neighbouring_NN villages_NNS ,_, in_IN Sirur_NNP Tluka_NNP ,_, were_VBD 121_CD cases-104_JJ deaths_NNS ;_: of_IN which_WDT 109_CD cases-95_JJ deaths_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT open_JJ fields_NNS within_IN the_DT boundaries_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Sirur_NNP ._.
Besides_IN this_DT ,_, some_DT villages_NNS in_IN the_DT Ahmednagar_NNP District_NNP ,_, the_DT border_NN of_IN which_WDT is_VBZ only_RB one_CD mile_NN distant_NN from_IN Ghodnadi_NNP ,_, were_VBD infected_VBN by_IN that_DT town_NN ._.
Manchar_NNP ._.
Population-1,895_NNP ._.
Infection_NN was_VBD introduced_VBN into_IN the_DT village_NN of_IN Manchar_NNP by_IN a_DT Marwadi_NNP woman_NN belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT village_NN of_IN Avsari_NNP Budruk_NNP ._.
A_DT death_NN from_IN plague_NN had_VBD already_RB taken_VBN place_NN at_IN her_PRP$ honse_NN at_IN the_DT latter_JJ place_NN when_WRB she_PRP came_VBD to_TO Manchar_NNP and_CC infected_VBD a_DT woman_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN with_IN whom_WP she_PRP put_VBD up_RP ;_: both_DT these_DT women_NNS shortly_RB after_IN died_VBN of_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT disease_NN now_RB spread_VBP from_IN house_NN to_TO house_NN ,_, carrying_VBG off_RP two_CD or_CC three_CD members_NNS from_IN each_DT infected_VBN family_NN :_: the_DT Marwadi_NNP and_CC Koshti_NNP eastes_VBZ being_VBG more_RBR particularly_RB attacked_VBN ._.
Complete_JJ evacuation_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN was_VBD promptly_RB enforced_VBN ;_: all_DT houses_NNS were_VBD kept_VBN entirely_RB open_JJ ;_: infected_VBN houses_NNS insufficiently_RB lighted_VBD or_CC ventilated_VBN had_VBD holes_NNS made_VBN in_IN them_PRP admitting_VBG of_IN light_JJ and_CC fresh_JJ air_NN in_IN abundance_NN ._.
Disinfection_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP in_IN every_DT house_NN ,_, whether_IN infected_VBN or_CC not_RB :_: and_CC the_DT following_JJ remarks_NNS by_IN Mr._NNP Lamb_NNP on_IN the_DT enect_NN of_IN these_DT measures_NNS are_VBP interesting_VBG :_: -_: ``_`` All_PDT these_DT measures_NNS being_VBG adopted_VBN ,_, the_DT village_NN became_VBD prefectly_RB free_JJ from_IN plague_JJ poison_NN ;_: in_IN proof_NN of_IN this_DT not_RB a_DT single_JJ plague_NN case_NN occurred_VBD after_IN the_DT re-occupation_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD unoccupied_VBN for_IN 3_CD 1/2_CD months_NNS continually_RB ._.
Out_IN of_IN the_DT several_JJ anti-plague_JJ measures_NNS resorted_VBN to_TO ,_, the_DT evacuation_NN of_IN houses_NNS at_IN once_RB was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB most_RBS effective_JJ ;_: from_IN POONA_NNP DISTRICT_NNP ._. ]_NN
229_CD the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN on_IN the_DT 20th_JJ November_NNP 1897_CD to_TO 19th_CD December_NNP 1897_CD ,_, 15_CD cases_NNS bad_JJ occurred_VBD ;_: the_DT village_NN was_VBD evacuated_VBN on_IN the_DT 19th_CD December_NNP 1897_CD ;_: after_IN that_DT date_NN there_EX were_VBD only_RB 7_CD cases_NNS ,_, the_DT plague_NN then_RB stopped_VBD ,_, and_CC there_EX was_VBD complete_JJ subsidence_NN of_IN it_PRP for_IN one_CD month_NN from_IN 5th_CD January_NNP 1898_CD to_TO 6th_CD February_NNP 1898_CD ,_, except_IN for_IN a_DT sudden_JJ outbreak_NN in_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT Koshti_NNP families_NNS which_WDT lost_VBD 10_CD of_IN its_PRP$ members_NNS ;_: the_DT disease_NN was_VBD suppressed_VBN on_IN 6th_CD January_NNP 1898_CD ,_, i.e._FW ,_, within_IN a_DT fortnight_NN only_RB after_IN the_DT evacuation_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN ._.
The_DT disease_NN was_VBD not_RB communicated_VBN to_TO any_DT other_JJ village_NN in_IN the_DT vicinity_NN of_IN Manchar_NNP ._. ''_''
The_DT figures_NNS for_IN this_DT epidemic_JJ were_VBD 34_CD cases-31_JJ deaths_NNS ._.
The_DT village_NN of_IN Mawdi_NNP Karipather_NNP (_( population_NN ,_, 622_CD )_) was_VBD infected_VBN by_IN a_DT Mahomedan_NNP who_WP arrived_VBD from_IN Poona_NNP and_CC was_VBD attacked_VBN on_IN the_DT 19th_CD of_IN October_NNP 1897_CD ._.

Mr._NNP Lamb_NNP ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP ,_, visited_VBD the_DT village_NN and_CC ordered_VBD its_PRP$ complete_JJ evacuation_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP by_IN the_DT 10th_CD of_IN November_NNP ,_, a_DT few_JJ of_IN the_DT infected_JJ houses_NNS being_VBG burnt_JJ down_RB ._.

On_IN the_DT 12th_CD July_NNP ,_, the_DT Kirkee_NNP Bazar_NNP (_( population_NN ,_, 6,000_CD )_) reported_VBD 4_CD ,_, plague_NN cases_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, in_IN spite_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT precautions_NNS taken_VBN ,_, dropping_VBG cases_NNS continued_VBD till_JJ 31st_CD July_NNP ,_, on_IN which_WDT date_NN 12_CD cases_NNS occurred_VBD and_CC the_DT disease_NN became_VBD epidemic_JJ ._.

On_IN the_DT 9th_CD August_NNP ,_, Poona_NNP Cantonment_NNP reported_VBD an_DT imported_JJ case_NN from_IN Kirkee_NNP :_: and_CC from_IN this_DT date_NN to_TO the_DT 16th_CD September_NNP there_EX were_VBD 6_CD indigenous_JJ cases_NNS and_CC 2_CD imported_VBN from_IN Kirkee_NNP :_: but_CC from_IN this_DT last_JJ date_NN the_DT figures_NNS rapidly_RB rose_VBD till_IN the_DT disease_NN assumed_VBD epidemic_JJ proportions_NNS ._.

231_CD On_IN the_DT 17th_CD November_NNP 1897_CD a_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP was_VBD established_VBN by_IN order_NN of_IN Govern-_NNP ment_NN (_( vide_IN ante_NN )_) ._.
It_PRP consisted_VBD of-_JJ Chairman_NNP ,_, Major-Greneral_NNP J._NNP Duncan_NNP ._.
Members_NNS Lieut.-Colonel_NNP W._NNP J._NNP Fawcett_NNP ,_, R.A.M.C_NNP ._.
Manjor_NNP w.c.Ross_NN ._.
This_DT Committee_NNP held_VBD its_PRP$ first_JJ meeting_NN on_IN the_DT 19th_CD November_NNP 1897_CD ,_, and_CC decided_VBD on_IN the_DT following_JJ measures_NNS ,_, which_WDT ,_, since_IN the_DT 15th_CD idem_NN had_VBD been_VBN put_VBN into_IN effect_NN :_: -_: (_( ?_. ._. )_)
Partition_NN of_IN Cantonments_NNP into_IN three_CD divisions_NNS ,_, each_DT under_IN a_DT British_JJ Officer_NNP ;_: and_CC of_IN these_DT again_RB into_IN 17_CD sub-divisions_NNS in_IN all_DT ,_, each_DT under_IN a_DT supervisor_NN who_WP was_VBD either_CC a_DT native_JJ gentleman_NN or_CC retired_JJ Native_JJ Officer_NNP ._.
Each_DT supervisor_NN maintained_VBD a_DT list_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT inhabitants_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ sub-division_NN ._.
(_( ii_NN ._. )_)
Search_NNP party_NN for_IN each_DT sub-division_NN ._.
(_( iii_NN ._. )_)
Divisional_JJ establishment_NN (_( common_JJ to_TO all_DT sub-divisions_NNS in_IN its_PRP$ division_NN )_) for_IN treatment_NN ,_, ambulance_NN ,_, segregation_NN ,_, disinfection_NN ,_, and_CC sanitation_NN ._.
(_( iv_NN ._. )_)
Two_CD lady-searchers_NNS each_DT for_IN Divisions_NNP I_PRP and_CC II_NNP ,_, for_IN visiting_VBG purdah_JJ ladies_NNS ,_, (_( v._NN )_) Commissioned_VBD Medical_NNP Officer_NNP 's_POS certificate_NN for_IN every_DT death_NN ._.
The_DT result_NN was_VBD a_DT practically_RB complete_JJ search_NN of_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN Cantonments_NNP daily_JJ ,_, with_IN prompt_JJ segregation_NN ,_, attendance_NN ,_, and_CC disinfection_NN ._.
A_DT Health_NNP Camp_NNP (_( ultimately_RB capable_JJ of_IN accommodating_VBG 1,000_CD people_NNS )_) was_VBD started_VBN on_IN the_DT 16th_CD November_NNP in_IN the_DT Ll_NNP Bgh_NNP ,_, to_TO which_WDT water_NN was_VBD laid_VBN on_IN and_CC oil_NN lamps_NNS supplied_VBD ,_, and_CC for_IN which_WDT latrines_NNS and_CC bathing_VBG places_NNS were_VBD erected_VBN ._.
Into_IN this_DT camp_NN ,_, as_IN room_NN became_VBD available_JJ ,_, the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT most_RBS infected_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT bazar_NN were_VBD moved_VBN in_IN blocks_NNS ;_: and_CC hero_NN they_PRP remained_VBD for_IN ten_JJ days-_JJ a_DT Bannih_NNP supplying_VBG food_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT European_JJ officer_NN ordering_VBG subsist-_JJ ence_NN money_NN for_IN the_DT destitute_NN ._.
On_IN arrival_NN in_IN camp_NN every_DT article_NN was_VBD thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN ._.
The_DT inhabitants_NNS during_IN the_DT day_NN attended_VBD to_TO their_PRP$ ordinary_JJ business_NN ,_, returning_VBG at_IN night_NN to_TO sleep_VB in_IN camp_NN ._.
The_DT value_NN of_IN such_JJ a_DT camp_NN is_VBZ proved_VBN by_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN only_RB I_PRP case_NN occurred_VBD after_IN the_DT people_NNS returned_VBD to_TO the_DT bazar_NN :_: and_CC that_IN one_CD a_DT woman_NN who_WP had_VBD been_VBN but_CC six_CD days_NNS in_IN camp_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD attacked_VBN the_DT evening_NN of_IN the_DT day_NN she_PRP left_VBD it_PRP ._.
A_DT second_JJ Health_NNP Camp_NNP (_( capacity_NN ,_, 400_CD )_) was_VBD established_VBN early_RB in_IN December_NNP ,_, about_RB two_CD or_CC three_CD hundred_VBN yards_NNS from_IN the_DT Wnowrie_NNP Bazr_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT disease_NN was_VBD severe_JJ ._.
It_PRP was_VBD worked_VBN on_IN the_DT same_JJ principles_NNS ._.
In_IN this_DT case_NN the_DT result_NN was_VBD still_RB more_RBR satisfactory_JJ ,_, for_IN neither_DT in_IN the_DT camp_NN nor_CC after_IN their_PRP$ return_NN to_TO their_PRP$ houses_NNS was_VBD there_EX any_DT indigenous_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
In_IN this_DT connection_NN it_PRP may_MD be_VB stated_VBN that_IN a_DT small_JJ row_NN of_IN huts_NNS was_VBD omitted_VBN when_WRB the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT Wnowrie_NNP Bazr_NNP people_NNS were_VBD turned_VBN out_RP ;_: within_IN 24_CD hours_NNS 5_CD cases_NNS ,_, including_VBG 8_CD deaths_NNS ,_, occurred_VBD amongst_IN those_DT left_VBN behind-_VBP an_DT incident_NN which_WDT proved_VBD a_DT valuable_JJ lesson_NN to_TO the_DT people_NNS ._.
In_IN January_NNP 1898_CD ,_, Wnowrie_NNP village_NN was_VBD the_DT only_JJ plague-spot_NN in_IN Cantonment_NNP limits_NNS ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD not_RB until_IN the_DT 23rd_CD January_NNP that_IN the_DT Health_NNP Camp_NNP could_MD accommodate_VB its_PRP$ inhabitants_NNS ._.
As_IN each_DT block_NN was_VBD vacated_VBN by_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS ,_, the_DT houses_NNS were_VBD immediately_RB thoroughly_JJ cleaned_VBN ,_, disinfected_VBN ,_, and_CC lime-washed_JJ ._.
Houses_NNS unfit_VBP for_IN habitation_NN were_VBD demolished_VBN ._.
The_DT numbers_NNS put_VBD through_IN the_DT two_CD camps_NNS were_VBD :_: -_: Camp_NN ._.
From_IN Saciar_NNP Bazr_NNP ._.
From_IN Cantonments_NNS ._.
From_IN other_JJ places_NNS ._.
Total_NN ._.

VIII_NNP ._.
From_IN June_NNP 1897_CD to_TO February_NNP 1898_CD ,_, 3_CD Europeans_NNPS were_VBD attacked-a_JJ Sergeant_NNP 's_POS wife_NN living_NN in_IN Wnowrie_NNP Barracks_NNP (_( 4th_CD November_NNP 1897_CD )_) and_CC 2_CD soldiers_NNS (_( 20th_CD and_CC 29th_CD January_NNP )_) -all_NN of_IN whom_WP recovered_VBD ._.
The_DT last_JJ native_JJ case_NN was_VBD on_IN the_DT 28th_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT last_JJ European_JJ on_IN the_DT 29th_CD of_IN January_NNP 1898_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS was_VBD 422_CD and_CC deaths_NNS 298_CD ._.
During_IN March_NNP 1899_CD ,_, 5_CD imported_VBN cases_NNS (_( 2_CD fatal_NN )_) occurred_VBD ,_, and_CC in_IN April_NNP indigenous_JJ plague_NN appeared_VBD ._.
During_IN May_NNP it_PRP steadily_RB increased_VBD and_CC ultimately_RB developed_VBD into_IN a_DT severe_JJ epide-_JJ mic_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, however_RB ,_, falls_NNS outside_IN the_DT scope_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ review_NN ._.
Throughout_IN the_DT long_JJ period_NN of_IN immunity_NN precautionary_JJ measures_NNS had_VBD not_RB been_VBN relaxed_VBN ._.
All_DT arrivals_NNS by_IN rail_NN from_IN infected_VBN areas_NNS were_VBD disinfected_VBN ;_: all_DT arrivals_NNS ,_, whether_IN by_IN rail_NN or_CC road_NN ,_, whether_IN from_IN infected_JJ areas_NNS or_CC not_RB ,_, were_VBD placed_VBN under_IN 10_CD days_NNS '_POS surveillance_NN ._.
Special_JJ precautions_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN to_TO prevent_VB infection_NN by_IN road_NN :_: -_: ``_`` To_TO prevent_VB the_DT introduction_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, by_IN road_NN ,_, the_DT Cantonment_NNP was_VBD divided_VBN into_IN wards_NNS ,_, each_DT under_IN a_DT supervisor_NN ._.
Each_DT supervisor_NN has_VBZ a_DT census_NN of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN every_DT house_NN in_IN his_PRP$ sub-division_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ his_PRP$ duty_NN in_IN his_PRP$ daily_JJ rounds_NNS to_TO note_VB the_DT arrival_NN of_IN strangers_NNS from_IN outside_JJ and_CC to_TO order_NN them_PRP to_TO attend_VB for_IN surveillance_NN at_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS ._. ''_''
Also_RB to_TO prevent_VB infection_NN being_VBG introduced_VBN from_IN the_DT City-_NNP ``_`` To_TO guard_VB against_IN introduction_NN of_IN plague_NN from_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, persons_NNS were_VBD prohibited_VBN from_IN changing_VBG their_PRP$ residence_NN from_IN one_CD house_NN to_TO another_DT without_IN a_DT pass_NN from_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Plague_NNP Authority_NNP ,_, and_CC no_DT empty_JJ houses_NNS could_MD be_VB occupied_VBN without_IN such_PDT a_DT pass_NN ._.
Such_JJ measures_NNS can_MD only_RB be_VB partially_RB successful_JJ ,_, as_IN with_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT City_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ purely_RB a_DT question_NN of_IN time_NN its_PRP$ spreading_NN to_TO the_DT Cantonment_NNP ._.
The_DT two_CD are_VBP now_RB practically_RB one_CD town_NN :_: along_IN the_DT Bhwani_NNP Peth_NNP road_NN there_EX is_VBZ really_RB no_DT break_NN in_IN the_DT houses_NNS ._.
Hundreds_NNS of_IN people_NNS work_VBP in_IN the_DT Canton-_NNP ment_NN in_IN the_DT day_NN and_CC return_NN to_TO their_PRP$ houses_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP in_IN the_DT evening_NN ._.
Many_JJ Cantonment_NNP residents_NNS have_VBP relations_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP and_CC vice_NN vere_RB ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ practically_RB impossible_JJ to_TO prevent_VB them_PRP from_IN exchanging_VBG visits_NNS and_CC spending_VBG a_DT night_NN or_CC so_RB in_IN each_DT other_JJ 's_POS houses_NNS ._.
In_IN this_DT way_NN infection_NN is_VBZ continually_RB being_VBG introduced_VBN ;_: it_PRP may_MD for_IN a_DT time_NN with_IN disinfection_NN be_VB kept_VBN back_RB ,_, but_CC eventually_RB some_DT area_NN must_MD become_VB infected_JJ ._. ''_''
The_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN to_TO ensure_VB early_JJ detection_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN were-_JJ 1_CD ._.
Certificates_NNS of_IN death_NN signed_VBN by_IN a_DT Commissioned_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP before_IN burial_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
Daily_JJ list_NN of_IN sick_JJ made_VBN out_RP by_IN Ward_NNP Supervisors_NNS :_: the_DT sick_JJ being_VBG visited_VBN by_IN a_DT Plague_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT measures_NNS introduced_VBN ,_, the_DT Chairman_NNP ,_, Poona_NNP Cantonment_NNP Plague_NNP Com-_NNP mittee_NN ,_, reports-_JJ ``_`` Disinfection_NNP and_CC ventilation.-In_JJ the_DT Cantonment_NNP the_DT only_RB method_NN followed_VBD was_VBD to_TO saturate_VB the_DT floors_NNS with_IN an_DT acidulated_JJ solution_NN of_IN perchloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN ,_, strength_NN 1_CD to_TO 1,000_CD ;_: the_DT same_JJ solution_NN was_VBD squirted_VBN over_IN the_DT walls_NNS and_CC ceilings_NNS of_IN all_DT infected_JJ buildings_NNS ,_, and_CC all_DT articles_NNS of_IN clothing_NN ,_, not_RB burnt_VB ,_, which_WDT might_MD reasonably_RB be_VB supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB infected_VBN ,_, were_VBD dipped_VBN into_IN buckets_NNS of_IN the_DT solution_NN ._.
The_DT tiles_NNS were_VBD removed_VBN ,_, where_WRB ,_, by_IN so_IN doing_VBG ,_, sunlight_NN could_MD reach_VB the_DT infected_JJ rooms_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT houses_NNS were_VBD vacated_VBN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN 10_CD days_NNS ,_, the_DT doors_NNS and_CC windows_NNS being_VBG left_VBD open_JJ ._.
After_IN the_DT disinfected_JJ houses_NNS had_VBD dried_VBN from_IN the_DT perchloride_JJ solution_NN ,_, they_PRP were_VBD whitewashed_VBN ._.
``_`` Evacuation.-This_NN was_VBD not_RB tried_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN ._.
``_`` Inoculation.-On_NNP the_DT 12th_CD April_NNP last_JJ arrangementes_NNS were_VBD made_VBN to_TO carry_VB on_IN inoculation_NN against_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT necessary_JJ serum_NN was_VBD obtained_VBN from_IN Professor_NNP Haffkine_NNP 's_POS Laboratory_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC two_CD private_JJ practitioners_NNS ,_, Dr._NNP Mody_NNP and_CC Dr._NNP Erasmus_NNP Dias_NNP ,_, very_RB kindly_RB con-_JJ sented_VBN to_TO carry_VB on_IN the_DT work_NN free_JJ of_IN charge_NN ._.
A_DT notice_NN was_VBD issued_VBN to_TO the_DT public_NN in_IN English_NNP and_CC Marthi_NNP ,_, inviting_VBG them_PRP to_TO be_VB inoculated_VBN ,_, but_CC at_IN that_DT time_NN there_EX were_VBD only_RB a_DT few_JJ sporadic_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT Cantonment_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT fear_NN of_IN infection_NN was_VBD not_RB sufficient_JJ to_TO induce_VB people_NNS to_TO undergo_VB the_DT operation_NN ._.
Shortly_RB afterwards_NNS ,_, Dr._NNP Erasmus_NNP Dias_NNP (_( on_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ P_NNP ?_. ?_.
?_. A_DT DISTRICT_NNP ._. ]_NN
233_CD responsibility_NN and_CC without_IN informing_VBG the_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP )_) circulated_VBD a_DT leaflet_NN in_IN Marathi_NNP quoting_VBG from_IN a_DT report_NN of_IN Dr._NNP Leuman_NNP 's_POS on_IN inoculution_NN in_IN Dhrwr_NNP and_CC Hubli_NNP ,_, and_CC drawing_VBG attention_NN to_TO the_DT very_RB great_JJ protection_NN which_WDT it_PRP afforded_VBD against_IN plague_NN ._.
This_DT ,_, combined_VBN with_IN the_DT previous_JJ notice_NN ,_, caused_VBD quite_RB a_DT panic_NN amongst_IN the_DT banias_NN in_IN the_DT bazr_NN ,_, who_WP were_VBD convinced_VBN that_IN inoculation_NN was_VBD to_TO be_VB made_VBN compulsory_NN ,_, and_CC many_JJ at_IN once_RB made_VBN arrange-_JJ ments_NNS to_TO leave_VB Poona_NNP and_CC return_VB to_TO their_PRP$ homes_NNS ._.
This_DT was_VBD brought_VBN to_TO my_PRP$ notice_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP therefore_RB proceeded_VBD to_TO the_DT bazrs_NN ,_, collected_VBD the_DT banias_NN round_VB me_PRP and_CC assured_VBD them_PRP that_IN under_IN no_DT circumstances_NNS would_MD any_DT person_NN be_VB forced_VBN to_TO submit_VB to_TO be_VB inoculated_VBN ._.
This_DT re-assured_JJ them_PRP ,_, and_CC I_PRP heard_VBD nothing_NN more_JJR of_IN any_DT uneasy_JJ feeling_NN in_IN this_DT respect_NN ._.
``_`` Up_IN to_TO the_DT 1st_CD of_IN June_NNP only_RB seven_CD persons_NNS were_VBD inoculated_VBN ,_, but_CC since_IN then_RB plague_NN has_VBZ increased_VBN and_CC people_NNS have_VBP come_VBN forward_RB more_RBR readily_RB ,_, over_IN 50_CD having_VBG been_VBN inoculated_VBN already_RB in_IN this_DT mouth_NN (_( June_NNP )_) ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ now_RB proposed_VBN to_TO start_VB inoculation_NN at_IN the_DT Charitable_JJ Dispensary_NNP and_CC endeavour_VB to_TO induce_VB the_DT poorer_NN classes_VBZ to_TO protect_VB themselves_PRP in_IN this_DT manner_NN ._.
``_`` Subsequently_RB much_JJ of_IN the_DT antipathy_NN to_TO inoculation_NN of_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT Cantonment_NNP people_NNS vanished_VBD ,_, as_IN over_IN 20,000_CD voluntary_JJ inoculations_NNS were_VBD carried_VBN out_IN within_IN four_CD months_NNS ._.
``_`` Segregation_NN ._.
-The_NN system_NN in_IN force_NN in_IN the_DT Cantonment_NNP ,_, is_VBZ ,_, to_TO send_VB all_DT contacts_NNS (_( persors_NNS from_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS )_) to_TO a_DT Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP for_IN 10_CD days_NNS ;_: on_IN arrival_NN at_IN the_DT Camp_NNP their_PRP$ cloth-_JJ Eng_NNP ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, is_VBZ disinfected_VBN and_CC they_PRP are_VBP detained_VBN there_RB for_IN 48_CD hours_NNS ;_: at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN this_DT time_NN they_PRP are_VBP permitted_VBN to_TO go_VB about_IN their_PRP$ business_NN in_IN the_DT daytime_NN ,_, but_CC return_VBP to_TO the_DT Camp_NNP to_TO sleep_VB until_IN the_DT 10_CD days_NNS are_VBP completed_VBN ._.
When_WRB the_DT accommodation_NN in_IN the_DT Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP permits_VBZ ,_, the_DT people_NNS on_IN either_DT side_NN of_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS are_VBP also_RB segregated_VBN ._.
This_DT was_VBD in_IN variably_RB done_VBN at_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT Camp_NNP is_VBZ now_RB too_RB crowded_VBN to_TO allow_VB of_IN this_DT ._.
More_JJR huts_NNS are_VBP now_RB being_VBG built_VBN and_CC the_DT segregation_NN of_IN the_DT persons_NNS from_IN neighbouring_VBG houses_NNS will_MD again_RB be_VB resorted_VBN to_TO as_RB soon_RB as_IN there_EX is_VBZ accommodation_NN in_IN the_DT Camp_NNP for_IN them_PRP ._.
*_JJ *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP ``_`` Re-occupation.-Disinfected_JJ houses_NNS were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO be_VB re-occupied_JJ after_IN they_PRP had_VBD Leen_NNP kept_VBD vacant_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN 10_CD days_NNS ._.
``_`` In_IN three_CD instances_NNS plague_VBP appeared_VBN in_IN houses_NNS which_WDT had_VBD previously_RB been_VBN disinfected_VBN ._.
For_IN instance_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT 6th_CD of_IN May_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.

On_IN the_DT 5th_CD of_IN June_NNP ,_, almost_RB exactly_RB a_DT month_NN after_IN ,_, the_DT man_NN living_NN in_IN No_DT ._.

At_IN No_DT ._.
658_CD Sachapir_NNP Street_NNP ,_, a_DT badly_RB infected_JJ locality_NN ,_, and_CC inhabited_VBN by_IN some_DT 11_CD families_NNS ,_, the_DT whole_JJ place_NN ,_, after_IN most_JJS careful_JJ disinfection_NN 011_CD the_DT 16th_CD May_NNP ,_, was_VBD kept_VBN vacant_NN for_IN some_DT 12_CD or_CC 14_CD days_NNS ,_, after_IN which_WDT one_CD or_CC two_CD families_NNS moved_VBD back_RB into_IN their_PRP$ rooms_NNS ,_, the_DT other_JJ houses_NNS still_RB remaining_VBG vacant_NN ._.

The_DT attitude_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS during_IN this_DT period_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN eminently_RB satisfactory_JJ ._.
``_`` Altitude_NN of_IN the_DT people.-The_JJ people_NNS have_VBP been_VBN most_RBS patient_JJ ,_, and_CC submit_NN in_IN the_DT most_RBS ready_JJ and_CC admirable_JJ manner_NN to_TO the_DT restrictions_NNS which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ found_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO impose_VB on_IN them_PRP ._.

Poona_NNP District_NNP ._.
Third_JJ Epidemic_NNP (_( July_NNP 1898-_CD November_NNP 1899_CD )_) .-Throughout_NN April_NNP ,_, May_NNP and_CC Jane_NNP 1898_CD there_EX was_VBD almost_RB total_JJ subsidence_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT Poona_NNP District_NNP and_CC City_NNP ,_, although_IN no_DT week_NN passed_VBD without_IN dropping_VBG cases_NNS occurring_VBG in_IN both_DT ._.
From_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN July_NNP the_DT district_NN figures_NNS steadily_RB rose_VBD and_CC culminated_VBD in_IN a_DT moderate_JJ epidemic_NN which_WDT lasted_VBD throughout_IN September_NNP ,_, October_NNP and_CC Novem-_NNP ber_NN 1898_CD ._.
The_DT highest_JJS weekly_JJ figures_NNS were_VBD 180_CD cases-115_JJ deaths_NNS (_( week_NN ending_VBG 14th_CD October_NNP 1898_CD )_) and_CC 177_CD cases-_JJ 131_CD deaths_NNS (_( week_NN ending_VBG 28th_CD October_NNP 1898_CD )_) ._.
On_IN the_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN to_TO prevent_VB this_DT third_JJ outbreak_NN and_CC to_TO control_VB it_PRP when_WRB it_PRP occurred_VBD ,_, Mr._NNP W._NNP P._NNP Shephard_NNP ,_, I._NNP C._NNP S._NNP ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP ,_, reports_VBZ as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` (_( 1_CD )_) To_TO prevent_VB the_DT introduction_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, the_DT village_NN officers_NNS were_VBD ordered_VBN to_TO watch_VB carefully_RB all_DT arrivals_NNS from_IN infected_VBN areas_NNS and_CC to_TO keep_VB them_PRP outside_RP their_PRP$ village_NN for_IN a._JJ period_NN 59_CD 234_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
VIII_NNP ._.
often_RB days_NNS ._.
The_DT measure_NN worked_VBN on_IN the_DT whole_JJ very_RB successfully_RB ,_, the_DT co-operation_NN of_IN the_DT villagers_NNS being_VBG generally_RB obtained_VBN ,_, a_DT consequence_NN in_IN some_DT cases_NNS of_IN previous_JJ experience_NN of_IN plague_NN and_CC a_DT recognition_NN of_IN its_PRP$ highly_RB infectious_JJ nature_NN ._.
A_DT further_JJ precaution_NN was_VBD the_DT establishment_NN of_IN disinfecting_VBG camps_NNS at_IN certain_JJ stations_NNS on_IN the_DT main_JJ line_NN between_IN Poona_NNP and_CC Bombay_NNP ,_, where_WRB all_DT arrivals_NNS were_VBD disinfected_VBN before_IN being_VBG allowed_VBN to_TO pass_VB into_IN the_DT talukas_NN ._.
This_DT measure_NN was_VBD also_RB useful_JJ and_CC highly_RB successful_JJ ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) To_TO assist_VB the_DT discovery_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS all_DT village_NN officers_NNS were_VBD directed_VBN to_TO report_VB any_DT abnormal_JJ mortality_NN to_TO the_DT Mmlatdr_NNP of_IN their_PRP$ tluka_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD supplied_VBN with_IN copies_NNS of_IN the_DT circular_JJ describing_VBG the_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN plague_NN ._.
Registers_NNS were_VBD kept_VBN of_IN all_DT arrivals_NNS and_CC departures_NNS of_IN persons_NNS not_RB belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT village_NN ._.
These_DT measures_NNS were_VBD also_RB successful_JJ ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) The_DT most_RBS ordinary_JJ source_NN of_IN infection_NN is_VBZ the_DT arrival_NN from_IN an_DT infected_JJ area_NN of_IN persons_NNS carrying_VBG infection_NN either_RB in_IN their_PRP$ clothes_NNS or_CC bodies_NNS ._.
At_IN Khed_NNP a_DT Mahomedan_NNP family_NN arrived_VBD from_IN Bombay_NNP in_IN August_NNP ._.
Their_PRP$ clothing_NN was_VBD disinfected_VBN :_: they_PRP were_VBD detained_VBN outside_IN the_DT town_NN for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS ;_: on_IN the_DT 12th_CD day_NN ,_, a_DT boy_NN of_IN 14_CD ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT family_NN ,_, showed_VBD symptoms_NNS of_IN plague_NN ,_, From_IN this_DT case_NN plague_NN spread_NN gradually_RB throughout_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
At_IN Alandi_NNP ,_, a_DT Gura_NNP ?_.
family_NN who_WP ,_, while_IN visiting_VBG Chinchwd_NNP ,_, had_VBD put_VBN up_RP in_IN an_DT infected_JJ house_NN ,_, returned_VBN to_TO Alandi_NNP and_CC infected_VBD that_IN ,_, town_NN also_RB ._.
At_IN Bhongaoli_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT Purandhar_NNP Tluka_NNP ,_, plague_NN was_VBD introduced_VBN by_IN a_DT woman_NN who_WP had_VBD been_VBN to_TO an_DT infected_JJ village_NN in_IN the_DT Wi_NNP Tluka_NNP of_IN the_DT Stnra_NNP District_NNP ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN a_DT washerman_NN returned_VBN from_IN an_DT infected_JJ village_NN in_IN the_DT Bhor_NNP State_NNP ._.
Then_RB rats_VBZ began_VBD to_TO die_VB m_JJ BhongaoH_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT village_NN rapidly_RB became_VBD infected_JJ ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) When_WRB plague_JJ deaths_NNS occurred_VBD ,_, the_DT clothing_NN and_CC bedding_NN of_IN the_DT deceased_VBN was_VBD ordin-_JJ arily_RB burnt_NN ,_, but_CC sometimes_RB only_RB washed_JJ ._.
The_DT contacis_NN were_VBD segregated_VBN and_CC their_PRP$ clothing_NN and_CC bedding_NN washed_NNS and_CC sometimes_RB disinfected_VBN ._.
Disinfection_NN was_VBD the_DT regular_JJ course_NN where_WRB a_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP was_VBD available_JJ ._.
On_IN some_DT occasions_NNS the_DT clothing_NN was_VBD washed_VBN or_CC disinfected_VBN a_DT second_JJ time_NN when_WRB the_DT infected_JJ house_NN was_VBD re-occupied_JJ ._.
All_DT evacuated_VBN houses_NNS were_VBD sooner_RB or_CC later_RB disinfected_VBN with_IN Perchloride_NNP of_IN Mercury_NNP ,_, all_DT rubbish_JJ being_VBG previously_RB swept_VBN out_RP and_CC burned_VBD ,_, Care_NNP was_VBD taken_VBN to_TO thoroughly_VB saturate_NN with_IN the_DT solution_NN the_DT floors_NNS ,_, walls_NNS and_CC ceilings_NNS ._.
Occasionally_RB roofs_NNS were_VBD opened_VBN to_TO admit_VB air_NN and_CC light_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN some_DT cases_NNS holes_NNS were_VBD made_VBN in_IN the_DT walls_NNS for_IN the_DT same_JJ purpose_NN ._.
Grass_NNP huts_NNS in_IN which_WDT plague_NN cases_NNS occurred_VBD were_VBD invariably_RB burnt_JJ ._.
(_( a_DT )_) Alandi_NNP ,_, Kharpudi_NNP Burlruk_NNP and_CC Kherdi_NNP ,_, Pimpri_NNP ,_, Rase_NNP Brahmanwadi_NNP and_CC Bhongaoli_NNP were_VBD completely_RB evacuated_VBN within_IN a_DT very_RB few_JJ days_NNS of_IN the_DT first_JJ indigenous_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN ._.
Partial_JJ evacuation_NN was_VBD resorted_VBN to_TO at_IN Khed_NNP and_CC Chakan_NNP ._.
Evacuation_NN certainly_RB lessened_VBD the_DT violence_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ but_CC did_VBD not_RB completely_RB stop_VB it_PRP ._.
Cases_NNS continued_VBD to_TO occur_VB in_IN the_DT huts_NNS into_IN which_WDT the_DT people_NNS had_VBD gone_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT inability_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN to_TO refrain_VB from_IN attending_VBG en_FW masse_FW on_IN their_PRP$ sick_JJ relatives_NNS ,_, unless_IN strictly_RB prevented_VBN ,_, ensured_VBD that_IN a_DT large_JJ number_NN should_MD die_VB where_WRB many_JJ might_MD have_VB lived_VBN ._.
This_DT can_MD only_RB be_VB obviated_VBN by_IN having_VBG separate_JJ quarters_NNS for_IN each_DT ,_, allowing_VBG only_RB one_CD attendant_NN who_WP should_MD ordinarily_RB sleep_VB outside_IN the_DT patient_NN 's_POS hut_NN ,_, and_CC not_RB allowing_VBG him_PRP or_CC the_DT patient_NN to_TO rejoin_VB the_DT family_NN until_IN the_DT latter_NN is_VBZ cured_VBN and_CC they_PRP have_VBP both_DT been_VBN disinfected_VBN ._.
A_DT system_NN of_IN village_NN hospitals_NNS might_MD ensure_VB this_DT being_VBG done_VBN ,_, but_CC such_JJ hospitals_NNS are_VBP invariably_RB unpopular_JJ ,_, and_CC if_IN villagers_NNS are_VBP to_TO be_VB forced_VBN to_TO do_VB everything_NN that_WDT is_VBZ required_VBN ,_, a_DT very_RB large_JJ body_NN of_IN men_NNS would_MD be_VB necessary_JJ ,_, entailing_VBG a_DT correspondingly_RB heavy_JJ expenditure_NN ._.
Even_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, assuming_VBG that_IN evacuation_NN is_VBZ not_RB carried_VBN out_RP in_IN an_DT ideal_JJ manner_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ still_RB very_RB effective_JJ and_CC greatly_RB lessens_VBZ the_DT mortality_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, (_( 6_CD )_) Inoculation_NN was_VBD only_RB carried_VBN out_RP on_IN a_DT small_JJ scale_NN ,_, 50_CD persons_NNS being_VBG inoculated_VBN at_IN Chinchwd_NNP and_CC 477_CD at_IN ,_, Aundh_NNP ._.
Ai_NNP Chinchwd_NNP ,_, one_CD inoculated_VBN woman_NN died_VBD of_IN plague_NN ._.
(_( 7_CD )_) Strict_NNP segregation_NN was_VBD only_RB insisted_VBN on_IN when_WRB cases_NNS first_RB occurred_VBD in_IN a_DT village_NN Afterwards_IN it_PRP became_VBD merged_VBN in_IN the_DT evacuation_NN measiires_VBZ referred_VBN to_TO above_VB ._.
The_DT segregated_JJ family_NN was_VBD treated_VBN like_IN a_DT suspicious_JJ arrival_NN and_CC simply_RB kept_VBD outside_IN the_DT village_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN ton_NN days_NNS ._.
(_( 8_CD )_) Temporary_NNP huts_NNS were_VBD erected_VBN for_IN plague_NN patients_NNS at_IN Chinchwd_NNP ,_, Chakan_NNP ,_, Khed_NNP ,_, Arvi_NNP ,_, Bhongaoli_NNP and_CC Alandi_NNP ._.

(_( 9_CD )_) No_DT one_NN was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO re-occupy_VB his_PRP$ house_NN until_IN it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN disinfected_VBN and_CC until_IN the_DT officer_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN plague_JJ operations_NNS was_VBD thoroughly_RB satisfied_VBN that_IN the_DT infection_NN had_VBD disappeared_VBN ._.

(_( 10_CD )_) The_DT people_NNS acquiesced_VBN in_IN all_PDT the_DT measures_NNS adopted_VBN for_IN their_PRP$ welfare_NN ,_, except_IN (_( 1_CD )_) inoculation_NN ,_, and_CC (_( 2_CD )_) separation_NN from_IN their_PRP$ sick_JJ relatives_NNS ._.

Poona_NNP City_NNP (_( excluding_VBG can-_JJ tonment_NN and_CC suburbs_NN )_) ._.
From_NN May_NNP 1898_CD to_TO February_NNP 1899_CD ,_, Poona_NNP City_NNP was_VBD free_JJ from_IN indigenous_JJ plague_NN ._.
The_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN imported_VBN cases_NNS which_WDT occurred_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, were_VBD naturally_RB a_DT constant_JJ source_NN of_IN anxiety_NN ._.

As_IN regards_NNS the_DT organisation_NN and_CC means_VBZ taken_VBN up_RP to_TO the_DT above_NN date_NN ,_, Major_NNP W_NNP ,_, L._NNP Reade_NNP ,_, R._NNP A._NNP M._NNP C._NNP ,_, Chief_NNP Plague_NNP Authority_NNP ,_, Poona_NNP City_NNP ,_, reports_VBZ as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` Mentioned_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ place_NN ,_, the_DT organization_NN may_MD he_PRP said_VBD to_TO consist_VB of_IN two_CD lines_NNS of_IN defence_NN ,_, the_DT first_JJ line_NN includes_VBZ surveillance_NN of_IN arrivals_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT second_JJ line_NN ,_, corpse-inspection_NN ._.

(_( 2_CD )_) The_DT town_NN is_VBZ divided_VBN into_IN 17_CD districts_NNS ,_, and_CC each_DT division_NN is_VBZ placed_VBN in_IN charge_NN of_IN a_DT Chief_NNP Volunteer_NNP ,_, usually_RB a_DT native_JJ gentleman_NN of_IN position_NN in_IN the_DT division_NN ._.

(_( 3_CD )_) Each_DT division_NN is_VBZ provided_VBN with_IN an_DT office_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT voluntary_JJ system_NN has_VBZ so_RB far_RB developed_VBN in_IN Poona_NNP that_IN those_DT offices_NNS ave_VBP placed_VBN rent-free_NN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Authorities_NNP ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) The_DT surveillance_NN of_IN arrivals_NNS by_IN rail_NN and_CC road_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN out_RP at_IN the_DT divisional_JJ office_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN the_DT non-attendance_NN of_IN a_DT person_NN on_IN the_DT surveillance_NN list_NN ,_, a_DT clerk_NN or_CC peon_NN is_VBZ at_IN once_RB sent_VBN to_TO visit_VB the_DT house_NN and_CC to_TO find_VB out_RP the_DT cause_NN of_IN non-attendance_NN ._.

(_( 5_CD )_) Traders_NNPS '_POS passes_NNS are_VBP issued_VBN to_TO recoognized_JJ traders_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN whose_WP$ business_NN entails_VBZ a_DT good_JJ deal_NN of_IN travelling_NN ._.

(_( 7_CD )_) If_IN every_DT householder_NN carried_VBD out_IN these_DT regulations_NNS ,_, an_DT organization_NN for_IN house-to-houso_JJ visitation_NN would_MD bo_VB needless_JJ ,_, but_CC unfortunately_RB many_JJ householders_NNS are_VBP not_RB sufficiently_RB impress-_JJ ed_NN with_IN the_DT necessity_NN for_IN carrying_VBG out_RP these_DT duties_NNS ._.
The_DT degree_NN in_IN which_WDT these_DT obligations_NNS arc_VBP met_VBN varies_NNS considerably_RB ,_, but_CC it_PRP may_MD be_VB roughly_RB asserted_VBN that_IN the_DT better_JJR educated_VBN carry_VBP out_RP the_DT rules_NNS to_TO a_DT larger_JJR extent_NN than_IN the_DT poorer_NN classes_NNS ._.
A_DT person_NN under_IN surveillance_NN has_VBZ to_TO attend_VB at_IN the_DT divisional_JJ office_NN every_DT alternate_NN clay_NN for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS ._.
(_( 8_CD )_) Surveillance_NN of_IN arrivals_NNS has_VBZ now_RB been_VBN done_VBN away_RB with_IN ,_, or_CC the_DT part_NN of_IN it_PRP which_WDT entailed_VBD attendance_NN at_IN the_DT divisional_JJ office_NN for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS ._.
-_: Shortly_RB after_IN the_DT present_JJ outbreak_NN ,_, which_WDT commonoed_VBP in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN February_NNP 1899_CD ,_, it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN it_PRP became_VBD impracticable_JJ as_IN per-_JJ sonation_NN became_VBD constant_JJ ._.
Several_JJ instances_NNS occurred_VBD of_IN persons_NNS ,_, under_IN surveillance_NN sending_VBG some_DT one_CD else_RB to_TO personate_VB them_PRP ,_, as_IN a_DT rule_NN the_DT person_NN who_WP should_MD have_VB come_VBN being_VBG ill_VBN in_IN a_DT house_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD therefore_RB decided_JJ to_TO do_VB away_RP with_IN compulsory_JJ reporting_NN of_IN the_DT arrival_NN and_CC to_TO throw_VB the_DT onus_NN of_IN report_NN of_IN illness_NN on_IN the_DT householder_NN ._.
This_DT system_NN has_VBZ now_RB been_VBN working_VBG for_IN two_CD months_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB the_DT efficiency_NN of_IN the_DT organization_NN has_VBZ suffered_VBN through_IN its_PRP$ abolition_NN ._.
(_( 9_CD )_) The_DT necessity_NN for_IN an_DT accurate_JJ house_NN census_NN is_VBZ of_IN importance_NN ,_, as_IN by_IN means_NNS of_IN this_DT system_NN it_PRP ought_MD to_TO be_VB possible_JJ to_TO limit_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
On_IN a_DT case_NN occurring_VBG in_IN a_DT house_NN the_DT number_NN of_IN '_'' contacts_NNS '_POS would_MD be_VB accurately_RB known_VBN and_CC the_DT tendency_NN to_TO spread_VB the_DT disease_NN would_MD be_VB lessened_VBN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD owing_VBG to_TO the_DT inaccurate_NN and_CC slipshod_JJ way_NN that_IN the_DT house_NN census_NN was_VBD kept_VBN in_IN three_CD of_IN the_DT divisions_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN that_WDT prevented_VBD the_DT present_JJ outbreak_NN from_IN being_VBG limited_VBN to_TO a_DT greater_JJR extent_NN than_IN has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT case_NN ._.
This_DT weakness_NN unfortunately_RB only_RB became_VBD apparent_JJ after_IN the_DT disease_NN had_VBD taken_VBN root_NN in_IN these_DT divisions_NNS ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB said_VBD that_IN the_DT fact_NN of_IN a_DT person_NN 's_POS name_NN being_VBG entered_VBN in_IN the_DT house_NN list_NN will_MD not_RB act_VB as_IN a_DT sufficient_JJ deterrent_NN to_TO leaving_VBG the_DT house_NN and_CC going_VBG elsewhere_RB ,_, but_CC the_DT knowledge_NN that_IN a_DT 'contact_NN '_'' is_VBZ still_RB at_IN large_JJ is_VBZ an_DT incentive_NN for_IN search_NN ._.
An_DT additional_JJ safeguard_NN is_VBZ the_DT responsibility_NN which_WDT the_DT Local_NNP Authorities_NNP cast_VBD on_IN the_DT householder_NN to_TO produce_VB the_DT number_NN entered_VBN on_IN the_DT house_NN list_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT correct_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS is_VBZ not_RB produced_VBN ,_, the_DT household_NN can_MD be_VB placed_VBN in_IN close_JJ segregation_NN ;_: this_DT will_MD generally_RB have_VB the_DT effect_NN of_IN the_DT correct_JJ number_NN being_VBG produced_VBN ._.
Under_IN the_DT present_JJ rules_NNS no_DT legal_JJ responsibility_NN can_MD be_VB cast_VBN on_IN the_DT householder_NN to_TO produce_VB the_DT number_NN of_IN persons_NNS living_VBG in_IN the_DT house_NN ;_: he_PRP is_VBZ only_RB responsible_JJ for_IN reporting_VBG the_DT arrivals_NNS of_IN a_DT person_NN from_IN an_DT infected_JJ area_NN ._.
It_PRP would_MD considerably_RB facilitate_VB the_DT work_NN of_IN keeping_VBG an_DT accurate_NN house_NN census_NN if_IN the_DT responsibility_NN was_VBD legalised_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT householder_NN made_VBD responsible_JJ for_IN a_DT report_NN of_IN all_DT arrivals_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ house_NN ,_, irrespective_NN of_IN the_DT locality_NN from_IN which_WDT they_PRP came_VBD ;_: he_PRP should_MD also_RB report_VB all_DT departures_NNS from_IN the_DT house_NN ._.
(_( 10_CD )_) Surveillance_NN of_IN 'contacts'-When_NNP only_RB isolated_VBD cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB dealt_VBN with_IN ,_, and_CC a_DT small_JJ number_NN of_IN plague_JJ 'contacts_NNS '_POS to_TO be_VB arranged_VBN for_IN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN most_RBS convenient_JJ to_TO keep_VB the_DT latter_JJ under_IN surveillance_NN in_IN a_DT building_NN in_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
The_DT house_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT case_NN occurred_VBD was_VBD disinfected_VBN ,_, also_RB the_DT clothing_NN of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS ,_, and_CC these_DT people_NNS had_VBD to_TO present_VB themselves_PRP daily_RB for_IN medical_JJ examination_NN ._. ''_''
But_CC in_IN spite_NN of_IN these_DT careful_JJ and_CC vigorous_JJ precautions_NNS ,_, plague_NN would_MD not_RB be_VB denied_VBN :_: towards_NNS the_DT end_NN of_IN February_NNP 1899_CD ,_, it_PRP became_VBD indigenous_JJ ,_, and_CC ,_, after_IN considerable_JJ fluctuations_NNS of_IN virulence_NN throughout_IN March_NNP ,_, April_NNP and_CC May_NNP ,_, it_PRP burst_VBZ out_RP into_IN an_DT epidemic_NN of_IN exceptional_JJ seventy_NN ,_, lasting_VBG throughout_IN June_NNP ,_, July_NNP ,_, August_NNP and_CC September-causing_VBG a_DT panic_NN which_WDT led_VBD to_TO the_DT flight_NN of_IN over_IN half_PDT the_DT City_NNP and_CC destroying_VBG nearly_RB 10,000_CD people-the_JJ history_NN of_IN which_WDT ,_, however_RB ,_, lies_VBZ beyond_IN the_DT scope_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ review_NN ._.
?_. ?_. ?_.
?_. A_DT DISTRICT_NNP ._. ]_NN
237_CD Plague_NNP measures_NNS in_IN Poema_NNP City_NNP are_VBP differentiated_VBN from_IN those_DT in_IN the_DT other_JJ large_JJ towns_NNS of_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP by_IN a_DT striking_JJ characteristic_NN ;_: the_DT rigid_JJ enforcement_NN of_IN the_DT production_NN of_IN a_DT certificate_NN of_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN death_NN before_IN disposal_NN of_IN a_DT dead_JJ body_NN ._.
Doubtless_NN this_DT measure_NN conduces_VBZ to_TO the_DT detection_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT sustained_JJ violence_NN of_IN the_DT recent_JJ epidemic_JJ seems_VBZ to_TO show_VB that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ of_IN little_JJ use_NN in_IN combating_VBG an_DT outbreak_NN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN stated_VBN that_IN the_DT third_JJ epidemic_JJ began_VBD in_IN the_DT latter_JJ half_NN of_IN February_NNP 1899_CD ,_, the_DT total_JJ mortality_NN during_IN January_NNP was_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, every_DT high_JJ ;_: but_CC this_DT is_VBZ explained_VBN by_IN Major_JJ Rende_NN :_: -_: ``_`` (_( 3_CD )_) During_IN January_NNP and_CC February_NNP 1899_CD ,_, measles_NNS and_CC influenza_NNS were_VBD prevalent_JJ in_IN epidemic_JJ form_NN ,_, causing_VBG a_DT large_JJ mortality_NN amongst_VBP the_DT young_JJ and_CC the_DT very_RB old_JJ ,_, also_RB their_PRP$ sequels_NNS ,_, pneumonia_NN and_CC bronchitis_NN ._.
In_IN January_NNP 1899_CD ,_, the_DT monthly_JJ mortality_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN was_VBD 385_CD ,_, and_CC for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN comparison_NN it_PRP will_MD be_VB convenient_JJ to_TO take_VB January_NNP 1896_CD ,_, which_WDT was_VBD a_DT year_NN free_RB from_IN plague_NN ,_, at_IN least_JJS the_DT early_JJ portion_NN of_IN it_PRP ._.
In_IN January_NNP 1896_CD ,_, the_DT monthly_JJ mortality_NN was_VBD 259_CD ,_, but_CC this_DT excluded_VBD still-born_JJ children_NNS ,_, of_IN whom_WP 24_CD are_VBP included_VBN in_IN the_DT Janu-_NNP ary_JJ 1899_CD statistics_NNS ;_: this_DT would_MD lower_VB the_DT number_NN in_IN the_DT latter_JJ year_NN to_TO 361_CD ._.
The_DT mortality_NN of_IN children_NNS under_IN five_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN during_IN January_NNP 1899_CD was_VBD 208_CD ,_, whereas_NNS in_IN the_DT corresponding_JJ month_NN of_IN 1896_CD it_PRP was_VBD only_RB 59_CD ._.
The_DT deaths_NNS in_IN this_DT class_NN alone_RB would_MD more_RBR than_IN account_NN for_IN the_DT increased_JJ mortality_NN ,_, not_RB reckoning_VBG the_DT 24_CD still-boras_JJ which_WDT are_VBP included_VBN in_IN the_DT 1899_CD statistics_NNS ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) A_DT plague_JJ epidemic_NN does_VBZ not_RB take_VB its_PRP$ start_NN amongst_IN persons_NNS of_IN this_DT age_NN ,_, but_CC com-_JJ mences_NNS in_IN the_DT vigorous_JJ adult_NN class_NN ,_, who_WP move_VBP about_IN seeking_VBG work_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP therefore_RB more_RBR exposed_JJ to_TO zones_NNS of_IN infection_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ quite_RB inconceivable_JJ that_IN undetected_JJ plague_NN could_MD have_VB existed_VBN in_IN the_DT town_NN and_CC not_RB be_VB detected_VBN by_IN the_DT medical_JJ officers_NNS on_IN corpse-inspection_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP must_MD be_VB remembered_VBN that_IN these_DT officers_NNS were_VBD specially_RB skilled_VBN in_IN the_DT work_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD largely_RB owing_VBG to_TO the_DT thoroughness_NN with_IN which_WDT this_DT work_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP that_IN cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN had_VBD been_VBN detected_VBN and_CC limited_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ spread_NN in_IN the_DT preceding_VBG ten_JJ months_NNS ._.
To_TO suppose_VB that_IN an_DT epidemic_NN of_IN plague_NN can_MD exist_VB in_IN the_DT town_NN with_IN a_DT selective_JJ agency_NN for_IN children_NNS under_IN 5_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN ,_, and_CC showing_VBG none_NN of_IN the_DT objective_JJ features_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, would_MD certainly_RB revolutionize_VB our_PRP$ present_JJ knowledge_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
If_IN additional_JJ data_NNS are_VBP necessary_JJ to_TO dispel_VB the_DT suspicion_NN that_IN the_DT increased_JJ mortality_NN we_PRP suffered_VBD from_IN in_IN Poona_NNP during_IN the_DT early_JJ months_NNS of_IN this_DT year_NN was_VBD due_JJ to_TO plague_VB ,_, they_PRP could_MD be_VB found_VBN in_IN the_DT immunity_NN from_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT Cantonment_NNP and_CC neighbouring_JJ villages_NNS ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) If_IN the_DT excess_JJ mortality_NN had_VBD been_VBN due_JJ to_TO plague_VB ,_, it_PRP would_MD mean_VB that_IN over_IN a_DT hundred_JJ deaths_NNS in_IN the_DT month_NN were_VBD unrecognized_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN no_DT precautions_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN ;_: and_CC this_DT non-_JJ recognition_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN would_MD surely_RB have_VB led_VBN to_TO an_DT outbreak_NN in_IN the_DT neighbouring_JJ Canton-_JJ ment_NN and_CC villages_NNS ._.
(_( 6_CD )_) For_IN a_DT clear_JJ comprehension_NN of_IN this_DT subject_NN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO devote_VB some_DT space_NN to_TO the_DT subject_NN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT matter_NN of_IN considerable_JJ importance_NN ,_, as_IN an_DT increased_VBN death-rate_NN in_IN a_DT town_NN which_WDT is_VBZ exposed_VBN to_TO plague_VB infection_NN is_VBZ usually_RB the_DT danger_NN flag_NN preceding_VBG an_DT epidemic_JJ ;_: but_CC with_IN a_DT reliable_JJ death_NN registration_NN ,_, this_DT signal_NN of_IN danger_NN would_MD be_VB recognised_VBN on_IN the_DT first_JJ imported_JJ case_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN coming_VBG into_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
(_( 7_CD )_) During_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN February_NNP ,_, after_IN the_DT town_NN had_VBD been_VBN infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, the_DT mortality_NN amongst_NN children_NNS was_VBD less_RBR ;_: whereas_IN the_DT mortality_NN amongst_NN adults_NNS was_VBD greatly_RB in_IN excess_NN ,_, this_DT excess_JJ being_VBG due_JJ to_TO plague_VB ._. ''_''
Of_IN the_DT origin_NN and_CC gradual_JJ spread_NN of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN ,_, Major_NNP Reade_NNP gives_VBZ the_DT following_JJ description_NN :_: -_: ``_`` The_DT present_JJ outbreak_NN of_IN plague_NN commenced_VBD early_RB in_IN February_NNP ,_, and_CC can_MD be_VB traced_VBN to_TO an_DT imported_VBN case_NN from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, the_DT illness_NN for_IN several_JJ days_NNS being_VBG concealed_VBN ._.
The_DT servant_NN of_IN a_DT Bhatia_NNP merchant_NN came_VBD from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB known_VBN whether_IN he_PRP was_VBD ill_RB at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN his_PRP$ arrival_NN or_CC in_IN the_DT incubation_NN stage_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.

Boundaries_NNS ._.
Stra_NNP is_VBZ bounded_VBN on_IN the_DT north_NN by_IN the_DT States_NNPS of_IN Bhor_NNP and_CC Phaltan_NNP ,_, and_CC beyond_IN them_PRP by_IN Poona_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT east_NN by_IN Sholpur_NNP and_CC the_DT Jath_NNP State_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT south_NN by_IN Belgaum_NNP and_CC Kolhpur_NNP ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN by_IN the_DT Kolba_NNP and_CC Ratngiri_NNP District_NNP ._.
Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT west_NN water_NN is_VBZ fairly_RB abundant_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT east_NN ,_, hot_JJ weather_NN after_IN hot_JJ weather_NN ,_, and_CC want_NN of_IN water_NN causes_NNS much_RB suffering_VBG ._.
The_DT supply_NN comes_VBZ partly_RB from_IN rivers_NNS and_CC streams_NNS ,_, partly_RB from_IN reservoirs_NNS ,_, and_CC partly_RB from_IN wells_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP numerous_JJ ,_, but_CC in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS run_VBP dry_JJ during_IN the_DT hot_JJ season_NN ._.
The_DT Stra_NNP climate_NN is_VBZ a_DT marked_JJ change_NN from_IN the_DT moist_NN and_CC relaxing_VBG Konkan_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ liable_JJ to_TO aggravate_VB fever_NN and_CC render_VB it_PRP more_RBR acute_JJ by_IN contracting_VBG the_DT surface_NN vessels_NNS and_CC forcing_VBG inwards_NNS an_DT increased_VBN flow_NN of_IN blood_NN ._.
The_DT adverse_JJ condition_NN is_VBZ limited_VBN to_TO the_DT dry_JJ season_NN ,_, or_CC at_IN least_JJS is_VBZ considerably_RB modified_VBN during_IN the_DT soft_JJ mild_NN and_CC damp_VB south-west_JJ monsoon_NN ._.
The_DT soils_NNS of_IN the_DT District_NNP belong_NN to_TO three_CD main_JJ classes_NNS ,_, red_VBN in_IN the_DT hills_NNS and_CC black_JJ and_CC light-coloured_JJ in_IN the_DT plains_NNS ._.
The_DT soil_NN of_IN the_DT Krishna_NNP valley_NN is_VBZ especially_RB rich_JJ ._.
About_IN thirty-three_JJ miles_NNS north-west_RB of_IN Stra_NNP ,_, is_VBZ Mahbaleshvar_NNP ,_, the_DT chief_JJ sanitarium_NN of_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
Previous_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.

*_JJ Stra_NNP District_NNP ._.
Population-225,989_NNP ._.
First_RB Epidemic_NNP (_( October_NNP 1896-June_JJ 1897_CD )_) .-The_JJ Stra_NNP District_NNP ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT earliest_JJS attacked_VBN in_IN the_DT whole_JJ Presidency_NNP ,_, fell_VBD a_DT prey_NN to_TO plague_VB while_IN it_PRP was_VBD yet_RB suffering_VBG from_IN a_DT famine_NN of_IN great_JJ severity_NN ._.
Imported_VBN plague_NN was_VBD reported_VBN in_IN the_DT District_NNP as_RB early_RB as_IN October_NNP 1896_CD ,_, during_IN which_WDT month_NN 4_CD cases_NNS (_( all_DT fatal_NN )_) occurred_VBD ._.
These_DT were_VBD followed_VBN by_IN 25_CD cases-_JJ 21_CD deaths-in_JJ the_DT month_NN of_IN November_NNP 1896_CD ._.
But_CC only_RB in_IN a_DT few_JJ instances_NNS did_VBD these_DT cases_NNS communicate_VBP infection_NN ,_, though_IN precautions_NNS of_IN any_DT kind_NN were_VBD almost_RB wholly_RB absent_JJ ._.
Thus_RB in_IN January_NNP and_CC February_NNP 1897_CD ,_, indigenous_JJ plague_NN broke_VBD out_RP in_IN the_DT villages_NNS of_IN Sangwi_NNP (_( Koregaon_NNP Tluka_NNP )_) and_CC Akhade_NNP ,_, Waluth_NNP ,_, Panas_NNP and_CC Khadshi_NNP (_( Joli_NNP Tluka_NNP )_) ,_, the_DT infection_NN having_VBG been_VBN imported_VBN from_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
Of_IN these_DT places_NNS ,_, Sangwi_NNP ,_, Akhade_NNP and_CC Waluth_NNP suffered_VBD somewhat_RB severely_JJ :_: but_CC the_DT villagers_NNS camped_VBD in_IN the_DT fields_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ accord_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT plague_NN died_VBD out_RP in_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN ._.
A_DT few_JJ more_JJR cases_NNS were_VBD imported_VBN in_IN March_NNP and_CC in_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN of_IN April_NNP 1897_CD ._.
No_DT more_RBR was_VBD heard_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT District_NNP until_IN it_PRP broke_VBD out_RP at_IN Kard_NNP in_IN July_NNP with_IN terrible_JJ severity_NN :_: and_CC with_IN the_DT above_JJ cases_NNS ,_, therefore_RB ,_, the_DT epidemic_NN in_IN the_DT Stra_NNP District_NNP may_MD be_VB said_VBD to_TO end_VB :_: The_DT figures_NNS were_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` Bombay_NNP Gazetteer_NNP ,_, Vol_NNP ._.

Second_JJ Epidemic_NNP (_( June_NNP 1897-June_CD 1898_CD )_) .-Alike_NN in_IN its_PRP$ inception_NN and_CC progress_NN ,_, the_DT history_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Kard_NNP Town_NNP is_VBZ a_DT startling_VBG one_CD ._.

B._NNP Smith_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, is_VBZ not_RB without_IN significance_NN :_: -_: ``_`` Plague_NN was_VBD reported_VBN by_IN Mr._NNP F._NNP B_NNP ._.
Young_NNP ,_, Superintendent_NNP of_IN Land_NNP Records_NNP and_CC Agriculture_NNP ,_, C._NNP D._NNP ,_, as_IN existing_VBG in_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN January_NNP ,_, or_CC beginning_NN of_IN February_NNP 1897_CD ,_, in_IN the_DT following_JJ places_NNS in_IN the_DT Kard_NNP Tluka_NNP :_: -_: Kard_NNP 1_CD 1_CD Khadshi_NNP 2_CD 2_CD Wahagaon_NNP 1_CD 1_CD Chore_NNP 7_CD 7_CD Belavada_NNP 2_CD 2_CD Pli_NNP 4_CD 4_CD ``_`` Mr._NNP Young_NNP 's_POS tour_NN in_IN the_DT Stra_NNP District_NNP lasted_VBD from_IN 10th_CD January_NNP to_TO the_DT 17th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ._.
He_PRP did_VBD not_RB see_VB any_DT of_IN the_DT cases_NNS himself_PRP ,_, and_CC could_MD not_RB state_NN if_IN there_EX were_VBD any_DT buboes_NNS ._. ''_''

247_CD of_IN January_NNP 1898_CD in_IN this_DT Tluka_NNP alone_RB was_VBD 57_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN of_IN September_NNP 1897_CD ,_, '_'' seven_CD villages_NNS returned_VBN about_IN 100_CD cases_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT 4th_JJ September_NNP ,_, Lieutenant_NNP Robertson_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, took_VBD charge_NN of_IN the_DT villages_NNS in_IN the_DT Kard_NNP Tluka_NNP and_CC succeeded_VBN in_IN several_JJ cases_NNS in_IN detecting_VBG plague_NN at_IN places_NNS where_WRB it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN carefully_RB concealed_VBN ._.
But_CC the_DT extent_NN of_IN his_PRP$ charge_NN largely_RB discounted_VBD the_DT efficacy_NN of_IN his_PRP$ endeavours_NNS :_: for_IN whatever_WDT good_JJ he_PRP was_VBD able_JJ to_TO effect_NN on_IN his_PRP$ arrival_NN at_IN a_DT village_NN ,_, was_VBD undone_NN on_IN his_PRP$ departure_NN ._.

Amongst_IN the_DT places_NNS which_WDT suffered_VBD most_RBS severely_RB in_IN the_DT Kard_NNP Tluka_NNP was_VBD the_DT town_NN Masur_NNP ._.
Population-6,703_NNP ._.
of_IN Masur_NNP ,_, a_DT well-to-do_JJ agricultural_JJ and_CC commercial_JJ centre_NN ,_, second_NN in_IN importance_NN only_RB to_TO Kard_NNP itself_PRP ._.
Some_DT people_NNS of_IN Masur_NNP visited_VBD Kard_NNP and_CC brought_VBD infection_NN thence_NN in_IN the_DT second_JJ week_NN of_IN August_NNP 1897_CD ._.

Efforts_NNS were_VBD therefore_RB confined_VBN to_TO the_DT isolation_NN and_CC treatment_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN ._.

Tsgaon_NNP Tluka_NNP ._.

of_IN the_DT population_NN ,_, being_VBG less_JJR than_IN 2_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
in_IN 9_CD cases_NNS ._.

There_EX was_VBD a_DT general_JJ subsidence_NN towards_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN 1897_CD ,_, but_CC fresh_JJ villages_NNS were_VBD attacked_VBN and_CC the_DT epidemic_JJ lingered_VBN on_IN in_IN this_DT Tluka_NNP after_IN the_DT disease_NN had_VBD subsided_VBN everywhere_RB else_RB in_IN the_DT District_NNP ._.

successfully_RB isolated_VBN ._.
In_IN this_DT month_NN ._.
Mr._NNP C._NNP B_NNP ._.
``_`` Winchester_NNP ,_, I._NNP C._NNP S._NNP ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP ,_, called_VBD a_DT meeting_NN of_IN the_DT citizens_NNS and_CC impressed_VBN on_IN them_PRP the_DT necessity_NN for_IN a_DT close_JJ watch_NN over_IN further_JJ importation_NN ._.
The_DT town_NN was_VBD divided_VBN into_IN 9_CD wards_NNS ,_, two_CD Municipal_JJ Commissioners_NNPS holding_VBG charge_NN of_IN each_DT ward_NN ._.
As_IN ,_, however_RB ,_, more_JJR cases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN March_NNP ,_, and_CC there_RB was_VBD every_DT prospect_NN of_IN their_PRP$ increasing_NN ,_, observation_NN posts_NNS were_VBD established_VBN on_IN the_DT roads_NNS leading_VBG into_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN keeping_VBG ward_JJ superintendents_NNS informed_VBN of_IN the_DT name_NN and_CC address_NN of_IN every_DT arrival_NN ._.
Two_CD Observation_NNP Camps_NNP supplemented_VBD these_DT measures_NNS on_IN the_DT 9th_CD April_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Those_DT camps_NNS were_VBD closed_VBN on_IN the_DT 1st_CD of_IN June_NNP ;_: but_CC the_DT surveillance_NN system_NN was_VBD continued_VBN ._.
But_CC ,_, with_IN the_DT fall_NN of_IN Kard_NNP ,_, the_DT protection_NN of_IN Satra_NNP became_VBD increasingly_RB difficult_JJ :_: and_CC in_IN November_NNP 1897_CD Stra_NNP Town_NNP was_VBD numbered_VBN amongst_IN the_DT fallen_NN ._.
The_DT history_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ few_JJ cases_NNS is_VBZ both_DT interesting_JJ and_CC instructive_JJ ._.
In_IN September_NNP 1897_CD ,_, 2_CD or_CC 3_CD cases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT house_NN of_IN a_DT man_NN who_WP had_VBD frequent_JJ dealings_NNS with_IN Kard_NNP ._.
This_DT man_NN 's_POS house_NN formed_VBD one_CD of_IN a_DT block_NN of_IN seven_CD or_CC eight_CD houses_NNS ,_, separated_VBN from_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN by_IN a_DT nullah_NN ._.
The_DT inmates_NNS were_VBD segregated_VBN and_CC the_DT house_NN thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN ._.
Some_DT 12_CD days_NNS later_RB a_DT case_NN occurred_VBD in_IN another_DT house_NN of_IN the_DT sanie_NN block_NN ._.
This_DT case_NN was_VBD followed_VBN by_IN 2_CD others_NNS in_IN a_DT third_JJ house_NN ,_, also_RB situated_VBN in_IN the_DT same_JJ block_NN ._.
This_DT isolated_JJ block_NN was_VBD now_RB strictly_RB cordoned_VBN for_IN 15_CD days_NNS ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ residents_NNS were_VBD carefully_RB examined_VBN every_DT day_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT 4th_CD of_IN November_NNP ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ ,_, a_DT month_NN after_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN ,_, yet_RB another_DT person_NN succumbed_VBD to_TO plague_VB in_IN the_DT same_JJ block_NN ._.
Meanwhile_RB ,_, a_DT resident_NN of_IN the_DT block_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD been_VBN allowed_VBN to_TO shift_VB his_PRP$ quarters_NNS to_TO another_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, developed_VBD plague_NN there_RB ._.
Thereupon_NNP ,_, all_PDT the_DT houses_NNS in_IN which_WDT cases_NNS had_VBD occurred-4_JJ in_IN number-were_JJ burnt_NNS down_RP ;_: and_CC the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT cordoned_JJ inhabitants_NNS segregated_VBN in_IN the_DT Farashkhana_NNP (_( about_IN the_DT 9th_CD November_NNP 1897_CD )_) ;_: but_CC ,_, 2_CD cases_NNS occurring_VBG among_IN them_PRP next_JJ day_NN ,_, they_PRP were_VBD again_RB moved_VBN to_TO yet_RB another_DT place_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT 12th_CD November_NNP a_DT second_JJ centre_NN of_IN infection_NN was_VBD discovered_VBN :_: 4_CD cases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN a_DT house_NN not_RB far_RB from_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT infected_JJ houses_NNS in_IN the_DT block_NN ,_, but_CC situated_VBD in_IN the_DT town_NN proper_NN ._.
A_DT large_JJ block_NN of_IN about_IN 200_CD houses_NNS was_VBD then_RB cordoned_VBN ;_: those_DT who_WP wished_VBD to_TO leave_VB their_PRP$ houses_NNS being_VBG allowed_VBN to_TO do_VB so_RB after_IN passing_VBG 10_CD days_NNS in_IN the_DT Observation_NNP Camp_NNP ._.
Plague_NN now_RB broke_VBD out_RP quite_RB unexpectedly_RB in_IN the_DT heart_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ;_: but_CC was_VBD discovered_VBN in_IN good_JJ time_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT part_NN in_IN which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN was_VBD also_RB cordoned_VBN ._.
But_CC all_DT efforts_NNS to_TO stop_VB the_DT plague_NN were_VBD in_IN vain_NN :_: two_CD fresh_JJ centres_NNS were_VBD formed_VBN equally_RB insidiously_RB ;_: and_CC in_IN the_DT early_JJ part_NN of_IN December_NNP 1897_CD plague_NN was_VBD declared_VBN epidemic_JJ at_IN Stra_NNP Town_NNP ._.
During_IN the_DT previous_JJ month_NN Ro_NNP Bahadur_NNP B._NNP M._NNP Heblikar_NNP ,_, Deputy_NNP Collector_NNP ,_, had_VBD been_VBN appointed_VBN Chief_NNP Plague_NNP Authority_NNP ._.
A_DT Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP had_VBD already_RB been_VBN erected_VBN in_IN January_NNP 1897_CD ;_: and_CC a_DT Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP was_VBD now_RB attached_VBN to_TO it_PRP ._.
This_DT Hospital_NNP and_CC Camp_NNP were_VBD ,_, from_IN first_JJ to_TO last_JJ ,_, in_IN charge_NN of_IN Captain_NNP G._NNP Thomson_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ._.

Of_IN these_DT 1,685_CD inoculated_VBD people_NNS ,_, only_RB three_CD were_VBD attacked_VBN by_IN plague_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD several_JJ instances_NNS of_IN plague_NN occurring_VBG on_IN re-occupation_NN ,_, even_RB after_IN the_DT houses_NNS re-occupied_JJ had_VBD been_VBN disinfected_VBN ;_: these_DT instances_NNS were_VBD houses_NNS which_WDT had_VBD not_RB remained_VBN vacant_JJ for_IN any_DT considerable_JJ time_NN ._.
Lieutenant_JJ N._NNP E._NNP Anderson_NNP ,_, I._NNP S._NNP C._NNP ,_, quotes_VBZ Kamatipura_NNP and_CC a_DT Government_NNP building_NN adjoining_VBG the_DT jail_NN in_IN Stra_NNP Town_NNP as_IN examples_NNS ._.

In_IN this_DT connection_NN ,_, the_DT following_JJ observations_NNS by_IN Mr._NNP C._NNP G._NNP Dodgson_NNP ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP ,_, are_VBP both_DT valuable_JJ and_CC interesting_JJ :_: -_: ``_`` The_DT plan_NN which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP followed_VBN is_VBZ to_TO permit_VB re-occupation_JJ 2_CD months_NNS after_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN and_CC between_IN o_NN or_CC 4_CD months_NNS after_IN evacuation_NN ._.
The_DT method_NN employed_VBN is_VBZ to_TO allow_VB the_DT houses_NNS to_TO be_VB first_RB repaired_VBN (_( i._JJ e._NN ,_, roofs_VB mended_VBN )_) and_CC thoroughly_RB cleaned_VBN ._.
One_CD person_NN is_VBZ then_RB allowed_VBN to_TO sleep_VB in_IN each_DT house_NN ._.
If_IN after_IN 10_CD clays_NNS none_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS sleeping_VBG in_IN the_DT village_NN are_VBP found_VBN to_TO be_VB ill_JJ entire_JJ re-occupation_NN is_VBZ permitted_VBN ._.
The_DT results_NNS have_VBP been_VBN satisfactory_JJ ,_, as_IN infec-_JJ tion_NN has_VBZ not_RB broken_VBN out_RP again_RB in_IN a_DT single_JJ instance_NN ._.
As_RB far_RB as_IN my_PRP$ experience_NN goes_VBZ ,_, it_PRP makes_VBZ no_DT difference_NN whether_IN the_DT houses_NNS have_VBP been_VBN disinfected_VBN with_IN chemical_JJ disinfectants_NNS or_CC not_RB ,_, as_IN in_IN no_DT house_NN has_VBZ plague_VBN broken_VBN out_RP again_RB ,_, provided_VBD that_IN the_DT house_NN had_VBD been_VBN empty_JJ for_IN at_IN least_JJS o_JJ months_NNS ._.
Where_WRB houses_NNS were_VBD chemically_RB disinfected_VBN and_CC re-occupied_JJ after_IN a_DT lapse_NN of_IN ,_, say_VBP ,_, a_DT fortnight_NN ,_, plague_NN has_VBZ broken_VBN out_RP on_IN more_JJR than_IN one_CD occasion_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP inclined_JJ to_TO think_VB that_IN even_RB it_PRP '_'' houses_NNS had_VBD not_RB been_VBN ventilated_VBN at_IN all_DT but_CC had_VBD merely_RB been_VBN left_VBN vacant_NN for_IN ,_, say_VBP ,_, four_CD months_NNS ,_, that_IN the_DT germ_NN would_MD be_VB found_VBN to_TO have_VB become_VBN innocuous_JJ ._.

Population-62,229_NNP ._.
The_DT town_NN now_RB suffered_VBN from_IN a_DT severe_JJ epidemic_NN ;_: the_DT history_NN o_NN which_WDT is_VBZ as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: Attention_NN was_VBD first_RB attracted_VBN by_IN excessive_JJ mortality_NN in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN August_NNP ,_, and_CC Dr._NNP W._NNP R._NNP Scroggie_NNP ,_, the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, made_VBD a_DT special_JJ report_NN on_IN the_DT causes_NNS of_IN it_PRP ;_: but_CC it_PRP could_MD not_RB be_VB traced_VBN to_TO plague_VB ._.
The_DT first_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN was_VBD the_DT wife_NN of_IN a_DT railway_NN utter_NN who_WP came_VBD to_TO Sholpur_NNP from_IN Louvia_NNP ._.
The_DT details_NNS were_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` On_IN 29th_CD ultimo_NN (_( August_NNP )_) information_NN was_VBD received_VBN from_IN Lonvl_NNP that_IN a_DT railway_NN fitter_NN ,_, in_IN whose_WP$ family_NN there_EX were_VBD plague_JJ cases_NNS ,_, had_VBD left_VBN with_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN for_IN Sholpur_NNP ,_, Enquiries_NNPS were_VBD made_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT woman_NN was_VBD at_IN once_RB removed_VBN to_TO the_DT segregation_NN camp_NN on_IN 30th_CD ultimo_NN ._.

The_DT Collecter_NNP adds-_JJ ``_`` This_DT is_VBZ the_DT only_JJ plague_NN case_NN which_WDT has_VBZ occurred_VBN so_RB far_RB ,_, and_CC ,_, as_IN it_PRP was_VBD segregated_VBN at_IN once_RB ,_, I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB there_EX is_VBZ danger_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN spreading_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT first_JJ indigenous_JJ cases_NNS occurred_VBD on_IN the_DT 21st_CD September_NNP 1897_CD and_CC subsequent_JJ days_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT Collecter_NNP gives_VBZ the_DT following_VBG detailed_JJ notes_NNS on_IN them_PRP :_: -_: ``_`` The_DT local_JJ centre_NN of_IN infection_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB the_DT compound_NN occupied_VBD up_RB to_TO 30th_CD ultimo_NNS by_IN Mr._NNP Thatcher_NNP ,_, Superintendent_NNP of_IN Police_NNP ,_, Sholpur_NNP ._.

In_IN front_NN of_IN this_DT line_NN is_VBZ a_DT separate_JJ room_NN where_WRB his_PRP$ orderly_JJ and_CC police_JJ guard_NN stayed_NN ._.

``_`` Mr._NNP Thatcher_NNP went_VBD to_TO Poona_NNP on_IN the_DT 15th_CD ,_, and_CC almost_RB immediately_RB after_IN his_PRP$ servants_NNS began_VBD finding_VBG dead_JJ rats_NNS ,_, chiefly_NN in_IN the_DT kitchen_NN and_CC in_IN the_DT grain_NN room_NN ._.

Four_CD or_CC five_CD a_DT day_NN were_VBD found_VBN ._.
About_IN the_DT 21st_CD or_CC 22nd_CD his_PRP$ cook_NN ,_, who_WP stayed_VBD in_IN the_DT kitchen_NN ,_, foll_NN ill_NN ._.

On_IN the_DT 25th_CD the_DT orderly_JJ and_CC police_NNS sowr_NNS were_VBD found_VBN to_TO have_VB fever_NN ._.
The_DT orderly_JJ then_RB gave_VBD information_NN about_IN the_DT rats_NNS ,_, and_CC stops_NNS were_VBD at_IN once_RB taken_VBN to_TO disinfect_VB the_DT bungalow_NN and_CC out-_JJ bouses_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO segregate_VB those_DT likely_JJ to_TO be_VB infected_VBN ._.

His_PRP$ mother_NN stayed_VBD in_IN a_DT hut_NN close_RB to_TO the_DT temple_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ most_RBS likely_JJ that_IN the_DT boy_NN performed_VBD some_DT services_NNS for_IN the_DT syce_NN 's_POS sister-iu-law_NN while_IN she_PRP was_VBD sick_JJ there_RB and_CC assisted_VBN in_IN lier_JJR removal_NN ._.

On_IN the_DT 30th_JJ (_( morning_NN )_) Mr._NNP Thatcher_NNP 's_POS hamal_JJ died_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN a_DT house_NN in_IN the_DT city_NN ._.

In_IN Poona_NNP Mr._NNP Thatcher_NNP stayed_VBD at_IN 11_CD ,_, Staveley_NNP Road_NNP with_IN Mr._NNP Henderson_NNP of_IN the_DT 2nd_CD Grenadiers_NNS ,_, in_IN whose_WP$ compound_NN several_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN occurred_VBD ._.

The_DT cases_NNS have_VBP all_DT been_VBN diagnosed_VBN as_IN plague_NN by_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ``_`` The_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN is_VBZ doubtful_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT only_JJ suggestions_NNS that_WDT can_MD be_VB made_VBN are_VBP of_IN little_JJ value_NN ``_`` Infected_JJ rats_NNS have_VBP been_VBN found_VBN in_IN six_CD other_JJ compounds_NNS round_VBP about_IN ,_, and_CC the_DT disease_NN appears_VBZ to_TO affect_VB squirrels_NNS also_RB ,_, as_IN several_JJ dead_JJ ones_NNS have_VBP been_VBN found_VBN in_IN adjoining_VBG com-_JJ pounds_NNS ._.

VIII_NNP ._.
The_DT infection_NN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, lay_VBD chiefly_NN in_IN and_CC around_IN Mr._NNP Thatcher_NNP 's_POS bungalow_NN ,_, although_IN it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO say_VB how_WRB it_PRP got_VBD there_RB ._.
But_CC Modikhna_NNP and_CC the_DT Sadar_NNP Bazr_NNP were_VBD also_RB touched_VBN ;_: and_CC it_PRP soon_RB became_VBD evident_JJ that_IN these_DT two_CD places_NNS were_VBD a_DT serious_JJ menace_NN to_TO the_DT town_NN and_CC neighbouring_JJ villages_NNS ._.
The_DT Collector_NNP then_RB resolved_VBD upon_IN a_DT determined_JJ effort_NN first_RB to_TO confine_VB it_PRP to_TO them_PRP ,_, and_CC then_RB to_TO eradicate_VB it_PRP from_IN them_PRP also_RB ,_, and_CC details_NNS the_DT measures_NNS adopted_VBN :_: -_: ``_`` Houses_VBZ where_WRB plague_NN cases_NNS are_VBP found_VBN are_VBP disinfected_VBN at_IN once_RB :_: The_DT roofs_NNS have_VBP been_VBN in_IN most_JJS cases_NNS removed_VBN ,_, and_CC ,_, if_IN they_PRP are_VBP of_IN thatch_NN ,_, burned_VBN ._.
The_DT surrounding_NN houses_NNS are_VBP emp-_JJ tied_JJ and_CC sprayed_VBN with_IN perchloride_NN and_CC the_DT occupants_NNS allowed_VBN to_TO re-occupy_VB them_PRP when_WRB the_DT floor_NN and_CC walls_NNS are_VBP dry_JJ ._.
