Where_WRB dead_JJ rats_NNS are_VBP found_VBN ,_, the_DT place_NN is_VBZ disinfected_VBN at_IN once._NN ``_``
The_DT accommodation_NN at_IN the_DT plague_NN hospital_NN and_CC segregation_NN camp_NN has_VBZ been_VBN and_CC is_VBZ being_VBG extended_VBN ._.
The_DT sect_NN and_CC caste_NN hospitals_NNS will_MD soon_RB be_VB ready_JJ ._.
They_PRP have_VBP been_VBN put_VBN up_RP near_IN the_DT municipal_JJ plague_NN hospital_NN ,_, and_CC will_MD be_VB under_IN the_DT supervision_NN of_IN the_DT officer_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT flying_VBG column_NN who_WP arrived_VBD to-day._JJ ``_``
A_DT cordon_NN of_IN Police_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN placed_VBN round_IN the_DT Sadar_NNP Bazr_NNP and_CC Modikhna_NNP ``_`` Arrangements_NNS for_IN house-to-house_JJ visitation_NN in_IN the_DT Modikhna_NNP and_CC Sadar_NNP Bzar_NNP have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN and_CC come_VBN into_IN operation_NN to-day_NN ._.
The_DT leading_VBG inhabitants_NNS have_VBP volunteered_VBN for_IN the_DT work_NN ._.
They_PRP have_VBP been_VBN allotted_VBN different_JJ sections_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN and_CC are_VBP giving_VBG every_DT assistance_NN ._.
For_IN Pardah_NNP and_CC high-caste_NN women_NNS ,_, two_CD ladies_NNS have_VBP been_VBN employed._VBN ``_``
Deaths_NNS are_VBP required_VBN to_TO be_VB registered_VBN at_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT four_CD hospitals_NNS and_CC dispensaries_NNS (_( including_VBG the_DT Dufferin_NNP Hospital_NNP in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Pardah_NNP women_NNS )_) ._.
The_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP in_IN charge_NN ,_, on_IN receipt_NN of_IN intimation_NN of_IN the_DT death_NN ,_, proceeds_NNS to_TO the_DT house_NN of_IN the_DT deceased_VBN to_TO ascertain_VB ,_, by_IN inspection_NN of_IN the_DT corpse_NN and_CC other_JJ inquiries_NNS ,_, the_DT cause_NN of_IN death_NN ._.
In_IN only_RB 5_CD cases_NNS was_VBD no_DT intimation_NN of_IN death_NN given_VBN ._.
``_`` The_DT Patels_NNP of_IN the_DT surrounding_NN villages_NNS have_VBP been_VBN directed_VBN to_TO prevent_VB any_DT one_CD coming_VBG from_IN Sholpur_NNP without_IN a_DT pass_NN from_IN staying_VBG for_IN even_RB one_CD night_NN in_IN their_PRP$ villages_NNS ._. ''_''
Evacuation_NN is_VBZ conspicuous_JJ by_IN its_PRP$ absence_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT results_NNS were_VBD disastrous_JJ ._.
Although_IN the_DT conditions_NNS in_IN the_DT camp_NN were_VBD not_RB favourable_JJ to_TO plague_VB ,_, it_PRP was_VBD other-_JJ wise_NN in_IN the_DT Sadar_NNP Bzar_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT bulk_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN ,_, poor_JJ and_CC dirty_NN ,_, were_VBD herded_VBN together_RB in_IN far_RB from_IN sanitary_JJ surroundings_NNS within_IN low_JJ dark_JJ hovels_NNS of_IN mud_NN and_CC thatch_NN ._.
Such_JJ a_DT locality_NN ,_, once_RB infected_VBN ,_, soon_RB became_VBD a_DT hot-bed_NN of_IN the_DT germ_NN which_WDT spread_VBD rapidly_RB ._.
New_NNP cases_NNS occurred_VBD daily_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT people_NNS ,_, realising_VBG their_PRP$ danger_NN ,_, became_VBD panic-stricken_JJ ._.
An_DT exodus_NN took_VBD place_NN ,_, which_WDT lasted_VBD throughout_IN October_NNP and_CC November_NNP 1897_CD and_CC resulted_VBD in_IN the_DT flight_NN of_IN some_DT 25,000_CD people-about_JJ two-fifths_NNS of_IN the_DT population_NN ._.
The_DT measures_NNS themselves_PRP were_VBD unhappily_RB not_RB attended_VBN by_IN any_DT appreciable_JJ success_NN ._.
The_DT cordon_NN ,_, easily_RB evaded_VBD ,_, was_VBD powerless_NN to_TO prevent_VB large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN people_NNS leaving_VBG the_DT Sadar_NNP Bzar_NNP daily_JJ :_: and_CC house-to-house_JJ visitation_NN ,_, distasteful_JJ to_TO the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC carried_VBD out_RP chiefly_NN by_IN unofficial_JJ persons_NNS in_IN a_DT time_NN of_IN panic_NN ,_, was_VBD necessarily_RB perfunctory_NN ._.
Meanwhile_RB the_DT disease_NN slowly_RB invaded_VBD the_DT town_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN October_NNP 1897_CD was_VBD firmly_RB established_VBN there_RB ,_, the_DT whole_JJ municipal_JJ limit_NN being_VBG declared_VBD an_DT infected_JJ area_NN ,_, and_CC booking_VBG prohibited_VBN at_IN Sholpur_NNP and_CC at_IN all_DT stations_NNS within_IN 20_CD miles_NNS on_IN either_DT side-Mohol_NN ,_, Pakni_NNP ,_, Hotgi_NNP ,_, and_CC Silati-except_NNP on_IN production_NN of_IN a_DT pass_NN signed_VBN by_IN a_DT Plague_NNP Authority_NNP ._.

261_CD It_PRP was_VBD now_RB (_( about_IN 27th_CD October_NNP 1897_CD )_) that_IN the_DT first_JJ important_JJ change_NN in_IN dealing_VBG with_IN the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD made_VBN by_IN an_DT appeal_NN to_TO evacuation_NN ._.
The_DT Sadar_NNP Bazr_NNP ,_, Modikhna_NNP ,_, Mngwda_NNP and_CC Mochiwda_NNP were_VBD emptied_VBN of_IN their_PRP$ poorer_NN inhabitants_NNS ,_, who_WP were_VBD removed_VBN to_TO a_DT camp_NN on_IN the_DT Bijpur_NNP Road_NNP near_IN the_DT Motibg_NNP Tank_NNP ._.

The_DT disease_NN now_RB rapidly_RB decreased_VBN ,_, ''_'' writes_VBZ the_DT Collector_NNP ,_, ``_`` amongst_VB the_DT people_NNS so_RB removed_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ infected_JJ surroundings_NNS ,_, but_CC continued_VBD to_TO rage_VB with_IN unabated_JJ severity_NN amongst_VBP the_DT better_JJR classes_NNS who_WP had_VBD remained_VBN behind_IN in_IN ._.
their_PRP$ houses_NNS ._. ''_''
Major_JJ A._NN V._NNP Anderson_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, arrived_VBD about_IN this_DT time_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN his_PRP$ advice_NN it_PRP was_VBD decided_VBN to_TO vacate_VB the_DT Modikhna_NNP and_CC Sadar_NNP Bazr_NNP completely_RB ._.
This_DT decision_NN was_VBD announced_VBN by_IN beat_NN of_IN drum_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN the_DT 12th_CD November_NNP 1897_CD the_DT measure_NN had_VBD been_VBN carried_VBN out_RP ._.
Most_JJS of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS went_VBD into_IN fields_NNS and_CC gardens_NNS round_VBP the_DT city_NN ,_, but_CC those_DT who_WP had_VBD no_DT connection_NN with_IN land-butchers_NNS ,_, bakers_NNS ,_, tailors_NNS ,_, etc.-went_JJ into_IN the_DT Motibg_NNP Camp_NNP and_CC remained_VBD there_EX for_IN the_DT next_JJ six_CD months_NNS ._.
Another_DT large_JJ health_NN camp_NN for_IN mill-workers_NNS was_VBD started_VBN on_IN a_DT large_JJ open_JJ plain_NN near_IN the_DT Fort_NNP ._.
This_DT latter_JJ work_NN was_VBD done_VBN by_IN Mr._NNP Virchand_NNP Dipchand_NNP ,_, C.I.E._NNP ,_, at_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ expense_NN ,_, for_IN his_PRP$ mill-employes_JJ ,_, who_WP gladly_RB left_VBD their_PRP$ houses_NNS to_TO live_VB in_IN the_DT comfortable_JJ sheds_NNS built_VBN for_IN them_PRP ._.
Mr._NNP Virchand_NNP Dipchand_NNP also_RB added_VBD a_DT special_JJ hospital_NN and_CC segregation_NN shed_VBN to_TO the_DT camp_NN ._.
A_DT special_JJ doctor_NN was_VBD attached_VBN to_TO this_DT hospital_NN ._.
With_IN the_DT complete_JJ evacuation_NN of_IN Modikhna_NNP and_CC the_DT Sadar_NNP Bazr_NNP the_DT first_JJ stage_NN of_IN the_DT Sholpur_NNP epidemic_NN may_MD be_VB said_VBD to_TO end_VB ._.
The_DT interest_NN now_RB shifts_VBZ to_TO the_DT town_NN ,_, which_WDT in_IN its_PRP$ turn_NN was_VBD to_TO undergo_VB the_DT same_JJ ordeal_NN :_: a_DT long_JJ ineffectual_JJ struggle_NN with_IN the_DT rising_VBG epidemic_NN ,_, accompanied_VBN with_IN difficulties_NNS ,_, various_JJ in_IN kind_NN ,_, great_JJ in_IN degree_NN :_: and_CC ultimate_JJ success_NN almost_RB wholly_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT complete_JJ ,_, if_IN tardy_JJ ,_, evacuation_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ city_NN ._.
About_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN November_NNP the_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS in_IN the_DT town_NN had_VBD become_VBN so_RB large_JJ that_IN it_PRP was_VBD clear_JJ that_IN the_DT existing_VBG organisation_NN could_MD not_RB cope_VB with_IN the_DT task_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Collector_NNP accordingly_RB asked_VBD for_IN help_NN ._.

Lieutenant_JJ Wake_NNP took_VBD over_RP the_DT Motibg_NNP Camp_NNP and_CC the_DT now_RB empty_JJ Sadar_NNP Bazr_NNP and_CC Modikhna_NNP ._.
On_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN Lieutenants_NNP Kidd_NNP ,_, Henderson_NNP and_CC Cumming_VBG the_DT number_NN of_IN wards_NNS was_VBD increased_VBN to_TO 9_CD ,_, 7_CD being_VBG in_IN the_DT town_NN ._.

On_IN the_DT 12th_CD December_NNP ,_, Captain_NNP F._NNP H._NNP Dominichetti_NNP ,_, 28th_CD Madras_NNP Infantry_NNP ,_, arrived_VBD and_CC took_VBD over_RP charge_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Pratt_NNP 's_POS ward_NN ,_, the_DT latter_JJ taking_NN over_IN the_DT superintendence_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Camp_NNP ._.
During_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG ._.
26th_CD November_NNP 1897_CD Mr._NNP A._NNP Wingate_NNP ,_, the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, visited_VBD Sholpur_NNP and_CC inspected_VBD the_DT arrangements_NNS ._.
The_DT epidemic_JJ reached_VBD its_PRP$ climax_NN during_IN the_DT fortnight_JJ ending_VBG 10th_CD December_NNP 1897_CD ,_, during_IN which_WDT time_NN 813_CD deaths_NNS were_VBD registered_VBN from_IN plague_NN ;_: the_DT maximum_NN for_IN one_CD day_NN being_VBG 98_CD deaths_NNS ._.
The_DT Collector_NNP 's_POS remarks_NNS on_IN this_DT period_NN are_VBP striking_VBG :_: -_: ``_`` These_DT figures_NNS ,_, terrible_JJ as_IN they_PRP are_VBP in_IN themselves_PRP ,_, fail_VBP to_TO convey_VB an_DT adequate_JJ idea_NN of_IN the_DT appalling_JJ severity_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, unless_IN it_PRP is_VBZ remembered_VBN that_IN the_DT population_NN had_VBD been_VBN reduced_VBN by_IN flight_NN by_IN at_IN least_JJS one-half_JJ of_IN its_PRP$ normal_JJ numbers_NNS ._.
After_IN the_DT 10th_CD of_IN Decem-_NNP ber_NNP ,_, the_DT plague_NN rapidly_RB declined_VBD ,_, chiefly_VB owing_VBG to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT evacuation_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN was_VBD more_JJR and_CC more_RBR vigorously_RB pushed_VBN on_IN throughout_IN December_NNP ,_, until_IN by_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT month_NN the_DT city_NN had_VBD been_VBN completely_RB emptied_VBN and_CC the_DT whole_JJ population_NN were_VBD camped_VBN out_RP either_RB in_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ fields_NNS and_CC gardens_NNS in_IN the_DT environs_NNS or_CC the_DT city_NN or_CC were_VBD lodged_VBN in_IN the_DT large_JJ organised_JJ health_NN camps_NNS into_IN which_WDT the_DT poorer_NN classes_NNS were_VBD drafted_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ homes_NNS in_IN the_DT city_NN ._.

VIII_NNP ._.
A_DT remarkable_JJ feature_NN of_IN this_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD the_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN the_DT Camps_NNP ,_, which_WDT was_VBD very_RB good_JJ ._.
The_DT Collector_NNP writes_VBZ (_( 2nd_CD January_NNP 1898_CD )_) :_: -_: ``_`` Pothepur_NNP Camp_NNP with_IN 10,000_CD inhabitants_NNS ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ not_RB 100_CD yards_NNS from_IN the_DT town_NN walls_NNS ,_, has_VBZ not_RB had_VBN a_DT single_JJ case_NN for_IN three_CD days_NNS now_RB ,_, and_CC is_VBZ a_DT most_RBS striking_JJ example_NN of_IN the_DT efficiency_NN of_IN the_DT evacuation_NN cure_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT District_NNP ._.
The_DT District_NNP in_IN the_DT meantime_NN had_VBD been_VBN ,_, with_IN one_CD or_CC two_CD isolated_JJ exceptions_NNS ,_, quite_RB free_JJ from_IN indigenous_JJ plague_NN ,_, though_RB much_RB troubled_VBN by_IN imported_VBN cases_NNS from_IN Sholpur_NNP ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD not_RB till_JJ about_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN December_NNP that_WDT indigenous_JJ plague_NN can_MD really_RB be_VB said_VBD to_TO have_VB begun_VBN :_: but_CC ,_, even_RB then_RB ,_, owing_VBG to_TO strenuous_JJ efforts_NNS in_IN carrying_VBG out_RP evacuation_NN ,_, disinfection_NN ,_, segregation_NN and_CC cognate_NN measures_NNS ,_, it_PRP never_RB reached_VBD alarming_VBG figures_NNS ._.
During_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 7th_CD January_NNP 1898_CD the_DT cases_NNS in_IN the_DT district_NN fell_VBD from_IN 95_CD to_TO 53_CD ,_, but_CC they_PRP soon_RB rose_VBD again_RB ;_: and_CC it_PRP was_VBD but_CC one_CD more_JJR phenomenon_NN in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN a_DT disease_NN enveloped_VBN in_IN obscure_JJ phenomena_NNS ._.
As_IN the_DT town_NN grew_VBD more_JJR and_CC more_JJR empty_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT fields_NNS and_CC gardens_NNS round_VBP it_PRP inhabited_VBD ,_, the_DT increased_VBN danger_NN of_IN spread_NN to_TO the_DT villages_NNS in_IN the_DT district_NN was_VBD foreseen_JJ ,_, and_CC efforts_NNS were_VBD directed_VBN towards_NNS saving_VBG them_PRP ._.
Orders_NNS were_VBD early_JJ issued_VBN that_IN fugitives_NNS from_IN Sholpur_NNP Town_NNP were_VBD not_RB to_TO be_VB permitted_VBN even_RB for_IN one_CD night_NN in_IN any_DT village_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT 22nd_CD October_NNP Mr._NNP G._NNP K._NNP Agarkar_NNP was_VBD called_VBN in_IN from_IN Famine_NNP Duty_NNP and_CC appointed_VBD Travelling_NNP Plague_NNP Authority_NNP ._.
His_PRP$ duty_NN was_VBD to_TO tour_VB round_NN villages_NNS within_IN a_DT radius_NN of_IN 20_CD miles_NNS and_CC deal_NN with_IN such_JJ plague_NN as_IN might_MD occur_VB in_IN any_DT village_NN ;_: and_CC also_RB to_TO see_VB that_IN the_DT village_NN authorities_NNS obeyed_VBD the_DT plague_JJ orders_NNS already_RB issued_VBN ._.
Unhappily_RB ,_, amongst_IN the_DT first_JJ victims_NNS was_VBD Mr._NNP Agarkar_NNP himself_PRP ,_, who_WP contracted_VBD the_DT disease_NN in_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT villages_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ charge_NN ._.
No_DT one_NN could_MD be_VB spared_VBN to_TO replace_VB him_PRP in_IN the_DT face_NN of_IN the_DT crescent_NN epidemic_NN in_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT villages_NNS were_VBD consequently_RB for_IN some_DT time_NN left_VBD without_IN regular_JJ supervision_NN ._.
In_IN order_NN to_TO further_JJ prevent_NN spread_NN ,_, at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN November_NNP a_DT cordon_NN of_IN Police_NNP posts_NNS was_VBD drawn_VBN round_JJ Sholpur_NNP Town_NNP itself_PRP ,_, and_CC carts_NNS were_VBD prohibited_VBN from_IN leaving_VBG the_DT Munici-_JJ pality_NN at_IN night_NN under_IN any_DT circumstances_NNS ._.
Nevertheless_RB ,_, on_IN the_DT 17th_CD December_NNP 1897_CD indige-_NN nous_JJ plague_NN appeared_VBD in_IN the_DT villages_NNS of_IN Shelgi_NNP and_CC Nandur_NNP ,_, about_RB 1_CD and_CC 8_CD miles_NNS from_IN Sholpur_NNP respectively_RB ._.
These_DT villages_NNS were_VBD at_IN once_RB evacuated_VBN and_CC every_DT house_NN in_IN each_DT disin-_NN fected_VBN with_IN perchloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT 31st_CD December_NNP four_CD more_JJR villages_NNS reported_VBD indigenous_JJ plague_NN ,_, amongst_VB them_PRP Kurul_NNP ._.
The_DT infection_NN of_IN the_DT latter_NN ,_, a_DT large_JJ market_NN village_NN ,_, was_VBD a_DT cause_NN of_IN anxiety_NN :_: and_CC indeed_RB the_DT infection_NN of_IN 4_CD villages_NNS subsequently_RB attacked_VBD was_VBD traceable_JJ to_TO it_PRP ._.
On_IN the_DT 5th_CD January_NNP 1898_CD Mr._NNP W._NNP T._NNP Morison_NNP ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP ,_, was_VBD transferred_VBN from_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP J._NNP W._NNP A._NNP Weir_NNP succeeding_VBG him_PRP ._.

It_PRP was_VBD soon_RB evident_JJ that_IN the_DT mischief_NN in_IN the_DT villages_NNS was_VBD wider-spread_JJ than_IN had_VBD been_VBN supposed_VBN ;_: and_CC it_PRP was_VBD discovered_VBN that_IN indigenous_JJ plague_NN had_VBD existed_VBN and_CC had_VBD been_VBN successfully_RB concealed_VBN from_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN November_NNP ._.
The_DT Collector_NNP thus_RB describes_VBZ the_DT efforts_NNS to_TO cope_VB with_IN the_DT spread_NN and_CC subdue_VB the_DT disease_NN where_WRB found_NN :_: -_: ``_`` But_CC with_IN increased_JJ supervision_NN ,_, concealment_NN was_VBD no_RB longer_RBR possible_JJ :_: and_CC by_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ fortnight_NN in_IN January_NNP ,_, reliable_JJ information_NN had_VBD been_VBN obtained_VBN as_IN to_TO the_DT actual_JJ SHOLAPUR_NNP DISTRICT_NNP ._. ]_NN
265_CD condition_NN of_IN the_DT villages_NNS ._.
The_DT villages_NNS found_VBN infected_VBN were_VBD immediately_RB evacuated_VBN ;_: by_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT 3rd_CD week_NN in_IN January_NNP ,_, 19_CD villages_NNS had_VBD been_VBN evacuated_VBN ._.
Nevertheless_RB the_DT plague_NN continued_VBD to_TO spread_VB ,_, and_CC fresh_JJ villages_NNS were_VBD attacked_VBN every_DT week_NN ._.
It_PRP became_VBD evident_JJ that_IN closer_JJR supervision_NN by_IN superior_JJ officers_NNS was_VBD required_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP was_VBD necessary_JJ to_TO re-organise_VB the_DT system_NN for_IN dealing_VBG with_IN the_DT plague_NN in_IN the_DT villages_NNS ._.

The_DT new_JJ system_NN worked_VBN well_RB ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ results_NNS soon_RB showed_VBD themselves_PRP in_IN a_DT decline_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS in_IN the_DT Tluka_NNP ,_, which_WDT ,_, with_IN a_DT few_JJ fluctuations_NNS ,_, continued_VBD steadily_RB until_IN the_DT final_JJ disappearance_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN from_IN the_DT district_NN at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN April_NNP ._.

267_CD All_PDT the_DT cases_NNS were_VBD indigenous_JJ ,_, and_CC if_IN any_DT imported_JJ cases_NNS occurred_VBD ,_, they_PRP were_VBD not_RB discovered_VBN ._.
But_CC the_DT case_NN of_IN Katewdi_NNP village_NN is_VBZ noteworthy_JJ ;_: and_CC the_DT Collector_NNP 's_POS remarks_NNS are_VBP most_RBS interesting_JJ :_: -_: ``_`` On_IN the_DT 19th_CD of_IN July_NNP rumours_NNS reached_VBD Sholpur_NNP of_IN suspicious_JJ sickness_NN and_CC deaths_NNS in_IN the_DT village_NN of_IN Katewdi_NNP in_IN the_DT Mdha_NNP Tluka_NNP ._.
This_DT village_NN was_VBD not_RB one_CD of_IN the_DT villages_NNS which_WDT were_VBD known_VBN to_TO be_VB infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN during_IN the_DT previous_JJ epidemic_NN ;_: but_CC it_PRP lies_VBZ in_IN close_JJ proximity_NN to_TO three_CD villages_NNS ,_, Kurul_NNP ,_, Sayadwarwad_NNP ,_, and_CC Gotewdi_NNP ,_, which_WDT suffered_VBD severely_RB during_IN the_DT last_JJ epidemic_JJ ._.
I_PRP reached_VBD the_DT village_NN on_IN the_DT 20th_JJ July_NNP ,_, and_CC found_VBD that_IN 7_CD deaths_NNS from_IN plague_NN had_VBD taken_VBN place_NN in_IN the_DT village_NN before_IN my_PRP$ arrival_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN 8_CD persons_NNS were_VBD lying_VBG sick_JJ with_IN plague_NN in_IN different_JJ houses_NNS in_IN the_DT village_NN ._.
The_DT village_NN was_VBD a_DT small_JJ one_CD ,_, of_IN not_RB more_JJR than_IN 250_CD inhabitants_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP induced_VBD the_DT people_NNS to_TO evacuate_VB the_DT village_NN and_CC sleep_JJ outside_NN in_IN temporary_JJ huts_NNS on_IN the_DT same_JJ day_NN on_IN which_WDT I_PRP arrived_VBD ._.
The_DT patients_NNS were_VBD allowed_VBN at_IN first_JJ to_TO remain_VB in_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS ,_, but_CC were_VBD afterwards_NNS gradually_RB taken_VBN out_RP into_IN the_DT fields_NNS ,_, when_WRB the_DT people_NNS had_VBD had_VBN time_NN to_TO settle_VB down_RP outside_RB ._.
A_DT census_NN was_VBD taken_VBN of_IN all_PDT the_DT inhabitants_NNS ,_, and_CC steps_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN to_TO trace_VB out_RP and_CC keep_VB under_IN observation_NN such_JJ persons_NNS as_IN had_VBD recently_RB migrated_VBN to_TO other_JJ villages_NNS ._.
``_`` The_DT history_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN in_IN this_DT village_NN was_VBD interesting_JJ and_CC suggestive_JJ ._.
Examination_NN of_IN the_DT Death_NNP Register_NNP and_CC enquiries_NNS made_VBN on_IN the_DT spot_NN among_IN the_DT villagers_NNS made_VBD it_PRP clear_JJ that_IN 3_CD deaths_NNS from_IN plague_NN had_VBD occurred_VBN in_IN the_DT village_NN towards_VBD the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN May_NNP ,_, but_CC they_PRP had_VBD not_RB been_VBN recognised_VBN and_CC reported_VBN as_IN plague_JJ deaths_NNS ._.
Two_CD of_IN them_PRP occurred_VBD in_IN one_CD house_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT description_NN of_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS and_CC the_DT circumstances_NNS of_IN the_DT deaths_NNS left_VBD no_DT doubt_NN that_IN they_PRP were_VBD due_JJ to_TO plague_VB ,_, but_CC as_IN the_DT fact_NN remained_VBD unknown_JJ to_TO the_DT authorities_NNS nothing_NN was_VBD done_VBN to_TO destroy_VB the_DT infection_NN in_IN the_DT houses_NNS or_CC in_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT villagers_NNS remained_VBD in_IN occupation_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN ._.
The_DT disease_NN remained_VBD quiescent_NN in_IN the_DT village_NN for_IN two_CD months_NNS and_CC then_RB broke_VBD out_RP again_RB ._.
Among_IN the_DT first_JJ persons_NNS attacked_VBN were_VBD some_DT who_WP were_VBD closely_RB connected_VBN with_IN the_DT persons_NNS who_WP had_VBD died_VBN in_IN May_NNP ,_, and_CC who_WP died_VBD in_IN adjacent_JJ houses_NNS ._.
``_`` There_EX seemed_VBN to_TO be_VB every_DT reason_NN to_TO suppose_VB that_IN after_IN the_DT 3_CD deaths_NNS in_IN May_NNP the_DT disease_NN germs_NNS remained_VBD dormant_JJ owing_VBG to_TO the_DT unfavourable_JJ conditions_NNS of_IN hot_JJ weather_NN and_CC conse-_JJ quent_JJ desiccation_NN of_IN the_DT soil_NN ,_, but_CC that_IN with_IN the_DT advent_NN of_IN the_DT rains_NNS and_CC the_DT accompanying_VBG coolness_NN and_CC dampness_NN they_PRP sprang_VBP into_IN renewed_VBN activity_NN ._. ''_''
Suspicious_JJ deaths_NNS occurred_VBD on_IN the_DT 24th_CD July_NNP in_IN Pokhrpur_NNP ,_, and_CC some_DT 15_CD deaths_NNS had_VBD occurred_VBN when_WRB the_DT Collector_NNP went_VBD in_IN person_NN to_TO examine_VB matters_NNS ''_'' He_PRP says_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` Plague_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN in_IN this_DT village_NN from_IN about_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN July_NNP ._.
I_PRP could_MD get_VB no_DT clue_NN to_TO its_PRP$ origin_NN ._. ''_''
Equally_RB obscure_JJ was_VBD its_PRP$ origin_NN in_IN Kondi_NNP and_CC Akole_NNP ._.

VIII_NNP The_DT source_NN of_IN infection_NN in_IN Shamspur_NNP was_VBD clearly_RB traced_VBN ,_, for_IN the_DT Collector_NNP writes_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN of_IN Shamspur_NNP ,_, the_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT infection_NN has_VBZ been_VBN clearly_RB traced_VBN ._.
A_DT woman_NN from_IN Akole_NNP came_VBD into_IN this_DT village_NN about_IN the_DT 10th_CD of_IN August_NNP ._.
She_PRP was_VBD a_DT kinswoman_NN of_IN the_DT Ptil_NNP ,_, who_WP allowed_VBD her_PRP into_IN the_DT village_NN contrary_JJ to_TO orders_NNS ,_, instead_RB of_IN detaining_VBG her_PRP$ outside_JJ under_IN observation_NN ._.

Shamspur_NNP is_VBZ only_RB a_DT small_JJ hamlet_NN of_IN 12_CD houses_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB expected_VBN that_IN the_DT plague_NN here_RB will_MD do_VB much_RB mischief_NN ._.
The_DT village_NN has_VBZ been_VBN evacuated_VBN ._. ''_''
Comparing_VBG this_DT table_NN with_IN that_DT for_IN the_DT last_JJ epidemic_JJ ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_IN ,_, with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN Dahitne_NNP ,_, all_PDT the_DT villages_NNS attached_VBN now_RB suffered_VBN for_IN the_DT first_JJ lime_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT second_JJ half_NN of_IN April_NNP 1899_CD the_DT district_NN was_VBD quite_RB free_JJ ,_, but_CC two_CD villages_NNS in_IN the_DT Sholpur_NNP Tluka_NNP were_VBD re-infected_VBN in_IN May_NNP ._.

Boundaries_NNS ._.
Belgaum_NNP is_VBZ bounded_VBN on_IN the_DT north_NN by_IN the_DT Miraj_NNP and_CC Jath_NNP States_NNPS ;_: on_IN the_DT east_NN by_IN the_DT States_NNPS of_IN Jamkhandi_NNP and_CC Mudhol_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT south-east_JJ by_IN Dhrwr_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT south_JJ by_IN North_NNP Knara_NNP ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN by_IN Svantvadi_NNP and_CC Kolhpur_NNP ._.
Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
Belgamn_NNP ,_, running_VBG parallel_RB to_TO the_DT Sahydri_NNP hills_NNS ,_, with_IN a_DT very_RB irregular_JJ out-line_NN ,_, measures_VBZ about_IN a_DT hundred_JJ miles_NNS from_IN north_JJ to_TO south_JJ and_CC fifty_JJ to_TO eighty_VB miles_NNS from_IN east_NN to_TO west_NN ._.
The_DT pleasantest_JJS climate_NN in_IN the_DT District_NNP is_VBZ in_IN a_DT tract_JJ parallel_NN with_IN the_DT crest_NN of_IN the_DT Sahy-_NNP dris_NN ,_, between_IN the_DT western_JJ forests_NNS and_CC the_DT treeless_NN east_NN ._.
The_DT Belgaum_NNP year_NN may_MD be_VB arranged_VBN into_IN three_CD seasons_NNS ,_, the_DT cold_JJ and_CC dry_JJ season_NN from_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN October_NNP till_VB the_DT middle_NN of_IN February_NNP ;_: the_DT hot_JJ and_CC dry_JJ season_NN from_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN February_NNP till_VB the_DT beginning_NN of_IN June_NNP ;_: and_CC the_DT wet_NN season_NN from_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN June_NNP till_VBP the_DT middle_NN of_IN October_NNP ._.
About_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN October_NNP the_DT cold_JJ weather_NN perceptibly_RB sets_VBZ in_IN ,_, the_DT evening_NN air_NN begins_VBZ to_TO be_VB chilly_RB ,_, heavy_JJ fogs_NNS gather_RB soon_RB after_IN sunset_VBN ,_, and_CC towards_IN the_DT morning_NN and_CC for_IN some_DT time_NN after_IN sunrise_NN the_DT country_NN is_VBZ shrouded_VBN in_IN thick_JJ mist_NN ._.
Towards_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN December_NNP or_CC early_RB in_IN January_NNP the_DT night_NN temperature_NN is_VBZ at_IN its_PRP$ minimum_NN ._.
The_DT hot_JJ season_NN sets_NNS in_IN about_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN February_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT temperature_NN rises_VBZ rapidly_RB until_IN it_PRP reaches_VBZ 100_CD in_IN May_NNP ._.
Geologically_RB the_DT soils_NNS of_IN the_DT District_NNP may_MD be_VB divided_VBN into_IN two_CD classes_NNS ,_, the_DT red_JJ and_CC the_DT black_JJ ._.
The_DT red_JJ soils_NNS are_VBP primary_JJ soils_NNS ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, they_PRP are_VBP the_DT direct_JJ result_NN of_IN the_DT decomposition_NN of_IN the_DT iron-bearing_JJ rocks_NNS ._.
The_DT ._.
black_JJ soils_NNS are_VBP secondary_JJ soils_NNS ,_, that_DT is_VBZ ,_, they_PRP are_VBP rock_JJ ruins_NNS charged_VBN by_IN the_DT addition_NN of_IN organic_JJ matter_NN ._.
Previous_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT authentic_JJ record_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT Belgaum_NNP District_NNP previous_JJ to_TO 1897_CD ._.
*_IN The_DT Belganm_NNP District_NNP enjoyed_VBD immunity_NN both_DT from_IN imported_VBN as_RB well_RB as_IN indigenous_JJ plague_NN till_IN October_NNP 1897_CD ._.
But_CC this_DT immunity_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB expected_VBN to_TO continue_VB much_RB longer_RBR ,_, when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ remembered_VBN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD surrounded_VBN on_IN the_DT north-east_JJ ,_, west_JJ and_CC north-west_JJ by_IN the_DT Sholpur_NNP District_NNP ,_, the_DT Kolhpur_NNP Agency_NNP and_CC the_DT Stra_NNP District_NNP ,_, respectively_RB ,_, places_NNS where_WRB severe_JJ plague_NN epidemics_NNS were_VBD then_RB raging_VBG ._.
As_IN the_DT reports_NNS for_IN 1897-98_JJ received_VBN from_IN this_DT District_NNP consisted_VBD merely_RB of_IN isolated_JJ reports_NNS on_IN villages_NNS ,_, and_CC no_DT report_NN has_VBZ yet_RB been_VBN received_VBN for_IN 1808-99_CD ,_, the_DT progress_NN of_IN plague_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB sketched_VBN in_IN any_DT detail_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN in_IN these_DT villages_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN sketched_VBN at_IN some_DT length_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN in_IN them_PRP were_VBD presumably_RB similar_JJ with_IN those_DT taken_VBN elsewhere_RB in_IN the_DT Belgaum_NNP District_NNP ._.
Kgvd_NNP ._.
Population-3,839_NNP ._.
First_RB Epidemic_NNP (_( November_NNP 1897-June_JJ 1898_CD )_) .-The_NN first_JJ case_NN occurred_VBD on_IN the_DT 21st_CD October_NNP 1897_CD in_IN Kgvd_NNP village_NN ,_, the_DT source_NN of_IN infection_NN being_VBG probably_RB clue_NN to_TO importation_NN from_IN Stra_NNP ._.
The_DT following_JJ parti-_JJ culars_NNS are_VBP taken_VBN from_IN the_DT District_NNP Deputy_NNP Collector_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP N._NNP C._NNP Soman_NNP 's_POS report_NN :_: -_: *_NN Bombay_NNP Gazetteer_NNP ,_, Vol_NNP ._.
XXI_NN ._.
272_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
IX._NNP ``_``
Ten_CD persons_NNS of_IN the_DT Gujar_NNP caste_NN left_VBD Tsgaon_NNP in_IN the_DT Stra_NNP District_NNP on_IN 27th_CD September_NNP 1897_CD when_WRB plague_NN became_VBD severe_JJ there_RB ,_, and_CC arrived_VBD at_IN Kgvd_NNP the_DT same_JJ day_NN ,_, ``_`` getting_VBG down_RB at_IN the_DT Shedbarl_NNP Railway_NNP Station_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ three_CD miles_NNS from_IN Kgvd_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD not_RB then_RB suspected_VBD that_IN any_DT one_CD of_IN them_PRP was_VBD infected_VBN ._.
They_PRP put_VBD up_RP with_IN their_PRP$ relative_JJ Bhanchand_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ house_NN is_VBZ situated_VBN behind_IN the_DT market_NN street_NN and_CC almost_RB in_IN the_DT centre_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN ._.
It_PRP appears_VBZ one_CD woman_NN ofthat_IN party_NN got_VBD sick_JJ and_CC the_DT whole_JJ party_NN left_VBD Kgvd_NNP on_IN the_DT 1st_CD October_NNP 1897_CD ,_, as_IN they_PRP could_MD not_RB remain_VB longer_JJR there_EX without_IN detection._NN ``_``
About_IN the_DT 21st_CD October_NNP 1807_CD one_CD Bala_NNP ,_, wife_NN of_IN Satiapa_NNP Karav_NNP ,_, who_WP lived_VBD in_IN a_DT house_NN in_IN Bhauchand_NNP 's_POS back-yard_NN (_( east_NN )_) ,_, got_VBD fever_RB and_CC she_PRP died_VBD on_IN the_DT 26th_CD ._.
About_IN this_DT time_NN a_DT boy_NN named_VBN Satapa_NNP ,_, aged_VBD 12_CD ,_, who_WP lived_VBD in_IN a_DT house_NN adjoining_VBG Bala_NNP 's_POS and_CC who_WP was_VBD a_DT relative_NN of_IN Bala_NNP ,_, was_VBD attacked_VBN with_IN fever_NN and_CC he_PRP died_VBD on_IN the_DT 30th_CD ._.
Radhabai_NNP ,_, widow_NN of_IN Rama_NNP Simpi_NNP ,_, living_VBG in_IN a_DT house_NN adjoining_VBG Satapa_NNP 's_POS ,_, was_VBD attacked_VBN along_IN with_IN Satapa_NNP and_CC also_RB died_VBD on_IN the_DT 30th_CD ._.
She_PRP visited_VBD Bala_NNP during_IN her_PRP$ illness_NN ._.
Bhanchand_NNP ,_, with_IN whom_WP the_DT Tsgaon_NNP people_NNS put_VBD up_RP ,_, had_VBD fever_VBN about_IN the_DT 27th_CD and_CC died_VBD on_IN 1st_CD November_NNP ._.
One_CD Devendr_NNP Kasar_NNP ,_, who_WP lived_VBD opposite_JJ (_( west_JJS )_) to_TO Bhauchand_NNP ,_, in_IN a_DT house_NN separated_VBN only_RB by_IN a_DT road_NN about_IN 12_CD feet_NNS in_IN width_NN ,_, had_VBD also_RB an_DT attack_NN simultaneously_RB with_IN Bhauchand_NNP ,_, and_CC he_PRP died_VBD on_IN the_DT 31st_CD October_NNP ._.
KrishnabaiPudale_NNP ,_, who_WP lived_VBD in_IN a_DT house_NN adjoining_VBG Bhauchand_NNP 's_POS to_TO the_DT south_NN ,_, was_VBD attacked_VBN and_CC died_VBN on_IN 2nd_CD November_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Amina_NNP Kone_NNP Usman_NNP ,_, living_VBG behind_IN Devendra_NNP 's_POS house_NN ,_, was_VBD next_JJ attacked_JJ and_CC died_VBD on_IN 6th_CD November_NNP ._.
liaghu_NN Satar_NNP ,_, who_WP lived_VBD in_IN a_DT house_NN adjoining_VBG Bhauchand_NNP 's_POS to_TO the_DT north_NN ,_, was_VBD also_RB attacked_VBN and_CC died_VBN on_IN the_DT 7th_CD ._.
Bala_NNP 's_POS daughter-in-law_NN ,_, Tipaca_NNP ,_, who_WP lived_VBD with_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC Bala_NNP 's_POS sister_NN Satyava_NNP ,_, who_WP visited_VBD Bala_NNP during_IN her_PRP$ illness_NN ,_, and_CC Bhagirthi_NNP ,_, daughter-_JJ in-law_NN of_IN Kadhabai_NNP ,_, who_WP lived_VBD with_IN her_PRP ,_, all_DT died_VBD on_IN the_DT 7th_CD November_NNP 1897_CD ,_, after_IN a_DT very_RB short_JJ ,_, illness_JJ ._.
``_`` From_IN the_DT above_IN it_PRP is_VBZ clear_JJ that_IN plague_NN was_VBD imported_VBN into_IN Kgvd_NNP by_IN the_DT Tsgaon_NNP Gujurs_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN Bhanchand_NNP Gajar_NNP 's_POS house_NN was_VBD the_DT centre_NN from_IN which_WDT it_PRP spread_VBD in_IN all_DT directions_NNS ._. ''_''
The_DT following_JJ measures_NNS were_VBD adopted_VBN to_TO combat_VB and_CC deal_VB with_IN the_DT outbreak_NN ;_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) Sanitation_NN and_CC cleaning_VBG up_RB of_IN the_DT village_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Muster_NN and_CC examination_NN of_IN the_DT residents_NNS of_IN the_DT village_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) Evacuation_NN of_IN houses_NNS and_CC streets_NNS ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) Muster_NN and_CC examination_NN of_IN the_DT inmutes_NNS of_IN huts_NNS in_IN fields_NNS ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) Removal_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN to_TO hospital_NN ._.
(_( 6_CD )_) Segregation_NN of_IN contacts_NNS ._.
(_( 7_CD )_) Interdiction_NN of_IN communication_NN ._.
(_( 8_CD )_) Disinfection_NN ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS and_CC deaths_NNS in_IN Kgvd_NNP ,_, from_IN November_NNP 1897_CD to_TO March_NNP 1898_CD ,_, was_VBD 220-181_JJ ,_, respectively_RB ._.
Up_RB to_TO the_DT 12th_CD of_IN November_NNP 1897_CD ,_, 21_CD cases-18_JJ deaths_NNS were_VBD reported_VBN throughout_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, of_IN which_WDT three_CD cases_NNS and_CC two_CD deaths_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN Belgaum_NNP Town_NNP ._.
Between_IN October_NNP 1897_CD and_CC June_NNP 1899_CD ,_, Belgaum_NNP District_NNP and_CC Town_NNP each_DT suffered_VBD from_IN two_CD epidemics_NNS ._.
The_DT first_JJ epidemic_JJ lasted_VBN from_IN November_NNP 1897_CD to_TO June_NNP 1898_CD in_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, and_CC from_IN December_NNP 1897_CD to_TO April_NNP 1898_CD in_IN the_DT Town_NNP ._.

Boundaries_NNS ._.
The_DT Bijapur_NNP District-an_NNP irregular_NN ,_, egg-shaped_JJ belt_NN of_IN land_NN ,_, -110_JJ miles_NNS long_RB ,_, and_CC varying_VBG in_IN breadth_NN from_IN 75_CD miles_NNS in_IN the_DT centre_NN to_TO 5_CD in_IN the_DT extreme_JJ north_NN and_CC 50_CD in_IN the_DT south-forms_NNS the_DT most_RBS easterly_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
Its_PRP$ boundaries_NNS are_VBP roughly_RB as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -North_NN and_CC north-east_JJ ,_, Sholapur_NNP District_NNP and_CC Akalkot_NNP State_NNP ;_: east_NN and_CC south-east_NN ,_, the_DT Nizam_NNP 's_POS territory_NN ;_: south-west_JJ ,_, Lhrwr_NNP District_NNP and_CC Rmdurg_NNP State_NNP ;_: west_JJS ,_, Belga_NNP urn_VBP District_NNP and_CC some_DT minor_JJ States_NNS ._.
The_DT Bhima_NNP River_NNP separates_VBZ it_PRP from_IN Sholapur_NNP District_NNP on_IN the_DT north_JJ and_CC north-east_JJ :_: and_CC the_DT Malprabha_NNP River_NNP on_IN the_DT south-west_NN from_IN Belgaum_NNP District_NNP ._.
Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
The_DT climate_NN ,_, except_IN in_IN Bdtmi_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ overgrown_VBN with_IN stunted_JJ bushy_JJ vegetation_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN Muddebihal_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ marshy_JJ ,_, is_VBZ dry_JJ and_CC healthy_JJ ._.
March_NNP and_CC April_NNP are_VBP the_DT hottest_JJS months_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT heat_NN of_IN May_NNP is_VBZ relieved_VBN by_IN clouds_NNS and_CC occasional_JJ thunderstorms_NNS ._.
The_DT District_NNP is_VBZ well_RB watered_VBN ,_, for_IN ,_, although_IN the_DT rainfall_NN is_VBZ small_JJ ,_, rivers_NNS and_CC streams_NNS abound_VBP ._.
The_DT soil_NN of_IN this_DT District_NNP is_VBZ of_IN two_CD kinds-black_NN and_CC red_JJ ._.
The_DT black_JJ soil_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ formed_VBN by_IN the_DT ruins_NNS of_IN rock_NN changed_VBN by_IN organic_JJ matter_NN ,_, has_VBZ great_JJ moisture-holding_JJ capacity_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT rainy_NN season_NN becomes_VBZ clayey_JJ and_CC impassable_JJ :_: while_NN in_IN the_DT hot_JJ weather_NN it_PRP shrinks_VBZ and_CC gapes_NNS in_IN deep_JJ fissures_NNS ._.
This_DT black_JJ soil_NN is_VBZ exceedingly_RB fertile_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT Dar_NNP Valley_NNP ,_, where_WRB it_PRP abounds_VBZ ,_, is_VBZ proverbially_RB known_VBN as_IN the_DT ``_`` Granary_NNP of_IN Bijapar_NNP ._. ''_''
The_DT red_JJ soil_NN does_VBZ not_RB retain_VB moisture_NN and_CC is_VBZ unfruitful_JJ ._.
Previous_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.
Bijpur_NNP District_NNP appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB previously_RB suffered_VBN from_IN only_RB one_CD recorded_VBD epidemic_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
This_DT occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT year_NN 1689_CD ._.
Aurungzebe_NNP himself_PRP was_VBD at_IN Bijpur_NNP at_IN the_DT time_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT disease_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB broken_VBN out_RP first_JJ amongst_VB his_PRP$ soldiers_NNS ._.
100,000_CD people_NNS are_VBP said_VBD fco_NNS have_VBP perished_VBN in_IN this_DT outbreak_NN ;_: and_CC many_JJ more_JJR fled_JJ ._.
When_WRB the_DT disease_NN had_VBD abated_VBN ,_, Aurungzebe_NNP ordered_VBD a_DT census_NN :_: and_CC it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN 1,016,000_CD persons_NNS had_VBD melted_VBN away_RB in_IN the_DT outbreak_NN of_IN plague_NN and_CC in_IN the_DT destruction_NN of_IN Shh-_NNP pur_NN ._.
Bijpur_NNP City_NNP never_RB recovered_VBD itself_PRP ,_, and_CC from_IN that_DT time_NN it_PRP decayed_VBD with_IN a_DT speed_NN for_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO account_VB ._.
Aurungzebe_NNP ,_, anxious_JJ that_IN it_PRP should_MD regain_VB its_PRP$ former_JJ importance_NN ,_, made_VBN every_DT effort_NN to_TO restore_VB its_PRP$ prosperity_NN ._.
All_DT ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD in_IN vain_NN :_: life_NN had_VBD left_VBN the_DT City_NNP ._.
*_RB Imported_VBN cases_NNS an_DT the_DT Bijapur_NNP District_NNP ._.
1897-98_JJ ._.
Up_RB to_TO the_DT beginning_NN of_IN December_NNP 1897_CD this_DT District_NNP eujoyed_VBD a_DT happy_JJ immunity_NN from_IN plague_NN ,_, From_IN that_DT time_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, up_RB to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN February_NNP 1898_CD ,_, imported_VBN cases_NNS ,_, rarely_RB absent_NN from_IN the_DT history_NN of_IN any_DT plague_JJ epidemic_NN ,_, occurred_VBD ._.

``_`` Several_JJ of_IN the_DT towns_NNS in_IN Dhrwr_NNP are_VBP very_RB populous_JJ ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ highly_RB desirable_JJ that_IN every_DT legitimate_JJ means_NNS should_MD be_VB employed_VBN to_TO prevent_VB plague_NN gaining_VBG an_DT entrance_NN into_IN them_PRP ._.

With_IN the_DT rains_NNS beginning_VBG ,_, proper_JJ shelter_NN outside_IN the_DT town_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB afforded_VBN to_TO persons_NNS turned_VBD out_IN of_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS :_: eva-_JJ cuation_NN was_VBD an_DT impossibility_NN ._.
Previous_JJ to_TO this_DT (_( in_IN February_NNP 1898_CD )_) ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP had_VBD recourse_VBN to_TO the_DT drastic_JJ measure_NN of_IN burning_VBG down_RP houses_NNS to_TO stamp_VB out_RP the_DT disease_NN :_: and_CC some_DT 250_CD houses_NNS were_VBD actually_RB thus_RB disinfected_VBN ._.

An_DT appeal_NN was_VBD ,_, therefore_RB ,_, made_VBD to_TO inoculation_NN ;_: and_CC it_PRP was_VBD eagerly_RB supported_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.
By_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN June_NNP over_IN 2,000_CD inoculations_NNS had_VBD been_VBN performed_VBN ._.

Knara_NNP ,_, the_DT southernmost_JJS part_NN of_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ,_, is_VBZ a_DT belt_NN of_IN country_NN about_IN 110_CD Boundaries_NNS ._.
miles_NNS from_IN north_JJ to_TO south_VB ,_, and_CC from_IN 10_CD to_TO 60_CD miles_NNS from_IN east_NN to_TO west_JJS ,_, It_PRP is_VBZ bounded_VBN as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -On_VB the_DT north_NN ,_, by_IN Bidi_NNP in_IN Belgaum_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT east_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT Dhrwr_NNP ,_, Kalghatgi_NNP ,_, Bankpur_NNP ,_, and_CC Hngal_NNP sub-divisions_NNS of_IN Dhrwr_NNP ,_, and_CC by_IN Maisur_NNP (_( Mysore_NNP )_) ;_: on_IN the_DT south-east_NN ,_, by_IN Maisur_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT south_NN ,_, by_IN Maisur_NNP and_CC South_NNP Knara_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT west_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT Arabian_NNP Sea_NNP and_CC Goa_NNP ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT north-west_JJ ,_, by_IN Goa_NNP ._.
Compared_VBN with_IN the_DT neighbouring_JJ Districts_NNS of_IN Belgaum_NNP and_CC Dhrwr_NNP ,_, Knara_NNP is_VBZ Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
unhealthy_JJ ._.
In_IN spite_NN of_IN an_DT average_JJ rainfall_NN of_IN over_IN 100_CD inches_NNS ,_, the_DT coast_NN sub-divisions_NNS are_VBP more_RBR healthy_JJ than_IN the_DT forest-covered_JJ uplands_NNS ._.
Of_IN the_DT feverish_JJ inland_NN tracts_NNS ,_, the_DT valleys_NNS of_IN the_DT Klinadi_NNP and_CC its_PRP$ tributaries_NNS are_VBP perhaps_RB the_DT most_RBS unhealthy_JJ ._.
Throughout_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, especially_RB above_IN the_DT Sahyadris_NNP ,_, the_DT two_CD most_JJS unhealthy_JJ seasons_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN are_VBP the_DT two_CD first_JJ rainy_JJ months_NNS ,_, June_NNP and_CC July_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT four_CD cool_JJ months_NNS ,_, November_NNP to_TO February_NNP ._.
There_EX are_VBP four_CD chief_NN rivers_NNS ,_, the_DT Klinadi_NNP in_IN the_DT north_NN ,_, the_DT Bedti_NNP or_CC Gangvali_NNP about_IN 20_CD miles_NNS south_RB ,_, the_DT Donihalla_NNP or_CC Tadri_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Blanadi_NNP or_CC Gersappa_NNP river_NN about_IN 15_CD miles_NNS south_RB of_IN the_DT Tadri_NNP ._.
The_DT Gersappa_NNP river_NN contains_VBZ the_DT famous_JJ Gersappa_NNP falls_NNS ,_, 890_CD feet_NNS high_JJ ,_, forming_VBG a_DT most_RBS picturesque_JJ water-fall_JJ ,_, among_IN the_DT highest_JJS in_IN the_DT world_NN ._.
Neither_DT in_IN Upland_NNP nor_CC in_IN Lowland_NNP Knara_NNP are_VBP there_RB large_JJ lakes_NNS or_CC reservoirs_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT forests_NNS the_DT water_NN is_VBZ so_RB laden_JJ with_IN vegetable_JJ matter_NN that_WDT even_RB running_VBG streams_NNS are_VBP dangerous_JJ to_TO drink_VB ._.
At_IN the_DT upper_JJ ends_NNS of_IN the_DT valleys_NNS a_DT red_JJ alluvial_JJ soil_NN called_VBN kagdali_NN ,_, with_IN shining_VBG particles_NNS of_IN mica_NN ,_, is_VBZ often_RB found_VBN ;_: and_CC near_IN the_DT mouth_NN of_IN the_DT valles_NNS is_VBZ a_DT still_RB richer_JJR soil_NN called_VBN bailu_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT western_JJ belt_VBD the_DT lowlands_NNS are_VBP under_IN tillage_NN ,_, and_CC most_JJS of_IN the_DT forests_NNS are_VBP found_VBN on_IN the_DT spurs_NN that_WDT run_VBP west_RB from_IN the_DT Sahyadris_NNP ,_, in_IN some_DT cases_NNS bo_VBP the_DT sea_NN ._.
The_DT soil_NN is_VBZ red_JJ and_CC gravelly_RB ,_, ill_RB suited_VBN for_IN teak_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, when_WRB found_NN ,_, is_VBZ stunted_VBN and_CC insignificant_JJ ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT authentic_JJ record_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN this_DT District_NNP previous_JJ to_TO 1896_CD ._.
In_IN 1860_CD ,_, how-_JJ Previous_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.
ever_RB ,_, Knara_NNP suffered_VBD severely_RB from_IN an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN fever_NN which_WDT lasted_VBD for_IN 8_CD years_NNS ._.
The_DT fever_NN was_VBD sometimes_RB remittent_JJ ,_, but_CC mostly_RB intermittent_JJ ,_, of_IN the_DT usual_JJ daily_JJ ,_, third-day_JJ ,_, and_CC fourth-day_JJ types_NNS ._.
*_JJ Knara_NNP District_NNP ._.
Population-446,351_NNP ._.
The_DT Knara_NNP District_NNP has_VBZ escaped_VBN more_RBR lightly_RB than_IN any_DT other_JJ District_NNP attacked_VBN by_IN plague_NN ;_: the_DT Ahmedabad_NNP District_NNP ,_, perhaps_RB ,_, excepted_VBD ._.

IX_NNP ._.
solitary_JJ case-one_NN of_IN the_DT very_RB first_JJ that_DT was_VBD discovered_VBN in_IN the_DT Southern_JJ Division-had_NNP been_VBN imported_VBN in_IN October_NNP 1896_CD in_IN the_DT Kumta_NNP Tluka_NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT infection_NN did_VBD not_RB take_VB root_NN ._.
The_DT method_NN and_CC energy_NN with_IN which_WDT preventive_JJ measures_NNS were_VBD introduced_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT careful_JJ scrutiny_NN ,_, week_NN by_IN week_NN ,_, of_IN the_DT mortality_NN all_DT over_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, doubtless_NN largely_RB contributed_VBD to_TO this_DT happy_JJ immunity_NN ._.
Precautionary_JJ measures_NNS practically_RB began_VBD on_IN the_DT 9th_CD of_IN August_NNP 1897_CD ,_, when_WRB the_DT District_NNP Magistrate_NNP was_VBD appointed_VBN a_DT Special_NNP Plague_NNP Authority_NNP by_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP ,_, S._NNP D._NNP ,_, and_CC was_VBD at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN requested_VBN to_TO do_VB his_PRP$ utmost_NN to_TO protect_VB his_PRP$ District_NNP from_IN the_DT introduction_NN of_IN the_DT pestilence_NN ._.
Thus_RB called_VBN upon_NN ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP at_IN once_RB directed_VBN his_PRP$ attention_NN to_TO the_DT necessity_NN of_IN watching_VBG arrivals_NNS from_IN infected_JJ places_NNS ;_: and_CC Observation_NNP Camps_NNP were_VBD established_VBN at_IN all_PDT the_DT ports_NNS ''_'' on_IN the_DT west_NN coast_NN at_IN which_WDT steamers_VBZ called-at_NN almost_RB all_PDT the_DT places_NNS of_IN entrance_NN on_IN the_DT eastern_JJ land-boundary-and_NN on_IN the_DT Goa_NNP Frontier_NNP on_IN the_DT north_NN ._.

For_IN -the_NNP first_RB few_JJ mouths_NNS ,_, people_NNS whose_WP$ temperature_NN was_VBD higher_JJR than_IN normal_JJ ,_, or_CC who_WP came_VBD from_IN infected_JJ districts_NNS without_IN passes_NNS ,_, were_VBD compelled_VBN to_TO present_VB themselves_PRP for_IN examination_NN for_IN eight_CD days_NNS after_IN arrival_NN ._.
Later_RB on_IN ,_, when_WRB the_DT chances_NNS of_IN infection_NN increased_VBN with_IN the_DT increase_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT Southern_NNP Martha_NNP Country_NNP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD considered_VBN advisable_JJ to_TO detain_VB all_DT persons_NNS who_WP could_MD not_RB produce_VB proper_JJ health_NN certificates_NNS ,_, with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN those_DT who_WP being_VBG free_JJ from_IN ,_, suspicious_JJ symptoms_NNS ,_, furnished_JJ security_NN for_IN their_PRP$ due_JJ presentation_NN for_IN daily_JJ medical_JJ inspection_NN for_IN the_DT prescribed_JJ period_NN of_IN eight_CD days_NNS ._.
People_NNS detained_VBN in_IN Camps_NNP were_VBD daily_RB examined_VBN by_IN Hospital_NNP Assistants_NNP and_CC also_RB visited_VBN by_IN Plague_NNP Authorities_NNP ._.
From_IN all_PDT the_DT municipal_JJ towns_NNS ,_, where_WRB an_DT exodus_NN from_IN affected_JJ localities_NNS was_VBD pro-_JJ bable_JJ ,_, weekly_JJ mortality_NN returns_NNS were_VBD called_VBN for_IN ;_: and_CC any_DT abnormal_JJ excess_NN in_IN the_DT death-_JJ rate_NN thoroughly_RB iuvestigated_VBN ._.
Important_JJ municipal_JJ areas_NNS were_VBD divided_VBN into_IN wards_NNS ,_, or_CC blocks_NNS ,_, and_CC given_VBN into_IN the_DT charge_NN of_IN supervisors_NNS ,_, whose_WP$ duty_NN it_PRP was_VBD ,_, not_RB only_RB to_TO look_VB to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN each_DT ward_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT limewashing_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT houses_NNS therein_VBP ,_, but_CC also_RB to_TO watch_VB the_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS ,_, especially_RB of_IN all_DT new-comers_NNS ._.
Plague_NNP Authorities_NNPS were_VBD directed_VBN to_TO do_VB all_DT they_PRP could_MD to_TO prevent_VB the_DT inspection_NN ,_, of_IN persons_NNS from_IN affected_JJ parts_NNS being_VBG a_DT farce_NN on_IN the_DT one_CD hand_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT cause_NN of_IN needless_JJ inconvenience_NN on_IN the_DT other_JJ ,_, caste_NN prejudices_NNS being_VBG ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, respected_VBN ._.

``_`` Without_IN so_RB much_JJ as_IN an_DT imported_JJ case_NN for_IN the_DT space_NN of_IN two_CD years_NNS ,_, 2_CD imported_VBN and_CC 3_CD indigenous_JJ cases_NNS ,_, all_DT fatal_JJ ,_, preceded_VBN by_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN rats_NNS ,_, were_VBD reported_VBN in_IN a_DT single_JJ week-that_JJ ending_VBG 30th_JJ September_NNP 1898-all_JJ ,_, with_IN one_CD exception_NN ,_, at_IN Hungund_NNP ._.

Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
The_DT year_NN may_MD be_VB roughly_RB divided_VBN into_IN four_CD seasons_NNS ,_, the_DT rains_NNS from_IN June_NNP to_TO October_NNP ,_, the_DT damp_JJ hot_JJ weather_NN in_IN October_NNP and_CC November_NNP ,_, the_DT cold_JJ weather_NN from_IN December_NNP to_TO March_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT dry_JJ hot_JJ weather_NN from_IN March_NNP to_TO June_NNP ._.
The_DT climate_NN of_IN Alibg_NNP differs_NNS somewhat_RB from_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ free_JJ from_IN hot_JJ winds_NNS ,_, and_CC has_VBZ almost_RB always_RB some_DT sea_NN breeze_NN ._.
Either_CC a_DT little_JJ before_RB or_CC a_DT little_JJ after_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN October_NNP the_DT south-west_JJ wind_NN drops_NNS and_CC the_DT rain_NN ceases_NNS ._.

The_DT air_NN is_VBZ charged_VBN with_IN electricity_NN ,_, the_DT sea_NN breeze_NN fails_VBZ ,_, and_CC the_DT nights_NNS are_VBP close_JJ and_CC oppressive_JJ ._.
This_DT is_VBZ the_DT unhealthiest_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT climate_NN ,_, though_IN feverish_JJ and_CC relaxing_NN ,_, is_VBZ perhaps_RB less_RBR relaxing_VBG than_IN Ratnagiri_NNP and_CC less_RBR feverish_JJ than_IN Thna_NNP ._.

There_EX are_VBP four_CD chief_JJ varieties_NNS of_IN soil_NN :_: diluvial_JJ and_CC alluvial_JJ ,_, powdered_JJ latrite_NN and_CC trap_NN ,_, clayey_NN mould_MD resting_VB on_IN trap_NN ,_, and_CC soil_NN containing_VBG marine_NN deposits_NNS with_IN much_JJ sand_NN and_CC other_JJ matter_NN in_IN concretion_NN ._.

Panvel_NNP Town_NNP ._.

Mr._NNP Brooke_NNP ,_, I._NNP C._NNP S._NNP ,_, Assistant_NNP Collector_NNP ,_, and_CC Dr._NNP Sprague_NNP were_VBD at_IN once_RB sent_VBN there_RB ,_, and_CC instituted_VBD house-to-house_NN inspection_NN and_CC disinfection_NN ._.

During_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG ?_. KOLABA_NNP DISTRICT_NNP ._. ]_NN

Population-10,417_NNP ._.

Boundaries_NNS ._.
The_DT Ratngiri_NNP District_NNP is_VBZ bounded_VBN roughly_RB as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -On_VB the_DT north_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT Svitri_NNP river_NN ;_: on_IN the_DT east_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT watershed_NN of_IN the_DT Sahydri_NNP hills_NNS from_IN Htlot_NNP to_TO Naradva_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT south-east_JJ corner_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT Svantvdi_NNP State_NNP coming_VBG between_IN Ratngiri_NNP and_CC the_DT Sahydri_NNP hills_NNS ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT Indian_JJ Ocean_NNP ._.
The_DT climate_NN and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
The_DT climate_NN ,_, though_IN moist_NN and_CC relaxing_NN ,_, is_VBZ on_IN the_DT whole_JJ decidedly_RB healthy_JJ ._.
The_DT rainfall_NN is_VBZ abundant_JJ and_CC comparatively_RB regular_JJ ._.
The_DT climate_NN on_IN the_DT sea_NN coast_NN and_CC for_IN some_DT miles_NNS inland_VBP is_VBZ very_RB temperate_JJ ,_, extremes_NNS of_IN heat_NN and_CC cold_JJ being_VBG never_RB felt_VBN ._.
The_DT District_NNP is_VBZ well_RB watered_VBN by_IN numerous_JJ streams_NNS and_CC watercourses_NNS ,_, which_WDT form_VBP its_PRP$ very_NN system_NN ._.
Hot_NNP springs_NNS are_VBP found_VBN in_IN various_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, the_DT waters_NNS of_IN which_WDT ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN taste_NN and_CC smell_NN form_NN any_DT test_NN ,_, seem_VBP strongly_RB impregnated_VBN with_IN sulphur_NN ._.
The_DT temperature_NN of_IN the_DT water_NN varies_NNS in_IN different_JJ springs_NNS from_IN 100_CD to_TO almost_RB the_DT boiling_NN point_NN (_( 212_CD )_) ,_, and_CC at_IN Tural_NNP the_DT experiment_NN of_IN poaching_VBG an_DT egg_NN has_VBZ been_VBN successfully_RB performed_VBN ._.
Inland_NNP ,_, near_IN the_DT trap_NN of_IN the_DT Sahydri_NNP hills_NNS ,_, the_DT mali_NN soil_NN is_VBZ very_RB soft_JJ ,_, deep_JJ ,_, and_CC dark_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ the_DT richest_JJS soil_NN in_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, and_CC generally_RB holds_VBZ moisture_NN enough_JJ for_IN a_DT second_JJ unwatered_JJ crop_NN ._.
Pnthal_NNP soil_NN is_VBZ found_VBN in_IN low-lying_JJ lands_NNS ,_, where_WRB during_IN the_DT rainy_NN season_NN water_NN lies_VBZ deep_RB ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT authentic_JJ record_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT Ratngiri_NNP District_NNP previous_JJ to_TO 1896_CD ._.
*_NNS First_NNP Epidemic.-A_NNP slight_JJ epidemic_NN of_IN plague_NN prevailed_VBN in_IN the_DT Ratnagiri_NNP District_NNP (_( population_NN ,_, 1,105,926_CD )_) from_IN the_DT 4th_CD December_NNP 1896_CD to_TO 5th_CD July_NNP 1897_CD ._.

Burondi_NNP ._.

Mr._NNP K._NNP R._NNP Bomanji_NNP ,_, Bo_NNP ._. '_'' C_NNP ._.

The_DT hut_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT first_JJ case_NN occurred_VBD was_VBD burnt_VBN in_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN the_DT Assistant_NNP Collec-_NNP tor_NN ,_, N._NNP D._NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Swifte_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT roofs_NN of_IN 20_CD of_IN the_DT neighbouring_NN thatched_VBD houses_NNS were_VBD removed_VBN and_CC houses_NNS were_VBD disinfected_VBN with_IN carbolic_JJ acid_NN ._.
The_DT inmates_NNS were_VBD segregated_VBN ,_, and_CC they_PRP lived_VBD under_IN trees_NNS on_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN a_DT neighbouring_NN hill_NN to_TO the_DT south-west_NN ._.
Rule_NNP 29_CD of_IN the_DT General_NNP Plague_NNP Rules_NNP was_VBD made_VBN applicable_JJ to_TO this_DT village_NN from_IN the_DT 24th_CD November_NNP 1897_CD ,_, and_CC all_DT communication_NN between_IN the_DT neighbouring_NN villages_NNS was_VBD stopped_VBN ._.
The_DT first_JJ case_NN occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT Nadkar_NNP Moholla_NNP ._.
The_DT people_NNS of_IN this_DT and_CC a_DT neighbouring_JJ street_NN ,_, Parkar_NNP Moholla_NNP ,_, were_VBD segregated_VBN ,_, and_CC they_PRP lived_VBD in_IN sheds_NNS erected_VBN by_IN themselves_PRP in_IN fields_NNS ._.

309_CD by_IN any_DT one_CD from_IN any_DT such_JJ place_NN ._.

IX_NNP ._.
The_DT source_NN of_IN infection_NN was_VBD probably_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, Bombay_NNP ._.

311_CD The_DT Collector_NNP makes_VBZ the_DT following_JJ comments_NNS on_IN the_DT concealment_NN of_IN cases_NNS at_IN the_DT begin-_JJ ning_NN of_IN the_DT Jaigad_NNP epidemic_NN :_: -_: ``_`` Jaigad_NNP is_VBZ unfortunately_RB one_CD of_IN those_DT filthy_JJ villages_NNS which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ hopeless_JJ to_TO save_VB when_WRB any_DT epidemic_JJ breaks_NNS out_RP ._.
The_DT population_NN consists_VBZ chiefly_NN of_IN Dldis_NNP (_( Mahomedan_NNP fishermen_NNS )_) ,_, who_WP are_VBP extremely_RB dirty_JJ in_IN their_PRP$ habits_NNS ._.
At_IN the_DT best_JJS of_IN times_NNS there_EX is_VBZ a_DT smell_NN of_IN rotten_JJ fish_NN about_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS ._.
The_DT people_NNS of_IN this_DT village_NN have_VBP paid_VBN very_RB dearly_RB for_IN their_PRP$ reluctance_NN to_TO disclose_VB the_DT true_JJ state_NN of_IN affairs_NNS in_IN time_NN ._.
There_EX can_MD be_VB no_DT doubt_NN now_RB that_IN the_DT place_NN was_VBD infected_VBN after_IN the_DT 15th_CD February_NNP 1898_CD ._.
The_DT Mmlatdr_NNP also_RB erred_VBD in_IN leaving_VBG the_DT village_NN on_IN the_DT 18th_CD February_NNP 1898_CD instead_RB of_IN making_VBG a_DT prompt_JJ enquiry_NN personally_RB ._.
The_DT disease_NN was_VBD however_RB checked_VBN in_IN Jaigad_NNP proper_NN by_IN the_DT 20th_JJ April_NNP ,_, the_DT people_NNS of_IN Sakri_NNP Moholla_NNP ,_, which_WDT caught_VBD the_DT infection_NN last_JJ ,_, being_VBG the_DT only_JJ persons_NNS with_IN whom_WP it_PRP lingered_VBD till_VB the_DT 8th_CD May_NNP 1898_CD ._.
The_DT sites_NNS of_IN the_DT sheds_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT people_NNS lived_VBD were_VBD constantly_RB being_VBG changed_VBN as_IN fresh_JJ cases_NNS occurred_VBD ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ clothes_NNS and_CC belongings_NNS were_VBD disinfected_VBN frequently_RB ._.
This_DT I_PRP think_VBP had_VBD a_DT good_JJ effect_NN ._.
``_`` Ro_NNP Bahdur_NNP K._NNP P._NNP Joshi_NNP and_CC Medical_NNP Pupil_NNP Mr._NNP Torpy_NNP deserve_VBZ great_JJ credit_NN for_IN the_DT way_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PRP discharged_VBD their_PRP$ arduous_JJ and_CC onerous_JJ duties_NNS under_IN very_RB trying_VBG circum-_JJ stances_NNS ._.
At_IN the_DT best_JJS of_IN times_NNS Jaigad_NNP is_VBZ a_DT poor_JJ place_NN to_TO have_VB to_TO live_VB in_IN ,_, and_CC supplies_NNS of_IN any_DT kind_NN were_VBD not_RB to_TO be_VB had_VBN for_IN love_NN or_CC money_NN ,_, as_IN all_DT communication_NN was_VBD cut_VBN off_RP ._.

Padwa_NNP ._.
Population-1,800_NNP ._.
Padwa_NNP lies_VBZ about_IN 4_CD miles_NNS to_TO the_DT north_NN of_IN Jaigad_NNP ._.
Its_PRP$ inhabitants_NNS are_VBP mostly_RB Bhandris_NNP and_CC Dldis_NNP (_( Mahomedans_NNPS )_) ._.
The_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT pest_NN here_RB is_VBZ unknown_JJ ._.
``_`` As_IN at_IN Bnkote_NNP ,_, ''_'' writes_VBZ the_DT Collector_NNP ,_, ``_`` as_IN at_IN Jaigad_NNP ,_, -so_NNP at_IN Padwa_NNP the_DT plague_NN began_VBD with_IN the_DT Dldis_NNP ._.
The_DT origin_NN was_VBD not_RB very_RB clearly_RB traced_VBN ._. ''_''
The_DT Collector_NNP thinks_VBZ it_PRP pro-_JJ bably_RB due_JJ to_TO Shriwardhan_NNP in_IN the_DT Janjira_NNP State_NNP ,_, a_DT port_NN at_IN which_WDT boats_NNS touch_VBP en_IN route_NN to_TO Padwa_VB :_: but_CC the_DT Commissioner_NNP ,_, S._NNP D._NNP ,_, points_VBZ out_RP the_DT improbability_NN of_IN such_JJ a_DT thing_NN ,_, because_IN no_DT indigenous_JJ plague_NN has_VBZ been_VBN known_VBN at_IN Shriwardhan_NNP ,_, and_CC thinks_VBZ that_IN the_DT ``_`` infection_NN came_VBD either_RB from_IN Jaigad_NNP or_CC from_IN some_DT unknown_JJ source_NN ._. ''_''
Whatever_WDT may_MD be_VB the_DT true_JJ solution_NN of_IN the_DT difficulty_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ certain_JJ that_IN on_IN the_DT 3rd_CD April_NNP 1898_CD ,_, three_CD days_NNS after_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT boat_NN in_IN question_NN ,_, dead_JJ rats_NNS were_VBD found_VBN in_IN two_CD houses_NNS in_IN Padwa_NNP ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT evening_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ day_NN 9_CD persons_NNS were_VBD attacked_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, all_DT either_CC relatives_NNS or_CC friends_NNS of_IN the_DT tindal_NN of_IN this_DT very_RB boat_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT 4th_CD April_NNP the_DT Collec-_NNP tor_NN was_VBD at_IN Jaigad_NNP ._.
The_DT news_NN of_IN this_DT outbreak_NN reached_VBD him_PRP the_DT same_JJ night_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT follow-_JJ ing_NN morning_NN he_PRP visited_VBD Padwa_NNP ._.
He_PRP found_VBD the_DT tindal_NN 's_POS relatives_NNS had_VBD already_RB been_VBN moved_VBN into_IN sheds_NNS by_IN the_DT Mhalkari_NNP ,_, and_CC that_DT same_JJ day_NN (_( 5th_CD April_NNP 1898_CD )_) the_DT entire_JJ Guhagarkar_NNP Mohalla_NNP was_VBD vacated_VBN ._.
Nineteen_JJ families_NNS occupied_VBD this_DT Mohalla_NNP ._.
Nine_CD of_IN these_DT families_NNS were_VBD attacked_VBN and_CC were_VBD removed_VBN to_TO sheds_NNS ,_, the_DT remaining_VBG 10_CD families_NNS living_VBG on_IN board_NN their_PRP$ boats_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT 7th_CD and_CC 8th_CD of_IN April_NNP the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN was_VBD emptied_VBN ,_, the_DT people_NNS living_VBG in_IN sheds_NNS made_VBN of_IN jhamps_NNS and_CC in_IN their_PRP$ boats_NNS ._.
The_DT effect_NN of_IN this_DT wholesale_JJ evacuation_NN was_VBD magical_JJ :_: in_IN the_DT five_CD days_NNS which_WDT had_VBD elapsed_VBN between_IN the_DT first_JJ case_NN and_CC complete_JJ evacuation_NN ,_, no_DT less_JJR than_IN 29_CD deaths_NNS had_VBD occurred_VBN ._.
During_IN the_DT five_CD weeks_NNS which_WDT followed_VBD it_PRP ,_, only_RB 35_CD deaths_NNS occurred_VBD ,_, and_CC four_CD weeks_NNS after_IN it_PRP the_DT disease_NN had_VBD practically_RB died_VBN out_RP ._.
Dr._NNP C._NNP T._NNP Parsons_NNP ,_, English_NNP Doctor_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD stationed_VBN at_IN Jaigad_NNP ,_, frequently_RB visited_VBN Padwa_NNP ._.
The_DT following_JJ remarks_NNS of_IN the_DT Collector_NNP are_VBP of_IN interest_NN :_: -_: ``_`` The_DT Dldis_NNP ,_, I_PRP am_VBP afraid_JJ ,_, are_VBP a_DT heartless_NN lot_NN ._.
The_DT healthy_JJ members_NNS simply_RB refuse_VB to_TO attend_VB to_TO their_PRP$ sick_JJ relatives_NNS and_CC considerable_JJ difficulty_NN was_VBD felt_VBN on_IN this_DT account_NN ._.
The_DT services_NNS of_IN wardboys_NNS were_VBD necessary_JJ ,_, and_CC Surgeon-General_JJ sent_VBD 7_CD of_IN them_PRP on_IN 25th_CD April_NNP 1898_CD ._.

Most_JJS of_IN the_DT segregated_JJ persons_NNS ?_. 312_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
in_IN Padwa_NNP ,_, a_DT large_JJ number_NN consisting_NN of_IN women_NNS and_CC children_NNS ,_, were_VBD poor_JJ ._.

100_CD ._.

Ratngiri_NNP District_NNP ._.

Boundaries_NNS ._.
The_DT Province_NNP of_IN Sind_NNP forms_VBZ the_DT extreme_JJ north-western_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presi-_NNP dency_NN ,_, consisting_VBG of_IN the_DT lower_JJR valley_NN and_CC the_DT delta_NN of_IN the_DT Indus_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ bounded_VBN on_IN the_DT north_NN by_IN Baluchistn_NNP ,_, the_DT Punjb_NNP ,_, and_CC Bhwalpur_NNP State_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT east_NN by_IN the_DT Native_NNP States_NNPS of_IN Jaisalmer_NNP and_CC Jodhpur_NNP in_IN Rjputna_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT south_NN by_IN the_DT Rann_NNP of_IN Cutch_NNP and_CC the_DT Arabian_NNP Sea_NNP ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN by_IN the_DT territories_NNS of_IN the_DT Khn_NNP of_IN Khelt_NNP ._.
Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO its_PRP$ prevalent_JJ aridity_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT absence_NN of_IN the_DT monsoons_NNS ,_, Sind_NNP ranks_VBZ amongst_IN the_DT hottest_JJS and_CC most_RBS variable_JJ climates_NNS in_IN India_NNP ._.
The_DT thermo-_JJ meter_NN frequently_RB rises_VBZ in_IN summer_NN to_TO 110_CD and_CC occasionally_RB to_TO 120_CD ;_: while_IN in_IN winter_NN it_PRP falls_VBZ at_IN night_NN a_DT few_JJ degrees_NNS below_IN freezing-point_NN ._.
Although_IN situated_VBN on_IN the_DT very_RB verge_NN of_IN either_DT monsoon_NN ,_, the_DT Province_NNP derives_VBZ no_DT benefit_NN from_IN their_PRP$ rainfall_NN ;_: for_IN the_DT north-western_JJ monsoon_NN ,_, which_WDT deluges_VBZ the_DT hills_NNS of_IN Baluchistn_NNP ,_, extends_VBZ no_DT farther_RB eastward_RB than_IN Karchi_NNP ;_: while_IN the_DT south-western_JJ monsoon_NN terminates_NNS at_IN Lakhpat_NNP Bandar_NNP on_IN the_DT boundary_NN of_IN Cutch_NNP ,_, as_RB regularly_RB as_IN though_IN it_PRP intentionally_RB avoided_VBD the_DT frontiers_NNS of_IN Sind_NNP ._.
Sometimes_RB ,_, indeed_RB ,_, for_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD years_NNS in_IN succession_NN ,_, no_DT rain_NN falls_VBZ in_IN the_DT Province_NNP ._.
The_DT climate_NN on_IN the_DT sea-coast_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, is_VBZ much_RB more_RBR equable_JJ in_IN temperature_NN than_IN is_VBZ Upper_JJ Sind_NNP ._.
In_IN Northern_NNP Sind_NNP ,_, the_DT extremes_NNS of_IN temperature_NN are_VBP strongly_RB marked_VBN ._.
The_DT thermometer_NN at_IN Shikrpur_NNP often_RB sinks_VBZ below_IN freezing-point_NN in_IN winter_NN ,_, and_CC ice_RB forms_NNS as_RB late_RB as_IN February_NNP ;_: yet_RB in_IN summer_NN ,_, for_IN weeks_NNS together_RB ,_, the_DT readings_NNS at_IN midnight_NN do_VBP not_RB fall_VB below_IN 100_CD F._NNP This_DT great_JJ and_CC prolonged_JJ heat_NN ,_, coupled_VBN with_IN the_DT exhalations_NNS arising_VBG from_IN the_DT stagnant_NN pools_NNS left_VBD after_IN the_DT annual_JJ inundation_NN ,_, produces_VBZ a_DT fatal_JJ fever_NN and_CC ague_NN ._.
Previous_JJ Epidemics_NNS ._.
Although_IN no_DT detailed_JJ record_NN of_IN its_PRP$ incidence_NN and_CC spread_NN there_EX is_VBZ available_JJ ,_, yet_CC it_PRP is_VBZ certain_JJ that_IN Southern_JJ Sind_NNP was_VBD involved_VBN in_IN the_DT great_JJ Gujerat_NNP Plague_NNP Epidemic_NNP of_IN 1812-21_JJ ._.
Beyond_IN this_DT there_EX does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB to_TO be_VB any_DT authentic_JJ record_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Sind_NNP previous_JJ to_TO 1896_CD ._.
*_JJ Plague_NNP in_IN Sind_NNP ._.
December_NNP 1896-June_JJ 1899_CD ._.
Kathiawar_NNP excepted_VBD ,_, Sind_NNP has_VBZ suffered_VBN less_RBR severely_RB than_IN any_DT other_JJ Division_NNP or_CC Agency_NNP in_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP ._.
With_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN three_CD bad_JJ epidemics_NNS in_IN Karchi_NNP and_CC one_CD of_IN moderate_JJ virulence_NN in_IN Hyderabad_NNP ,_, plague_NN has_VBZ been_VBN very_RB slight_JJ there_RB ._.
As_IN the_DT system_NN of_IN Camps_NNP for_IN the_DT prevention_NN of_IN either_DT importation_NN or_CC exportation_NN of_IN plague_NN was_VBD an_DT elaborate_JJ one_CD ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN treated_VBN with_IN some_DT prominence_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ worthy_JJ of_IN note_NN that_IN ,_, in_IN spite_NN of_IN successive_JJ and_CC severe_JJ epidemics_NNS ,_, Karchi_NNP City_NNP did_VBD not_RB very_RB deeply_RB infect_VB the_DT District_NNP or_CC very_RB widely_RB disseminate_JJ infection_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ in_IN striking_VBG con-_JJ trast_NN to_TO Mndvi_NNP ,_, Nsik_NNP ,_, Poona_NNP ,_, Hubli_NNP ,_, etc_NN ._.
Observation_NN Camps_NNP ._.
There_EX were_VBD three_CD important_JJ Observation_NNP Camps_NNP in_IN Sind_NNP ._.
The_DT Malir_NNP Camp_NNP (_( established_VBN 31st_CD March_NNP 1898_CD )_) ,_, the_DT most_RBS important_JJ of_IN them_PRP all_DT ,_, was_VBD situated_VBN near_IN the_DT narrow_JJ neck_NN in_IN the_DT hills_NNS on_IN the_DT north_NN ,_, through_IN which_WDT the_DT North-Western_NNP Railway_NNP runs_VBZ ._.
This_DT neck_NN was_VBD guarded_VBN by_IN a_DT police_NN cordon_NN in_IN touch_NN with_IN the_DT Camp_NNP itself_PRP ._.
Lieutenant_JJ Niblock_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, was_VBD in_IN charge_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC made_VBD it_PRP a_DT most_RBS *_JJ Imperial_NNP Gazetteer_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Vol_NNP ._.
XII_NN ._.
80_CD ?_. 318_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
X._NNP valuable_JJ protection_NN ._.
Between_IN the_DT 31st_CD March_NNP 1898_CD and_CC the_DT 1st_CD July_NNP 1898_CD ,_, 9,058_CD persons_NNS passed_VBN through_IN it_PRP ,_, of_IN whom_WP 126_CD suffered_VBD from_IN plague_NN ._.
Of_IN these_DT 108_CD came_VBD by_IN train_NN from_IN Karchi_NNP (_( 13_CD with_IN plague_NN on_IN them_PRP )_) ,_, and_CC 18_CD from_IN the_DT surrounding_VBG country_NN ,_, who_WP were_VBD attempting_VBG to_TO escape_VB by_IN road_NN ,_, but_CC were_VBD caught_VBN by_IN the_DT Police_NNP cordon_NN ._.
The_DT Kiamari_NNP Camp_NNP was_VBD for_IN protection_NN against_IN arrivals_NNS by_IN sea_NN ;_: and_CC suspicious_JJ cases_NNS found_VBN there_EX were_VBD taken_VBN to_TO Manora_NNP ._.
Between_IN the_DT 1st_CD August_NNP 1897_CD and_CC the_DT 31st_CD December_NNP 1898_CD ,_, 35,360_CD incoming_VBG passengers_NNS were_VBD detained_VBN ,_, of_IN whom_WP 7_CD developed_VBD plague_NN ,_, and_CC 14,413_CD outgoing_NN (_( including_VBG 7,103_CD coolie_JJ emigrants_NNS to_TO Mombasa_NNP )_) passengers_NNS ,_, amongst_VBP whom_WP 17_CD cases_NNS were_VBD detected_VBN ._.
Some_DT arrivals_NNS from_IN Bombay_NNP threatened_VBD a_DT disturbance_NN in_IN this_DT Camp_NNP ,_, but_CC Lieutenant_NNP Law_NNP with_IN firmness_NN and_CC tact_NN succeeded_VBN in_IN preventing_VBG it_PRP ._.
The_DT Reti_NNP Camp_NNP (_( established_VBN 19th_CD January_NNP 1898_CD )_) was_VBD situated_VBN near_IN the_DT Bhawalpur_NNP frontier_NN to_TO catch_VB arrivals_NNS from_IN the_DT Punjb_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD under_IN Dr._NNP Adams_NNP ,_, and_CC was_VBD closed_VBN on_IN the_DT 27th_CD June_NNP on_IN the_DT cessation_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP ._.
17,613_CD persons_NNS passed_VBN through_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC one_CD plague_NN case_NN direct_JJ from_IN Jullundur_NNP District_NNP was_VBD detected_VBN there_RB ._.
Health_NNP Camps_NNP ._.
Two_CD large_JJ Health_NNP Camps_NNP were_VBD established_VBN in_IN the_DT desert_NN area_NN beyond_IN the_DT Lyari_NNP River_NNP ._.
The_DT population_NN of_IN these_DT Camps_NNP were_VBD about_RB 12,300_CD and_CC 11,250_CD approximately_RB ._.
Besides_IN these_DT ,_, the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT richer_NN classes_VBZ built_VBN camps_NNS for_IN themselves_PRP of_IN such_JJ excellence_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB methodically_RB and_CC carefully_RB superintended_VBD ,_, that_IN from_IN the_DT 19th_CD September_NNP 1898_CD people_NNS were_VBD permitted_VBN to_TO leave_VB the_DT city_NN with_IN their_PRP$ sick_NN and_CC without_IN detention_NN in_IN the_DT regular_JJ Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP ,_, provided_VBD the_DT sickness_NN was_VBD notified_VBN ._.
The_DT result_NN was_VBD most_RBS beneficial_JJ ._.
With_IN the_DT dread_NN of_IN the_DT Segregation_NNP Camps_NNP died_VBD the_DT incentive_NN to_TO flee_VB and_CC scatter_NN ._.
It_PRP also_RB led_VBD to_TO a_DT greatly-_JJ to-be-desired_JJ result_NN ,_, in_IN that_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, no_RB longer_RBR fearful_JJ ,_, vacated_VBD their_PRP$ houses_NNS and_CC went_VBD to_TO live_VB outside_IN the_DT city_NN collectively_RB and_CC contentedly_RB ._.
To_TO prevent_VB wrangling_NN ,_, the_DT different_JJ communities_NNS were_VBD separated_VBN ,_, and_CC for_IN the_DT very_RB poor_JJ some_DT 250_CD huts_NNS (_( costing_VBG 7_CD or_CC 8_CD rupees_NNS each_DT )_) were_VBD erected_VBN ._.
On_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN Camps_NNP generally_RB ,_, Mr._NNP R._NNP Giles_NNP ,_, Acting_NNP Commissioner_NNP in_IN Sind_NNP ,_, writes_VBZ as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` The_DT most_RBS noticeable_JJ features_NNS were_VBD the_DT Voluntary_NNP Camp_NNP system_NN described_VBD ._.
._.
._.
in_IN ._.
._.
._.
last_JJ year_NN 's_POS report_NN and_CC the_DT maintenance_NN of_IN a_DT strict_JJ system_NN of_IN medical_JJ exa-_JJ mination_NN and_CC detention_NN at_IN the_DT Malir_NNP ,_, which_WDT saved_VBD ,_, in_IN 1898_CD ,_, the_DT rest_NN of_IN Sind_NNP from_IN plague_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT recent_JJ outbreak_NN ,_, the_DT Voluntary_NNP Camp_NNP system_NN was_VBD in_IN force_NN from_IN the_DT outset_NN ,_, i._NN e._NN ,_, the_DT people_NNS were_VBD permitted_VBN to_TO leave_VB with_IN their_PRP$ sick_NN ,_, provided_VBD they_PRP went_VBD into_IN huts_NNS outside_IN the_DT inhabited_JJ area_NN of_IN Karachi_NNP and_CC only_RB returned_VBD to_TO work_VB by_IN day_NN ._.
The_DT results_NNS were_VBD identical_JJ ._.
The_DT sick_JJ died_VBD or_CC recovered_VBD without_IN infecting_VBG the_DT newly_RB occupied_VBN areas_NNS ,_, but_CC those_DT who_WP visited_VBD the_DT city_NN ,_, which_WDT became_VBD ,_, as_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, virulently_RB infected_VBN ,_, frequently_RB developed_VBD the_DT disease_NN ,_, yet_RB still_RB without_IN its_PRP$ spreading_NN in_IN the_DT Camp_NNP ._.
``_`` This_DT radical_JJ measure_NN removes_VBZ to_TO a_DT great_JJ extent_NN the_DT necessity_NN for_IN other_JJ plague_NN measures_NNS ._.
The_DT Segregation_NNP Camp_NNP is_VBZ kept_VBN up_RP only_RB for_IN the_DT families_NNS of_IN those_DT who_WP will_MD not_RB go_VB out_RP into_IN Camp_NNP ._.
Search_NN parties_NNS are_VBP no_RB longer_RB required_VBN ,_, as_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN people_NNS have_VBP no_DT occasion_NN to_TO conceal_VB ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT city_NN disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT houses_NNS and_CC inoculation_NN alone_RB remain_VBP ._.
``_`` The_DT most_RBS noticeable_JJ feature_NN in_IN the_DT third_JJ outbreak_NN is_VBZ the_DT change_NN in_IN the_DT system_NN at_IN the_DT Malir_NNP Camp_NNP ._.
The_DT Acting_NNP Commissioner_NNP has_VBZ ,_, in_IN paragraph_JJ 3_CD of_IN his_PRP$ memorandum_NN on_IN last_JJ year_NN 's_POS report_NN ,_, explained_VBD how_WRB this_DT Camp_NNP guards_VBZ a_DT narrow_JJ outlet_NN from_IN Karchi_NNP and_CC renders_VBZ the_DT pro-_JJ tection_NN of_IN Sind_NNP comparatively_RB easy_JJ ._.
Last_JJ year_NN ,_, all_DT arrivals_NNS at_IN this_DT neck_NN ,_, whether_IN by_IN rail_NN or_CC road_NN ,_, were_VBD examined_VBN and_CC detained_VBN for_IN 10_CD days_NNS ,_, Government_NNP servants_NNS and_CC those_DT bearing_JJ passes_NNS signed_VBN by_IN those_DT authorised_VBN to_TO grant_VB them_PRP being_VBG alone_RB permitted_VBN to_TO continue_VB their_PRP$ journey_NN ._.
``_`` This_DT year_NN ,_, the_DT issue_NN of_IN Government_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.

Rainfall_NN ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: Average_VBP from_IN 6_CD to_TO 8_CD inches_NNS ._.
Hyderabad_NNP ,_, a_DT vast_JJ alluvial_JJ plain_NN ,_, 216_CD miles_NNS long_RB by_IN 48_CD broad_JJ ,_, is_VBZ bounded_VBN on_IN the_DT north_NN by_IN Boundaries_NNP ._.
Khairpur_NNP State_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT east_NN by_IN the_DT Thar_NNP and_CC Prkr_NNP District_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT south_NN by_IN the_DT same_JJ tract_NN and_CC the_DT river_NN Kori_NNP ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN by_IN the_DT river_NN Indus_NNP and_CC Karchi_NNP District_NNP ._.
Fertile_NNP along_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT Indus_NNP ,_, which_WDT forms_VBZ its_PRP$ western_JJ boundary_NN ;_: it_PRP degenerates_VBZ towards_IN the_DT east_NN into_IN sandy_JJ wastes_NNS ,_, sparsely_RB populated_VBN ,_, and_CC defy-_JJ ing_NN cultivation_NN ._.
Considerable_JJ variations_NNS of_IN climate_NN obtain_VB within_IN the_DT District_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT north_NN ,_, the_DT hot_JJ season_NN of_IN April_NNP and_CC May_NNP is_VBZ followed_VBN by_IN two_CD months_NNS of_IN flood_NN ,_, the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN being_VBG cold_JJ and_CC dry_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT central_JJ tract_NN the_DT cold_JJ season_NN suc-_JJ ceeds_VBZ the_DT hot_JJ without_IN any_DT intervening_JJ inundations_NNS to_TO graduate_VB the_DT transition_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT change_NN occurs_VBZ sometimes_RB with_IN such_JJ suddenness_NN that_WDT ,_, to_TO quote_VB a_DT local_JJ saying_NN ,_, '_'' sunstroke_VBD and_CC frost-_JJ bite_NN are_VBP possible_JJ in_IN one_CD and_CC the_DT same_JJ day_NN ._. '_''
In_IN normal_JJ years_NNS ,_, the_DT District_NNP is_VBZ healthy_JJ as_IN com-_JJ pared_VBN with_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN India_NNP ._.
Fevers_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, are_VBP very_RB prevalent_JJ in_IN September_NNP and_CC October_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT inundations_NNS cease_NN and_CC the_DT canals_NNS are_VBP drying_VBG up_RP ;_: and_CC they_PRP last_JJ till_IN the_DT northerly_JJ winds_NNS set_VBN in_IN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT authentic_JJ record_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Hyderabad_NNP previous_JJ to_TO 1897_CD ._.
The_DT year_NN 1869_CD is_VBZ memorable_JJ for_IN an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN epidemic_JJ cholera_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN Previous_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.
Hyderabad_NNP Tluka_NNP of_IN severe_JJ fever_NN ._.
*_IN The_DT disease_NN appeared_VBD in_IN Hyderabad_NNP at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN January_NNP in_IN imported_JJ form_NN ,_, and_CC from_IN the_DT 8th_CD January_NNP to_TO the_DT 19th_CD February_NNP 33_CD cases_NNS and_CC Hyderabad_NNP Town_NNP ._.
28_CD deaths_NNS had_VBD been_VBN so_RB reported_JJ ,_, no_DT week_NN containing_VBG double_JJ figures_NNS in_IN either_DT cases_NNS or_CC deaths_NNS ._.
Hyderabad_NNP ,_, like_IN Karchi_NNP ,_, is_VBZ a_DT closely-packed_JJ old_JJ town_NN with_IN namberless_JJ narrow_JJ lanes_NNS and_CC blind_VB alleys_NNS ._.
Its_PRP$ situation_NN on_IN a_DT hill_NN ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ dry_JJ climate-both_NN ,_, doubtless_NN ,_, unfavourable_JJ to_TO the_DT germ-probably_RB prevented_VBN the_DT serious_JJ development_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN ._.
On_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN imported_JJ cases_NNS ,_, Mr._NNP C._NNP G._NNP Dodgson_NNP ,_, I._NNP C._NNP S._NNP ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP ,_, made_VBD Hyderabad_NNP his_PRP$ head-quarters_NNS ._.
He_PRP insisted_VBD on_IN house-to-house_NN inspection_NN being_VBG made_VBN a_DT reality_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN patients_NNS ,_, when_WRB their_PRP$ condition_NN permitted_VBD ,_, to_TO sheds_NNS ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT 23rd_CD of_IN February_NNP proceeded_VBD to_TO take_VB action_NN in_IN person_NN by_IN causing_VBG the_DT evacuation_NN of_IN a_DT group_NN of_IN houses_NNS containing_VBG about_IN a_DT hundred_JJ families_NNS where_WRB the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD increasing_VBG ._.
On_IN the_DT 3rd_CD March_NNP it_PRP was_VBD evident_JJ that_IN plague_NN had_VBD broken_VBN out_RP in_IN Hyderabad_NNP and_CC medical_JJ inspection_NN on_IN the_DT Railway_NNP was_VBD commenced_VBN in_IN view_NN of_IN a_DT probable_JJ exodus_NN ._.
Sixteen_NNP medical_JJ students_NNS were_VBD placed_VBN on_IN the_DT main_JJ roads_NNS leading_VBG out_IN of_IN Hyderabad_NNP ,_, and_CC it_PRP became_VBD difficult_JJ for_IN any_DT sick_JJ person_NN to_TO get_VB away_RB ._.
Large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN dead_JJ rats_NNS discovered_VBN in_IN the_DT houses_NNS when_WRB opened_VBN for_IN disinfection_NN and_CC cleansing_VBG proved_VBD the_DT wisdom_NN of_IN removing_VBG the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN houses_NNS ,_, which_WDT ,_, though_IN not_RB actually_RB infected_VBN themselves_PRP ,_, were_VBD yet_RB in_IN proximity_NN to_TO such_JJ houses_NNS as_IN were_VBD ._.

the_DT Judge_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT strong_JJ body_NN of_IN volunteers_NNS ,_, amongst_VB them_PRP Mr._NNP M._NNP Hesketh_NNP ,_, Principal_NNP of_IN the_DT Sind_NNP College_NNP ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP Dayaram_NNP Gidumal_NNP ,_, the_DT Judge_NNP of_IN Shikrpur_NNP in_IN Hyderabad_NNP ,_, ably_RB assisted_VBD Mr._NNP Dodgson_NNP in_IN his_PRP$ fight_NN with_IN the_DT plague_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Dayaram_NNP Gidumal_NNP established_VBD a_DT Private_NNP Hospital_NNP on_IN the_DT Native_NNP Library_NNP premises_NNS under_IN the_DT Reverend_NNP A._NN Canney_NNP ,_, C._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, and_CC Miss_NNP Piggott_NNP ,_, Z._NNP M._NNP ,_, of_IN which_WDT Lieutenant-_NNP Colonel_NNP Hume_NNP Henderson_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, held_VBD general_JJ medical_JJ supervision_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT 24th_CD of_IN March_NNP the_DT Government_NNP High_NNP School_NNP was_VBD opened_VBN as_IN a_DT Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP under_IN Lieut.-Colonel_NNP Hume_NNP Henderson_NNP and_CC a_DT staff_NN of_IN Lady_JJ Nurses_NNS from_IN Calcutta_NNP ._.

Apart_RB from_IN Hyderabad_NNP itself_PRP ,_, 55_CD cases_NNS and_CC 48_CD deaths_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, of_IN which_WDT 18_CD cases_NNS and_CC 15_CD deaths_NNS occurred_VBD at_IN Tando_NNP Alahyr_NNP ._.
But_CC in_IN spite_NN of_IN all_DT efforts_NNS the_DT epidemic_JJ grew_VBD ,_, spread_NN in_IN every_DT direction_NN by_IN fleeing_VBG victims_NNS ,_, and_CC with_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 9th_CD April_NNP 1897_CD threatened_VBD to_TO become_VB severe_JJ ._.
Mr._NNP Dodgson_NNP broke_VBD down_RP under_IN the_DT strain_NN and_CC was_VBD compelled_VBN reluctantly_RB to_TO take_VB furlough_NN ._.
His_PRP$ last_JJ act_NN was_VBD to_TO recommend_VB a_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, and_CC one_CD was_VBD constituted_VBN under_IN the_DT orders_NNS of_IN Government_NN on_IN the_DT 9th_CD April_NNP 1897_CD ._.
This_DT Committee_NNP did_VBD good_JJ work_NN ,_, minimising_VBG correspondence_NN and_CC promoting_VBG united_JJ effort_NN ._.
The_DT Camps_NNP ,_, carefully_RB laid_VBN out_RP and_CC systematically_RB worked_VBN by_IN Captain_NNP Cater_NNP Jones_NNP ,_, were_VBD brought_VBN under_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN European_JJ non-commis-_NN sioned_VBD officers_NNS and_CC soldiers_NNS ._.

The_DT weekly_JJ figures_NNS for_IN this_DT first_JJ epidemic_NN are_VBP given_VBN in_IN the_DT Chapter_NN on_IN Sind_NNP as_IN a_DT whole_NN ._.

Boundaries_NNS ._.
Karchi_NNP District_NNP is_VBZ bounded_VBN on_IN the_DT north_NN by_IN Shikrpur_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT east_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT Indus_NNP and_CC Hyderabad_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT south_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT Arabian_NNP Sea_NNP ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN ,_, by_IN Baluchistn_NNP ._.
The_DT climate_NN of_IN Karachi_NNP City_NNP and_CC the_DT neighbouring_JJ country_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ in_IN every_DT direction_NN open_JJ to_TO the_DT sea-breeze_NN ,_, possesses_VBZ a_DT great_JJ superiority_NN to_TO that_DT Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
which_WDT prevails_VBZ throughout_IN the_DT remainder_NN of_IN Sind_NNP ._.
The_DT hill-_JJ country_NN of_IN Kohistn_NNP is_VBZ also_RB cooler_NN in_IN Summer_NNP and_CC warmer_NN in_IN Winter_NNP than_IN is_VBZ the_DT case_NN in_IN the_DT plains_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT north_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, near_IN the_DT barren_NN Laki_NNP range_NN of_IN hills_NNS ,_, the_DT heat_NN often_RB becomes_VBZ insupportable_JJ ._.
The_DT hot_JJ season_NN commences_NNS about_IN the_DT middle_NN or_CC end_NN of_IN March_NNP ,_, reaches_VBZ its_PRP$ maximum_NN in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN July_NNP ,_, and_CC lasts_NNS till_VBP the_DT end_NN of_IN August_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT temperature_NN once_RB more_RBR becomes_NNS tolerably_RB cool_VBP ._.
Karchi_NNP City_NNP is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO enjoy_VB the_DT healthiest_JJS climate_NN in_IN all_DT Sind_NNP ._.
