There_EX is_VBZ no_DT authentic_JJ record_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Karchi_NNP previous_JJ to_TO 1896_CD ._.
*_JJ Karachi_NNP City_NNP ._.
First_RB Epidemic_NNP ._.
(_( December_NNP 1896-May_JJ 1897_CD )_) .-The_NN first_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN reported_VBN in_IN Karchi_NNP City_NNP was_VBD that_IN of_IN a_DT Brahman_NNP cook_NN ,_, 16_CD years_NNS old_JJ ,_, who_WP was_VBD taken_VBN ill_RB on_IN the_DT 4th_CD December_NNP 1896_CD and_CC died_VBD on_IN the_DT 9th_CD ._.
Three_CD more_JJR cases_NNS were_VBD reported_VBN on_IN the_DT 11th_CD ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT 19th_CD plague_NN was_VBD declared_VBN epidemic_JJ ._.
Although_IN plague_NN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, must_MD have_VB existed_VBN in_IN Karchi_NNP from_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN December_NNP ,_, the_DT Acting_NNP Commissioner_NNP in_IN Sind_NNP draws_JJ attention_NN to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT mortality_NN during_IN October_NNP ,_, November_NNP ,_, and_CC December_NNP ,_, taken_VBN either_DT daily_JJ ,_, weekly_JJ ,_, or_CC monthly_RB ,_, gives_VBZ no_DT indication_NN of_IN its_PRP$ presence_NN ._.
He_PRP also_RB points_VBZ out_RP that_IN the_DT usual_JJ imported_VBN cases_NNS are_VBP wanting_VBG in_IN the_DT history_NN of_IN the_DT introduction_NN of_IN plague_NN into_IN Karchi_NNP :_: nor_CC is_VBZ there_RB any_DT record_NN of_IN an_DT abnormal_JJ mortality_NN amongst_NN rats_NNS ._.
The_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN in_IN Karchi_NNP ,_, therefore_RB ,_, remains_VBZ wrapped_VBN in_IN mystery_NN ._.
The_DT locality_NN first_RB attacked_VBD was_VBD the_DT old_JJ town_NN quarter_NN ._.
Up_RB to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN December_NNP ,_, out_IN of_IN 63_CD cases_NNS (_( 59_CD fatal_NN )_) ,_, 51_CD occurred_VBD there_RB ._.
On_IN the_DT 25th_JJ December_NNP Lieutenant-Colonel_NNP J._NNP W._NNP Clarkson_NNP ,_, Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, addressed_VBD the_DT Acting_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, strongly_RB recommending_VBG compulsory_JJ segregation_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN ;_: and_CC to_TO ensure_VB this_DT ,_, and_CC also_RB prompt_JJ information_NN of_IN sickness_NN ,_, the_DT Acting_NNP Commissioner_NNP issued_VBD orders_NNS to_TO all_DT District_NNP Officers_NNP calling_VBG for_IN daily_JJ reports_NNS from_IN any_DT place_NN where_WRB plague_NN appeared_VBD ,_, and_CC directing_VBG compulsory_JJ segregation_NN of_IN patients_NNS ._.
Meanwhile_RB in_IN Karachi_NNP cleaning_NN and_CC disinfection_NN were_VBD being_VBG energetically_RB carried_VBN out_RP by_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Executive_NNP ;_: and_CC suitable_JJ houses_NNS were_VBD set_VBN apart_RB as_IN Caste_NNP Hospitals_NNP for_IN such_JJ patients_NNS as_IN did_VBD not_RB possess_VB suitable_JJ private_JJ dwellings_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, by_IN a_DT resolution_NN of_IN the_DT Muni-_NNP cipality_NN ,_, compulsory_JJ segregation_NN was_VBD limited_VBN to_TO those_DT patients_NNS who_WP ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, had_VBD no_DT proper_JJ segregation_NN accommodation_NN ._.

On_IN the_DT 3rd_CD January_NNP the_DT Acting_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO ascertain_VB how_WRB far_RB the_DT Municipality_NNP were_VBD in_IN a_DT position_NN to_TO carry_VB their_PRP$ resolutions_NNS regarding_VBG segregation_NN ,_, disinfec-_JJ tion_NN ,_, and_CC notification_NN of_IN sickness_NN into_IN effect_NN ,_, returned_VBD to_TO Karchi_NNP ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT same_JJ day_NN ,_, accompanied_VBN by_IN Colonel_NNP G._NNP G._NNP Bainbridge_NNP ,_, P._NNP M._NNP O._NNP ,_, Mr._NNP R._NNP Giles_NNP ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP ,_, Lieutenant-_NNP Colonel_NNP W._NNP G._NNP H._NNP Henderson_NNP ,_, Captain_NNP H._NNP C._NNP L._NNP Arnim_NNP ,_, Deputy_NNP Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, and_CC Dr._NNP S._NNP M._NNP Kaka_NNP ,_, Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, made_VBD a_DT tour_NN of_IN inspection_NN through_IN the_DT City_NNP and_CC found_VBD that_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP had_VBD not_RB been_VBN misrepresented_VBN ._.
The_DT disinfection_NN of_IN rooms_NNS in_IN which_WDT deaths_NNS had_VBD occurred_VBN was_VBD most_RBS thorough_JJ ,_, and_CC to_TO Dr._NNP Kaka_NNP is_VBZ due_JJ the_DT credit_NN of_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN perchlorids_NNS of_IN mercury_NN as_IN a_DT disinfectant_NN throughout_IN the_DT operations_NNS ._.
But_CC the_DT buildings_NNS reserved_VBD as_IN Caste_NN Hospitals_NNS were_VBD empty_JJ ;_: and_CC it_PRP was_VBD clear_JJ that_IN only_RB force_NN would_MD fill_VB them_PRP ._.
To_TO such_JJ means_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, without_IN first_JJ trying_VBG gentler_NN methods_NNS ,_, the_DT Acting_NNP Commissioner_NNP was_VBD unwilling_VBG to_TO resort_VB ;_: and_CC he_PRP consequently_RB refused_VBD his_PRP$ sanction_NN to_TO compulsory_NN removal_NN ._.
Lieutenant-Colonel_NNP Clarkson_NNP now_RB put_VBP forward_RB a_DT valuable_JJ suggestion_NN ._.
This_DT was_VBD to_TO divide_VB the_DT City_NNP into_IN Wards_NNP or_CC Districts_NNPS ,_, with_IN a_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP atttached_VBD to_TO each_DT for_IN inspection_NN of_IN cases_NNS ,_, and_CC an_DT Inspector_NN to_TO discover_VB and_CC report_VB them_PRP ;_: a_DT suggestion_NN which_WDT was_VBD at_IN once_RB acted_VBN on_IN ._.
These_DT measures_NNS were_VBD soon_RB justified_VBN by_IN their_PRP$ success_NN ._.
The_DT Hindus_NNP ,_, no_RB longer_RBR fearful_JJ of_IN measures_NNS of_IN which_WDT they_PRP neither_RB understood_VBD the_DT value_NN nor_CC perceived_VBD the_DT use_NN ,_, gradually_RB accepted_VBD both_DT treatment_NN and_CC segregation_NN ._.
The_DT Collector_NNP had_VBD meetings_NNS with_IN the_DT Mahomedans_NNPS ,_, and_CC gave_VBD them_PRP four_CD Lady_NN Doctors_NNS ,_, and_CC Mahomedan_NNP Physicians_NNP ,_, thus_RB gradually_RB gaining_VBG their_PRP$ acquiescence_NN to_TO these_DT measures_NNS ._.
Only_RB one_CD instance_NN of_IN resistance_NN to_TO authority_NN is_VBZ on_IN record_NN ._.
It_PRP arose_VBD from_IN the_DT necessity_NN of_IN disinfecting_VBG a_DT house_NN and_CC burning_VBG down_RP a_DT but_CC ,_, and_CC occurred_VBD on_IN the_DT 18th_CD of_IN January_NNP amongst_VBD the_DT fisher_NN class_NN ,_, a_DT class_NN who_WP had_VBD on_IN previous_JJ occasions_NNS of_IN epidemic_JJ disease_NN proved_VBD troublesome_JJ ._.
Under_IN instructions_NNS from_IN Government_NNP ,_, Railway_NNP Medical_NNP Inspection_NNP was_VBD instituted_VBN on_IN lines_NNS laid_VBN down_RB by_IN the_DT Principal_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP from_IN the_DT 1st_CD January_NNP 1897_CD ._.
But_CC a_DT serious_JJ exodus_NN ,_, arising_VBG from_IN the_DT declaration_NN of_IN epidemic_JJ plague_NN ,_, greatly_RB accentuated_VBD the_DT danger_NN of_IN dissemination_NN ,_, and_CC from_IN the_DT 8th_CD January_NNP ,_, therefore_RB ,_, measures_NNS for_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN arrivals_NNS and_CC departures_NNS were_VBD adopted_VBN and_CC gradually_RB developed_VBN ._.
Civil_JJ Surgeons_NNS and_CC Hospital_NNP Assistants_NNP were_VBD responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT inspection_NN of_IN travellers_NNS at_IN Karchi_NNP and_CC all_PDT the_DT chief_JJ Railway_NNP Stations_NNP in_IN Sind_NNP ._.
On_IN the_DT 10th_NNS detailed_JJ orders_NNS were_VBD issued_VBN to_TO each_DT District_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, directing_VBG him_PRP to_TO superintend_VB the_DT arrangements_NNS obtaining_VBG in_IN his_PRP$ District_NNP and_CC to_TO take_VB immediate_JJ action_NN to_TO supplement_NN and_CC otherewise_NN aid_NN this_DT organization_NN where_WRB necessary_JJ ._.
From_IN the_DT 14th_CD January_NNP inspections_NNS of_IN both_DT Up_NNP and_CC Down_NNP trains_NNS were_VBD held_VBN at_IN the_DT following_JJ Stations_NNS :_: Kotri_NNP ,_, Laki_NNP ,_, Dadu_NNP ,_, Hyderabad_NNP ,_, Pad_NNP Edan_NNP ,_, Ruk_NNP ,_, Jacobabad_NNP ,_, Shikrpur_NNP ,_, Sukkur_NNP Rohri_NNP ,_, and_CC Reti_NNP ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT 23rd_CD January_NNP the_DT Acting_NNP Commissioner_NNP reported_VBD that_IN the_DT Railway_NNP Medical_NNP Inspection_NNP throughout_IN the_DT Province_NNP was_VBD careful_JJ and_CC thorough_JJ ._.
As_IN the_DT exodus_NN increased_VBD ,_, Commissioned_NNP Medical_NNP Officers_NNP were_VBD asked_VBN for_IN ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT 15th_JJ February_NNP Lieutenants_NNP N._NNP R._NNP J._NNP Rainier_NNP and_CC A._NNP Gwyther_NNP took_VBD over_RP charge_NN ,_, the_DT former_JJ at_IN Karchi_NNP and_CC the_DT latter_NN at_IN Dadu_NNP Railway_NNP Stations_NNP ._.
As_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ grew_VBD ,_, the_DT people_NNS deserted_VBD the_DT infected_JJ quarter_NN ,_, fleeing_VBG by_IN rail_NN and_CC road_NN and_CC sea_NN ;_: even_RB those_DT who_WP remained_VBD in_IN the_DT town_NN fled_VBD to_TO the_DT houses_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ neighbours_NNS or_CC their_PRP$ friends_NNS ._.
To_TO cope_VB with_IN this_DT ,_, a_DT special_JJ Police_NNP organization_NN was_VBD required_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT District_NNP Superintendent_NNP of_IN Police_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP C._NNP McIver_NNP ,_, abandoning_VBG his_PRP$ tour_NN at_IN the_DT request_NN of_IN the_DT Collector_NNP ,_, formed_VBD ,_, in_IN conjunction_NN with_IN the_DT General_NNP Officer_NNP Commanding_NNP ,_, a_DT Police_NNP and_CC Military_NNP Cordon_NNP between_IN the_DT City_NNP on_IN one_CD side_NN and_CC the_DT Sadar_NNP Bazr_NNP Cantonments_NNP on_IN the_DT other_JJ ._.

325_CD The_DT construction_NN of_IN Health_NNP Camps_NNP was_VBD now_RB taken_VBN in_IN hand_NN ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP J._NNP Strachan_NNP ,_, Engineer_NNP and_CC Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Municipality_NNP ,_, rapidly_RB erected_VBD huts_NNS on_IN a_DT site_NN across_IN the_DT river_NN ,_, into_IN which_WDT the_DT Collector_NNP endeavoured_VBD to_TO get_VB the_DT Hindus_NNP of_IN the_DT old_JJ town_NN to_TO move_VB ._.
Eventually_RB ,_, with_IN some_DT concessions_NNS to_TO the_DT people_NNS ,_, this_DT was_VBD done_VBN ,_, and_CC proved_VBD a_DT useful_JJ example_NN ._.
The_DT increasing_VBG daily_JJ mortality_NN at_IN length_NN induced_VBD the_DT Acting_NNP Commissioner_NNP to_TO relin-_VB quish_JJ the_DT rest_NN of_IN his_PRP$ tour_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT 23rd_CD of_IN January_NNP 1897_CD he_PRP returned_VBD to_TO Karchi_NNP to_TO find_VB this_DT first_JJ Health_NNP Camp_NNP just_RB occupied_VBN by_IN some_DT 2,000_CD Nasurpuris_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD laid_VBN out_RP ,_, with_IN water-_JJ pipes_NNS ,_, bathing_VBG platforms_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, nor_CC had_VBD the_DT Municipality_NNP spared_VBD expense_NN to_TO make_VB it_PRP attractive_JJ ._.
On_IN the_DT 26th_CD January_NNP Surgeon-General_NNP J._NNP Cleghorn_NNP ,_, Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP to_TO the_DT Govern-_NNP ment_NN of_IN India_NNP ,_, arrived_VBD to_TO examine_VB the_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN ._.

These_DT high_JJ figures_NNS were_VBD largely_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT Trans-Lyari_JJ quarter_NN (_( population_NN ,_, 30,000_CD )_) which_WDT had_VBD become_VBN infected_VBN on_IN the_DT 10th_JJ January_NNP ,_, and_CC up_RB to_TO this_DT had_VBD not_RB suffered_VBN severely_RB ,_, but_CC which_WDT now_RB called_VBD for_IN special_JJ action_NN ._.
Sardr_NNP Khn_NNP Bahdur_NNP Mahomed_NNP Yakub_NNP was_VBD accordingly_RB placed_VBN in_IN charge_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, with_IN Khn_NNP Sheb_NNP Rasul_NNP Bakhsh_NNP as_IN Assistant_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT few_JJ Muhammadan_NNP supervisors_NNS ;_: but_CC it_PRP was_VBD not_RB until_IN the_DT 19th_CD of_IN March_NNP that_IN the_DT Trans-Lyari_NNP Muhammadans_NNPS consented_VBD to_TO move_VB their_PRP$ sick_NN ._.
On_IN that_DT date_NN they_PRP moved_VBD them_PRP all_DT out_IN together_RB ,_, and_CC from_IN that_DT time_NN the_DT difficulties_NNS in_IN isolating_VBG the_DT sick_NN there_RB ceased_VBN ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Hospital_NNP became_VBD a_DT Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Government_NNP High_NNP School_NNP was_VBD a_DT Civil_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, of_IN which_WDT Lieutenant_NNP W._NNP J._NNP Niblock_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, ultimately_RB assumed_JJ charge_NN ._.

Later_RB on_IN they_PRP were_VBD assisted_VBN by_IN the_DT Misses_NNP Carey_NNP of_IN the_DT Zenana_NNP Mission_NNP and_CC some_DT nurses_NNS who_WP were_VBD paid_VBN from_IN the_DT Charitable_JJ Fund_NN ._.
The_DT origin_NN of_IN this_DT fund_NN deserves_VBZ notice_RB ._.
The_DT Pleaders_NNPS and_CC other_JJ native_JJ gentlemen_NNS were_VBD desirous_JJ of_IN giving_VBG a_DT farewell_NN entertain-_JJ ment_NN to_TO Mr._NNP Hart-Davies_NNP on_IN his_PRP$ retirement_NN ._.
But_CC Mr._NNP Davies_NNP begged_VBD that_IN the_DT money_NN might_MD be_VB devoted_VBN to_TO some_DT public_JJ object_NN ._.
A_DT meeting_NN was_VBD called_VBN at_IN Government_NNP House_NNP ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD decided_VBN to_TO raise_VB a_DT charitable_JJ fund_NN of_IN which_WDT this_DT money_NN should_MD be_VB the_DT nucleus_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD augmented_VBN by_IN a_DT Concert_NNP given_VBN by_IN the_DT ladies_NNS of_IN the_DT Station_NNP ,_, and_CC by_IN private_JJ subscription_NN ,_, and_CC ultimately_RB amounted_VBD to_TO Rs_NNP ._.
20,000_CD ._.
This_DT fund_NN was_VBD given_VBN piece-meal_JJ to_TO Superin-_JJ tendents_NNS ,_, and_CC was_VBD used_VBN for_IN furniture_NN for_IN Hospitals_NNP ,_, food_NN ,_, stimulants_NNS ,_, &_CC c._VBP The_DT Jail_NNP had_VBD one_CD case_NN in_IN spite_NN of_IN every_DT precaution_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD that_IN of_IN a_DT prisoner_NN of_IN 5_CD months_NNS standing_VBG ;_: the_DT infection_NN may_MD have_VB come_VBN from_IN a_DT Warder_NNP ._.
No_DT other_JJ case_NN occurred_VBD ._.
As_IN it_PRP is_VBZ in_IN the_DT heart_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD for_IN long_RB encircled_VBN by_IN plague_NN ,_, the_DT Jail_NNP may_MD be_VB considered_VBN a_DT striking_JJ instance_NN of_IN segregation_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT Karchi_NNP District_NNP itself_PRP ,_, outside_IN of_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, only_RB 238_CD cases_NNS and_CC 178_CD deaths_NNS from_IN ._.
plague_NN occurred_VBD in_IN all_DT ._.
Of_IN these_DT ,_, only_RB 53_CD and_CC 41_CD were_VBD local_JJ cases_NNS and_CC deaths_NNS ._.
The_DT disease_NN only_RB took_VBD root_NN in_IN Tatta_NNP ,_, with_IN which_WDT its_PRP$ Railway_NNP Station_NNP Jungshahi_NNP must_MD be_VB included_VBN ,_, and_CC in_IN Kotri_NNP ._.
Tatta_NNP is_VBZ a_DT town_NN of_IN about_IN 10,000_CD inhabitants_NNS ,_, about_RB 13_CD miles_NNS from_IN Jungshahi_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT favourite_JJ resort_NN of_IN the_DT upper_JJ classes_NNS of_IN Karachi_NNP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ on_IN the_DT main_JJ route_NN to_TO Cutch_NNP ._.

The_DT influx_NN then_RB appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB ceased_VBN ,_, and_CC no_DT more_JJR deaths_NNS were_VBD reported_VBN till_JJ plague_NN broke_VBD out_RP locally_RB in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG the_DT 26th_CD March_NNP ._.
Thereafter_RB the_DT outbreak_NN was_VBD local_JJ ,_, and_CC practically_RB ceased_VBD early_JJ in_IN May_NNP ._.
Karchi_NNP City_NNP ._.
Second_JJ Epidemic_NNP (_( April_NNP 1898-August_JJ 1898_CD )_) .-The_NN cause_NN of_IN the_DT second_JJ outbreak_NN is_VBZ obscure_JJ ._.
Karachi_NNP was_VBD declared_VBN free_JJ from_IN August_NNP 1897_CD ._.
On_IN the_DT 28th_CD March_NNP 1898_CD a_DT case_NN occurred_VBD ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT 31st_CD another_DT ._.
But_CC the_DT City_NNP was_VBD prepared_VBN ._.
The_DT former_JJ Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, with_IN General_NNP Cooke_NNP at_IN its_PRP$ head_NN ,_, had_VBD never_RB been_VBN dissolved_VBN ,_, and_CC immediately_RB set_VB itself_PRP to_TO organize_VB measures_NNS to_TO combat_VB the_DT disease_NN ._.
The_DT measures_NNS in_IN force_NN during_IN the_DT second_JJ epidemic_JJ differed_VBN in_IN two_CD essential_JJ ,_, and_CC several_JJ minor_NNS ,_, respects_NNS from_IN those_DT which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN employed_VBN during_IN the_DT first_JJ :_: (_( 1_CD )_) Widely_RB extended_VBN compulsory_NN evacuation_NN ;_: (_( 2_CD )_) An_DT improved_JJ system_NN of_IN voluntary_JJ evacuation_NN ,_, known_VBN as_IN voluntary_JJ camps_NNS ._.
Inoculation_NN on_IN a_DT small_JJ scale_NN ,_, disinfection_NN under_IN English_NNP Medical_NNP officers_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, were_VBD amongst_VBN the_DT minor_JJ contrasts_NNS ._.
The_DT Plague_NNP Committee_NNP was_VBD composed_VBN of-_JJ President-Major-General_JJ T._NNP A._NN Cooke_NNP ,_, Commanding_NNP Sind_NNP District_NNP ._.

327_CD The_DT first_JJ measure_NN was_VBD the_DT organization_NN of_IN Superintendents_NNP (_( with_IN staff_NN for_IN each_DT )_) ._.
Passes_NNS were_VBD introduced_VBN which_WDT were_VBD at_IN first_JJ given_VBN to_TO persons_NNS living_VBG in_IN uninfected_JJ portions_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, but_CC were_VBD afterwards_NNS restricted_VBN to_TO persons_NNS who_WP had_VBD completed_VBN ten_JJ days_NNS '_POS residence_NN in_IN the_DT Malir_NNP Camp_NNP ._.
(_( 1_CD )_) Inoculation.-This_NN was_VBD begun_VBN on_IN the_DT 13th_CD of_IN April_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC extended_VBD over_IN 3_CD months_NNS ,_, the_DT last_JJ operation_NN being_VBG performed_VBN on_IN the_DT 19th_CD July_NNP 1898_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN inoculations_NNS was_VBD 6,106_CD ;_: 3,911_CD being_VBG males_NNS and_CC 2,195_CD females_NNS ._.
The_DT results_NNS up_IN to_TO the_DT 25th_JJ August_NNP were_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -Among_VB the_DT 287_CD twice-inoculated_JJ neither_DT case_NN nor_CC death_NN occurred_VBD ._.
Among_IN the_DT 5,819_CD once-inoculated_JJ there_EX were_VBD 44_CD cases_NNS and_CC 25_CD deaths_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT 14_CD cases_NNS ,_, 10_CD deaths_NNS occurred_VBD within_IN ten_JJ days_NNS of_IN the_DT operation_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Structural_NNP improvements.-A_JJ large_JJ number_NN of_IN structural_JJ improvements_NNS ,_, carried_VBD out_RP by_IN the_DT influence_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Superintendents_NNP ,_, were_VBD particularly_RB noticeable_JJ when_WRB the_DT Acting_NNP Commissioner_NNP accompanied_VBD the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioners_NNPS on_IN a_DT tour_NN of_IN inspection_NN through_IN Karchi_NNP City_NNP on_IN the_DT 25th_CD of_IN January_NNP 1899_CD ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) The_DT Relief_NNP Fund_NNP ,_, ably_RB managed_VBD as_IN before_IN by_IN Mr._NNP Motiram_NNP Advani_NNP ._.

(_( 5_CD )_) Dr._NNP Simond_NNP s_VBD visit_NN between_IN 9th_CD May_NNP and_CC 6th_CD June_NNP 1898_CD in_IN order_NN to_TO test_VB the_DT efficacy_NN of_IN Dr._NNP Roux_NNP 's_POS serum_NN ._.

Third_JJ Epidemic_NNP (_( February_NNP 1899-June_JJ 1899_CD )_) .-Yet_VBP a_DT third_JJ epidemic_JJ occurred_VBD in_IN Karchi_NNP during_IN the_DT current_JJ year_NN ._.
A_DT long_JJ series_NN of_IN dropping_VBG ,_, or_CC sporadic_JJ ,_, cases_NNS occurred_VBD between_IN the_DT cessation_NN of_IN the_DT second_JJ epidemic_JJ and_CC the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT third_JJ ._.
No_DT single_JJ week_NN ,_, indeed_RB ,_, throughout_IN this_DT interval_NN passed_VBD without_IN plague_NN being_VBG returned_VBN ._.
Of_IN this_DT period_NN Mr._NNP Sladen_NNP ,_, the_DT Acting_NNP Collector_NNP ,_, gives_VBZ the_DT following_VBG interesting_JJ account_NN :_: -_: ``_`` The_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN subsequent_NN to_TO the_DT re-occupation_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN after_IN the_DT second_JJ epidemic_JJ will_MD now_RB be_VB briefly_NN traced_VBN ._.
``_`` At_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN July_NNP ,_, the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD lingering_VBG on_IN in_IN the_DT Ranchor_NNP and_CC Sadar_NNP Bazaar_NNP Quarters_NNP ,_, at_IN Kiamari_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT Lyari_NNP Quarter_NNP and_CC the_DT Trans-Lyari_NNP Camps_NNP ._.
``_`` In_IN the_DT Ranchor_NNP Quarter_NNP ,_, six_CD cases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN a_DT fresh_JJ center_NN ,_, in_IN a_DT compound_NN inhabited_VBN by_IN inoculated_JJ persons_NNS ,_, towards_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN July_NNP ._.
After_IN an_DT interval_NN ,_, plague_NN broke_VBD out_RP among_IN the_DT sweepers_NNS ,_, who_WP up_RP till_NN then_RB had_VBD been_VBN comparatively_RB free_JJ ,_, and_CC this_DT was_VBD followed_VBN a_DT fortnight_NN later_RB by_IN a_DT sharp_JJ outbreak_NN among_IN the_DT sweepers_NNS at_IN Kiamari_NNP ._.
Finally_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN September_NNP ,_, there_EX was_VBD another_DT revival_NN among_IN the_DT Katchis_NNP in_IN the_DT Ranchor_NNP Quarter_NNP ._.
About_IN 300_CD persons_NNS were_VBD then_RB segregated_VBN ,_, among_IN whom_WP a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS appeared_VBD ,_, and_CC about_IN 10_CD days_NNS later_RB ,_, as_IN fresh_JJ cases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT same_JJ quarter_NN ,_, a_DT large_JJ block_NN was_VBD evacuated_VBN and_CC kept_VBN vacant_NN for_IN about_RB 6_CD weeks_NNS ._.
The_DT quarter_NN then_RB remained_VBD free_JJ ,_, except_IN for_IN a_DT solitary_JJ case_NN in_IN October_NNP ,_, from_IN 29th_CD September_NNP to_TO 2nd_CD March_NNP 1899_CD ._.
At_IN Kiamari_NNP ,_, plague_NN died_VBD slowly_RB and_CC caused_VBD some_DT anxiety_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP continued_VBD through_IN the_DT busy_JJ export_NN season_NN with_IN a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS every_DT week_NN ._.
Then_RB after_IN a_DT brief_JJ interval_NN occurred_VBD an_DT outbreak_NN among_IN the_DT sweepers_NNS ,_, which_WDT was_VBD severe_JJ ,_, but_CC was_VBD quickly_RB stopped_VBN by_IN evacuation_NN ._.
``_`` In_IN the_DT main_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT Lyari_NNP Quarter_NNP ,_, the_DT plague_NN died_VBD away_RB rapidly_RB in_IN June_NNP and_CC disappeared_VBD in_IN July_NNP ._.
In_IN an_DT isolated_JJ corner_NN of_IN the_DT quarter_NN ,_, called_VBN Dhobi_NNP Ghat_NNP ,_, plague_JJ un-_JJ expectedly_RB broke_VBD out_RP at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN July_NNP among_IN Mekranis_NNP ,_, Banias_NNP ,_, and_CC others_NNS ,_, but_CC fortunately_RB did_VBD not_RB affect_VB the_DT dhobis_NN ._.
The_DT affected_JJ area_NN was_VBD evacuated_VBN immediately_RB and_CC no_DT further_JJ cases_NNS occurred_VBD except_IN in_IN segregation_NN ._.
``_`` In_IN the_DT Voluntary_NNP Camp_NNP area_NN ,_, a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN July_NNP ,_, and_CC early_RB in_IN August_NNP a_DT Mekrani_NNP village_NN took_VBD infection_NN from_IN Kiamari_NNP ._.
``_`` In_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN August_NNP ,_, plague_NN appeared_VBD in_IN a_DT little_JJ cluster_NN of_IN huts_NNS in_IN the_DT gardens_NNS ,_, known_VBN as_IN Tharu_NNP Lines_NNP ,_, inhabited_VBN by_IN Lasis_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ on_IN the_DT bank_NN of_IN the_DT Lyari_NNP ,_, and_CC several_JJ families_NNS suddenly_RB crossed_VBD and_CC camped_VBD on_IN the_DT other_JJ side_NN ._.
Six_NNP cases_NNS occurred_VBD here_RB ._.
The_DT whole_JJ village_NN was_VBD evacuated_VBN and_CC cleaned_VBN and_CC kept_VBD empty_NNS for_IN 2_CD months_NNS ._.
``_`` On_IN the_DT 17th_JJ October_NNP ,_, plague_NN appeared_VBD in_IN another_DT small_JJ community_NN in_IN the_DT gardens_NNS ,_, the_DT owners_NNS of_IN the_DT gardens_NNS being_VBG Khojas_NNP and_CC their_PRP$ servants_NNS Katchis_NNP ._.
*_JJ *_NNP *_NNP ``_`` To_TO go_VB back_RB to_TO the_DT Sadar_NNP Bazaar_NNP ._.
After_IN 21_CD cases_NNS and_CC 15_CD cases_NNS in_IN the_DT first_JJ two_CD weeks_NNS of_IN June_NNP ,_, the_DT plague_NN fell_VBD to_TO about_IN 5_CD cases_NNS a_DT week_NN :_: it_PRP seemed_VBD to_TO disappear_VB and_CC again_RB revive_JJ ._.
Several_JJ cases_NNS occurred_VBD among_IN the_DT Mochis_NNP early_JJ in_IN August_NNP ,_, then_RB followed_VBD a_DT respite_NN of_IN several_JJ days_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP again_RB broke_VBD out_RP among_IN the_DT Mochis_NNP in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN September_NNP ._.
This_DT time_NN Mr._NNP Brayson_NNP ,_, Deputy_NNP Collector_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD in_IN charge_NN ,_, had_VBD the_DT whole_JJ Mochi_NNP Quarter_NNP vacated_VBD and_CC insisted_VBD on_IN the_DT ground_NN floors_NNS being_VBG paved_VBN before_IN the_DT residents_NNS returned_VBD ._.
This_DT had_VBD the_DT desired_JJ effect_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP did_VBD not_RB prevent_VB the_DT plague_NN breaking_VBG out_RP among_IN the_DT same_JJ community_NN this_DT year_NN ._.
From_IN the_DT Mochis_NNP the_DT infection_NN seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN spread_VBN by_IN rats_NNS to_TO neighbouring_VBG houses_NNS ._.
The_DT rats_NNS were_VBD very_RB numerous_JJ in_IN the_DT Sadar_NNP Bazaar_NNP and_CC Civil_NNP Lines_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT few_JJ were_VBD occasionally_RB found_VBN dead_JJ in_IN the_DT former_JJ quarter_NN ._.
Infection_NNP conveyed_VBN by_IN rats_NNS seemed_VBD the_DT most_RBS probable_JJ cause_NN of_IN a_DT case_NN in_IN a_DT Memon_NNP compound_NN not_RB far_RB removed_VBN from_IN the_DT Mochis_NNP '_POS houses_NNS ._.
``_`` On_IN the_DT 4th_JJ October_NNP a_DT Memon_NNP girl_NN in_IN Rambagh_NNP developed_VBD plague_NN who_WP was_VBD found_VBN to_TO have_VB slept_VBN 2_CD nights_NNS with_IN friends_NNS in_IN the_DT Sadar_NNP Bazaar_NNP ._.
Although_IN this_DT and_CC the_DT neighbouring_JJ 2_CD or_CC 3_CD houses_NNS were_VBD vacated_VBN at_IN once_RB ,_, the_DT infection_NN had_VBD already_RB spread_VBN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT next_JJ three_CD weeks_NNS there_EX were_VBD 7_CD cases_NNS among_IN the_DT Rambagh_NNP Memons_NNPS in_IN this_DT neighbourhood_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD Hindustani_NNP child_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB caught_VBN it_PRP from_IN playing_VBG with_IN them_PRP ._.
?_. KARACHI_NNP DISTRICT_NNP ._. ]_NN
329_CD ``_`` Meanwhile_RB ,_, sporadic_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD occurring_VBG in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, the_DT victims_NNS being_VBG widely_RB dissociated_VBN ._.
The_DT last_JJ of_IN these_DT ,_, however_RB ,_, occurred_VBD early_RB in_IN November_NNP ,_, and_CC once_RB for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN ten_JJ days_NNS and_CC on_IN another_DT occasion_NN for_IN eight_CD days_NNS in_IN succession_NN no_DT cases_NNS were_VBD reported_VBN ._.
The_DT infection_NN among_IN the_DT Rambagh_NNP Memon_NNP community_NN was_VBD stopped_VBN by_IN evacuation_NN and_CC segregation_NN in_IN the_DT special_JJ Memon_NNP Camp_NNP early_RB in_IN November._NNP ``_``
Infection_NNP next_JJ appeared_VBD among_IN other_JJ Memons_NNS in_IN the_DT Garden_NNP Quarter_NNP ,_, about_RB half_PDT a_DT mile_JJ away_RB ,_, where_WRB it_PRP adjoins_VBZ the_DT town_NN proper_NN ,_, about_IN which_WDT the_DT following_VBG extract_NN from_IN the_DT weekly_JJ Plague_NNP report_NN is_VBZ quoted_VBN :_: -_: 'During_VBG the_DT past_JJ fortnight_NN or_CC three_CD weeks_NNS ,_, five_CD deaths_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN a_DT large_JJ compound_NN in_IN the_DT Garden_NNP Quarter_NNP ._.
The_DT bodies_NNS were_VBD examined_VBN in_IN every_DT case_NN ,_, but_CC except_IN that_IN the_DT deaths_NNS were_VBD considered_VBN suspicious_JJ by_IN reason_NN of_IN their_PRP$ occurring_VBG partly_RB among_IN the_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ family_NN in_IN adjoining_VBG rooms_NNS and_CC so_RB soon_RB after_IN one_CD another_DT ,_, there_EX was_VBD no_DT reason_NN to_TO believe_VB them_PRP to_TO be_VB due_JJ to_TO plague_VB ._.
*_JJ *_NNP *_VBZ A_NNP true_JJ case_NN has_VBZ now_RB occurred_VBN among_IN them_PRP 7_CD days_NNS after_IN the_DT last_JJ death_NN ._. '_''
``_`` This_DT case_NN was_VBD followed_VBN by_IN 5_CD others_NNS from_IN the_DT same_JJ source_NN of_IN infection_NN ,_, most_JJS of_IN them_PRP occurring_VBG in_IN a_DT camp_NN to_TO which_WDT over_IN 600_CD persons_NNS were_VBD removed_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS after_IN the_DT first_JJ case_NN mentioned_VBN above_IN ._.
On_IN December_NNP 1st_CD ,_, a_DT Bhil_NNP girl_NN in_IN a_DT neighbouring_JJ compound_NN died_VBD of_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN December_NNP 21st_CD and_CC 22nd_CD two_CD Memon_NNP children_NNS of_IN another_DT compound_NN ._.
The_DT weekly_JJ report_NN is_VBZ again_RB quoted_VBN regarding_VBG these_DT two_CD cases_NNS ,_, as_IN the_DT difficulty_NN in_IN diagnosing_VBG deaths_NNS from_IN plague_NN was_VBD again_RB exemplified_VBN :_: -_: 'On_VBZ the_DT 12th_CD a_DT Memon_NNP woman_NN died_VBD after_IN giving_VBG birth_NN to_TO a_DT child_NN on_IN the_DT 11th_CD ,_, who_WP also_RB died_VBD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD certified_VBN after_IN examination_NN that_IN there_EX were_VBD no_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN plague_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT 17th_CD ,_, a_DT Memon_NNP 50_CD years_NNS old_JJ died_VBD and_CC was_VBD certified_VBN not_RB to_TO have_VB died_VBN of_IN plague_NN by_IN the_DT doctor_NN who_WP attended_VBD him_PRP ._.
He_PRP had_VBD been_VBN living_VBG in_IN the_DT house_NN next_JJ to_TO that_DT in_IN which_WDT the_DT woman_NN had_VBD died_VBN on_IN the_DT 12th_CD ._.
The_DT two_CD cases_NNS this_DT week_NN are_VBP the_DT son_NN ,_, aged_VBD 12_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT grandson_NN ,_, aged_VBD 21/2_CD ,_, of_IN the_DT man_NN who_WP died_VBD on_IN the_DT 17th_CD ._. '_''
``_`` In_IN the_DT following_JJ week_NN ,_, one_CD more_JJR case_NN occurred_VBD traceable_JJ to_TO this_DT source_NN ,_, and_CC later_RB on_IN another_DT ._.
It_PRP broke_VBD out_RP next_JJ in_IN a_DT compound_NN in_IN the_DT Jail_NNP Quarter_NNP close_NN to_TO those_DT from_IN which_WDT the_DT residents_NNS had_VBD been_VBN removed_VBN to_TO camp_VB ._.
Four_CD cases_NNS occurred_VBD on_IN the_DT 8th_CD ,_, 9th_CD ,_, 10th_CD ,_, and_CC 12th_CD January_NNP ,_, a_DT fifth_NN on_IN the_DT 18th_CD ,_, and_CC with_IN them_PRP the_DT plague_NN ceased_VBN in_IN this_DT neighbourhood_NN for_IN a_DT time_NN ._.
``_`` In_IN the_DT weekly_JJ reports_NNS ,_, attention_NN has_VBZ been_VBN drawn_VBN to_TO the_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN children_NNS who_WP suffered_VBD during_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ among_IN the_DT Memons_NNS ._.
Out_IN of_IN the_DT 8_CD cases_NNS in_IN the_DT Rambagh_NNP Quarter_NNP ,_, 7_CD were_VBD children_NNS under_IN 14_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC 6_CD of_IN the_DT 14_CD cases_NNS from_IN the_DT Garden_NNP and_CC Jail_NNP Quarters_NNP which_WDT occurred_VBD in_IN November_NNP ,_, December_NNP ,_, and_CC January._NNP ``_``
This_DT completes_VBZ the_DT narrative_NN of_IN the_DT intermediate_JJ months_NNS between_IN the_DT second_JJ and_CC third_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.
The_DT last_JJ cases_NNS of_IN the_DT second_JJ epidemic_NN were_VBD succeeded_VBN by_IN a_DT series_NN of_IN small_JJ outbreaks_NNS quickly_RB subdued_VBD ,_, and_CC sporadic_JJ cases_NNS among_IN all_DT classes_NNS ._.
When_WRB the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN was_VBD free_JJ ,_, there_EX followed_VBD the_DT outbreak_NN among_IN the_DT Memons_NNP ,_, the_DT insidious_JJ spread_NN of_IN which_WDT to_TO the_DT Garden_NNP and_CC Jail_NNP Quarters_NNP was_VBD not_RB checked_VBN until_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN January_NNP ._. ''_''
The_DT third_JJ outbreak_NN in_IN Karchi_NNP was_VBD probably_RB a_DT recrudescence_NN ._.
``_`` No_DT possible_JJ cause_NN except_IN recrudescence_NN ,_, ''_'' writes_VBZ Mr._NNP Sladen_NNP ,_, ``_`` could_MD be_VB assigned_VBN for_IN the_DT first_JJ of_IN these_DT cases_NNS ._.
The_DT second_JJ might_MD ,_, perhaps_RB ,_, have_VBP been_VBN derived_VBN from_IN the_DT first_JJ ,_, but_CC no_DT connection_NN was_VBD trace-_JJ able_JJ ._.
From_IN the_DT 28th_CD of_IN January_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT first_JJ case_NN occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT Napier_NNP Quarter_NNP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD evident_JJ that_IN a_DT recurrence_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN an_DT epidemic_JJ form_NN was_VBD probable_JJ ._. ''_''
Throughout_IN February_NNP the_DT cases_NNS gradually_RB became_VBD more_RBR numerous_JJ ;_: while_IN throughout_IN March_NNP the_DT figures_NNS rose_VBD rapidly_RB ._.
Mr._NNP Sladen_NNP thus_RB briefly_RB reviews_VBZ the_DT progress_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN :_: -_: ``_`` From_IN the_DT 26th_CD February_NNP ,_, there_EX was_VBD a_DT rapid_JJ increase_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT totals_NNS of_IN the_DT succeeding_JJ weeks_NNS rose_VBD steadily_RB from_IN 59_CD in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG March_NNP 3rd_CD to_TO 428_CD in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG April_NNP 14th_CD ._.
Plague_NNP mortality_NN began_VBD to_TO decline_VB at_IN once_RB after_IN the_DT maxi-_JJ mum_NN had_VBD been_VBN reached_VBN ,_, but_CC the_DT figures_NNS remained_VBD high_JJ till_NN about_IN May_NNP 10th_CD ,_, when_WRB the_DT im-_JJ provement_NN became_VBD very_RB rapid_JJ ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS in_IN the_DT weeks_NNS ending_VBG May_NNP 26th_CD and_CC June_NNP 2nd_CD were_VBD only_RB 29_CD and_CC 34_CD ,_, respectively_RB ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG June_NNP 23rd_CD there_EX were_VBD none_NN ._.
The_DT succeeding_NN weeks_NNS have_VBP shewn_VBN one_CD or_CC two_CD cases_NNS only_RB ._.
As_IN an_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, plague_NN was_VBD practically_RB over_IN by_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN May_NNP ._. ''_''

It_PRP is_VBZ worthy_JJ of_IN note_NN that_IN during_IN this_DT epidemic_VBZ the_DT plague_NN mortality_NN amongst_NN males_NNS was_VBD far_RB greater_JJR than_IN amongst_JJ females_NNS ;_: that_IN amongst_VBZ children_NNS being_VBG comparatively_RB insignificant_JJ ._.

As_IN regards_NNS the_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN to_TO meet_VB it_PRP ,_, the_DT following_VBG were_VBD the_DT most_RBS prominent_JJ :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) Health_NNP ,_, Observation_NNP and_CC Segregation_NNP Camps_NNP ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Evacuation_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) Disinfection_NN ._.
The_DT Camps_NNP ,_, with_IN their_PRP$ objects_NNS ,_, have_VBP been_VBN previously_RB described_VBN ._.
They_PRP were_VBD established_VBN at_IN Malir_NNP ,_, Kiamari_NNP ,_, Jati_NNP (_( for_IN arrivals_NNS from_IN Cutch_NNP )_) in_IN the_DT District_NNP ;_: and_CC at_IN Translyari_NNP ,_, at_IN Lyari_NNP ,_, at_IN Tatta_NNP Naka_NNP and_CC at_IN Thul_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT city_NN itself_PRP ._.
Most_JJS of_IN these_DT Camps_NNP had_VBD stood_VBN in_IN each_DT epidemic_NN ,_, and_CC served_VBD their_PRP$ various_JJ purposes_NNS with_IN considerable_JJ success_NN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ only_RB necessary_JJ to_TO dwell_VB here_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, upon_IN the_DT modifi-_JJ cations_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ working_NN during_IN 1898-99_JJ ._.
The_DT chief_JJ modification_NN was_VBD that_IN introduced_VBD throughout_IN the_DT whole_JJ Presidency_NN in_IN November_NNP 1898_CD ,_, when_WRB detention_NN was_VBD abolished_VBN and_CC surveillance_NN was_VBD introduced_VBN ._.
The_DT following_JJ remarks_NNS on_IN the_DT City_NNP Camps_NNP and_CC on_IN Evacuation_NN by_IN Mr._NNP Sladen_NNP are_VBP full_JJ of_IN interest_NN :_: -_: ``_`` In_IN the_DT Camps_NNP ,_, 413_CD cases_NNS and_CC 299_CD deaths_NNS occurred_VBD between_IN 21st_CD February_NNP and_CC 31st_CD May_NNP ._.
The_DT numbers_NNS seem_VBP large_JJ ,_, but_CC it_PRP has_VBZ to_TO be_VB remembered_VBN that_IN all_DT persons_NNS are_VBP included_VBN who_WP were_VBD not_RB actually_RB known_VBN to_TO have_VB plague_NN when_WRB they_PRP left_VBD the_DT town_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT very_RB large_JJ per-_JJ centage_NN of_IN the_DT cases_NNS occurred_VBD within_IN a_DT few_JJ days_NNS of_IN the_DT arrival_NN in_IN Camp_NNP ._.
Last_JJ year_NN ,_, all_DT cases_NNS that_WDT developed_VBD within_IN 10_CD days_NNS after_IN leaving_VBG the_DT town_NN were_VBD entered_VBN as_IN cases_NNS in_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
Latterly_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT bulk_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS had_VBD left_VBN the_DT town_NN and_CC cases_NNS continued_VBD to_TO occur_VB ,_, very_RB careful_JJ enquiries_NNS were_VBD made_VBN ,_, with_IN the_DT invariable_JJ result_NN that_IN the_DT person_NN attacked_VBD was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB either_RB a_DT regular_JJ visitor_NN to_TO the_DT infected_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN or_CC more_RBR often_RB had_VBD stopped_VBN the_DT night_NN or_CC till_VB very_RB late_RB in_IN the_DT evening_NN at_IN a_DT house_NN or_CC shop_NN instead_RB of_IN coming_VBG back_RB to_TO Camp_NNP ._.
Cases_NNS attributable_JJ to_TO personal_JJ contact_NN in_IN the_DT Camps_NNP were_VBD very_RB rare_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN no_DT cases_NNS was_VBD there_RB reason_NN to_TO suspect_VB local_JJ infection_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Motumal_NNP writes_VBZ that_IN ,_, generally_RB speaking_VBG ,_, those_DT who_WP died_VBD in_IN his_PRP$ division_NN were_VBD Chaprus_NNP ,_, Mekranis_NNP and_CC low_JJ class_NN Katchis_NNP ,_, who_WP found_VBD employ-_JJ ment_NN sewing_VBG gunny_NN bags_NNS and_CC working_VBG as_IN coolies_NNS at_IN Kiamari_NNP or_CC in_IN godowns_NNS in_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
Plague_NNP among_IN high-caste_JJ persons_NNS was_VBD exceptional_JJ ,_, although_IN they_PRP went_VBD daily_RB to_TO Karchi_NNP to_TO their_PRP$ offices_NNS ._. ''_''
?_. KARACHI_NNP DISTRICT_NNP ._. ]_NN
331_CD Generally_NNP speaking_NN ,_, no_DT one_NN developed_VBD the_DT disease_NN in_IN Camp_NNP ,_, unless_IN he_PRP had_VBD brought_VBN the_DT infection_NN on_IN him_PRP from_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
The_DT advantages_NNS of_IN leaving_VBG infected_JJ sites_NNS for_IN fresh_JJ ground_NN are_VBP too_RB well_RB known_VBN to_TO need_VB repetition_NN ._.
The_DT evacuation_NN of_IN blocks_NNS had_VBD no_DT appreciable_JJ effect_NN on_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN plague_NN when_WRB once_RB the_DT epidemic_NN had_VBD begun_VBN ,_, though_IN it_PRP may_MD be_VB reasonably_RB assumed_VBN that_IN it_PRP minimised_VBD the_DT mortality_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD probably_RB the_DT chief_JJ means_NNS of_IN stopping_VBG the_DT local_JJ outbreaks_NN among_IN the_DT Memons_NNPS in_IN November_NNP 1898_CD in_IN the_DT Rambagh_NNP Quarter_NNP and_CC in_IN the_DT Garden_NNP Quarter_NNP ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ yet_RB to_TO be_VB dis-_JJ covered_VBN what_WP law_NN governs_VBZ the_DT progress_NN of_IN infection_NN when_WRB once_RB an_DT epidemic_JJ begins_NNS ._.
While_IN it_PRP is_VBZ known_VBN that_IN houses_NNS when_WRB infected_VBN are_VBP most_RBS dangerous_JJ ,_, it_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB said_VBD that_IN the_DT interiors_NNS of_IN houses_NNS are_VBP the_DT only_JJ places_NNS where_WRB the_DT germ_NN is_VBZ found_VBN ._.
The_DT open_JJ country_NN in_IN the_DT immediate_JJ neighbourhood_NN of_IN Karchi_NNP is_VBZ peculiarly_RB suitable_JJ for_IN Camp_NNP sites_NNS within_IN reasonable_JJ distance_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
The_DT water-supply_NN is_VBZ fair_JJ ,_, though_RB ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT failure_NN of_IN the_DT rain_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD not_RB so_RB good_JJ this_DT year_NN as_IN last_JJ ._.
The_DT provision_NN of_IN huts_NNS entails_NNS considerable_JJ expense_NN to_TO the_DT poorer_JJR members_NNS of_IN the_DT com-_JJ munity_NN ,_, who_WP are_VBP ,_, however_RB ,_, often_RB generously_RB assisted_VBN by_IN the_DT wealthier_JJR members_NNS ._.
The_DT provision_NN of_IN materials_NNS for_IN the_DT indigent_NN formed_VBD a_DT large_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT expenditure_NN during_IN the_DT last_JJ plague_NN ._.
One_CD weak_JJ point_NN in_IN the_DT system_NN followed_VBD in_IN Karchi_NNP was_VBD that_IN infected_JJ articles_NNS were_VBD removed_VBN to_TO the_DT jungles_NNS without_IN hinderance_NN ,_, the_DT actual_JJ rubbish_NN and_CC infected_VBD bedding_VBG only_RB in_IN the_DT vacated_JJ houses_NNS being_VBG destroyed_VBN ._.
The_DT excellent_JJ results_NNS that_WDT have_VBP always_RB followed_VBN evacuation_NN ,_, coupled_VBN with_IN thorough_JJ disinfection_NN and_CC subsequent_JJ segregation_NN ,_, are_VBP well_RB known_VBN ._.
But_CC on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN the_DT rapid_JJ cessation_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT Camps_NNP point_NN to_TO a_DT comparatively_RB small_JJ risk_NN from_IN infected_VBN clothing_NN :_: the_DT benefit_NN of_IN wholesale_JJ disinfection_NN on_IN evacuation_NN ,_, even_RB if_IN it_PRP were_VBD feasible_JJ ,_, would_MD be_VB lessened_VBN by_IN the_DT daily_JJ return_NN to_TO work_VB in_IN the_DT infected_JJ locality_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT dislocation_NN of_IN business_NN which_WDT follows_VBZ absolute_NN segregation_NN and_CC the_DT comparatively_RB small_JJ risk_NN run_VBN by_IN working_VBG by_IN day_NN in_IN infected_JJ areas_NNS render_VBP it_PRP inadvisable_JJ to_TO attempt_VB to_TO carry_VB out_RP on_IN a_DT large_JJ scale_NN the_DT plan_NN followed_VBD with_IN such_JJ success_NN with_IN small_JJ numbers_NNS ._.
The_DT difficulty_NN of_IN preventing_VBG persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP vacated_VBN their_PRP$ houses_NNS for_IN Camp_NNP from_IN returning_VBG to_TO the_DT town_NN to_TO reside_VB in_IN other_JJ houses_NNS is_VBZ another_DT weak_JJ point_NN in_IN the_DT system_NN ._.
The_DT Police_NNP were_VBD warned_VBN which_WDT houses_NNS had_VBD been_VBN evacuated_VBN ,_, and_CC persons_NNS were_VBD detected_VBN at_IN times_NNS in_IN the_DT earlier_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ residing_NN in_IN them_PRP ._.
In_IN the_DT Nasarpuri_NNP and_CC Khatri_NNP Camps_NNP in_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT huts_NNS were_VBD all_DT numbered_VBN ,_, a_DT regular_JJ roll-call_NN was_VBD attempted_VBN ;_: but_CC such_PDT a_DT system_NN would_MD be_VB out_IN of_IN the_DT question_NN in_IN the_DT Voluntary_JJ Camp_NNP area-entailing_NN an_DT establishment_NN which_WDT would_MD be_VB very_RB expensive_JJ and_CC an_DT amount_NN of_IN interference_NN and_CC supervision_NN which_WDT would_MD be_VB much_RB resented_VBN ._.
The_DT danger_NN of_IN harbouring_VBG contacts_NNS and_CC of_IN living_NN in_IN infected_JJ premises_NNS are_VBP both_DT fairly_RB well_RB understood_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT good_JJ sense_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS is_VBZ the_DT best_JJS safeguard_NN against_IN an_DT abuse_NN of_IN the_DT freedom_NN enjoyed_VBN in_IN the_DT Voluntary_NNP Camp_NNP area_NN ._.
The_DT arrangements_NNS offered_VBN for_IN the_DT safe_JJ custody_NN of_IN valuables_NNS in_IN the_DT Police_NNP Strong_NNP Room_NNP when_WRB families_NNS removed_VBD to_TO Camp_NNP was_VBD not_RB taken_VBN advantage_NN of_IN to_TO any_DT extent_NN either_DT last_JJ year_NN or_CC this_DT year_NN ._.
Large_JJ quantities_NNS of_IN valuable_JJ orna-_JJ ments_NNS were_VBD kept_VBN in_IN the_DT mat_NN huts_VBZ in_IN the_DT Camps_NNP ,_, and_CC there_EX were_VBD not_RB many_JJ who_WP took_VBD the_DT precaution_NN even_RB of_IN burying_VBG them_PRP in_IN the_DT ground_NN ._.
One_CD or_CC two_CD serious_JJ thefts_NNS took_VBD place_NN in_IN consequence_NN ._.

Boundaries_NNS ._.
The_DT Shikrpur_NNP District_NNP ,_, lying_VBG in_IN the_DT extreme_JJ north_NN of_IN Sind_NNP ,_, is_VBZ bounded_VBN on_IN the_DT north_NN and_CC west_NN by_IN Baluchistn_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT east_NN by_IN the_DT Rjputna_NNP Agency_NNP ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT south_NN by_IN Karchi_NNP and_CC Hyderabad_NNP ._.
Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
The_DT climate_NN of_IN Shikrpur_NNP District_NNP is_VBZ hot_JJ and_CC dry_JJ ,_, with_IN a_DT remarkable_JJ absence_NN of_IN air-_JJ currents_NNS during_IN the_DT inundation_NN season_NN ;_: and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ ,_, in_IN consequence_NN ,_, very_RB trying_VBG to_TO a_DT European_JJ constitution_NN ._.
The_DT hot_JJ weather_NN commences_NNS in_IN April_NNP ,_, and_CC ends_VBZ in_IN October_NNP ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ generally_RB ushered_VBN in_IN by_IN violent_JJ dust-storms_NNS ;_: the_DT cold_NN season_NN begins_VBZ in_IN November_NNP ,_, and_CC lasts_NNS till_VBP March_NNP ._.
The_DT general_JJ aspect_NN of_IN Shikrpur_NNP District_NNP is_VBZ that_IN of_IN a_DT vast_JJ alluvial_JJ plain_NN ,_, broken_VBN only_RB by_IN low_JJ limestone_NN hills_NNS ,_, which_WDT tend_VBP to_TO preserve_VB a_DT permanent_JJ bank_NN for_IN the_DT Indus_NNP ._.
Towards_IN the_DT west_NN rises_VBZ the_DT Khirthar_NNP range_NN ,_, with_IN an_DT extreme_JJ elevation_NN of_IN upwards_NNS of_IN 7_CD ,_, 000_CD feet_NNS ,_, forming_VBG a_DT natural_JJ boundary_NN between_IN Shikrpur_NNP and_CC Baluchistn_NNP ._.
Large_JJ patches_NNS of_IN salt_NN land_NN ,_, known_VBN as_IN Kalar_NNP ,_, occur_VBP frequently_RB ,_, especially_RB in_IN the_DT upper_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP ;_: and_CC towards_VB the_DT Jacobabad_NNP frontier_NN ,_, barren_JJ tracts_NNS of_IN clay_NN ,_, and_CC ridges_NNS of_IN sand_NN hills_NNS covered_VBN with_IN caper_NN and_CC thorn_JJ jungle_NN ,_, constitute_VB a_DT distinctive_JJ feature_NN in_IN the_DT landscape_NN ._.
Previous_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT previous_JJ authentic_JJ record_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Shikr-_NNP pur_NN ,_, the_DT principal_JJ disease_NN being_VBG malarial_JJ fever_NN ._.
*_JJ Sukkur_NNP ._.
The_DT first_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Sukkur_NNP was_VBD reported_VBN by_IN Major_NNP W._NNP A._NN Corkery_NNP as_IN having_VBG occurred_VBN on_IN the_DT 12th_CD February_NNP ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT 25th_CD and_CC 26th_CD four_CD more_JJR cases_NNS were_VBD reported_VBN ._.
Lieut.-Colonel_NNP A._NN H._NNP Mayhew_NNP ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Shikrpur_NNP ,_, went_VBD to_TO Sukkur_NNP to_TO inaugurate_VB measures_NNS ,_, and_CC remained_VBD there_EX during_IN the_DT outbreak_NN ._.
Sukkur_NNP ,_, like_IN Karchi_NNP ,_, shows_VBZ no_DT imported_JJ cases_NNS ._.
The_DT same_JJ orders_NNS which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN issued_VBN to_TO the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Hyderabad_NNP were_VBD issued_VBN to_TO the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Sukkur_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT same_JJ steps_NNS taken_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT progress_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ remarkably_RB similar_JJ in_IN both_DT these_DT districts_NNS :_: -_: Week_NN ending_VBG HYDERABAD_NNP ._.

81_CD ?_. 334_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
X_NN ._.
Major_JJ R._NNP J._NNP Baker_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, was_VBD sent_VBN to_TO Sukkur_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN company_NN with_IN Major_JJ Corkery_NNP made_VBD a_DT thorough_JJ house-to-house_NN inspection_NN of_IN the_DT infected_JJ locality_NN ,_, reporting_VBG 2_CD cases_NNS in_IN the_DT Isolation_NNP Camp_NNP and_CC 1_CD in_IN the_DT Health_NNP Camp_NNP ._.
The_DT stringent_JJ removal_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN led_VBD to_TO the_DT flight_NN of_IN about_IN 10,000_CD people_NNS ,_, and_CC three-fourths_NNS of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN New_NNP Sukkur_NNP fled_VBD to_TO the_DT neighbouring_NN villages_NNS ._.
Messrs._NNS P._NNP R._NNP Cadell_NNP and_CC W._NNP H._NNP Lucas_NNP and_CC Major_NNP Baker_NNP (_( who_WP had_VBD been_VBN placed_VBN on_IN special_JJ inspection_NN duty_NN )_) all_DT arrived_VBN in_IN Sukkur_NNP about_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN March_NNP ;_: and_CC shortly_RB after_IN ,_, Lieutenant_NNP A._NNP E._NNP Beadon_NNP ,_, with_IN 30_CD men_NNS of_IN the_DT Wiltshire_NNP Regiment_NNP ,_, appeared_VBD on_IN the_DT scene_NN ._.
The_DT Acting_NNP Commissioner_NNP paid_VBD two_CD visits_NNS to_TO Shikrpur_NNP and_CC three_CD to_TO Sukkur_NNP during_IN the_DT outbreak_NN ._.
Gharibabad_NNP was_VBD the_DT worst_JJS infected_JJ corner_NN of_IN New_NNP Sukkur_NNP ,_, but_CC Mr._NNP Lucas_NNP removed_VBD the_DT whole_JJ population_NN of_IN the_DT quarter_NN (_( about_IN 600_CD )_) to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Camp_NNP on_IN the_DT 17th_CD April_NNP ,_, and_CC not_RB another_DT case_NN occurred_VBD ._.
The_DT disease_NN gradually_RB died_VBD down_RP during_IN April_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT last_JJ case_NN occurred_VBD on_IN the_DT 2nd_CD June_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Shikrpur_NNP ._.
Shikrpur_NNP escaped_VBD lightly_RB ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT able_JJ defence_NN of_IN Captains_NNP C._NNP J._NNP Milne_NNP and_CC E._NNP S._NNP Clark_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, warmly_RB supported_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, who_WP equipped_VBD two_CD large_JJ Plague_NNP Hospitals_NNP ._.
The_DT Government_NNP Plague_NNP Hospital_NNP received_VBD the_DT imported_VBN cases_NNS ._.
Large_JJ Camps_NNP were_VBD standing_VBG to_TO receive_VB the_DT population_NN of_IN any_DT area_NN that_WDT might_MD be_VB attacked_VBN ._.
The_DT railway_NN and_CC road_NN appoaches_NNS were_VBD carefully_RB guarded_VBN ,_, and_CC every_DT new-comer_JJ found_NN himself_PRP in_IN the_DT Observation_NNP Camp_NNP ._.
Rigid_JJ corpse-inspection_NN also_RB obtained_VBN ,_, and_CC deterred_VBD sick_JJ arrivals_NNS ._.
The_DT comparative_JJ immunity_NN of_IN Shikrpur_NNP is_VBZ undoubtedly_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT attitude_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS themselves_PRP ,_, led_VBN by_IN the_DT Judges_NNP ,_, Messrs._NNP Dayaram_NNP and_CC Tyabji_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT City_NNP Magistrate_NNP ,_, Ro_NNP Bahdur_NNP Choithram_NNP ._.
Rohri_NNP ._.
Rohri_NNP was_VBD also_RB badly_RB infected_VBN ._.
Mr._NNP Mountford_NNP ,_, I._NNP C._NNP S._NNP ,_, was_VBD in_IN charge_NN ,_, and_CC fought_VBD the_DT disease_NN with_IN energy_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD assisted_VBN by_IN Lieutenants_NNS Leith_NNP ,_, Hislop_NNP ,_, and_CC Bailey_NNP ,_, who_WP were_VBD indefatigable_JJ ._.
A_DT small_JJ steam_NN disinfector_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT bathing_NN shed_VBN attached_VBD ,_, was_VBD used_VBN ,_, and_CC larger_JJR ones_NNS at_IN Shikrpur_NNP and_CC Sukkur_NNP ._.
Other_JJ places_NNS ._.
Plague_NNP also_RB appeared_VBD in_IN the_DT following_JJ places_NNS ,_, but_CC did_VBD not_RB develop_VB into_IN a_DT serious_JJ epidemic_NN in_IN any_DT of_IN them_PRP :_: -Abad_NN ,_, Tluka_NNP Sukkur_NNP ;_: Thati_NNP ,_, Tluka_NNP Rohri_NNP ;_: Miani_NNP Baghat_NNP ,_, Tluka_NNP Rohri_NNP ;_: Tando_NNP Mir_NNP Muhammad_NNP Hasan_NNP ,_, Tluka_NNP Rohri_NNP ;_: Larkhna_NNP (_( imported_VBN cases_NNS only_RB )_) ;_: Khairpur_NNP Dahirki_NNP ,_, Tluka_NNP Ubauro_NNP ;_: and_CC a_DT few_JJ others_NNS The_DT Thar_NNP and_CC Prkar_NNP Districts_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Upper_NNP Sind_NNP Frontier_NNP ,_, escaped_VBD practically_RB scot-free_JJ with_IN 3_CD cases-2_JJ deaths_NNS ,_, and_CC 4_CD cases-3_JJ deaths_NNS ,_, respectively_RB :_: all_DT ,_, except_IN one_CD ,_, imported_VBN ._.

Boundaries_NNS ._.
Cutch_NNP State_NNP is_VBZ bounded_VBN on_IN the_DT north_JJ and_CC north-west_JJ by_IN the_DT Province_NNP of_IN Sind_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT east_NN by_IN Planpur_NNP State_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT south_NN by_IN Kthiwr_NNP State_NNP and_CC the_DT Gulf_NNP of_IN Cutch_NNP ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN and_CC south-west_JJ by_IN the_DT Indian_JJ Ocean_NNP ._.
The_DT climate_NN is_VBZ mild_JJ and_CC agreeable_JJ ,_, except_IN during_IN May_NNP and_CC June_NNP ,_, when_WRB a_DT burning_NN wind_NN and_CC dust-storms_JJ prevail_NN ._.
[_JJ Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT permanent_JJ river_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN the_DT rains_NNS streams_NNS of_IN considerable_JJ size_NN flow_NN from_IN the_DT central_JJ hill_NN ranges_VBZ northwards_NNS to_TO the_DT Rann_NNP and_CC southwards_NNS to_TO the_DT Gulf_NNP of_IN Cutch_NNP ._.
At_IN other_JJ times_NNS a_DT succession_NN of_IN pools_NNS marks_NNS the_DT courses_NNS of_IN these_DT streams_NNS ._.
The_DT subsoil_NN is_VBZ rocky_JJ ;_: the_DT upper_JJ soil_NN porous_JJ ,_, which_WDT makes_VBZ the_DT storage_NN of_IN water_NN in_IN ponds_NNS and_CC reservoirs_NNS difficult_JJ ;_: but_CC at_IN no_DT great_JJ depth_NN from_IN the_DT surface_NN ,_, water_NN abounds_NNS ;_: and_CC excellent_JJ wells_NNS are_VBP consequently_RB numerous_JJ ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT railway_NN communication_NN ;_: there_EX is_VBZ a_DT sea_NN route_NN to_TO and_CC from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC land_NN routes_NNS to_TO and_CC from_IN Sind_NNP and_CC Kthiwr_NNP ._.
Previous_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.
Epidemics_NNS of_IN plague_NN occurred_VBD formerly_RB in_IN Cutch_NNP in_IN 1812_CD and_CC in_IN 1815_CD ._.
In_IN 1812_CD Cutch_NNP was_VBD visited_VBN by_IN a_DT pestilence_NN of_IN such_JJ severity_NN that_WDT half_PDT the_DT population_NN is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO have_VB perished_VBN ._.
In_IN 1815_CD ,_, the_DT year_NN of_IN the_DT heaviest_JJS known_VBN rainfall_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD again_RB visited_VBN ;_: East_NNP Cutch_NNP (_( Wgad_NNP )_) being_VBG attacked_VBN and_CC suffering_VBG severely_RB ._.
In_IN 1878_CD ,_, the_DT year_NN of_IN the_DT heaviest_JJS rainfall_NN since_IN 1815_CD ,_, a_DT virulent_JJ type_NN of_IN fever_NN appeared_VBN in_IN every_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT province_NN ._.
About_IN 100,000_CD were_VBD attacked_VBN ,_, of_IN whom_WP 12,500_CD died_VBD ._.
*_JJ Cutch_NNP State_NNP ._.
Population-558,415_NNP ._.
First_RB Epidemic.-The_NNP date_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Cutch_NNP was_VBD the_DT 3rd_CD October_NNP 1896_CD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD imported_VBN from_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
From_IN this_DT date_NN to_TO the_DT 28th_CD of_IN February_NNP 1897_CD ,_, 47_CD imported_VBN cases_NNS (_( 25_CD fatal_NN )_) were_VBD reported_VBN ._.
Indigenous_JJ plague_NN appeared_VBD on_IN the_DT 4th_CD January_NNP 1897_CD ;_: and_CC from_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN February_NNP 1897_CD plague_NN was_VBD epidemic_JJ ._.
Mndvi_NNP Town_NNP (_( population_NN ,_, 38,155_CD )_) suffered_VBD very_RB severely_RB ,_, with_IN 4,359_CD cases-3,853_JJ deaths_NNS up_IN to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN August_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT Agency_NNP reporting_VBG 840_CD cases-641_JJ deaths_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT figures_NNS are_VBP unreliable_JJ and_CC can_MD be_VB taken_VBN as_IN approximate_JJ only_RB ._.
Plague_NN appeared_VBD at_IN 24_CD places_NNS in_IN all_DT ._.
Second_JJ Epidemic.-Plague_NNP did_VBD not_RB cease_VB during_IN 1897_CD in_IN the_DT State_NNP ,_, but_CC only_RB three_CD places_NNS were_VBD infected_VBN at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN July_NNP in_IN that_DT year_NN ,_, besides_IN Mndvi_NNP ,_, in_IN which_WDT plague_NN was_VBD rapidly_RB dying_VBG out_RP ._.
The_DT second_JJ epidemic_NN may_MD be_VB said_VBD to_TO have_VB begun_VBN at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN September_NNP 1897_CD ,_, when_WRB Mundra_NNP Town_NNP was_VBD attacked_VBN and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN infected_JJ places_NNS in_IN the_DT State_NNP rose_VBD to_TO 13_CD ._.
Mundra_NNP Town_NNP ._.
Population-10,433_NNP ._.
Mundra_NNP Town_NNP remained_VBD practically_RB free_JJ during_IN the_DT first_JJ epidemic_NN ,_, some_DT 43_CD cases_NNS in_IN all_DT being_VBG reported_VBN between_IN February_NNP and_CC June_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Of_IN these_DT the_DT large_JJ majority_NN were_VBD imported_VBN ._.
During_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 27th_CD August_NNP 1897_CD ,_, 6_CD cases-4_JJ deaths_NNS occurred_VBD ,_, and_CC a_DT moderate_JJ *_NNP Bombay_NNP Gazetteer_NNP ,_, Vol_NNP ._.

XI_NN ._.
epidemic_RB now_RB took_VBD place_NN ,_, reaching_VBG a_DT climax_NN of_IN 53_CD cases-46_JJ deaths_NNS during_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 29th_CD October_NNP ,_, and_CC dying_VBG out_RP towards_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN December_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT totals_NNS being_VBG 487_CD cases_NNS and_CC 362_CD deaths_NNS ._.
With_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN an_DT imported_JJ case_NN on_IN the_DT 28th_CD March_NNP ,_, Mundra_NNP remained_VBD free_JJ during_IN the_DT year_NN 1898_CD ._.
The_DT preventive_JJ measures_NNS adopted_VBN in_IN Cutch_NNP at_IN this_DT time_NN may_MD be_VB mentioned_VBN here_RB ._.
They_PRP were_VBD chiefly_VBP the_DT closing_NN of_IN all_DT ports_NNS in_IN Cutch_NNP ,_, except_IN Mndvi_NNP and_CC Khari_NNP Rohar_NNP ,_, the_DT latter_NN being_VBG also_RB the_DT point_NN of_IN entry_NN by_IN land_NN route_NN from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, Gujarat_NNP ,_, and_CC Kthiwr_NNP ;_: and_CC the_DT placing_VBG under_IN observation_NN for_IN 10_CD days_NNS of_IN all_DT arrivals_NNS at_IN these_DT ports_NNS ,_, except_IN those_DT from_IN Karchi_NNP ,_, who_WP underwent_JJ observation_NN before_IN leaving_VBG that_DT port_NN ,_, and_CC were_VBD therefore_RB admitted_VBN into_IN the_DT town_NN after_IN being_VBG medically_RB examined_VBN and_CC disinfected_VBN ._.
Four_CD camps_NNS were_VBD built_VBN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN at_IN Mndvi_NNP Bandar_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT fifth_NN was_VBD added_VBN for_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN those_DT who_WP might_MD develop_VB suspicious_JJ symptoms_NNS ._.
An_DT additionl_NN camp_NN for_IN Mahomedans_NNP was_VBD erected_VBN at_IN a_DT distance_NN of_IN a_DT mile_NN from_IN the_DT Bandar_NNP ._.
The_DT camps_NNS were_VBD opened_VBN on_IN the_DT 7th_CD October_NNP 1897_CD and_CC closed_VBD on_IN 22nd_CD July_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC during_IN this_DT period_NN 15,958_CD people_NNS were_VBD detained_VBN ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS found_VBN among_IN them_PRP being_VBG 22-of_JJ which_WDT 19_CD proved_VBD fatal-all_JJ amongst_IN the_DT Hindus_NNP from_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
The_DT system_NN of_IN observation_NN and_CC disinfection_NN was_VBD thorough_JJ ,_, and_CC a_DT roll_NN was_VBD called_VBN daily_RB and_CC the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN the_DT camps_NNS medically_RB examined_VBD twice_RB a_DT day_NN ._.
The_DT arrangements_NNS at_IN Khari_NNP Rohar_NNP were_VBD similar_JJ though_IN on_IN a_DT smaller_JJR scale_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD also_RB an_DT observation_NN camp_NN at_IN Mundra_NNP ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT spread_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Cutch_NNP generally_RB ,_, Major_NNP G._NNP E._NNP Hyde-Cates_NNP ,_, the_DT Political_NNP Agent_NNP ,_, is_VBZ of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT infection_NN was_VBD chiefly_JJ due_JJ to_TO Mndvi_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO Mndvi_NNP also_RB he_PRP attributes_VBZ the_DT infection_NN of_IN Mundra_NNP :_: -_: ``_`` The_DT spread_NN of_IN plague_NN was_VBD undoubtedly_RB in_IN the_DT first_JJ instance_NN carried_VBN by_IN persons_NNS leaving_VBG Mndvi_NNP ._.
Maska_NNP and_CC Gundiali_NNP were_VBD the_DT first_JJ infected_VBN ,_, the_DT first_JJ village_NN being_VBG only_RB a_DT mile_NN from_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT second_JJ six_CD miles_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT intercourse_NN between_IN this_DT village_NN and_CC Mndvi_NNP is_VBZ considerable_JJ ._.
Godhra_NNP ,_, 8_CD miles_NNS ,_, and_CC Bada_NNP ,_, 14_CD miles_NNS ,_, were_VBD also_RB probably_RB infected_VBN from_IN Mndvi_NNP ;_: while_IN the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ known_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN carried_VBN to_TO Mahpur_NNP by_IN personal_JJ infection_NN from_IN Mndvi_NNP ._.
``_`` At_IN the_DT time_NN the_DT first_JJ villages_NNS were_VBD attacked_VBN ,_, the_DT plague_NN in_IN Mndvi_NNP was_VBD at_IN its_PRP$ height_NN ,_, and_CC sufficient_JJ attention_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB paid_VBN to_TO them_PRP ,_, so_RB that_IN they_PRP ,_, in_IN their_PRP$ turn_NN ,_, infected_VBD other_JJ villages_NNS ._.
Fortunately_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN some_DT ,_, the_DT disease_NN stopped_VBD after_IN a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS ._.
``_`` In_IN the_DT Mundra_NNP District_NNP there_EX is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN that_IN Mundra_NNP itself_PRP was_VBD infected_VBN from_IN Mndvi_NNP ,_, although_IN Kapaya_NNP ,_, a_DT village_NN 3_CD miles_NNS from_IN Mundra_NNP ,_, was_VBD infected_VBN a_DT month_NN earlier_RB by_IN persons_NNS from_IN Mndvi_NNP ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT severe_JJ epidemic_NN in_IN Mndvi_NNP ,_, numbers_NNS of_IN people_NNS were_VBD flying_VBG all_DT over_IN the_DT place_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD could_MD only_RB trust_VB to_TO the_DT Wahiwatdr_NNP of_IN Mundra_NNP and_CC the_DT Dhrs_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT villages_NNS to_TO carry_VB out_RP the_DT orders_NNS for_IN placing_VBG persons_NNS from_IN Mndvi_NNP or_CC any_DT infected_JJ place_NN in_IN ten_JJ days_NNS '_POS quarantine_NN outside_IN the_DT villages_NNS ._.
These_DT orders_NNS were_VBD not_RB stringently_RB carried_VBN out_RP in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Mundra_NNP ,_, and_CC and_CC any_DT well-to-do_JJ person_NN found_VBD no_DT difficulty_NN in_IN getting_VBG into_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
The_DT plague_NN being_VBG an_DT altogether_RB new_JJ experience_NN ,_, the_DT headmen_NNS of_IN the_DT towns_NNS and_CC villages_NNS could_MD not_RB be_VB brought_VBN to_TO see_VB the_DT importance_NN of_IN forcibly_RB keeping_VBG out_RP in_IN infected_JJ people_NNS nor_CC was_VBD their_PRP$ disobedience_NN of_IN orders_NNS properly_RB dealt_NN with_IN by_IN the_DT Darbr_NNP at_IN that_DT time_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ quite_RB possible_JJ and_CC probable_JJ that_IN Mundra_NNP had_VBD several_JJ indigenous_JJ cases_NNS before_IN it_PRP was_VBD reported_VBN as_IN an_DT infected_JJ town_NN ._. ''_''
Room_NN was_VBD found_VBN in_IN some_DT pakka_JJ buildings_NNS in_IN an_DT enclosure_NN for_IN five_CD good_JJ caste_NN hospitals_NNS ,_, and_CC another_DT building_NN was_VBD set_VBN apart_RB as_IN a_DT segregation_NN hospital_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Damania_NNP superintended_VBD these_DT and_CC all_DT other_JJ plague_NN measures_NNS in_IN Mundra_NNP ,_, assisted_VBN by_IN Captain_NNP W._NNP S._NNP P._NNP Ricketts_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, 17th_CD Bombay_NNP Infantry_NNP ,_, who_WP performed_VBD plague_JJ duties_NNS in_IN addition_NN to_TO his_PRP$ own_JJ ;_: Captain_NNP H._NNP D._NNP Mason_NNP ,_, R._NNP A._NNP M._NNP C._NNP ,_, came_VBD to_TO Mundra_NNP when_WRB the_DT latter_NN fell_VBD ill_RB ;_: and_CC later_RB ,_, when_WRB Captain_NNP Mason_NNP left_VBD Mundra_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP Karanja_NNP was_VBD left_VBN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS ._.

Mndvi_NNP Town_NNP and_CC Salaya_NNP ._.
Population-38,155_NNP ._.
The_DT rise_NN and_CC progress_NN of_IN the_DT second_JJ epidemic_NN in_IN Mndvi_NNP are_VBP thus_RB described_VBN by_IN Major_JJ Hyde-Cates_NNS :_: -_: ``_`` Towards_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN December_NNP 1897_CD and_CC beginning_VBG of_IN January_NNP 1898_CD ,_, 3_CD or_CC 4_CD cases_NNS occurred_VBD amongst_IN the_DT Meghwals_NNP living_NN outside_IN the_DT Sonwlla_NNP Gate_NNP of_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
In_IN each_DT case_NN the_DT house_NN or_CC hut_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT case_NN occurred_VBD was_VBD burnt_VBN down_RB and_CC the_DT contacts_NNS segre-_JJ gated_VBN ._.
Finally_RB this_DT colony_NN of_IN Meghwals_NNS ,_, being_VBG a_DT standing_NN danger_NN ,_, was_VBD removed_VBN to_TO a_DT site_NN about_IN a_DT mile_NN from_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, where_WRB they_PRP were_VBD given_VBN assistance_NN in_IN building_NN huts_NNS for_IN themselves_PRP on_IN a_DT systematic_JJ plan_NN ._.
``_`` On_IN the_DT 23rd_CD February_NNP a_DT case_NN occurred_VBD amongst_IN the_DT Mahomedans_NNPS living_NN in_IN houses_NNS adjoining_VBG the_DT old_JJ Meghwal_NNP quarters_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT block_NN of_IN houses_NNS containing_VBG some_DT 80_CD people_NNS was_VBD evacuated_VBN and_CC the_DT persons_NNS segregated_VBD for_IN 20_CD days_NNS ._.
No_DT further_JJ case_NN occurred_VBD amongst_IN them_PRP ._.
``_`` It_PRP was_VBD not_RB till_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN March_NNP that_IN indigenous_JJ cases_NNS began_VBD to_TO appear_VB with_IN any_DT regularity_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB only_RB 1_CD or_CC 2_CD a_DT day_NN ,_, but_CC during_IN the_DT period_NN January_NNP 16th_CD to_TO April_NNP 7th_CD there_EX had_VBD been_VBN 25_CD imported_VBN cases_NNS with_IN 15_CD deaths_NNS ._.
All_PDT these_DT cases_NNS were_VBD from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT observation_NN camps_NNS ._.
``_`` During_IN January_NNP ,_, there_EX had_VBD been_VBN only_RB 3_CD or_CC 4_CD indigenous_JJ cases_NNS amongst_VBP the_DT Meghwals_NNS as_IN reported_VBN above_IN ;_: during_IN February_NNP ,_, there_EX was_VBD only_RB 1_CD indigenous_JJ case_NN ;_: and_CC during_IN March_NNP 8_CD cases_NNS with_IN 8_CD deaths_NNS ._.
During_IN April_NNP cases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN ones_NNS and_CC twos_NN till_VBP the_DT 30th_JJ April_NNP brought_VBD 4_CD cases_NNS ,_, the_DT total_NN for_IN that_DT month_NN being_VBG 20_CD cases_NNS and_CC 15_CD deaths_NNS ._.
May_NNP saw_VBD the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT recrudescence_NN in_IN earnest_NN ,_, and_CC during_IN the_DT week_NN April_NNP 30th_CD to_TO May_NNP 6th_CD ,_, cases_NNS went_VBD up_RP with_IN a_DT bound_NN from_IN 6_CD cases_NNS and_CC 2_CD deaths_NNS the_DT preceding_VBG week_NN to_TO 44_CD cases_NNS and_CC 32_CD deaths_NNS ._.
The_DT second_JJ week_NN in_IN May_NNP showed_VBD 42_CD cases_NNS and_CC 29_CD deaths_NNS ,_, the_DT third_JJ 64_CD cases_NNS and_CC 36_CD deaths_NNS ,_, the_DT fourth_JJ week_NN 81_CD -63_NN and_CC 33_CD cases_NNS and_CC 23_CD deaths_NNS for_IN the_DT remaining_VBG period_NN of_IN May_NNP 28th_CD to_TO 31st_CD ._.
Up_RB to_TO date_NN of_IN writing_NN (_( 20th_CD August_NNP 1898_CD )_) ,_, May_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT worst_JJS month_NN ,_, the_DT total_JJ cases_NNS during_IN this_DT month_NN going_VBG up_RB to_TO 260_CD cases-179_JJ deaths_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT grand_JJ total_NN from_IN the_DT start_NN of_IN the_DT recrudescence_NN ,_, which_WDT may_MD be_VB put_VBN down_RP as_IN the_DT 10th_CD March_NNP last_JJ to_TO 31st_CD May_NNP ,_, amounts_VBZ to_TO 288_CD cases_NNS and_CC 202_CD deaths_NNS ._. ''_''
Indigenous_NNP plague_NN began_VBD with_IN cases_NNS amongst_VBP the_DT Salts_NNP ._.
This_DT caste_NN lives_VBZ in_IN the_DT Nvapura_NNP quarter_NN of_IN the_DT town-a_JJ dirty_NN ,_, crowded_VBN and_CC insanitary_JJ locality_NN inside_IN the_DT fort_NN ._.
Throughout_IN the_DT previous_JJ epidemic_NN this_DT caste_NN had_VBD enjoyed_VBN immunity_NN from_IN the_DT disease_NN while_IN the_DT Khatris_NNP had_VBD suffered_VBN ._.
On_IN this_DT occasion_NN the_DT Khatris_NNP were_VBD comparatively_RB free_JJ ,_, while_IN the_DT Salts_NNP suffered_VBD ._.
The_DT disease_NN in_IN this_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD much_RB less_JJR severe_JJ :_: and_CC Major_JJ Hyde-Cates_NNS attributes_VBZ this_DT decrease_NN in_IN virulence_NN to_TO the_DT check_NN placed_VBD on_IN it_PRP by_IN the_DT following_JJ measures_NNS :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) Evacuation_NN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Death_NNP registration_NN and_CC death_NN certificates_NNS ._.
(_( c_NN )_) Segregation_NN of_IN whole_JJ blocks_NNS round_VBD the_DT infected_JJ houses_NNS ._.
(_( d_NN )_) Removal_NN of_IN the_DT tiles_NNS some_DT time_NN previous_JJ to_TO recrudescence_VB ._.
On_IN the_DT operation_NN of_IN these_DT measures_NNS ,_, Major_NNP Hyde-Cates_NNP makes_VBZ the_DT following_JJ remarks_NNS :_: -_: ``_`` (_( a_DT )_) First_NNP and_CC foremost_RB ,_, evacuating_VBG the_DT town_NN ._.
So_RB far_RB back_RB as_IN February_NNP 1898_CD ,_, the_DT Darbr_NNP Chief_NNP Plague_NNP Officer_NNP called_VBD a_DT meeting_NN of_IN the_DT headmen_NNS of_IN the_DT castes_NNS ,_, at_IN which_WDT Dr._NNP Mason_NNP and_CC myself_PRP were_VBD present_JJ ,_, and_CC we_PRP pointed_VBD out_RP to_TO them_PRP the_DT advantages_NNS of_IN turning_VBG out_RP and_CC the_DT serious_JJ consequent_NN which_WDT would_MD probably_RB ensue_VB if_IN they_PRP neglected_VBD the_DT advice_NN and_CC did_VBD not_RB get_VB their_PRP$ caste_NN people_NNS to_TO go_VB out_RP ._.
Some_DT went_VBD out_RP soon_RB after_IN this_DT ,_, but_CC we_PRP had_VBD to_TO have_VB one_CD or_CC two_CD subsequent_JJ meetings_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD not_RB till_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN April_NNP ,_, when_WRB cases_NNS had_VBD been_VBN occurring_VBG daily_RB during_IN the_DT month_NN ,_, that_IN any_DT appreciable_JJ difference_NN could_MD be_VB noticed_VBN in_IN the_DT numbers_NNS in_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT cases_NNS rose_VBD suddenly_RB to_TO 44_CD in_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN in_IN May_NNP ,_, the_DT people_NNS began_VBD to_TO turn_VB out_RP in_IN ?_. 340_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
XI_NN ._.
large_JJ numbers_NNS ,_, and_CC by_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN May_NNP there_EX could_MD not_RB have_VB been_VBN more_JJR than_IN 4,000_CD to_TO 5,000_CD people_NNS left_VBN in_IN the_DT town_NN out_IN of_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN between_IN 35,000_CD and_CC 40,000_CD ._.
The_DT majority_NN remaining_VBG in_IN were_VBD weavers_NNS who_WP have_VBP their_PRP$ looms_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS and_CC the_DT Mahomedans_NNPS of_IN all_DT classes_NNS ._.

1,200_CD amongst_VBZ the_DT poorest_JJS of_IN them_PRP ._.
No_DT sooner_NN ,_, how-_JJ ever_RB ,_, had_VBD we_PRP got_VBD some_DT of_IN the_DT Mahomedans_NNPS out_RP than_IN a_DT heavy_JJ storm_NN came_VBD on_IN ,_, and_CC they_PRP at_IN once_RB bolted_VBN back_RB to_TO their_PRP$ houses_NNS ,_, with_IN the_DT result_NN that_WDT latterly_VBZ the_DT Mahomedan_NNP quarter_NN was_VBD attacked_VBN and_CC they_PRP kept_VBD the_DT plague_NN going_VBG ._.
``_`` (_( b_NN )_) In_IN January_NNP ,_, at_IN my_PRP$ suggestion_NN ,_, a_DT notice_NN was_VBD issued_VBN that_IN no_DT dead_JJ body_NN would_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO be_VB disposed_VBN of_IN until_IN a_DT certificate_NN of_IN death_NN had_VBD been_VBN givien_VBN ,_, and_CC Police_NNP and_CC Karkuns_NNP were_VBD stationed_VBN at_IN the_DT gates_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN and_CC the_DT burial_NN and_CC burning_VBG grounds_NNS to_TO see_VB that_IN no_DT body_NN was_VBD disposed_VBN of_IN ,_, except_IN on_IN production_NN of_IN the_DT certificate_NN ._.
The_DT people_NNS were_VBD at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN informed_VBN that_IN if_IN any_DT sickness_NN was_VBD reported_VBN and_CC the_DT person_NN seen_VBN by_IN the_DT doctor_NN before_IN death_NN ,_, an_DT examination_NN of_IN the_DT corpse_NN would_MD not_RB be_VB made_VBN and_CC the_DT necessary_JJ certificate_NN given_VBN without_IN further_JJ trouble_NN ._.
The_DT work_NN of_IN examining_VBG sick_JJ persons_NNS and_CC granting_NN of_IN certificates_NNS was_VBD placed_VBN in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN a_DT well-qualified_JJ and_CC trustworthy_JJ Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT scheme_NN worked_VBD admirably_RB ,_, particularly_RB in_IN the_DT beginning_NN ._.
By_IN this_DT means_VBZ cases_NNS were_VBD at_IN once_RB detected_VBN after_IN being_VBG only_RB a_DT short_JJ time_NN sick_JJ and_CC taken_VBN to_TO hospital_VB ,_, and_CC prompt_JJ measures_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN with_IN the_DT infected_JJ house_NN and_CC those_DT adjoining_VBG it._JJ ``_``
(_( c_NN )_) Segregation_NN of_IN whole_JJ blocks.-This_NN could_MD only_RB be_VB done_VBN as_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT plague_NN was_VBD kept_VBN within_IN reasonable_JJ limits_NNS ,_, as_IN otherwise_RB a_DT very_RB large_JJ segregation_NN camp_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN necessary_JJ ._.
Later_RB on_IN ,_, when_WRB the_DT cases_NNS increased_VBD during_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN in_IN May_NNP ,_, only_RB one_CD or_CC two_CD houses_NNS on_IN either_DT side_NN of_IN the_DT infected_JJ house_NN were_VBD treated_VBN in_IN the_DT above_JJ manner_NN when_WRB found_NN occupied_VBD ;_: but_CC as_IN the_DT people_NNS turned_VBD out_RP in_IN earnest_NN ,_, the_DT houses_NNS were_VBD frequently_RB found_VBN unoccu-_JJ pied_NNS ,_, the_DT residents_NNS having_VBG gone_VBN to_TO live_VB in_IN the_DT Wadis_NNP ._.
The_DT segregation_NN camp_NN for_IN the_DT persons_NNS turned_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT houses_NNS surrounding_VBG an_DT infected_JJ house_NN was_VBD established_VBN on_IN a_DT maidan_NN about_IN 3/4_CD mile_NN from_IN the_DT town_NN and_CC across_IN the_DT river_NN ._.
The_DT camp_NN was_VBD in_IN charge_NN of_IN a_DT guard_NN of_IN the_DT 1st_CD Bombay_NNP Grenadiers_NNP ._.
The_DT people_NNS were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO go_VB to_TO their_PRP$ work_NN during_IN the_DT day_NN ,_, except_IN the_DT actual_JJ contacts_NNS ,_, who_WP were_VBD kept_VBN separate_JJ from_IN the_DT rest_NN ._.
These_DT latter_JJR were_VBD kept_VBN in_IN strict_JJ segregation_NN for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS and_CC then_RB allowed_VBD to_TO go_VB to_TO work_VB for_IN the_DT remainder_NN of_IN the_DT segregation_NN period_NN ,_, which_WDT at_IN first_NN was_VBD fixed_VBN at_IN twenty_NN days_NNS ,_, but_CC latterly_RB ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT numbers_NNS coming_VBG in_IN ,_, the_DT period_NN was_VBD reduced_VBN to_TO ten_VB days_NNS ._.
The_DT poorest_JJS classes_NNS and_CC those_DT whose_WP$ work_NN was_VBD in_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS were_VBD fed_VBN by_IN the_DT Darbr_NNP ._.
``_`` (_( d_NN )_) Removal_NN of_IN tiles.-As_NN to_TO how_WRB far_RB the_DT removal_NN of_IN tiles_NNS from_IN a_DT house_NN before_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN recrudescence_NN arrived_VBN really_RB does_VBZ good_JJ ,_, I_PRP am_VBP not_RB in_IN a_DT position_NN to_TO say_VB with_IN any_DT reliability_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP give_VBP the_DT facts_NNS gleaned_VBN for_IN what_WP they_PRP are_VBP worth_JJ ._.
Of_IN course_NN ,_, this_DT measure_NN can_MD only_RB be_VB beneficial_JJ in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN basement_NN houses_NNS ._.
It_PRP occurred_VBD to_TO me_PRP last_JJ January_NNP that_IN if_IN a_DT recru-_JJ descence_NN was_VBD to_TO be_VB expected_VBN about_IN March_NNP or_CC April_NNP ,_, the_DT removal_NN of_IN a_DT good_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT tiles_NNS from_IN houses_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Mndvi_NNP and_CC suburb_NN of_IN Salaya_NNP ,_, thereby_RB letting_VBG in_IN sun_NN and_CC air_NN to_TO the_DT interior_NN ,_, might_MD do_VB good_JJ ,_, and_CC certainly_RB could_MD do_VB no_DT harm_NN ._.
This_DT was_VBD done_VBN in_IN Mndvi_NNP and_CC Salaya_NNP about_IN January_NNP last_JJ ,_, but_CC was_VBD not_RB done_VBN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT houses_NNS outside_IN the_DT city_NN walls_NNS ,_, where_WRB a_DT population_NN of_IN some_DT 6,000_CD persons_NNS reside_NN for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN in_IN basement_NN houses_NNS ._.
Salaya_NNP contains_VBZ a_DT population_NN of_IN about_IN 4,000_CD persons_NNS ,_, chiefly_VBP fishermen_NNS and_CC sailors_NNS ,_, all_DT living_NN in_IN basement_NN houses_NNS ._.
Last_JJ year_NN this_DT suburb_NN of_IN Mndvi_NNP was_VBD reeking_VBG with_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC though_IN the_DT death-rate_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB accurately_RB stated_VBN owing_VBG to_TO its_PRP$ having_VBG been_VBN incorporated_VBN with_IN Mndvi_NNP ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS amounted_VBN to_TO certainly_RB 1,000_CD ._.

Kthiwr_NNP is_VBZ a_DT square_JJ peninsula_NN ,_, standing_VBG boldly_RB out_IN into_IN the_DT Arabian_NNP Sea_NNP ,_, between_IN the_DT smaller_JJR projection_NN of_IN Cutch_NNP and_CC the_DT straight_JJ line_NN of_IN the_DT Gujart_NNP coast_NN ._.
Its_PRP$ physical_JJ features_NNS suggest_VBP that_IN it_PRP may_MD once_RB have_VB been_VBN an_DT island_NN or_CC a_DT group_NN of_IN islands_NNS of_IN volcanic_JJ origin_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ bounded_VBN on_IN the_DT north-_JJ west_NN by_IN the_DT Gulf_NNP of_IN Cutch_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT east_NN by_IN the_DT Gulf_NNP of_IN Cambay_NNP ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT south_JJ and_CC south-_JJ west_NN by_IN the_DT Arabian_NNP Sea_NNP ._.
Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
Half-way_NNP along_IN its_PRP$ northern_JJ border_NN stretches_VBZ a_DT flat_JJ desert_NN called_VBD the_DT Rann_NNP ,_, which_WDT in_IN the_DT rainy_NN season_NN becomes_VBZ a_DT shallow_JJ lake_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT dry_JJ season_NN is_VBZ bare_NN of_IN vegetation_NN and_CC studded_VBD with_IN deposits_NNS of_IN salt_NN ._.
The_DT climate_NN of_IN the_DT Peninsula_NNP is_VBZ ,_, in_IN general_JJ ,_, pleasant_JJ and_CC healthy_JJ ._.
January_NNP ,_, February_NNP ,_, and_CC March_NNP are_VBP marked_VBN by_IN heavy_JJ dews_NNS and_CC thick_JJ fogs_NNS ._.
The_DT hot_JJ weather_NN months_NNS (_( April_NNP to_TO June_NNP )_) are_VBP the_DT healthiest_NN in_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
In_IN September_NNP and_CC October_NNP the_DT heat_NN of_IN the_DT sun_NN is_VBZ acutely_RB felt_JJ ,_, though_IN the_DT weather_NN is_VBZ cloudy_VBN ._.
The_DT west_NN Gohilvd_NNP and_CC Hlr_NNP is_VBZ perhaps_RB the_DT pleasantest_NN and_CC healthiest_JJS part_NN of_IN the_DT province_NN ._.
The_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN the_DT Rann_NNP ,_, though_IN hot_JJ and_CC dry_JJ ,_, is_VBZ nob_JJ specially_RB sickly_RB ,_, the_DT people_NNS being_VBG healthy_JJ ,_, stout_NN ,_, and_CC good-looking_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT stagnant_JJ water_NN and_CC excessive_JJ vegetation_NN of_IN the_DT Nl_NNP make_VBP it_PRP very_RB unhealthy_JJ ._.
The_DT soils_NNS of_IN Kthiwr_NNP may_MD be_VB classed_VBN under_IN two_CD main_JJ heads_NNS ,_, -black_NN and_CC red_JJ ,_, the_DT red_JJ being_VBG considered_VBN slightly_RB less_RBR valuable_JJ than_IN the_DT black_JJ ._.
In_IN this_DT District_NNP streams_NN abound_NN ,_, ponds_NNS and_CC wells_NNS are_VBP fairly_RB numerous_JJ ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ much_JJ variety_NN in_IN the_DT texture_NN ,_, quality_NN and_CC depth_NN of_IN the_DT soil_NN ._.
Previous_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.
Ktchiwr_NNP suffered_VBD much_RB from_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, which_WDT attacked_VBD one_CD or_CC other_JJ part_NN of_IN Gujarat_NNP ,_, Kthiwr_NNP ,_, and_CC Cutch_NNP for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN ten_JJ years_NNS between_IN 1812_CD and_CC 1821_CD ._.
This_DT plague_NN followed_VBD the_DT famine_NN of_IN 1811_CD and_CC 1812_CD ._.
*_NN In_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN 1897_CD ,_, Kthiwr_NNP was_VBD again_RB visited_VBN with_IN this_DT great_JJ scourge_NN ._.
Kthiwr_NNP ._.
Population-2,752,404_NNP ._.
First_RB Epidemic.-Plague_NNP began_VBD in_IN Kthiwr_NNP with_IN two_CD indigenous_JJ cases_NNS on_IN 7th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD at_IN Wadhwn_NNP Civil_NNP Station_NNP ._.
During_IN the_DT following_JJ week_NN cases_NNS occurred_VBD at_IN Jodia_NNP on_IN the_DT 13th_JJ February_NNP and_CC 18th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Quarantine_NN camps_NNS were_VBD at_IN once_RB established_VBN and_CC evacuation_NN of_IN infected_JJ and_CC adjoining_VBG houses_NNS begun_VBN ._.
The_DT former_JJ were_VBD established_VBN at_IN Bhvnagar_NNP ,_, Verval_NNP ,_, Perbandar_NNP ,_, and_CC Jodia_NNP ._.

Second_JJ Epidemic.-For_NNP six_CD months_NNS there_RB was_VBD no_DT more_RBR plague_NN ,_, either_RB indigenous_JJ or_CC imparted_VBN ._.

Was_NNP this_DT recrudescence_NN or_CC re-infection_NN ?_.
Colonel_NNP Hunter_NNP makes_VBZ the_DT following_JJ remarks_NNS about_IN it_PRP :_: -_: ``_`` Telegraphic_JJ information_NN reached_VBD me_PRP on_IN the_DT 19th_CD instant_NN that_IN 1_CD imported_VBD and_CC 3_CD indigenous_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN had_VBD been_VBN discovered_VBN in_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Kutiyua_NNP on_IN that_DT day_NN ._.
These_DT are_VBP the_DT first_JJ indigenous_JJ cases_NNS that_WDT have_VBP occurred_VBN in_IN this_DT province_NN since_IN June_NNP last_JJ ,_, and_CC Kutiyna_NNP is_VBZ one_CD of_IN the_DT three_CD places_NNS in_IN Kthiwr_NNP where_WRB indigenous_JJ cases_NNS occurred_VBD last_JJ year_NN ._.
The_DT plague_NN appeared_VBD there_RB in_IN January_NNP 1897_CD among_IN arrivals_NNS from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD not_RB reported_VBN until_IN March_NNP ,_, between_IN which_WDT time_NN and_CC June_NNP ,_, 94_CD indigenous_JJ eases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN 9,300_CD ._.
The_DT town_NN remaiued_VBD apparently_RB free_JJ from_IN then_RB till_VB now_RB ._. ''_''
Colonel_NNP Hunter_NNP apparently_RB inclines_VBZ to_TO the_DT belief_NN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD a_DT recrudescence_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP seems_VBZ more_RBR probable_JJ that_IN it_PRP was_VBD re-infection_NN ._.

The_DT theory_NN of_IN re-infection_NN is_VBZ ,_, moreover_RB ,_, strengthened_VBN by_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT same_JJ houses_NNS were_VBD not_RB attacked_VBN in_IN the_DT two_CD years_NNS ,_, as_IN Colonel_NNP Hunter_NNP states-_JJ ``_`` The_DT disease_NN this_DT year_NN has_VBZ not_RB returned_VBN to_TO the_DT houses_NNS affected_VBD last_JJ year_NN ._.

But_CC ,_, however_RB this_DT may_MD be_VB ,_, the_DT pestilence_NN bad_JJ arrived_VBN ,_, and_CC no_DT time_NN was_VBD lost_VBN in_IN combating_VBG it_PRP ._.
