347_CD to_TO prevent_VB spread_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT usual_JJ measures_NNS of_IN evacuation_NN and_CC disinfection_NN ,_, etc._FW ,_, were_VBD at_IN once_RB adopted_VBN ._.
On_IN the_DT 24th_CD February_NNP ,_, Colonel_NNP J._NNP M._NNP Hunter_NNP ,_, the_DT Political_NNP Agent_NNP ,_, and_CC Major_NNP A._NN V._NNP Anderson_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, arrived_VBD at_IN Kutiyna_NNP to_TO inspect_VB the_DT measures_NNS already_RB in_IN force_NN and_CC to_TO institute_VB such_JJ others_NNS as_IN might_MD be_VB necessary_JJ ._.
Their_PRP$ first_JJ care_NN was_VBD to_TO thoroughly_RB investigate_VB the_DT circumstances_NNS under_IN which_WDT the_DT cases_NNS had_VBD occurred_VBN ,_, but_CC they_PRP could_MD discover_VB little_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT following_JJ meagre_NN details_NNS were_VBD all_PDT that_DT could_MD be_VB learned_VBN :_: -_: ``_`` Porbandar_NNP and_CC Mngrol_NNP are_VBP the_DT two_CD nearest_JJS ports_NNS through_IN which_WDT there_EX had_VBD been_VBN ,_, numerous_JJ arrivals_NNS during_IN the_DT past_JJ two_CD months_NNS from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD impossible_JJ to_TO trace_VB the_DT importation_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN to_TO any_DT particular_JJ individual_NN ._.
The_DT imported_JJ case_NN on_IN the_DT 19th_CD was_VBD that_IN of_IN a_DT man_NN who_WP had_VBD arrived_VBN in_IN the_DT town_NN about_IN a_DT month_NN before_IN and_CC had_VBD undergone_JJ 10_CD days_NNS '_POS observation_NN at_IN Porbandar_NNP ._.
``_`` I_PRP am_VBP inclined_JJ to_TO think_VB the_DT disease_NN had_VBD existed_VBN for_IN some_DT little_JJ time_NN without_IN discovery_NN owing_VBG to_TO the_DT neglect_NN of_IN the_DT rules_NNS which_WDT I_PRP introduced_VBD last_JJ year_NN for_IN the_DT registration_NN of_IN deaths_NNS and_CC the_DT examination_NN of_IN all_DT bodies_NNS before_IN disposal_NN to_TO ascertain_VB the_DT cause_NN of_IN death_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ much_JJ to_TO be_VB regretted_VBN ,_, as_IN earlier_JJR measures_NNS might_MD have_VB prevented_VBN the_DT disease_NN becoming_VBG in-_JJ digenous_JJ and_CC saved_VBD the_DT Darbr_NNP the_DT trouble_NN and_CC expense_NN which_WDT will_MD devolve_VB upon_IN it_PRP now_RB ,_, but_CC which_WDT will_MD be_VB a_DT salutary_JJ lesson_NN in_IN future_JJ ._. ''_''

Lieutenant_NNP R._NNP S._NNP Pottinger_NNP ,_, Assistant_NNP Political_NNP Agent_NNP ,_, was-_NN appointed_VBD Special_NNP Plague_NNP Inspecting_NNP Officer_NNP ._.

Dr._NNP Anderson_NNP 's_POS report_NN has_VBZ not_RB yet_RB reached_VBN me_PRP ;_: These_DT measures_NNS have_VBP had_VBD a_DT marked_JJ effect_NN ._.

``_`` On_IN the_DT 2nd_CD instant_NN I_PRP visited_VBD the_DT ob_JJ ation_NN camp_NN at_IN Bhvnagar_NNP in_IN company_NN with_IN His_PRP$ Highness_NNP the_DT Thkor_NNP Sheb_NNP and_CC Dservuderson_NNP ,_, and_CC found_VBD all_PDT the_DT arrangements_NNS satisfactory_NN ._.
r._VB A_NNP ``_`` I_PRP am_VBP glad_JJ to_TO report_VB that_IN the_DT measures_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT plague_NN spreading_VBG from_IN Kuti-_NNP yna_NNS have_VBP so_RB far_RB been_VBN completely_RB successful_JJ ,_, as_IN the_DT disease_NN has_VBZ not_RB appeared_VBN ,_, elsewhere_RB in_IN the_DT Province_NNP ._. ''_''
It_PRP will_MD be_VB noticed_VBN that_IN the_DT town_NN had_VBD been_VBN free_JJ for_IN eight_CD days_NNS ._.

This_DT leads_VBZ Colonel_NNP Hunter_NNP to_TO say-_VB ``_`` The_DT measure_NN of_IN clearing_VBG out_RP the_DT occupants_NNS of_IN the_DT houses_NNS in_IN the_DT infected_JJ quarter_NN has_VBZ effectually_RB prevented_VBN the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN in_IN the_DT town_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT following_JJ week_NN ,_, 25th_CD March_NNP 1898_CD ,_, there_EX was_VBD no_DT case_NN at_IN all_DT ;_: and_CC only_RB 1_CD death_NN in_IN a_DT previous_JJ pending_VBG case_NN ;_: and_CC during_IN the_DT next_JJ month_NN only_RB 4_CD cases_NNS in_IN all_DT occurred_VBD ._.
Indeed_RB ,_, from_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN April_NNP to_TO the_DT 20th_JJ May_NNP no_DT indigenous_JJ plague_NN was_VBD reported_VBN from_IN the_DT Agency_NNP ,_, but_CC imported_VBD cases_NNS continued_VBD to_TO be_VB detected_VBN at_IN Porbandar_NNP ,_, Wadhwn_NNP and_CC Bhvuagair_NNP ._.

Porbandar_NNP Town_NNP ._.

Third_JJ Epidemic.-The_NNP next_JJ phase_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Kthiwr_NNP was_VBD the_DT sudden_JJ infection_NN of_IN Porbandar_NNP ._.
Up_RB to_TO 17th_CD May_NNP 1898_CD Porbandar_NNP had_VBD reported_VBN nothing_NN but_CC imported_VBN cases_NNS ,_, although_IN increased_VBN mortality_NN among_IN the_DT Khrwas_NNP had_VBD been_VBN noticed_VBN from_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT month_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT next_JJ two_CD days_NNS it_PRP reported_VBD 4_CD cases_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT succeeding_VBG week_NN 37_CD cases-26_JJ deaths_NNS ._.
The_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN is_VBZ unknown_JJ :_: -_: ``_`` As_IN it_PRP is_VBZ impossible_JJ to_TO say_VB which_WDT was_VBD the_DT first_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, the_DT channel_NN of_IN its_PRP$ intro-_JJ duction_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB confidently_RB determined_VBN ,_, but_CC the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP here_RB is_VBZ of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT disease_NN has_VBZ been_VBN communicated_VBN by_IN direct_JJ contagion_NN with_IN some_DT infected_JJ articles_NNS imported_VBN by_IN the_DT country_NN boats_VBZ into_IN Porbandar_NNP ,_, probably_RB cotton-seeds_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT great_JJ quantities_NNS have_VBP lately_RB come_VBN from_IN Karchi_NNP and_CC other_JJ places_NNS ._. ''_''
The_DT first_JJ measure_NN adopted_VBN was_VBD the_DT prevention_NN of_IN the_DT Khrwas_NNP mixing_VBG with_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN ._.
House-to-house_NNP inspection_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP in_IN the_DT Khrvavad_NNP by_IN a_DT Committee_NNP composed_VBN of_IN 1_CD State_NNP official_NN ,_, 1_CD medical_JJ man_NN ,_, and_CC 4_CD headmen_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN ._.
Plague_NN cases_NNS were_VBD removed_VBN to_TO a_DT hospital_NN ,_, and_CC contacts_NNS to_TO an_DT observation_NN camp_NN established_VBN on_IN the_DT other_JJ side_NN of_IN the_DT creek_NN ,_, and_CC orders_NNS were_VBD issued_VBN for_IN a_DT thorough_JJ whitewashing_NN and_CC disinfection_NN of_IN vacated_JJ houses_NNS ._.
It_PRP was_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, felt_VBD that_IN nothing_NN short_JJ of_IN complete_JJ evacuation_NN of_IN the_DT locality_NN would_MD be_VB effectual_JJ ._.
The_DT Khrvavad_NNP is_VBZ described_VBN to_TO be_VB a_DT place_NN consisting_NN of_IN about_IN 900_CD houses_NNS ``_`` most_JJS of_IN which_WDT are_VBP so_RB crowded_JJ together_RB ,_, so_RB inaccessible_JJ to_TO light_JJ and_CC air_NN ,_, and_CC otherwise_RB so_RB insanitary_JJ as_IN to_TO be_VB almost_RB unfit_JJ for_IN occupation_NN by_IN human_JJ beings_NNS ._. ''_''
After_IN some_DT persuasion_NN the_DT Khr-_NNP was_VBD agreed_VBN to_TO remove_VB to_TO the_DT observation_NN camp_NN beyond_IN the_DT creek_NN and_CC the_DT evacuation_NN of_IN the_DT quarter_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP with_IN commendable_JJ despatch_NN ._.
``_`` Hutting_VBG materials_NNS were_VBD supplied_VBN to_TO them_PRP ,_, and_CC by_IN the_DT evening_NN of_IN the_DT 20th_JJ May_NNP and_CC within_IN 24_CD hours_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ having_VBG consented_VBN to_TO vacate_VB their_PRP$ houses_NNS ,_, the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT Khrwa_NNP community_NN ,_, numbering_VBG about_IN 3,500_CD persons_NNS ,_, was_VBD located_VBN in_IN huts_NNS built_VBN by_IN themselves_PRP in_IN the_DT observation_NN camp_NN ._.
The_DT Shiah_NNP Borahs_NNP ,_, Kaba-_NNP valias_NN and_CC others_NNS who_WP lived_VBD either_CC in_IN the_DT Khrvavad_NNP or_CC in_IN the_DT immediate_JJ vicinity_NN were_VBD also_RB segregated_VBN ._. ''_''
After_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT Khrwas_NNP to_TO camp_VB ,_, their_PRP$ houses_NNS were_VBD disinfected_VBN and_CC opened_VBN up_RP to_TO light_NN and_CC air_NN ._.
A_DT permenant_JJ improvement_NN was_VBD effected_VBN by_IN opening_VBG up_RP the_DT congested_JJ part_NN of_IN their_PRP$ quarter_NN and_CC several_JJ houses_NNS were_VBD pulled_VBN down_RB and_CC substituted_VBN by_IN others_NNS constructed_VBN on_IN approved_JJ sanitary_JJ principles_NNS at_IN the_DT public_JJ expense_NN ._.
These_DT vigorous_JJ measures_NNS promptly_RB checked_VBD the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, and_CC between_IN the_DT 25th_CD of_IN May_NNP and_CC the_DT 12th_CD of_IN June_NNP 1898_CD there_EX were_VBD only_RB 4_CD cases_NNS ._.
But_CC the_DT monsoon_NN burst_NN on_IN the_DT 11th_CD of_IN June_NNP and_CC re-occupation_NN of_IN vacated_JJ houses_NNS ,_, had_VBD perforce_NN to_TO be_VB allowed_VBN ._.
In_IN spite_NN of_IN all_DT pre-_JJ cautions_NNS ,_, plague_NN again_RB broke_VBD out_RP on_IN the_DT loth_NN June_NNP in_IN the_DT Khrvavad_NNP ,_, and_CC as_IN it_PRP showed_VBD no_DT signs_NNS of_IN abatement_NN the_DT authorities_NNS once_RB more_RBR decided_JJ on_IN evacuation_NN and_CC commenced_VBD building_NN watertight_NN sheds_NNS capable_JJ of_IN accommodating_VBG 3,500_CD people_NNS on_IN the_DT other_JJ side_NN of_IN the_DT creek_NN ._.
But_CC they_PRP were_VBD determined_VBN to_TO lose_VB no_DT time_NN in_IN turning_VBG the_DT people_NNS out_RP ,_, and_CC ,_, until_IN the_DT camp_NN was_VBD ready_JJ ,_, accommodated_VBD 1,500_CD people_NNS in_IN some_DT 65_CD vessels_NNS which_WDT were_VBD lying_VBG moored_VBN in_IN the_DT creek_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT trading_NN season_NN had_VBD closed_VBN ._.
Others_NNS were_VBD housed_VBN in_IN some_DT available_JJ buildings_NNS and_CC in_IN temporary_JJ huts_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT 8th_CD July_NNP the_DT camp_NN was_VBD ready_JJ and_CC the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT Khrwa_NNP com-_JJ munity_NN was_VBD transferred_VBN to_TO it_PRP ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ neighbours_NNS to_TO other_JJ camps_NNS ._.
Meantime_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT disease_NN spread_NN to_TO other_JJ quarters_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, and_CC complete_JJ eva-_JJ cuation_NN was_VBD an_DT impossiblity_NN ._.
All_DT that_DT could_MD be_VB done_VBN was_VBD house-to-house_JJ inspection_NN ,_, removal_NN of_IN patients_NNS to_TO hospital_VB ,_, and_CC contacts_NNS to_TO segregation_NN camps_NNS ,_, with_IN disinfection_NN of_IN houses_NNS ._.
The_DT Mahomedans_NNPS ,_, who_WP numbered_VBD 4,369_CD ,_, and_CC next_JJ to_TO the_DT Khrwas_NNP returned_VBD the_DT largest_JJS proportion_NN of_IN victims_NNS ,_, were_VBD also_RB removed_VBN to_TO camps_NNS ._.
The_DT progress_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ is_VBZ thus_RB described_VBN by_IN Lieutenant-Colonel_NNP F._NNP W._NNP Snell_NNP ,_, the_DT Administrator_NNP of_IN the_DT State_NNP :_: -_: ?_. KATHIAWAR_NNP ._. ]_NN
349_CD ``_`` The_DT temporary_JJ camps_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT Khrwas_NNP were_VBD accommodated_VBN in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN June_NNP had_VBD necessarily_RB scanty_JJ accommodation_NN ._.
In_IN that_DT month_NN 1_CD find_NN that_IN 33_CD cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT camps_NNS ._.
In_IN July_NNP these_DT people_NNS were_VBD removed_VBN to_TO the_DT spacious_JJ camp_NN on_IN the_DT other_JJ side_NN of_IN the_DT creek_NN ,_, when_WRB there_EX were_VBD 13_CD seizures_NNS only_RB ._.
The_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT Rathod_NNP Falia_NNP ,_, the_DT Darbr_NNP Delo_NNP and_CC the_DT Panch_NNP Hatdi_NNP had_VBD 113_CD attacks_NNS in_IN August_NNP ._.
After_IN the_DT segregation_NN of_IN the_DT Mahomedans_NNPS living_NN in_IN these_DT localities_NNS ,_, the_DT attacks_NNS fell_VBD to_TO 13_CD ,_, including_VBG those_DT in_IN the_DT camps_NNS ._.
The_DT spread_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT town_NN was_VBD gradual_JJ from_IN the_DT time_NN it_PRP first_RB appeared_VBD in_IN the_DT Khrvavad_NNP ._.
The_DT new_JJ town_NN which_WDT is_VBZ furthest_JJS from_IN the_DT Khrvavad_NNP was_VBD the_DT least_JJS affected_JJ ._.
This_DT fact_NN leads_VBZ to_TO an_DT inference_NN that_WDT plague_NN germs_NNS do_VBP not_RB contaminate_VB the_DT atmosphere_NN where_WRB sanitary_JJ arrangements_NNS are_VBP fairly_RB satisfactory_JJ ._. ''_''
Many_JJ circumstances_NNS ,_, besides_IN the_DT fluctuations_NNS in_IN the_DT numbers_NNS of_IN cases_NNS ,_, rendered_VBD the_DT Por-_NNP bandar_NN outbreak_NN remarkable_NN ._.
It_PRP began_VBD in_IN the_DT hot_JJ weather_NN ,_, and_CC continued_VBD all_DT through_IN it_PRP ;_: the_DT first_JJ people_NNS attacked_VBN were_VBD mostly_RB females_NNS of_IN the_DT Khrwa_NNP caste_NN ,_, while_IN for_IN many_JJ weeks_NNS the_DT other_JJ communities_NNS ,_, living_VBG beside_IN them_PRP in_IN the_DT same_JJ crowded_JJ localities_NNS ,_, remained_VBD unscathed_JJ ._.
Rats_NNS again_RB had_VBD no_DT perceptible_JJ connection_NN with_IN it_PRP ._.
``_`` No_DT dead_JJ rats_NNS were_VBD discovered_VBN ,_, ''_'' writes_VBZ Colonel_NNP Hunter_NNP ,_, ``_`` either_CC before_IN or_CC after_IN the_DT out-_JJ break_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT epidemic_JJ ran_VBD a_DT lengthy_JJ course_NN in_IN Porbandar_NNP ,_, cases_NNS occurring_VBG up_RP to_TO the_DT middle_NN of_IN November_NNP 1898_CD ._.

From_IN the_DT 24-th_JJ July_NNP 1898_CD ,_, the_DT town_NN of_IN Bantwa_NNP ,_, some_DT 14_CD miles_NNS from_IN Kutiyna_NNP ,_, figured_VBD amongst_IN the_DT infected_JJ towns_NNS ._.

Bantwa_NNP Town_NNP ._.
Population-8,641_NNP ._.
Bantwa_NNP is_VBZ a_DT town_NN with_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN some_DT 8,500_CD ,_, lying_VBG about_IN 20_CD miles_NNS to_TO the_DT west_NN of_IN Jungdh_NNP ._.
Plague_NNP was_VBD first_RB reported_VBN there_RB on_IN the_DT 24th_CD July_NNP 1898_CD ,_, although_IN there_EX is_VBZ little_JJ doubt_NN that_IN cases_NNS had_VBD been_VBN occurring_VBG for_IN a_DT month_NN or_CC two_CD previous_JJ to_TO this_DT date_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN concealment_NN was_VBD largely_RB practised_VBN ._.
If_IN this_DT was_VBD the_DT case_NN ,_, the_DT large_JJ numbers_NNS attacked_VBN are_VBP easily_RB understood_JJ ._.
Its_PRP$ origin_NN is_VBZ very_RB uncertain_JJ ._.
It_PRP may_MD have_VB been_VBN imported_VBN from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, or_CC it_PRP may_MD have_VB been_VBN imported_VBN from_IN Porbandar_NNP ,_, or_CC ,_, again_RB ,_, from_IN Kutiyna_NNP ._.
But_CC the_DT latter_NN is_VBZ most_RBS improbable_JJ ._.
Colonel_NNP Hunter_NNP inclines_NNS to_TO the_DT former_JJ theory_NN :_: -_: ``_`` There_EX is_VBZ a_DT difficulty_NN in_IN accepting_VBG Mr._NNP Antia_NNP 's_POS conclusions_NNS that_IN the_DT plague_NN was_VBD introduc-_JJ ed_NN from_IN Porbandar_NNP ,_, inasmuch_JJ as_IN that_IN there_EX have_VBP been_VBN no_DT cases_NNS either_CC among_IN Memons_NNS or_CC Sonis_NNP at_IN Porbandar_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ more_RBR likely_JJ ,_, therefore_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT disease_NN was_VBD imported_VBN from_IN Bombay_NNP in_IN spite_NN of_IN the_DT observation_NN camps_NNS at_IN Porbandar_NNP and_CC Verval_NNP ._.
The_DT information_NN on_IN this_DT sub-_JJ ject_NN where_WRB there_EX are_VBP no_DT registers_NNS of_IN death_NN is_VBZ never_RB reliable_JJ ._. ''_''
Captain_NNP H._NNP G._NNP Carnegy_NNP ,_, Assistant_NNP Political_NNP Agent_NNP ,_, and_CC Khn_NNP Bahdur_NNP H._NNP J._NNP Antia_NNP ,_, Deputy_NNP Assistant_NNP Political_NNP Agent_NNP ,_, were_VBD sent_VBN at_IN once_RB to_TO the_DT spot_NN and_CC set_NN to_TO work_VB without_IN delay_NN ._.
Two_CD hospitals_NNS and_CC two_CD camps_NNS were_VBD erected_VBN some_DT 300_CD yards_NNS on_IN each_DT side_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN by_IN the_DT 1st_CD August_NNP ,_, Hospital_NNP Assistants_NNP being_VBG placed_VBN in_IN charge_NN ,_, Segregation_NNP and_CC disinfection_NN were_VBD also_RB started_VBN ,_, About_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN August_NNP ,_, Lieutenant_NNP R._NNP S._NNP Pottinger_NNP relieved_VBD Captain_NNP Carnegy_NNP who_WP returned_VBD to_TO Rjkot_NNP ._.
Dr._NNP Vaishnav_NNP (_( the_DT Jungadh_NNP State_NNP Doctor_NNP )_) and_CC Dr._NNP Chubb_NNP (_( sent_VBN from_IN Bombay_NNP at_IN the_DT request_NN of_IN the_DT Shethias_NNP )_) arrived_VBD shortly_RB after_IN and_CC extended_VBD the_DT operations_NNS inaugurated_VBN by_IN Captain_NNP Carnegy_NNP ._.
Colonel_NNP Hunter_NNP and_CC Major_NNP TV_NN ._.
H._NNP Burke_NNP ,_, KATHIAWAR_NNP ._. ]_NN
351_CD Agency_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, visited_VBD Bantwa_NNP about_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN August_NNP and_CC inspected_VBN all_PDT the_DT arrange-_JJ ments_NNS ._.
The_DT weather_NN at_IN this_DT time_NN was_VBD most_RBS unfavourable_JJ ._.
Heavy_NNP rains_NNS ,_, storms_NNS ,_, etc._NN ,_, made_VBD the_DT camps_NNS almost_RB uninhabitable_JJ ,_, and_CC rendered_VBD the_DT drying_NN of_IN clothes_NNS impossible_JJ ._.
The_DT cases_NNS leapt_VBP up_RP from_IN 19-8_JJ (_( week_NN ending_VBG 29th_CD July_NNP 1898_CD )_) to_TO 153-103_JJ (_( week_NN ending_VBG 2nd_CD September_NNP 1398_CD )_) ._.
The_DT following_JJ week_NN ,_, 9th_CD September_NNP ,_, the_DT figures_NNS were_VBD 247_CD cases-134_JJ deaths_NNS ._.
Colonel_NNP Hunter_NNP applied_VBD for_IN help_NN ,_, and_CC Lieutenant_NNP J._NNP K._NNP Condon_NNP ,_, 18th_CD B._NNP I._NNP ,_, arrived_VBD on_IN the_DT 12th_CD September_NNP at_IN Manawadar_NNP with_IN Lieutenant_NNP R._NNP S._NNP Pottinger_NNP ,_, the_DT Prnt_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD been_VBN away_RB on_IN tour_NN for_IN a_DT couple_NN of_IN days_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT afternoon_NN of_IN that_DT day_NN (_( 12th_CD September_NNP 1898_CD )_) a_DT violent_JJ storm_NN passed_VBD over_IN the_DT town_NN and_CC camps_NNS ,_, leaving_VBG the_DT whole_JJ place_NN more_RBR or_CC less_RBR under_IN water_NN ._.
The_DT condition_NN of_IN the_DT camp_NN produced_VBD a_DT general_JJ stampede_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, augmented_VBN by_IN a_DT misunderstanding_NN between_IN the_DT Police_NNP and_CC the_DT fugitives_NNS ,_, and_CC taken_VBN advantage_NN of_IN by_IN a_DT few_JJ badmshes_NNS ,_, resulted_VBD in_IN an_DT affray_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT Police_NNP Faujdar_NNP and_CC one_CD of_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Assistants_NNPS were_VBD hurt_VBN ._.
Several_JJ of_IN the_DT townspeople_NN were_VBD said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN injured_VBN ,_, but_CC the_DT truth_NN of_IN this_DT was_VBD never_RB discovered_VBN ._.
News_NN of_IN this_DT reached_JJ Lieutenants_NNP Pottinger_NNP aud_VBP Condon_NNP on_IN their_PRP$ arrival_NN about_IN 6_CD P.M._NNP ,_, and_CC they_PRP at_IN once_RB rode_VBN out_RP to_TO Bantwa_NNP to_TO see_VB what_WP could_MD be_VB done_VBN ._.
A_DT heavy_JJ storm_NN was_VBD raging_VBG at_IN the_DT time_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT rain_NN was_VBD falling_VBG in_IN torrents_NNS ._.
When_WRB they_PRP arrived_VBD ,_, the_DT town_NN was_VBD apparently_RB quite_RB quiet_JJ ._.
They_PRP then_RB rode_VBD out_IN to_TO the_DT camps_NNS ._.
These_DT were_VBD indeed_RB a_DT desolate_NN sight_NN ._.
Empty_NNP ,_, dilapidated_VBD and_CC bedraggled_VBD tents_NNS were_VBD dotted_VBN about_IN two_CD large_JJ shallow_JJ lakes_NNS of_IN water_NN :_: and_CC huts_NNS ,_, blown_VBN down_RP by_IN the_DT wind_NN ,_, lay_VBD ,_, masses_NNS of_IN sodden_JJ dbris_NN ._.
Thence_NN they_PRP went_VBD to_TO the_DT dispensary_NN ,_, where_WRB they_PRP found_VBD the_DT two_CD injured_JJ men_NNS and_CC the_DT Nyydhish_NNP ,_, who_WP gave_VBD an_DT unintelligible_JJ account_NN of_IN the_DT affair_NN ._.
The_DT next_JJ morning_NN broke_VBD clear_JJ and_CC bright_JJ and_CC saw_VBD them_PRP early_RB at_IN work_NN ._.
From_IN this_DT date_NN the_DT ward_NN system_NN ,_, with_IN evacuation_NN and_CC prompt_JJ disinfection_NN ,_, were_VBD all_DT energetically_RB recommenced_VBN and_CC pushed_VBN forward_RB ;_: the_DT fine_NN weather_NN which_WDT now_RB set_VBP in_IN making_VBG the_DT task_NN of_IN getting_VBG the_DT people_NNS out_IN of_IN the_DT town_NN gradually_RB easier_JJR and_CC easier_JJR ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN 10_CD days_NNS (_( about_IN 23rd_CD September_NNP 1898_CD )_) some_DT 2,000_CD were_VBD once_RB more_JJR out_RP in_IN camp_NN ,_, and_CC more_JJR and_CC more_JJR people_NNS segregated_VBD themselves_PRP daily_RB ._.
On_IN the_DT 23rd_CD September_NNP 1898_CD ,_, Khn_NNP Sheb_NNP Fazl_NNP Ahmed_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD done_VBN very_RB good_JJ work_NN in_IN Karchi_NNP ,_, arrived_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT results_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ work_NN soon_RB testified_VBD to_TO its_PRP$ excellence_NN ._.
The_DT disease_NN steadily_RB subsided_VBD ,_, and_CC by_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN October_NNP had_VBD practically_RB ceased_VBN ._.
The_DT last_JJ case_NN occurred_VBD on_IN the_DT 4th_CD November_NNP 1898_CD ,_, since_IN which_WDT date_NN the_DT town_NN has_VBZ been_VBN free_JJ ._.
The_DT figures_NNS for_IN this_DT short_JJ but_CC virulent_JJ epidemic_NNS are_VBP as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: Week_IN ending_VBG Cases_NNS ._.
Deaths_NNS ._.

Population_NN 8,321_CD ?_. 352_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
XL_NN Unfortunately_RB ,_, the_DT disease_NN spread_NN from_IN Bantwa_NNP to_TO three_CD neighbouring_VBG villages_NNS ,_, Buri_NNP ,_, Nkra_NNP and_CC Kambhla_NNP ;_: but_CC they_PRP were_VBD completely_RB evacuated_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT disease_NN consequently_RB never_RB got_VBD a_DT firm_NN hold_NN on_IN any_DT of_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC died_VBD out_RP in_IN a_DT brief_JJ space_NN of_IN time_NN ._.
To_TO return_VB to_TO the_DT Agency_NNP generally-_JJ Sardrgadh_NNP ,_, a_DT large_JJ town_NN ,_, was_VBD reported_VBN as_IN infected_VBN on_IN 17th_CD July_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC Salya_NNP on_IN the_DT 11th_CD August_NNP ._.
Dead_JJ rats_NNS were_VBD found_VBN previous_JJ to_TO the_DT outbreak_NN in_IN the_DT latter_JJ place_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ cases_NNS produced_VBD a_DT panic_NN ._.
Lieutenant-Colonel_NNP W._NNP P._NNP Kennedy_NNP ,_, Admini-_NNP strator_NN ,_, Navnagar_NNP State_NNP ,_, writes-_JJ ``_`` On_IN arrival_NN here_RB with_IN Mr._NNP O'Connor_NNP on_IN Saturday_NNP last_JJ ,_, 13th_CD August_NNP ,_, I_PRP found_VBD the_DT town_NN almost_RB absolutely_RB deserted_VBN ,_, the_DT inhabitants_NNS having_VBG stealthily_RB at_IN night_NN left_VBD the_DT place_NN through_IN fear_NN during_IN the_DT last_JJ few_JJ days_NNS ._.
Approximately_RB about_IN two-thirds_NNS of_IN the_DT population_NN have_VBP distributed_VBN themselves_PRP in_IN 31_CD villages_NNS of_IN this_DT State_NNP ,_, the_DT rest_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN those_DT remaining_VBG in_IN the_DT place_NN ,_, embarked_VBN on_IN 20_CD vessels_NNS ,_, and_CC were_VBD prepared_VBN to_TO go_VB ,_, but_CC were_VBD stopped_VBN by_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Customs_NNP Officer_NNP pending_VBG my_PRP$ arrival_NN ._.
Out_IN of_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN 3,273_CD ,_, only_RB some_DT 100_CD townspeople_NNS remain_VBP ;_: in_IN addition_NN to_TO these_DT ,_, there_EX are_VBP the_DT State_NNP and_CC Government_NNP officials_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ families_NNS ._.
Many_JJ of_IN the_DT townspeople_NN have_VBP ,_, left_VBN ,_, taking_VBG nothing_NN with_IN them_PRP and_CC leaving_VBG their_PRP$ household_NN property_NN and_CC ornaments_NNS and_CC stores_NNS of_IN merchandise_NN behind_NN ._. ''_''
As_IN regards_NNS its_PRP$ origin_NN ,_, he_PRP says-_JJ ``_`` In_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN the_DT plague_NN was_VBD not_RB imported_VBN by_IN human_JJ beings_NNS coming_VBG into_IN the_DT place_NN from_IN infected_VBN areas_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN everything_NN points_NNS to_TO its_PRP$ inception_NN through_IN ruts_NNS which_WDT must_MD have_VB come_VBN from_IN some_DT infected_JJ port_NN ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, Karchi_NNP ,_, Mndvi_NNP (_( Cutch_NNP )_) ,_, Porbandar_NNP or_CC Beyt_NNP ,_, as_IN there_EX is_VBZ frequent_JJ communication_NN by_IN sea_NN between_IN Salya_NNP and_CC these_DT ports_NNS ._.
But_CC so_RB far_RB it_PRP is_VBZ impossible_JJ to_TO say_VB to_TO which_WDT of_IN these_DT places_NNS ,_, one_CD or_CC more_JJR ,_, the_DT mischief_NN is_VBZ traceable._JJ ``_``
At_IN any_DT rate_NN the_DT plague_NN in_IN Salya_NNP must_MD be_VB classed_VBN as_IN indigenous_JJ ._. ''_''

Boundaries_NNS ._.
Kolhpur_NNP is_VBZ bounded_VBN on_IN the_DT north_NN by_IN the_DT Vrna_NNP river_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, for_IN about_IN sixty-six_JJ miles_NNS from_IN Prachitgad_NNP to_TO its_PRP$ meeting_NN with_IN the_DT Krishna_NNP two_CD miles_NNS south_RB of_IN Sngle_NNP ,_, separates_VBZ Kolhpur_NNP from_IN Stra_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT east_NN by_IN the_DT rivers_NNS Krishna_NNP and_CC Dudhganga_NNP ,_, Miraj_NNP and_CC Sngli_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT south_NN by_IN Belgaum_NNP ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN by_IN the_DT Sahydris_NNP ._.
Sngli_NNP ,_, the_DT chief_JJ State_NNP of_IN the_DT Southern_NNP Martha_NNP Country_NNP ,_, consists_VBZ of_IN detached_JJ tracts_NNS extending_VBG from_IN the_DT British_JJ Districts_NNS of_IN Stra_NNP and_CC Sholpur_NNP in_IN the_DT north_NN to_TO the_DT river_NN Tungbhadra_NNP in_IN the_DT south_NN of_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
The_DT other_JJ States_NNPS comprising_VBG the_DT Southern_NNP Martha_NNP Country_NNP are_VBP Miraj_NNP Senior_NNP and_CC Junior_NNP ,_, Kurundvd_NNP Senior_NNP and_CC Junior_NNP ,_, Jmkhandi_NNP ,_, Mudhol_NNP ,_, and_CC Rmdurg_NNP ._.
Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
The_DT seasons_NNS may_MD be_VB broadly_RB divided_VBN into_IN wet_NN ,_, cold_NN ,_, and_CC hot_JJ ._.
The_DT rainy_JJ months_NNS are_VBP the_DT healthiest_JJ time_NN in_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT cold_JJ season_NN ,_, which_WDT lasts_VBZ from_IN November_NNP to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN February_NNP ,_, is_VBZ the_DT most_RBS dry_JJ and_CC unhealthy_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT climate_NN of_IN the_DT Southern_NNP Martha_NNP Country_NNP ,_, though_IN hot_JJ ,_, is_VBZ not_RB unhealthy_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT rainy_NN season_NN the_DT climate_NN is_VBZ everywhere_RB pleasant_JJ ,_, except_IN perhaps_RB in_IN Shhpur_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT rainfall_NN is_VBZ heavy_JJ and_CC constant_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT cold_NN season_NN the_DT air_NN is_VBZ dry_JJ and_CC the_DT nights_NNS cool_NN ._.
The_DT soil_NN may_MD be_VB classed_VBN into_IN black_JJ ,_, red_JJ and_CC white_JJ ;_: or_CC again_RB as_IN good_JJ ,_, middling_NN ,_, and_CC poor_JJ ._.
Previous_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT authentic_JJ record_NN of_IN plague_NN either_CC in_IN Kolhpur_NNP or_CC the_DT Southern_JJ Martha_NNP Country_NNP ,_, cholera_NN being_VBG the_DT only_RB great_JJ source_NN of_IN epidemic_JJ disease_NN there_RB ._.
*_JJ Kolhpur_NNP and_CC S._NNP M._NNP Country_NNP ._.
As_IN this_DT Agency_NNP consists_VBZ of_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN States_NNS of_IN varying_VBG size_NN ,_, which_WDT have_VBP suffered_VBN from_IN plague_NN epidemics_NNS at_IN different_JJ times_NNS ,_, and_CC as_IN ,_, since_IN November_NNP 1897_CD ,_, no_DT single_JJ week_NN has_VBZ passed_VBN without_IN plague_NN being_VBG reported_VBN from_IN the_DT Agency_NNP ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB convenient_VBN in_IN this_DT review_NN to_TO deal_VB with_IN each_DT such_JJ State_NNP or_CC portion_NN of_IN the_DT Agency_NNP separately_RB ._.
The_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN to_TO combat_VB and_CC control_VB the_DT disease_NN were_VBD very_RB similar_JJ throughout_IN the_DT Agency_NNP ,_, the_DT difference_NN being_VBG mainly_RB in_IN the_DT vigour_NN and_CC promptitude_NN with_IN which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD enforced_VBN at_IN various_JJ places_NNS ._.
They_PRP are_VBP therefore_RB enumerated_VBN here_RB ,_, and_CC may_MD be_VB understood_JJ as_IN applying_VBG throughout_IN the_DT Agency_NNP at_IN such_JJ places_NNS as_IN were_VBD attacked_VBN ._.
Concerning_VBG the_DT protection_NN of_IN villages_NNS from_IN infection_NN up_RB to_TO June_NNP 1898_CD ,_, Colonel_NNP J._NNP W._NNP Wray_NNP ,_, the_DT Political_NNP Agent_NNP ,_, reports_VBZ as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` The_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN every_DT village_NN have_VBP been_VBN urged_VBN to_TO adopt_VB a_DT system_NN of_IN observation_NN by_IN which_WDT no_DT strangers_NNS can_MD enter_VB their_PRP$ precincts_NNS without_IN detention_NN outside_IN for_IN 10_CD days_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT system_NN has_VBZ worked_VBN well_RB and_CC inexpensively_RB ,_, the_DT Patels_NNP being_VBG held_VBN answerable_JJ for_IN any_DT careless-_JJ ness_NN that_WDT may_MD cause_VB the_DT village_NN to_TO become_VB infected_JJ ._.
``_`` All_DT approaches_NNS to_TO the_DT village_NN are_VBP guarded_VBN by_IN local_JJ arrangement_NN ,_, and_CC even_RB the_DT postal_JJ runner_NN who_WP has_VBZ been_VBN accustomed_VBN to_TO pass_VB through_IN with_IN the_DT mail-bag_NN has_VBZ ,_, by_IN the_DT courtesy_NN of_IN the_DT Post-_NNP Master-General_NNP ,_, been_VBN instructed_VBN to_TO put_VB down_RP his_PRP$ bag_NN on_IN the_DT border_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT bag_NN is_VBZ disinfected_VBN and_CC taken_VBN in_IN charge_NN by_IN a_DT State_NNP servant_NN who_WP is_VBZ held_VBN responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT safe_JJ delivery_NN of_IN the_DT mail-bag_NN ._.
*_JJ Bombay_NNP Gazetteer_NNP ,_, Vol_NNP ._.
XXIV_NN ,_, 89_CD ?_. 354_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
XL_IN ``_`` By_IN these_DT means_NNS regular_VBP communication_NN between_IN villages_NNS can_MD be_VB almost_RB entirely_RB sus-_JJ pended_JJ ,_, but_CC in_IN the_DT agricultural_JJ districts_NNS ,_, where_WRB the_DT lands_NNS of_IN an_DT infected_JJ village_NN adjoin_VBP those_DT of_IN a_DT non-infected_JJ one_NN ,_, as_IN has_VBZ been_VBN frequently_RB the_DT case_NN in_IN the_DT Krishna_NNP valley_NN and_CC the_DT Belgaum_NNP circle_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ quite_RB impossible_JJ to_TO prevent_VB occasional_JJ contact_NN between_IN people_NNS working_VBG in_IN the_DT fields_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ principally_RB in_IN this_DT way_NN that_IN the_DT Native_NNP State_NNP villages_NNS in_IN my_PRP$ jurisdiction_NN have_VBP become_VBN infected_VBN from_IN adjoining_VBG British_JJ villages_NNS and_CC from_IN each_DT other_JJ ._. ''_''
During_IN the_DT following_JJ year_NN these_DT measures_NNS do_VBP not_RB seem_VB to_TO have_VB been_VBN much_JJ relaxed_NN ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN to_TO combat_VB an_DT incipient_NN outbreak_NN ,_, Colonel_NNP Wray_NNP reports_NNS :_: -_: ``_`` The_DT most_RBS important_JJ consideration_NN is_VBZ the_DT prevention_NN of_IN concealment_NN of_IN cases_NNS ._.
For_IN on_IN this_DT ,_, more_JJR than_IN anything_NN else_RB ,_, in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN ,_, depends_VBZ the_DT success_NN or_CC failure_NN of_IN the_DT subsequent_JJ measures._NN ``_``
There_EX are_VBP two_CD evils_NNS inseparable_JJ from_IN a_DT plague_NN epidemic_NN which_WDT in_IN their_PRP$ turn_NN prejudice_NN all_DT suppressive_JJ measures_NNS to_TO a_DT serious_JJ extent-namely_RB ,_, panic_NN and_CC apathy_NN ._.
``_`` The_DT only_JJ way_NN to_TO deal_VB with_IN these_DT is_VBZ to_TO anticipate_VB them_PRP by_IN giving_VBG the_DT people_NNS themselves_PRP as_IN much_JJ occupation_NN and_CC responsibility_NN as_IN possible_JJ in_IN plague_NN matters_NNS ._. ''_''
Accordingly_RB authorities_NNS were_VBD nominated_VBN by_IN the_DT representative_JJ inhabitants_NNS ,_, who_WP were_VBD responsible_JJ for-_JJ (_( i_JJ ._. )_)
reporting_VBG all_DT cases_NNS of_IN sickness_NN ;_: (_( ii_VB ._. )_)

Kollipur_NNP State_NNP ._.
Population-913,131_NNP ._.
Plague_NNP first_RB broke_VBD out_RP in_IN this_DT Agency_NNP on_IN the_DT 23rd_CD October_NNP 1896_CD ,_, when_WRB one_CD case_NN ,_, imported_VBN from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, occurred_VBD in_IN Kolhpur_NNP Town_NNP ._.

The_DT following_JJ measures_NNS were_VBD instituted_VBN to_TO check_VB the_DT progress_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN :_: -_: (_( i_VB ._. )_)

With_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT infection_NN of_IN Sngli_NNP ,_, Lieutenant-Colonel_NNP J._NNP W._NNP Wray_NNP reports_NNS :_: -_: ``_`` A_DT railway_NN servant_NN from_IN the_DT Hubli_NNP Workshops_NNP ,_, where_WRB plague_NN was_VBD prevalent_JJ ,_, came_VBD by_IN train_NN as_RB far_RB as_IN Shedbal_NNP ,_, 18_CD miles_NNS from_IN Sngli_NNP ,_, walked_VBD into_IN a_DT Sngli_NNP field_NN ,_, remained_VBD there_EX for_IN the_DT day_NN and_CC went_VBD stealthily_RB to_TO the_DT priest_NN 's_POS house_NN at_IN night_NN ,_, stayed_VBD there_EX a_DT couple_NN of_IN days_NNS and_CC returned_VBN to_TO Shedbal_NNP ._.

But_CC this_DT immunity_NN did_VBD not_RB last_JJ long_RB ,_, for_IN in_IN the_DT second_JJ week_NN in_IN August_NNP 1898_CD the_DT number_NN of_IN attacks_NNS rose_VBD from_IN 3_CD in_IN the_DT week_NN previous_JJ to_TO 22_CD ._.

Kurundvd_NNP (_( Junior_NNP )_) State_NNP ._.

Jamkhandi_NNP State_NNP ._.
Population-102,102_NNP ._.

Boundaries_NNS ._.
Situated_VBN in_IN the_DT north-west_NN of_IN Grujart_NNP to_TO the_DT east_NN of_IN Cutch_NNP ,_, the_DT District_NNP is_VBZ bounded_VBN on_IN the_DT north_NN by_IN Mrwr_NNP and_CC Sirohi_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT east_NN by_IN the_DT Mahi_NNP Kntha_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT south_NN by_IN the_DT Gaikwar_NNP 's_POS territory_NN ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN by_IN the_DT Runn_NNP of_IN Cutch_NNP ._.
Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
The_DT year_NN has_VBZ four_CD seasons_NNS ,_, hot_JJ and_CC dry_JJ ,_, rainy_JJ ,_, hot_JJ and_CC moist_NN ,_, and_CC cold_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT hot_JJ and_CC dry_JJ season_NN ,_, the_DT heat_NN ,_, even_RB in_IN the_DT Planpur_NNP territory_NN ,_, is_VBZ great_JJ ;_: and_CC in_IN the_DT north_JJ towards_NNS Mrwr_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT west_NN towards_IN the_DT Runn_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ intense_JJ ._.
The_DT thermometer_NN rises_VBZ to_TO 120_CD in_IN the_DT shade_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT hot_JJ winds_NNS are_VBP so_RB fierce_JJ as_IN to_TO keep_VB even_RB the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN from_IN travelling_VBG during_IN the_DT daytime_NN ._.
Especially_RB away_RB from_IN the_DT hills_NNS and_CC near_IN the_DT Runn_NNP ,_, the_DT rains_NNS are_VBP slight_JJ ._.
The_DT third_JJ season_NN ,_, September_NNP ,_, October_NNP and_CC November_NNP ,_, is_VBZ very_RB unhealthy_JJ ._.
Both_DT Europeans_NNPS and_CC natives_NNS suffer_VBP from_IN fevers_NNS of_IN a_DT bad_JJ type_NN ._.
November_NNP ,_, December_NNP ,_, January_NNP and_CC February_NNP are_VBP pleasant_JJ ,_, and_CC for_IN Europeans_NNPS ,_, healthy_JJ ,_, the_DT cold_NN ,_, especially_RB towards_IN the_DT Runn_NNP ,_, being_VBG at_IN times_NNS very_RB great_JJ ._.
Except_IN in_IN hollows_NNS ,_, where_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ clay_VBN ,_, and_CC near_IN the_DT Runn_NNP ,_, where_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ mixed_JJ with_IN black_JJ earth_NN ,_, the_DT soil_NN in_IN the_DT plain_NN country_NN is_VBZ sandy_JJ ._.
The_DT District_NNP contains_VBZ no_DT natural_JJ lakes_NNS ,_, but_CC ,_, especially_RB in_IN Rdhanpur_NNP ,_, has_VBZ many_JJ ponds_NNS ._.
Close_RB to_TO the_DT hills_NNS the_DT water_NN is_VBZ very_RB near_IN the_DT surface_NN ,_, but_CC gradually_RB sinks_NNS in_IN the_DT sandy_JJ western_JJ plains_NNS ._.
Towards_IN the_DT Runn_NNP ,_, water_NN is_VBZ specially_RB scarce_JJ and_CC blackish_JJ ,_, and_CC ,_, in_IN this_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, a_DT scanty_NN rainfall_NN causes_VBZ the_DT greatest_JJS hardship_NN ._.
Previous_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT year_NN 1815-16_RB ,_, the_DT Districts_NNS of_IN Rdhanpur_NNP ,_, Sami_NNP and_CC Munjpur_NNP ,_, were_VBD visited_VBN by_IN a_DT disease_JJ very_RB like_IN plague_NN and_CC so_RB fatal_JJ that_IN it_PRP carried_VBD off_RP about_IN one-half_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN ._.
The_DT disease_NN appeared_VBD under_IN two_CD forms_NNS ,_, one_CD with_IN swellings_NNS in_IN the_DT arm-pits_NNS and_CC groin_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ with_IN fever_NN and_CC spitting_NN of_IN blood_NN ._.
Except_IN when_WRB the_DT buboes_NNS suppurated_VBD and_CC discharged_VBD freely_RB ,_, the_DT patient_NN seldom_RB recovered_VBD ._.
No_DT treatment_NN proved_VBD of_IN any_DT avail_NN ._.
Fever_NNP is_VBZ very_RB prevalent_JJ from_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN September_NNP to_TO December_NNP ._.
*_JJ Plague_NNP was_VBD introduced_VBN in_IN the_DT Planpur_NNP State_NNP by_IN a_DT Jain_NNP Bania_NNP who_WP went_VBD to_TO Planpur_NNP Town_NNP in_IN February_NNP 1897_CD from_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
As_IN the_DT epidemics_NNS in_IN the_DT State_NNP at_IN large_JJ and_CC in_IN the_DT town_NN comprised_VBD separate_JJ periods_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ convenient_JJ to_TO review_VB them_PRP separately_RB ._.
Planpur_NNP Town_NNP ._.
Population-21,092_NNP ._.
First_RB Epidemic.-Plague_NNP was_VBD at_IN first_JJ confined_VBN to_TO one_CD part_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN and_CC to_TO the_DT Jain_NNP community_NN alone_RB ,_, but_CC it_PRP gradually_RB spread_VBD and_CC resulted_VBD in_IN a_DT slight_JJ epidemic_NN during_IN March_NNP and_CC April_NNP 1897_CD ._.
On_IN the_DT 2nd_CD of_IN April_NNP ,_, Captain_NNP H._NNP F._NNP Cleveland_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, arrived_VBD on_IN special_JJ duty_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT same_JJ day_NN Dr._NNP J_NNP ._.
A._NN Lowson_NNP visited_VBD Planpur_NNP ._.
The_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN under_IN their_PRP$ direction_NN resulted_VBD in_IN the_DT rapid_JJ *Bombay_NNP Gazetteer_NNP ,_, Vol_NNP ._.
V_NNP ,_, 60_CD ?_. 358_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
XI_NN ._.
disappearance_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ._.
The_DT statistics_NNS are_VBP untrustworthy_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT total_JJ reported_VBD figures_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT original_JJ outbreak_NN in_IN February_NNP 1897_CD to_TO the_DT 15th_CD May_NNP 1897_CD were_VBD 141_CD cases_NNS and_CC 90_CD deaths_NNS ._.
From_IN the_DT 15th_CD May_NNP to_TO the_DT 2nd_CD August_NNP 1897_CD no_DT case_NN was_VBD reported_VBN ._.
Second_JJ Epidemic.-On_NNP the_DT 2nd_CD August_NNP 1897_CD ,_, 2_CD cases_NNS occurred_VBD ._.
The_DT origin_NN of_IN this_DT out-_JJ break_NN is_VBZ obscure_JJ ._.
Importation_NN must_MD be_VB set_VBN aside_RB after_IN the_DT definite_JJ statement_NN of_IN Lieut.-_NNP Colonel_NNP F._NNP H._NNP Jackson_NNP ,_, Political_NNP Superintendent-_NNP ``_`` Dr._NNP Cleveland_NNP duly_NN came_VBD and_CC inspected_VBD the_DT arrangements_NNS made_VBN by_IN the_DT Darbr_NNP and_CC informed_VBD me_PRP that_IN he_PRP was_VBD satisfied_VBN with_IN them_PRP ._.
He_PRP can_MD not_RB say_VB how_WRB the_DT plague_NN made_VBD its_PRP$ reappearance_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP has_VBZ certainly_RB not_RB been_VBN imported_VBN ._.
He_PRP thinks_VBZ that_IN a_DT house_NN that_WDT was_VBD closed_VBN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ period_NN of_IN plague_NN might_MD have_VB been_VBN re-opened_JJ without_IN going_VBG through_IN a_DT course_NN of_IN disinfection_NN ,_, but_CC that_IN this_DT was_VBD the_DT case_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB determined_VBN by_IN facts_NNS ._.
At_IN any_DT rate_NN the_DT plague_NN commenced_VBD again_RB in_IN the_DT immediate_JJ vicinity_NN of_IN the_DT place_NN where_WRB it_PRP left_VBD off_RP the_DT first_JJ time_NN ._. ''_''
Note.-Lieutenant_JJ Rainier_NNP states_NNS that_IN the_DT second_JJ outbreak_NN originated_VBN in_IN the_DT same_JJ chawl_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT first_JJ case_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN ._.
The_DT following_JJ measures_NNS were_VBD at_IN once_RB introduced_VBN :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) Segregation_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Observation_NN camps_NNS ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) Disinfection_NNP (_( of_IN houses_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN )_) ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) Medical_NNP inspection_NN ._.
Observation_NN camps_NNS were_VBD established_VBN at_IN Deesa_NNP Station_NNP and_CC Abu_NNP Road_NNP ._.
Medical_JJ inspection_NN ,_, which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN in_IN force_NN from_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, was_VBD continued_VBN at_IN Planpur_NNP Station_NNP ._.
Up_RB to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN August_NNP no_DT serious_JJ rise_NN in_IN the_DT mortality_NN took_VBD place_NN ;_: but_CC on_IN the_DT 4th_JJ September_NNP the_DT week_NN 's_POS figures_NNS were_VBD 39_CD cases-26_JJ deaths_NNS ,_, although_IN this_DT includes_VBZ some_DT con-_NN cealed_JJ cases_NNS ._.
During_IN this_DT week_NN 5_CD dead_JJ rats_NNS were_VBD found_VBN ._.
The_DT following_JJ week_NN (_( 4th-11th_JJ September_NNP 1897_CD )_) the_DT figures_NNS were_VBD 49-24_JJ ,_, and_CC cases_NNS still_RB continued_VBD to_TO be_VB concealed_VBN ._.
In_IN con-_JJ sequence_NN ,_, the_DT Darbr_NNP offered_VBD rewards_NNS for_IN the_DT discovery_NN of_IN cases_NNS ;_: and_CC the_DT ward_NN system_NN was_VBD introduced_VBN (_( 11th_CD September_NNP 1897_CD )_) ,_, the_DT town_NN being_VBG divided_VBN into_IN four_CD wards_NNS ,_, which_WDT were_VBD visited_VBN by_IN four_CD search_NN parties_NNS ._.
Spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN rail_NN to_TO the_DT north_NN was_VBD checked_VBN by_IN exam-_JJ ination_NN of_IN out-going_JJ passengers_NNS by_IN Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP J._NNP P._NNP Wadia_NNP and_CC a_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP ._.
A_DT serious_JJ rise_NN in_IN cases_NNS and_CC deaths_NNS during_IN the_DT next_JJ week_NN ,_, 11th-18th_JJ September_NNP ,_, was_VBD ,_, perhaps_RB ,_, in_IN some_DT measure_NN due_JJ to_TO unfavourable_JJ weather_NN ,_, heavy_JJ showers_NNS of_IN rain_NN ,_, with_IN an_DT intermittent_NN cold_NN wind_NN being_VBG severely_RB felt_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN segregation_NN camps_NNS ._.
Up_RB to_TO this_DT time_NN the_DT Political_NNP Superintendent_NNP had_VBD no_DT skilled_VBN European_JJ assistance_NN ,_, but_CC on_IN the_DT 22nd_CD September_NNP 1897_CD Lieutenant_NNP N._NNP Rainier_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, took_VBD charge_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS ;_: and_CC he_PRP thus_RB describes_VBZ the_DT measures_NNS in_IN force_NN on_IN his_PRP$ arrival_NN :_: -_: ``_`` (_( 1_CD )_) For_IN the_DT different_JJ classes_NNS of_IN inhabitants_NNS four_CD hospitals_NNS ,_, and_CC attached_VBD to_TO each_DT a_DT segre-_JJ gation_NN camp_NN ,_, to_TO which_WDT were_VBD removed_VBN the_DT sick_NN with_IN their_PRP$ attendants_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN the_DT neighbouring_NN houses_NNS ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Search-parties_NNS of_IN Darbr_NNP sepoys_NNS ,_, but_CC with_IN no_DT responsible_JJ official_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN them_PRP ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) A_DT rough_JJ disinfection_NN of_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS with_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN 1-20_JJ carbolic_JJ acid_NN ._. ''_''
On_IN these_DT arrangements_NNS he_PRP comments_NNS as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` These_DT arrangements_NNS were_VBD found_VBN not_RB to_TO work_VB satisfactorily_RB owing_VBG to_TO a_DT strongly_RB rooted_VBN objection_NN amongst_VBZ the_DT people_NNS to_TO hospitals_NNS and_CC segregation_NN camps_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT apathy_NN of_IN the_DT search-parties_NNS ,_, who_WP ,_, sympathising_VBG with_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, could_MD not_RB be_VB depended_VBN on_IN to_TO give_VB much_JJ help_NN or_CC timely_JJ information_NN ,_, in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS information_NN being_VBG delayed_VBN until_IN the_DT neighbours_NNS had_VBD had_VBN time_NN to_TO remove_VB to_TO a_DT different_JJ locality_NN ._. ''_''
In_IN order_NN to_TO overcome_VB these_DT difficulties_NNS ,_, Lieutenant_NNP Rainier_NNP turned_VBD to_TO the_DT native_JJ gentle-_JJ men_NNS appointed_VBN to_TO supervise_VB the_DT four_CD wards_NNS into_IN which_WDT the_DT town_NN had_VBD been_VBN divided_VBN ;_: the_DT ?_. PALANPUR_NNP ._. ]_NN
359_CD search-parties_NNS were_VBD placed_VBN directly_RB under_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC each_DT supervisor_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT help_NN of_IN his_PRP$ search-party_JJ ,_, daily_RB inspected_VBD his_PRP$ quarter_NN ._.
Lieutenant_NNP Rainier_NNP adds_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` Two_CD or_CC three_CD times_NNS a_DT week_NN I_PRP ,_, with_IN the_DT medical_JJ subordinates_NNS ,_, accompanied_VBD the_DT ward_NN supervisors_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ search_NN ,_, thus_RB ensuring_VBG a_DT complete_JJ and_CC simultaneous_JJ examination_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ city_NN ._.
``_`` The_DT influence_NN of_IN these_DT gentlemen_NNS induced_VBD the_DT search-parties_NNS to_TO give_VB earlier_JJR information_NN and_CC ensured_VBD the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT infected_JJ block_NN being_VBG removed_VBN to_TO a_DT segregation_NN camp_NN ,_, although_IN many_JJ still_RB managed_VBN to_TO escape_VB to_TO other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN and_CC to_TO the_DT mango-groves_NNS outside_IN ._.
``_`` When_WRB it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN in_IN the_DT latter_JJ place_NN they_PRP were_VBD not_RB interfered_VBN with_IN ,_, and_CC that_IN only_RB chowkidrs_VB were_VBD posted_VBN to_TO give_VB information_NN of_IN fresh_JJ cases_NNS ,_, they_PRP speedily_RB removed_VBD themselves_PRP and_CC their_PRP$ sick_JJ thither_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT disease_NN was_VBD gradually_RB subsiding_VBG ,_, when_WRB the_DT celebration_NN of_IN the_DT Divli_NNP festival_NN caused_VBD the_DT people_NNS to_TO go_VB back_RB to_TO their_PRP$ houses_NNS ,_, The_DT result_NN of_IN this_DT was_VBD a_DT fresh_JJ access_NN of_IN virulence_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT 28th_CD and_CC 29th_CD of_IN October_NNP 1897_CD ,_, Mr._NNP A._NNP Wingate_NNP ,_, Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Colonel_NNP G._NNP W._NNP R._NNP Hay_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, and_CC Major_NNP A._NN V._NNP Anderson_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, Inspecting_NNP Plague_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, visited_VBD Planpur_NNP and_CC advocated_VBD complete_JJ evacuation_NN ,_, thorough_JJ disinfection_NN of_IN persons_NNS ,_, clothes_NNS and_CC buildings_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, together_RB with_IN some_DT other_JJ minor_JJ measures_NNS ,_, most_JJS of_IN which_WDT were_VBD promptly_RB carried_VBN out_RP with_IN excellent_JJ results_NNS ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT value_NN of_IN evacuation_NN ,_, the_DT ward_NN system_NN ,_, and_CC other_JJ measures_NNS ,_, the_DT following_VBG remarks_NNS by_IN Lieutenant_NNP Rainier_NNP are_VBP interesting_VBG :_: -_: ``_`` To_TO the_DT better_JJR organization_NN of_IN search-parties_NNS ,_, the_DT voluntary_JJ removal_NN of_IN infected_JJ house-_JJ holds_VBZ to_TO the_DT mango-groves_NNS and_CC to_TO the_DT great_JJ decrease_NN in_IN the_DT population_NN (_( many_JJ people_NNS having_VBG fled_VBN to_TO the_DT surrounding_VBG villages_NNS )_) must_MD be_VB attributed_VBN the_DT decline_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN which_WDT marked_VBD the_DT eighth_JJ to_TO the_DT eleventh_JJ week_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, ``_`` Unfortunately_RB the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN the_DT Divli_NNP festival_NN caused_VBD a_DT great_JJ number_NN of_IN people_NNS to_TO return_VB to_TO the_DT city_NN ,_, resulting_VBG in_IN a_DT rapid_JJ increase_NN of_IN the_DT disease._NN ``_``
The_DT week_NN after_IN the_DT Divli_NNP most_JJS of_IN these_DT people_NNS had_VBD returned_VBN to_TO the_DT villages_NNS ._.
Probably_RB at_IN this_DT time_NN they_PRP laid_VBD the_DT foundation_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN in_IN the_DT districts_NNS ,_, though_IN one_CD or_CC two_CD vil-_JJ lages_NNS were_VBD already_RB infected_VBN ._.
About_IN this_DT time_NN (_( 28th_CD October_NNP 1897_CD )_) the_DT Plague_NNP Commis-_NNP sioner_NN arrived_VBD and_CC advocated_VBD the_DT complete_JJ evacuation_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
This_DT was_VBD done_VBN by_IN the_DT 2nd_CD November_NNP ,_, about_RB 8,000_CD or_CC one-third_NN of_IN the_DT normal_JJ population_NN building_NN huts_NNS for_IN them-_JJ selves_NNS in_IN the_DT open_JJ areas_NNS round_VBP about_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, the_DT remainder_NN making_VBG good_JJ their_PRP$ escape_NN to_TO the_DT villages_NNS ._.
The_DT effect_NN of_IN this_DT operation_NN ,_, combined_VBN with_IN the_DT increasing_VBG confidence_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, leading_VBG them_PRP to_TO voluntarily_VB report_NN cases_NNS and_CC submit_NN to_TO segregation_NN ,_, was_VBD at_IN once_RB apparent_JJ ._.
By_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN November_NNP the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD practically_RB at_IN an_DT end_NN ._. ''_''
On_IN the_DT evacuation_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, the_DT ward_NN system_NN was_VBD continued_VBN in_IN the_DT areas_NNS outside_IN it_PRP ,_, each_DT Superintendent_NNP keeping_VBG a_DT register_NN of_IN the_DT person_NN living_VBG under_IN his_PRP$ supervision_NN ._.

Palanpur_NNP District_NNP ._.
In_IN spite_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ in_IN Planpur_NNP Town_NNP during_IN March_NNP and_CC April_NNP 1897_CD ,_, plague_NN was_VBD not_RB reported_VBN from_IN any_DT other_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT State_NNP till_NN October_NNP 1897_CD ._.

From_IN October_NNP to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN December_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT system_NN of_IN obtaining_VBG information_NN of_IN fresh_JJ cases_NNS was_VBD somewhat_RB defective_JJ ,_, the_DT Patel_NNP and_CC Havldr_NNP making_VBG a_DT daily_JJ inspection_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN for_IN detection_NN of_IN suspicious_JJ cases_NNS only_RB ._.

A_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN States_NNP ,_, many_JJ of_IN which_WDT run_VBP ,_, as_IN it_PRP were_VBD ,_, through_IN the_DT Pauch_NNP Mahls_NNP District_NNP and_CC divide_VB it_PRP into_IN two_CD ,_, form_VBP the_DT Rewa_NNP Kntha_NNP group_NN ._.

Boundaries_NNS ._.
Rewa_NNP Kntha_NNP is_VBZ about_IN 140_CD miles_NNS from_IN north_JJ to_TO south_VB ,_, and_CC varies_NNS from_IN ten_NN to_TO fifty_VB from_IN east_JJ to_TO west_JJS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ bounded_VBN on_IN the_DT north_NN by_IN Mahi_NNP Kntha_NNP and_CC Meywr_NNP ;_: on_IN the_DT cast_NN by_IN the_DT Panch_NNP Mahls_NNP and_CC the_DT Bhopavar_NNP Agency_NNP :_: on_IN the_DT south_NN by_IN the_DT Ghekwr_NNP 's_POS territory_NN ;_: and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN by_IN Broach_NNP and_CC Kaira_NNP ._.
Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT forest-covered_JJ tracts_NNS of_IN eastern_JJ Rewa_NNP Kntha_NNP ,_, with_IN large_JJ areas_NNS of_IN land_NN rich_NNS in_IN springs_NNS ,_, the_DT cold_NN is_VBZ about_IN January_NNP sometimes_RB very_RB severe_JJ ,_, ice_JJ forming_VBG on_IN pools_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT crops_NNS suffering_VBG severely_RB from_IN frost_NN ._.
The_DT hot_JJ weather_NN lasts_VBZ from_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN April_NNP till_NN after_IN a_DT good_JJ fall_NN of_IN rain_NN in_IN July_NNP ._.
The_DT heat_NN ,_, too_RB ,_, is_VBZ sometimes_RB very_RB severe_JJ ,_, the_DT thermometer_NN in_IN the_DT shade_NN in_IN Lunvda_NNP and_CC Briya_NNP standing_VBG at_IN 108_CD and_CC 110_CD ._.
In_IN 1878_CD the_DT heat_NN was_VBD so_RB great_JJ that_IN several_JJ people_NNS died_VBD of_IN it_PRP and_CC bats_NNS and_CC monkeys_NNS fell_VBD dead_JJ from_IN the_DT trees_NNS ._.
Healthy_NNP in_IN the_DT open_JJ parts_NNS ,_, the_DT climate_NN of_IN the_DT eastern_JJ hill_NN and_CC forest_JJS tracts_NNS ,_, especially_RB of_IN Briya_NNP and_CC Rajpipla_NNP ,_, is_VBZ very_RB sickly_JJ ._.
Fever_NNP ,_, present_JJ throughout_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, is_VBZ commonest_JJS in_IN September_NNP ,_, October_NNP ,_, and_CC part_NN of_IN November_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT waterpools_NNS and_CC rank_VB forest_JJS growth_NN of_IN the_DT rains_NNS are_VBP drying_VBG up_RP ._.
In_IN the_DT hilly_NN parts_NNS the_DT soil_NN varies_NNS much_RB ,_, but_CC in_IN the_DT open_JJ districts_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ black_JJ throughout_IN ._.
Except_IN a_DT few_JJ tracts_NNS of_IN rocky_JJ and_CC inferior_JJ black_JJ soil_NN ,_, the_DT Rewa_NNP Kntha_NNP is_VBZ on_IN the_DT whole_JJ fertile_NN ._.

Svantvdi_NNP ,_, about_RB fifty_JJ miles_NNS long_RB and_CC from_IN ten_VBN to_TO thirty_VB broad_JJ ,_, is_VBZ a_DT compact_JJ territory_NN ,_, unbroken_VBN by_IN the_DT lands_NNS of_IN any_DT other_JJ States_NNS or_CC Districts_NNS ._.
Bounded_VBN on_IN the_DT north_NN by_IN the_DT Mlvan_NNP sub-division_NN of_IN Ratngiri_NNP ,_, ._.
it_PRP is_VBZ separated_VBN by_IN the_DT line_NN of_IN the_DT Sahydri_NNP hills_NNS ,_, on_IN the_DT north-east_JJ ,_, from_IN the_DT lands_NNS of_IN Kolhpur_NNP ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT east_NN and_CC south-east_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT Belguum_NNP and_CC Bidi_NNP sub-divisions_NNS of_IN the_DT British_JJ district_NN of_IN Belgaum_NNP ._.
To_TO the_DT south_JJ lie_VBP the_DT Dicholi_NNP and_CC Pedna_NNP sub-divisions_NNS of_IN the_DT Portuguese_NNP territory_NN of_IN Goa_NNP ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT west_NN and_CC north-west_JJ ,_, the_DT Ratngiri_NNP sub-divisions_NNS of_IN Vengurla_NNP and_CC Mlvau_NNP ._.
Climate_NNP and_CC natural_JJ features_NNS ._.
The_DT cold_JJ season_NN begins_VBZ about_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN November_NNP ,_, the_DT weather_NN very_RB suddenly_RB changing_VBG from_IN damp_JJ warmth_NN to_TO dry_VB cold_NN ._.
From_IN February_NNP to_TO the_DT middle_NN of_IN May_NNP strong_JJ gusty_NN winds_NNS blow_VBP from_IN the_DT north-_JJ west_NN ._.
The_DT hot_JJ weather_NN begins_VBZ in_IN March_NNP ,_, when_WRB at_IN times_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT afternoon_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT heavy_JJ cloudy_NN sky_NN ,_, the_DT thermometer_NN rises_VBZ to_TO 94_CD ._.
In_IN April_NNP ,_, the_DT hottest_JJS month_NN in_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, mists_NNS and_CC fogs_NNS are_VBP sometimes_RB followed_VBN by_IN thunder_NN ,_, lightning_NN ,_, and_CC rain_NN from_IN the_DT north-east_NN ._.
May_NNP ,_, though_IN it_PRP has_VBZ a_DT higher_JJR average_JJ temperature_NN than_IN April_NNP ,_, is_VBZ freshened_VBN by_IN a_DT strong_JJ sea-breeze_NN ._.
The_DT rainy_NN season_NN begins_VBZ early_JJ in_IN June_NNP and_CC ends_VBZ about_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN October_NNP ._.
The_DT soil_NN is_VBZ chiefly_VBG a_DT light_JJ sand_NN full_JJ of_IN stones_NNS and_CC gravel_NN ,_, and_CC unable_JJ to_TO yield_VB the_DT better_JJR class_NN of_IN crops_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT north_NN is_VBZ a_DT deep_JJ red_JJ soil_NN ,_, the_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT decomposition_NN of_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT lower_JJR trap_NN flows_NNS ._.
None_NN of_IN the_DT rivers_NNS are_VBP of_IN any_DT considerable_JJ size_NN :_: the_DT Svantvdi_NNP rivers_NNS ,_, rising_VBG from_IN the_DT western_JJ Shydri_NNP slopes_NNS and_CC passing_VBG west_NN to_TO the_DT sea_NN ,_, displaying_VBG much_JJ sameness_NN of_IN character_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT authentic_JJ record_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT Svantvdi_NNP State_NNP previous_JJ to_TO 1896_CD ._.
*_JJ Svantvdi_NNP ._.
Population-192,948_NNP ._.
The_DT Svantvdi_NNP State_NNP affords_NNS a_DT good_JJ instance_NN of_IN the_DT efficacy_NN of_IN surveillance_NN and_CC cognate_NN measures_NNS in_IN excluding_VBG plague_NN from_IN a_DT District_NNP or_CC State_NNP when_WRB thoroughly_NN and_CC energetically_RB put_VBD in_IN force_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ bound-_JJ ed_NN on_IN the_DT west_NN and_CC north_JJ by_IN Ratngiri_NNP District_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT south_NN by_IN Portuguese_JJ Territory_NNP ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT east_NN by_IN Kolhpur_NNP and_CC the_DT Southern_NNP Martha_NNP Country_NNP and_CC Belgaum_NNP ._.
Throughout_IN 1897_CD and_CC 1898_CD ,_, the_DT two_CD latter_NN were_VBD almost_RB constantly_RB infected_VBN ,_, and_CC imported_VBN cases_NNS occurred_VBD as_RB early_RB as_IN December_NNP 1896_CD ,_, ultimately_RB reach-ing_VBG a_DT total_NN of_IN 41_CD ,_, of_IN which_WDT no_DT less_JJR than_IN 37_CD were_VBD fatal_JJ ._.
Yet_RB ,_, up_RB to_TO October_NNP 1898_CD ,_, indigenous_JJ plague_NN was_VBD unknown_JJ in_IN the_DT Svantvdi_NNP State_NNP ._.
As_RB early_RB as_IN October_NNP 1896_CD ,_, Mr._NNP L._NNP P._NNP Walsh_NNP ,_, C._NNP I._NNP E._NNP ,_, the_DT Political_NNP Superintendent_NNP ,_, had_VBD called_VBN a_DT meeting_NN of_IN the_DT principal_JJ inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT Town_NNP and_CC District_NNP ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO im-_JJ press_NN on_IN them_PRP the_DT necessity_NN for_IN making_VBG arrangements_NNS to_TO ward_VB off_RP plague_NN ,_, should_MD it_PRP approach_VB ;_: and_CC to_TO deal_VB with_IN it_PRP ,_, should_MD it_PRP appear_VB in_IN the_DT State_NNP ._.
Dr._NNP D._NNP G._NNP Dalgado_NNP ,_, the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, delivered_VBD lectures_NNS on_IN the_DT subject_NN by_IN special_JJ request_NN ,_, and_CC every_DT endeavour_NN was_VBD made_VBN to_TO make_VB all_DT classes_NNS clearly_RB understand_VBP the_DT position_NN they_PRP had_VBD to_TO face_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT need_NN for_IN aiding_VBG the_DT authorities_NNS in_IN the_DT execution_NN of_IN such_JJ measures_NNS as_IN might_MD be_VB deemed_VBN necessary_JJ ._.
*_JJ Bombay_NNP Gazetteer_NNP ,_, Vol_NNP ._.
X.._NN ?_. 868_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
XI_NN ._.
From_IN November_NNP 1896_CD to_TO March_NNP 1897_CD ,_, 26_CD cases_NNS were_VBD imported-all_JJ ,_, with_IN one_CD exception_NN ,_, proving_VBG fatal-but_JJ each_DT was_VBD at_IN once_RB detected_VBN ,_, and_CC prevented_VBD from_IN establishing_VBG infection_NN ._.
This_DT was_VBD rendered_VBN the_DT more_RBR easy_JJ on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT situation_NN of_IN the_DT houses_NNS and_CC dwellings_NNS throughout_IN the_DT Agency_NNP ;_: for_IN they_PRP all_DT stand_VBP in_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ compounds_NNS ,_, entirely_RB detached_VBN from_IN each_DT other_JJ ._.
Patients_NNS were_VBD examined_VBN by_IN a_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP ,_, their_PRP$ clothes_NNS burnt_IN when_WRB neces-_JJ sary_NN ,_, their_PRP$ houses_NNS disinfected_VBN ,_, unroofed_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN all_DT cases_NNS vacated_VBN by_IN the_DT inmates_NNS ._.
A_DT shed_NN was_VBD also_RB erected_VBN outside_IN the_DT town_NN for_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN patients_NNS ._.
Towards_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN 1897_CD ,_, when_WRB plague_NN was_VBD raging_VBG in_IN a_DT severe_JJ form_NN in_IN Belgaum_NNP ,_, Major_NNP H._NNP M._NNP Abud_NNP ,_, I._NNP S._NNP C._NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD then_RB acting_VBG as_IN Political_JJ Superintendent_NN ,_, opened_VBD an_DT Observation_NN Camp_NNP at_IN Kumbheshvar_NNP at_IN the_DT foot_NN of_IN the_DT Amboli_NNP Ght_NNP and_CC another_DT at_IN Konal_NNP at_IN the_DT foot_NN of_IN the_DT Rm_NNP Ght_NNP ._.
These_DT Camps_NNP served_VBD the_DT two_CD principal_JJ routes_NNS from_IN the_DT infected_JJ districts_NNS ;_: but_CC there_EX were_VBD also_RB four_CD foot-paths_JJ leading_VBG into_IN the_DT State_NNP from_IN above_IN the_DT Ghats_NNP ._.
These_DT were_VBD effectively_RB guarded_VBN by_IN men_NNS of_IN the_DT Svantvdi_NNP Infantry_NNP Corps_NNP ._.
Up_RB to_TO the_DT middle_NN of_IN April_NNP 1898_CD ,_, all_DT travellers_NNS were_VBD detained_VBN at_IN these_DT Camps_NNP for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN seven_CD days_NNS (_( after_IN disinfection_NN both_DT of_IN themselves_PRP and_CC of_IN their_PRP$ kit_NN )_) ,_, a_DT different_JJ warrant_NN being_VBG allotted_VBN to_TO the_DT arrivals_NNS of_IN each_DT day_NN ;_: but_CC subsequently_RB only_RB those_DT found_VBN with_IN suspicious_JJ symptoms_NNS were_VBD detained_VBN ;_: the_DT rest_NN ,_, after_IN being_VBG inspected_VBN and_CC disinfected_VBN ,_, being_VBG allowed_VBN to_TO proceed_VB to_TO their_PRP$ destination_NN ,_, where_WRB they_PRP were_VBD placed_VBN under_IN surveillance_NN for_IN eight_CD days_NNS ._.
The_DT knowledge_NN of_IN the_DT existence_NN of_IN a_DT rigid_JJ system_NN of_IN inspection_NN and_CC detention_NN at_IN a_DT place_NN soon_RB checks_VBZ the_DT importation_NN of_IN plague_NN into_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC this_DT was_VBD exemplified_VBN in_IN Svantvdi_NNP ,_, where_WRB ,_, between_IN April_NNP 1897_CD and_CC September_NNP 1898-a_JJ period_NN of_IN 18_CD months-only_JJ 4_CD imported_VBN cases_NNS occurred_VBD ._.
Shirwal_NNP ._.
Population-137_NNP ._.
First_RB Epidemic.-In_NNP October_NNP 1898_CD ,_, the_DT State_NNP was_VBD subjected_VBN to_TO the_DT only_JJ epidemic_NN it_PRP has_VBZ known-if_NN ,_, indeed_RB ,_, an_DT outbreak_NN in_IN a_DT village_NN of_IN 137_CD souls_NNS ,_, lasting_VBG for_IN a_DT month_NN ,_, and_CC affecting_VBG 18_CD people_NNS ,_, of_IN whom_WP no_DT more_JJR than_IN 6_CD succumbed-can_JJ be_VB so_RB termed_JJ ._.
During_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 7th_CD October_NNP 1898_CD ,_, a_DT Mahr_NNP belonging_NN to_TO an_DT infected_JJ village_NN of_IN the_DT Belgaum_NNP District_NNP manages_VBZ to_TO evade_VB the_DT guard_NN watching_VBG the_DT different_JJ passes_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, cutting_VBG across_IN the_DT Ghts_NNP by_IN an_DT unfrequented_JJ path_NN ,_, visited_VBD a_DT woman_NN residing_VBG in_IN the_DT village_NN of_IN Fukeri_NNP ,_, and_CC ,_, having_VBG communicated_VBN the_DT infection_NN to_TO her_PRP$ ,_, returned_VBN to_TO British_JJ Territory_NNP ,_, where_WRB presumably_RB he_PRP died_VBD ._.
The_DT woman_NN was_VBD attended_VBN in_IN her_PRP$ illness_NN by_IN a_DT relative_JJ ,_, who_WP belonged_VBD to_TO the_DT village_NN of_IN Shirwal_NNP ,_, three_CD miles_NNS distant_VBP from_IN the_DT Belgaum_NNP boundary_NN ._.
This_DT relative_NN ,_, a_DT man_NN ,_, caught_VBD the_DT disease_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, returning_VBG to_TO Shirwal_NNP ,_, infected_VBD his_PRP$ village_NN ._.
Within_IN a_DT week_NN 13_CD people_NNS were_VBD attacked_VBN ._.
Never_RB was_VBD the_DT origin_NN of_IN an_DT outbreak_NN more_JJR clearly_RB traced_VBN ._.
The_DT outbreak_NN was_VBD reported_VBN to_TO Mr._NNP Walsh_NNP on_IN the_DT 13th_CD October_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC be_VB thus_RB describes_VBZ the_DT repressive_JJ measures_NNS adopted_VBN :_: -_: ``_`` In_IN order_NN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN to_TO the_DT neighbouring_NN villages_NNS ,_, the_DT Awath_NNP ,_, of_IN the_DT village_NN of_IN Shirwal_NNP in_IN which_WDT plague_NN had_VBD broken_VBN out_RP was_VBD at_IN once_RB surrounded_VBN by_IN a_DT cordon_NN of_IN Police_NNP find_VBP men_NNS of_IN the_DT Local_NNP Corps_NNP ;_: huts_NNS were_VBD erected_VBN on_IN a_DT site_NN some_DT half_PDT a_DT mile_JJ distant_NN from_IN Shirwal_NNP ,_, to_TO which_WDT all_PDT the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT A_NNP wath_NN were_VBD removed_VBN ,_, but_CC without_IN being_VBG permitted_VBN to_TO take_VB any_DT item_NN of_IN their_PRP$ clothes_NNS or_CC bedding_NN ;_: these_DT persons_NNS were_VBD disinfected_VBN ,_, as_IN was_VBD also_RB any_DT kit_NN which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO take_VB with_IN them_PRP ._.
The_DT persons_NNS stricken_VBP with_IN plague_NN were_VBD placed_VBN in_IN a_DT separate_JJ shed_NN ,_, where_WRB they_PRP were_VBD treated_VBN by_IN a_DT hospital_NN assistant_NN ,_, who_WP ,_, after_IN some_DT days_NNS '_POS delay_NN ,_, was_VBD assisted_VBN by_IN two_CD inoculated_JJ attendants_NNS ._.
All_PDT the_DT huts_NNS in_IN the_DT Awath_NNP and_CC all_PDT the_DT clothes_NNS and_CC bedding_NN of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS thereof_VBP were_VBD burnt_NNS ;_: the_DT ground_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT Awath_NNP stood_NN was_VBD first_RB saturated_VBN with_IN kerosine_JJ oil_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD then_RB fired_VBN ._.
The_DT State_NNP Krbhri_NNP was_VBD directed_VBN to_TO appraise_VB the_DT value_NN of_IN the_DT huts_NNS and_CC property_NN destroyed_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO SAVANTVADI_NNP ._. ]_NN
369_CD erect_JJ new_JJ huts_NNS for_IN the_DT villagers_NNS at_IN the_DT expense_NN of_IN the_DT State_NNP ,_, and_CC further_RB to_TO feed_VB the_DT inhabit-_JJ ants_NNS so_RB long_RB as_IN they_PRP were_VBD hindered_VBN by_IN the_DT military_JJ cordon_NN from_IN following_VBG their_PRP$ usual_JJ occu-_JJ pations_NNS ._.
The_DT cordon_NN was_VBD removed_VBN on_IN the_DT 3rd_CD December_NNP ,_, having_VBG been_VBN maintained_VBN for_IN 51_CD days_NNS ._. ''_''
The_DT result_NN was_VBD eminently_RB satisfactory_JJ ;_: in_IN the_DT succeeding_VBG four_CD weeks_NNS only_RB 3_CD more_JJR cases_NNS occurred_VBD ,_, and_CC plague_NN then_RB ceased_VBD in_IN Svantvdi_NNP ._.
From_IN October_NNP 1898_CD to_TO April_NNP 1899_CD there_EX occurred_VBD 11_CD more_RBR imported_JJ cases_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT 9_CD ended_VBD fatally_RB ._.
In_IN May_NNP 1899_CD there_EX was_VBD no_DT case_NN ,_, either_RB imported_VBN or_CC indigenous_JJ ._.

?_. 371_CD CHAPTER_NN XII_NN ._.
Part_NN I.-Plague_NNP Commissions_NNP ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ become_VBN the_DT custom_NN of_IN all_DT civilized_JJ nations_NNS to_TO appoint_VB ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN enquiring_VBG into_IN all_DT questions_NNS of_IN the_DT first_JJ importance_NN or_CC of_IN universal_JJ interest_NN ,_, at_IN such_JJ times_NNS as_IN they_PRP assume_VBP peculiar_JJ prominence_NN ,_, a_DT body_NN of_IN experts_NNS ._.
Such_JJ a_DT body_NN of_IN experts_NNS is_VBZ termed_VBN a_DT Commission_NNP ,_, which_WDT may_MD be_VB defined_VBN as_IN ``_`` a_DT company_NN of_IN persons_NNS joined_VBN together_RB in_IN the_DT exercise_NN of_IN some_DT public_JJ duty_NN or_CC some_DT public_JJ trust_NN ._. ''_''
One_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS notable_JJ instances_NNS of_IN such_JJ a_DT Commission-one_NNP indeed_RB not_RB nationally_RB ,_, but_CC internationally_RB ,_, representative-was_JJ the_DT great_JJ Peace_NNP Conference_NNP which_WDT lately_RB sat_VBD at_IN the_DT Hague_NNP ._.
The_DT widespread_JJ ignorance_NN concerning_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT terrible_JJ deadliness_NN of_IN ,_, Plague_NNP ;_: its_PRP$ long_JJ absence_NN in_IN epidemic_JJ form_NN from_IN Europe_NNP or_CC its_PRP$ neighbourhood_NN ;_: the_DT great_JJ progress_NN made_VBN in_IN every_DT department_NN of_IN Medical_NNP science_NN ,_, since_IN Medical_NNP science_NN last_JJ had_VBD an_DT opportunity_NN of_IN investi-_JJ gating_VBG it_PRP ;_: the_DT possibility_NN of_IN a_DT wide_JJ spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN from_IN a_DT central_JJ sea-port_NN like_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT consequent_JJ necessity_NN for_IN all_DT Governments_NNS to_TO be_VB intimate_JJ as_IN well_RB with_IN its_PRP$ nature_NN as_IN with_IN the_DT measures_NNS necessary_JJ to_TO prevent_VB an_DT outbreak_NN ,_, rendered_VBD the_DT opportunity_NN afforded_VBN by_IN the_DT present_JJ visitation_NN ,_, one_CD not_RB lightly_RB to_TO be_VB neglected_VBN ._.
Accordingly_RB ,_, the_DT Governments_NNS of_IN Egypt_NNP ,_, Austria_NNP ,_, Russia_NNP ,_, Germany_NNP ,_, Italy_NNP ,_, and_CC Ceylon_NNP are_VBP seen_VBN sending_VBG formal_JJ Commissions_NNS and_CC experts_NNS to_TO Bombay_NNP to_TO study_VB the_DT plague_NN ,_, while_IN eminent_JJ savants_NNS from_IN all_DT parts_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP and_CC India_NNP visited_VBD Bombay_NNP and_CC the_DT surrounding_JJ country_NN ._.
The_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP itself_PRP appointed_VBD one_CD Commission_NNP Sir_NNP Andrew_NNP Wingate_NNP ,_, Surgeon-General_NNP Cleghorn_NNP ,_, and_CC Col._NNP Hay_NNP )_) to_TO tour_VB throughout_IN the_DT plague-affected_JJ districts_NNS ,_, and_CC advise_VB on_IN the_DT measures_NNS to_TO be_VB adopted_VBN ,_, and_CC a_DT second_JJ (_( the_DT Plague_NNP Research_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, see_VBP Chapters_NNP II_NNP ._.
and_CC III_NNP ._. )_)
for_IN the_DT scientific_JJ investigation_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
The_DT theories_NNS and_CC conclusions_NNS formed_VBN from_IN the_DT Hongkong_NNP epidemic_NN were_VBD here_RB put_VBN to_TO a_DT further_JJ test_NN and_CC developed_VBD ;_: while_IN the_DT varying_VBG conditions_NNS of_IN life_NN ,_, of_IN climate_NN ,_, of_IN atmosphere_RB ,_, of_IN hilly_RB country_NN and_CC the_DT plains_NNS and_CC the_DT coast_NN of_IN crowded_JJ cities_NNS ,_, and_CC thin_JJ straggling_NN villages_NNS ,_, brought_VBD to_TO light_VB many_JJ an_DT interesting_JJ fact_NN about_IN a_DT disease_NN full_JJ of_IN riddles_NNS and_CC sur-_JJ prises_NNS ._.
The_DT medical_JJ faculty_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT regard_NN for_IN human_JJ life_NN ,_, peculiarly_RB its_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, undaunted_JJ by_IN many_JJ a_DT failure_NN ,_, never_RB relaxed_VBD its_PRP$ efforts_NNS ,_, now_RB trying_VBG new_JJ remedies_NNS ,_, now_RB endeavouring_VBG to_TO invent_VB a_DT curative_JJ serum_NN ._.
The_DT happy_JJ idea_NN of_IN prophylactic_JJ inoculation_NN ,_, first_RB conceived_VBN by_IN Mr_NNP ,_, Haffkiue_NNP ,_, also_RB deserves_VBZ mention_NN ._.
But_CC much_RB as_IN Joint_NNP Foreign_NNP Commissions_NNP and_CC individual_JJ scientists_NNS did-and_VBP they_PRP did_VBD much_RB ,_, although_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ labours_NNS can_MD not_RB be_VB discussed_VBN here-there_RB remained_VBD a_DT great_JJ deal_NN more_JJR to_TO be_VB done_VBN ,_, as_RB well_RB in_IN the_DT interests_NNS of_IN science_NN as_IN for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN admin-_JJ 'istratiou_NNS ._.
A_DT great_JJ many_JJ interesting_JJ facts_NNS had_VBD been_VBN collected_VBN ._.
A_DT few_JJ valuable_JJ deductions_NNS had_VBD been_VBN made_VBN ._.
But_CC there_EX were_VBD still_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT words_NNS of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, ``_`` many_JJ valuable_JJ items_NNS of_IN information_NN to_TO be_VB ascertained_VBN from_IN officers_NNS who_WP have_VBP been_VBN employed_VBN on_IN plague_NN operations_NNS that_WDT have_VBP not_RB been_VBN recorded_VBN in_IN official_JJ reports_NNS ;_: and_CC there_EX are_VBP also_RB many_JJ circumstances_NNS connected_VBN with_IN the_DT outbreaks_NNS at_IN different_JJ places_NNS which_WDT require_VBP to_TO be_VB locally_RB examined_VBN by_IN persons_NNS who_WP can_MD collate_VB the_DT facts_NNS and_CC form_NN conclusions_NNS which_WDT will_MD be_VB accepted_VBN by_IN public_JJ as_RB well_RB as_IN scientific_JJ opinion_NN in_IN respect_NN of_IN them_PRP ._. ''_''
Accordingly_RB ,_, the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP appointed_VBD the_DT Indian_NNP Plague_NNP Commission_NNP consisting_VBG of-_JJ Professor_NNP T._NNP R._NNP Fraser_NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, LL.D._NNP ,_, F._NNP R._NNP S._NNP ,_, Professor_NNP of_IN Materia_NNP Medica_NNP in_IN the_DT ?_. 372_CD [_JJ CHAP_NNP ._.
XII._NN ,_, PT_NNP ._.
I_PRP ._.
University_NNP of_IN Edinburgh_NNP ,_, President_NNP of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT following_JJ members_NNS :_: -_: Mr._NNP J._NNP P._NNP Hewett_NNP ,_, C._NNP I._NNP E._NNP ,_, I._NNP C._NNP S._NNP ,_, Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP in_IN the_DT Home_NNP Department_NNP ;_: Professor_NNP A._NNP E._NNP Wright_NNP ,_, M._NNP D._NNP ,_, Professor_NNP of_IN Pathology_NNP in_IN the_DT Army_NNP Medical_NNP School_NNP ,_, Netley_NNP ;_: Mr._NNP A._NNP Cumine_NNP ,_, I._NNP C._NNP S._NNP ,_, a_DT Senior_NNP Collector_NNP in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ;_: Dr._NNP M._NNP A._NNP Ruffer_NNP of_IN the_DT Egyptian_JJ Sanitary_NNP Department_NNP ;_: and_CC Mr._NNP C._NNP J._NNP Hallifax_NNP ,_, I._NNP C._NNP S._NNP ,_, Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Commission_NNP ._.
The_DT questions_NNS to_TO which_WDT the_DT Indian_NNP Plague_NNP Commission_NNP devoted_VBD themselves_PRP were_VBD :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) The_DT origin_NN of_IN the_DT different_JJ outbreaks_NNS of_IN plague_NN ;_: (_( 2_CD )_) The_DT manner_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ communicated_VBN ;_: (_( 3_CD )_) The_DT effects_NNS of_IN curative_JJ serum_NN ;_: and_CC (_( 4_CD )_) The_DT effects_NNS of_IN preventive_JJ inoculation_NN ._.
They_PRP arrived_VBD in_IN Bombay_NNP on_IN the_DT 25th_CD November_NNP 1898_CD ,_, and_CC at_IN once_RB proceeded_VBN to_TO inspect_VB operations_NNS and_CC to_TO record_VB evidence_NN ._.
Local_JJ Governments_NNS and_CC Administrations_NNS and_CC Native_JJ States_NNS were_VBD asked_VBN to_TO put_VB forward_RB such_JJ witnesses_NNS ,_, both_DT official_JJ and_CC non-official_JJ ,_, as_IN they_PRP desired_VBD to_TO be_VB examined_VBN ,_, while_IN the_DT general_JJ public_NN were_VBD invited_VBN by_IN means_NNS of_IN advertise-_JJ ments_NNS in_IN the_DT public_JJ Press_NNP to_TO tender_VB evidence_NN before_IN the_DT Commission_NNP ,_, which_WDT ,_, after_IN examining_VBG witnesses_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP for_IN a_DT week_NN ,_, visited_VBD Dharwar_NNP and_CC Hubli_NNP en_VBP route_NN for_IN Bangalore_NNP ,_, at_IN which_WDT places_VBZ they_PRP heard_VBD large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN witnesses_NNS put_VBN forward_RB by_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP and_CC Madras_NNP Governments_NNP and_CC by_IN the_DT Mysore_NNP Administration_NNP ._.
From_IN Bangalore_NNP they_PRP proceeded_VBD to_TO Hyderabad_NNP (_( Deccan_NNP )_) ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT way_NN made_VBD a_DT brief_JJ halt_NN at_IN Guntakul_NNP ._.
Thence_NN they_PRP visited_VBD in_IN turn_NN the_DT Central_NNP Provinces_NNPS ,_, the_DT Lower_NNP Provinces_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, the_DT North-West_NNP Provinces_NNPS ,_, and_CC the_DT Punjab_NNP ._.
But_CC the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP claimed_VBD most_JJS of_IN their_PRP$ attention_NN ._.
Karachi_NNP was_VBD visited_VBN on_IN the_DT 23rd_CD January_NNP 1899_CD ,_, and_CC after_IN proceeding_VBG to_TO Cutch_NNP Mandvi_NNP ,_, Ahmedabad_NNP ,_, Baroda_NNP ,_, Surat_NNP and_CC Damaun_NNP Road_NNP ,_, the_DT Commission_NNP once_RB more_JJR arrived_JJ in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, where_WRB they_PRP devoted_VBD a_DT fortnight_NN to_TO taking_VBG further_JJ evidence_NN and_CC examining_VBG the_DT various_JJ arrangements_NNS in_IN force_NN ,_, the_DT hospitals_NNS ,_, the_DT sea_NN and_CC railway_NN inspection_NN ,_, segregation_NN and_CC sanitation_NN ._.
Bacteriological_JJ experts_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP and_CC the_DT R._NNP A._NNP M._NNP C._NNP conducted_VBD certain_JJ experiments_NNS for_IN them_PRP at_IN Bangalore_NNP and_CC Bombay_NNP :_: whilst_NN two_CD medical_JJ officers_NNS were_VBD deputed_VBN by_IN them_PRP to_TO investigate_VB bacteriologically_RB the_DT nature_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN known_VBN as_IN ``_`` Mahamari_NNP ,_, ''_'' at_IN Kumaun_NNP and_CC Garhwal_NNP ._.
On_IN the_DT 22nd_CD of_IN February_NNP 1899_CD the_DT Commission_NNP left_VBD Bombay_NNP for_IN the_DT second_JJ time_NN to_TO visit_VB other_JJ places_NNS in_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP ,_, which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN seriously_RB affected_VBN by_IN Plague_NNP ._.
Thus_RB Poona_NNP ,_, Satara_NNP ,_, Belgaum_NNP ,_, Bijapur_NNP ,_, Sholapur_NNP ,_, Ahmednagar_NNP ,_, and_CC Nasik_NNP were_VBD in_IN turn_NN inspected_VBN and_CC evidence_NN recorded_VBN at_IN these_DT places_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT 8th_CD of_IN March_NNP the_DT Commission_NNP returned_VBD to_TO Bombay_NNP ,_, where_WRB a_DT fresh_JJ batch_NN of_IN witnesses_NNS offered_VBN themselves_PRP for_IN examination_NN ._.
The_DT witnesses_NNS examined_VBN by_IN the_DT Commission_NNP comprised_VBD all_DT classes_NNS of_IN officials_NNS and_CC non-_JJ officials_NNS ,_, experts_NNS and_CC laymen_NNS ,_, Civil_NNP and_CC Military_NNP officers_NNS of_IN all_DT grades_NNS who_WP had_VBD had_VBN anything_NN to_TO do_VB with_IN plague_NN measures_NNS ._.
European_JJ and_CC Native_JJ scientists_NNS and_CC medical_JJ men_NNS ,_, hakims_NNS and_CC vaids_NNS were_VBD alike_RB examined_VBN ._.
Whilst_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT one_CD hand_NN ,_, a_DT great_JJ deal_NN of_IN valuable_JJ evidence_NN was_VBD given_VBN before_IN the_DT Com-_NNP mission_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ ,_, it_PRP must_MD bo_VB noted_VBD that_IN a_DT considerable_JJ mass_NN of_IN less_RBR valuable_JJ theorising_NN was_VBD offered_VBN ,_, more_RBR especially_RB by_IN those_DT who_WP had_VBD formed_VBN pre-conceived_JJ or_CC ill-founded_JJ opinions_NNS as_IN regards_NNS the_DT origin_NN ,_, spread_NN and_CC other_JJ circumstances_NNS connected_VBN with_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
An_DT amusing_JJ example_NN of_IN such_JJ evidence_NN may_MD perhaps_RB be_VB given_VBN here_RB ._.
PLAGUE_NNP COMMISSIONS_NNP ._. ]_NN
373_CD A_NNP scientific_JJ witness_NN was_VBD being_VBG examined_VBN ,_, the_DT strength_NN of_IN whose_WP$ pre-conceived_JJ objections_NNS to_TO inoculation_VB had_VBN apparently_RB overcome_VBN his_PRP$ logical_JJ faculties_NNS ._.
He_PRP was_VBD of_IN opinion_NN ,_, he_PRP said_VBD ,_, that_IN the_DT inoculation_NN of_IN one_CD person_NN was_VBD the_DT direct_JJ cause_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN some_DT other_JJ uninocu-_JJ lated_VBN person_NN ._.
``_`` Do_VBP you_PRP really_RB mean_VB to_TO tell_VB us_PRP ,_, ''_'' asked_VBD a_DT certain_JJ critical_JJ member_NN of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP ,_, ``_`` that_DT if_IN in_IN a_DT family_NN one_CD person_NN was_VBD inoculated_VBN and_CC another_DT person_NN got_VBD plague_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT inoculation_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ member_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN would_MD be_VB the_DT direct_JJ cause_NN of_IN the_DT second_JJ being_VBG attacked_VBN ?_. ''_''
``_`` I_PRP do_VBP ,_, ''_'' said_VBD the_DT witness_NN solemnly_RB ._.
``_`` On_IN the_DT same_JJ principle_NN ,_, then_RB ,_, ''_'' the_DT member_NN continued_VBD ,_, ``_`` you_PRP would_MD argue_VB that_IN if_IN in_IN a_DT family_NN one_CD member_NN got_VBD married_JJ and_CC another_DT member_NN got_VBD the_DT measles_NNS ,_, that_IN the_DT marriage_NN would_MD be_VB the_DT direct_JJ cause_NN of_IN measles_NNS ?_. ''_''
``_`` I_PRP would_MD ,_, ''_'' said_VBD the_DT witness_NN ,_, unhesitatingly_RB ._.
``_`` Thank_NN you_PRP ,_, ''_'' said_VBD the_DT President_NNP ,_, ``_`` we_PRP need_VBP not_RB detain_VB you_PRP any_DT longer_JJR ._. ''_''
Evidence_NN was_VBD taken_VBN in_IN English_NNP as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN vernaculars_NNS ,_, always_RB in_IN public_JJ ,_, and_CC ,_, wherever_WRB possible_JJ ,_, in_IN Town_NNP Halls_NNP and_CC other_JJ public_JJ places_NNS ._.
Facts_NNS and_CC figures_NNS were_VBD called_VBN for_IN and_CC scrutinized_VBN ,_, each_DT witness_NN being_VBG asked_VBD beforehand_NN to_TO submit_VB an_DT abstract_NN of_IN the_DT main_JJ points_NNS on_IN which_WDT he_PRP proposed_VBD to_TO speak_VB ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ statements_NNS thoroughly_RB sifted_VBN ._.
Sound_JJ theories_NNS ,_, mature_JJ con-_JJ clusions_NNS ,_, bold_JJ propositions_NNS and_CC cautious_JJ suggestions_NNS were_VBD heard_VBN ,_, and_CC considered_VBN side_NN by_IN side_NN with_IN crude_JJ notions_NNS and_CC ignorant_JJ superstitions_NNS ._.
Armed_VBN with_IN this_DT mass_NN of_IN evidence_NN tendered_VBN by_IN hundreds_NNS of_IN witnesses_NNS ,_, the_DT Commission_NNP left_VBD for_IN Europe_NNP on_IN the_DT 25th_CD of_IN March_NNP to_TO hear_VB further_JJ witnesses_NNS ,_, to_TO consider_VB the_DT evidence_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO write_VB their_PRP$ report_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ at_IN present_JJ nearing_VBG completion_NN ._.
Mention_NN should_MD here_RB be_VB made_VBN of_IN Mr._NNP Fraucis_NNP Silva_NNP ,_, of_IN the_DT Accountant-General_NNP 's_POS Office_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD Chief_NNP Clerk_NNP to_TO the_DT Indian_NNP Plague_NNP Commission_NNP throughout_IN their_PRP$ tour_NN ;_: and_CC who_WP afterwards_RB acted_VBD as_IN Superintendent_NNP of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commissioner_NNP 's_POS Office_NNP ,_, and_CC whose_WP$ assistance_NN in_IN the_DT compilation_NN of_IN this_DT volume_NN has_VBZ been_VBN of_IN the_DT greatest_JJS value_NN ._.
94_CD ?_. 375_CD CHAPTER_NN XII_NN ._.
Part_NN II.-The_NNP Literature_NNP of_IN Plague_NNP ._.
The_DT literature_NN of_IN plague_NN has_VBZ now_RB assumed_VBN such_JJ proportions_NNS that_IN some_DT attempt_NN to_TO classify_VB and_CC collate_VB it_PRP ,_, at_IN least_JJS as_IN regards_NNS such_JJ works_NNS as_IN may_MD be_VB consi-_JJ dered_JJ classics_NNS ,_, will_MD perhaps_RB not_RB be-_JJ out_IN of_IN place_NN here_RB ._.
The_DT methods_NNS of_IN classification_NN which_WDT might_MD be_VB employed_VBN in_IN such_JJ an_DT attempt_NN are_VBP many_JJ ._.
The_DT method_NN adopted_VBN in_IN this_DT chapter_NN is_VBZ that_IN of_IN chronological_JJ order_NN ,_, supplemented_VBN by_IN sub-divisions_NNS of_IN the_DT subject_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB proposed_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, to_TO discuss_VB works_NNS on_IN plague_NN published_VBN before_IN the_DT year_NN 1500_CD A._NNP D._NNP ;_: in_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, the_DT starting_VBG point_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ synopsis_NN will_MD be_VB that_DT fell_VBD cycle_NN of_IN disease-the_JJ Black_NNP Death-which_NNP was_VBD the_DT first_JJ really_RB authentic_JJ visitation_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Europe_NNP ,_, and_CC whose_WP$ identity_NN with_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB open_JJ to_TO question_NN ._.
*_NNS But_CC in_IN these_DT outbursts_NNS of_IN the_DT pestilence_NN ,_, every_DT country_NN in_IN Europe_NNP was_VBD involved_VBN :_: the_DT dread_JJ disease_NN was_VBD discussed_VBN in_IN many_JJ tongues_NNS :_: and_CC this_DT fact_NN has_VBZ necessitated_VBN slight_JJ modifications_NNS in_IN the_DT original_JJ scheme_NN of_IN classification_NN ._.
These_DT are_VBP so_RB obvious_JJ as_IN not_RB to_TO require_VB further_JJ comment_NN ._.
16th_CD and_CC 17th_CD Centuries_NNS ._.

Most_JJS of_IN these_DT works_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ now_RB impossible_JJ to_TO procure_VB ;_: and_CC they_PRP are_VBP probably_RB hardly_RB to_TO be_VB found_VBN outside_IN the_DT Library_NNP of_IN the_DT British_JJ Museum_NNP ._.

18th_JJ Century_NNP ._.

377_CD The_DT following_JJ English_JJ work_NN of_IN this_DT period_NN may_MD also_RB be_VB mentioned_VBN :_: -_: (_( 29_CD )_) Noah_NNP Webster_NNP ,_, History_NNP of_IN Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP ,_, London_NNP ,_, 1800_CD ,_, -_: a_DT work_NN which_WDT contains_VBZ no_DT medical_JJ information_NN ,_, but_CC connects_VBZ plague_JJ epidemics_NNS with_IN famines_NNS and_CC other_JJ disasters_NNS ._.
