19th_JJ Century_NNP ;_: The_DT plague_NN literature_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ century_NN is_VBZ voluminous_JJ :_: English_JJ ,_, Ger-_NNP man_NN ,_, and_CC French_JJ savants_NNS have_VBP all_DT endeavoured_VBN to_TO collect_VB and_CC classify_VB the_DT old_JJ records_NNS of_IN this_DT mysterious_JJ discase_NN ._.

[_VB A_DT very_RB interesting_JJ little_JJ book_NN ._.
The_DT following_JJ quotations_NNS will_MD serve_VB to_TO illustrate_VB both_DT style_NN and_CC contents_NNS :_: -_: (_( I_PRP )_) We_PRP may_MD ,_, therefore_RB ,_, pass_NN over_IN the_DT epidemics_NNS of_IN 1092_CD in_IN Kief_NNP ,_, of_IN 1188_CD in_IN Norgorod_NNP and_CC some_DT others_NNS ,_, and_CC come_VB at_IN once_RB to_TO the_DT great_JJ outbreak_NN of_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT fourteenth_JJ century-_NN the_DT Black_NNP Death_NNP of_IN 1348-52_JJ ._.
In_IN Russia_NNP this_DT truly_RB terrible_JJ visitation_NN was_VBD no_DT less_RBR destructive_JJ than_IN it_PRP was_VBD in_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN Europe_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ curious_JJ to_TO note_VB that_IN ,_, while_IN the_DT Greek_NNP ,_, Italian_NNP ,_, and_CC other_JJ Western_JJ writers_NNS regard_VBP China_NNP or_CC ``_`` Cathay_JJ ``_`` as_IN the_DT place_NN of_IN origin_NN of_IN this_DT pesti-_JJ lence_NN ,_, the_DT Russian_JJ chroniclers_NNS state_NN that_IN it_PRP came_VBD from_IN India_NNP ._.
The_DT infection_NN seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB entered_VBN Russia_NNP by_IN two_CD routes-one_NN from_IN the_DT South-East_NNP ,_, through_IN the_DT Caucasus_NNP and_CC up_RB the_DT Volga_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT second_JJ and_CC later_RB one_CD from_IN the_DT North-west_NNP ,_, invading_VBG Pkof_NNP and_CC Norgorod_NNP ._.
It_PRP spared_VBD neither_RB high_JJ nor_CC low_JJ ,_, rich_JJ nor_CC poor_JJ ._.
In_IN Moscow_NNP it_PRP caused_VBD the_DT death_NN to_TO the_DT reigning_VBG Grand_NNP Prince_NNP (_( the_DT title_NN of_IN Tsar_NNP was_VBD then_RB unknown_JJ )_) and_CC all_PDT his_PRP$ seven_CD sons_NNS ._.
The_DT great_JJ Russian_JJ historian_NN ,_, Karamsin_NNP ,_, has_VBZ devoted_VBN but_CC a_DT few_JJ paragraphs_NN of_IN his_PRP$ history_NN of_IN this_DT epidemic_JJ ;_: but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ easy_JJ to_TO see_VB that_IN it_PRP was_VBD a_DT disaster_NN of_IN no_DT ordinary_JJ kind_NN ._.
That_IN it_PRP has_VBZ left_VBN less_JJR impress_JJ upon_IN the_DT history_NN of_IN this_DT nation_NN than_IN upon_IN that_DT of_IN others_NNS may_MD be_VB due_JJ to_TO the_DT condition_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN ._.
The_DT ravages_NNS and_CC slaughter_NN which_WDT invariably_RB followed_VBD on_IN a_DT Tartar_NNP invasion_NN left_VBD her_PRP$ scarce_JJ breathing_NN time_NN to_TO notice_VB the_DT added_JJ horrors_NNS of_IN the_DT Black_NNP Death_NNP ._.

Small_JJ wonder_NN it_PRP is_VBZ then_RB that_IN in_IN a_DT country_NN so_RB accustomed_JJ to_TO wholesale_JJ slaughter_NN by_IN Tartar_NNP enemy_NN from_IN with-_JJ out_IN or_CC by_IN rival_JJ rulers_NNS from_IN within_IN ,_, the_DT additional_JJ mortality_NN caused_VBN by_IN the_DT Black_NNP Death_NNP did_VBD not_RB effect_NN those_DT social_JJ or_CC political_JJ transformations_NNS ,_, which_WDT it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN shewn_VBN to_TO have_VB effected_VBN in_IN the_DT more_RBR advanced_JJ and_CC settled_JJ countries_NNS of_IN the_DT West_NNP ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Another_DT serious_JJ outbreak_NN of_IN plague_NN occurred_VBD in_IN 1709_CD ._.
Peter_NNP the_DT Great_NNP was_VBD then_RB at_IN war_NN with_IN the_DT Poles_NNP ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ troops_NNS were_VBD attacked_VBN by_IN the_DT pestilence_NN somewhere_RB near_IN the_DT frontier_NN of_IN the_DT two_CD countries_NNS ._.
His_PRP$ efforts_NNS to_TO quell_VB the_DT disease_NN were_VBD most_RBS energetic_JJ and_CC characteristic_JJ ;_: and_CC some_DT of_IN his_PRP$ measures_NNS ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB added_VBN ,_, were_VBD strikingly_RB in_IN accordance_NN with_IN modern_JJ practice_NN ._.
He_PRP caused_VBD the_DT troops_NNS to_TO be_VB removed_VBN by_IN sea_NN from_IN Marienburg_NNP to_TO Revel_NNP ._.
There_EX they_PRP were_VBD landed_VBN and_CC scattered_VBN over_IN as_RB large_JJ an_DT area_NN of_IN country_NN as_IN possible_JJ ;_: divisions_NNS were_VBD ordered_VBN to_TO encamp_VB so_RB many_JJ miles_NNS apart_RB ,_, and_CC regiments_NNS at_IN least_JJS a_DT verst_JJ (_( two-thirds_NNS of_IN a_DT mile_NN )_) from_IN each_DT other_JJ ._.
Some_DT of_IN his_PRP$ other_JJ measures_NNS were_VBD less_JJR to_TO be_VB commended_VBN ._.
The_DT cordon_NN system_NN was_VBD enforced_VBN with_IN the_DT utmost_JJ severity_NN ._.
Death_NN was_VBD the_DT almost_RB invariable_JJ penalty_NN for_IN the_DT least_JJS infringement_NN of_IN Peter_NNP 's_POS Plague_NNP Regulations_NNPS ._.
Gallows_NNS were_VBD erected_VBN on_IN the_DT public_JJ highways_NNS ,_, and_CC no_DT trial_NN was_VBD accorded_VBN to_TO the_DT unfortunate_JJ victim_NN caught_VBD trying_VBG to_TO break_VB through_IN the_DT cordon_NN ;_: he_PRP was_VBD hanged_VBN at_IN once_RB without_IN benefit_NN of_IN clergy_NN ._.
But_CC then_RB ,_, as_IN now_RB ,_, plague_NN was_VBD not_RB to_TO be_VB overcome_VBN by_IN mere_JJ force_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO be_VB exterminated_VBN at_IN the_DT point_NN of_IN the_DT bayonet_NN ,_, like_IN a_DT regiment_NN of_IN Swedes_NNP or_CC Poles_NNPS ;_: and_CC the_DT hero_NN of_IN Paltava_NNP for_IN once_RB found_VBN himself_PRP in_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN an_DT enemy_NN whom_WP even_RB he_PRP could_MD not_RB subdue_VB ._.
In_IN this_DT epidemic_JJ it_PRP is_VBZ stated_VBN that_IN about_IN a_DT hundred_CD thousand_NN persons_NNS fell_VBD victims_NNS to_TO the_DT plague_NN ;_: and_CC in_IN the_DT following_JJ year_NN ,_, when_WRB Peter_NNP was_VBD attacking_VBG the_DT fortress_NN of_IN Riga_NNP ,_, over_IN 60,000_CD persons_NNS are_VBP said_VBD to_TO have_VB died_VBN from_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ interesting_VBG to_TO note_VB that_DT at_IN that_DT time_NN ,_, and_CC also_RB in_IN the_DT earlier_JJR epidemics_NNS ,_, fumigation_NN ,_, which_WDT may_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN the_DT earliest_JJS form_NN of_IN disinfection_NN ,_, was_VBD freely_RB employed_VBN ._.

The_DT figures_NNS include_VBP both_DT indigenous_JJ as_RB well_RB as_IN imported_VBN cases_NNS and_CC deaths_NNS ._.

*_IN These_DT figures_NNS are_VBP taken_VBN from_IN Nathan_NNP 's_POS Plague_NNP in_IN India_NNP ,_, 1896_CD ,_, 1897_CD ._.
